Title: Jin yu liang yuan hong lou meng
American Psycho
Description: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

Title: Requiem for a Dream
Description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

Title: Battle Royale
Description: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

Title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
Description: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

Title: The Beach
Description: On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.

Title: The Perfect Storm
Description: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

Title: Chocolat
Description: A French woman and her young daughter open up a chocolate shop in a small remote village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

Title: High Fidelity
Description: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

Title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
Description: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

Title: The Little Vampire
Description: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.

Title: 102 Dalmatians
Description: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

Title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
Description: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddy.

Title: Battlefield Earth
Description: It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

Title: Where the Heart Is
Description: A pregnant seventeen-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Walmart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.

Title: Shaft
Description: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.

Title: Pay It Forward
Description: A young boy attempts to make the world a better place after his teacher gives him that chance.

Title: All the Pretty Horses
Description: Two Texas cowboys head to Mexico in search of work, but soon find themselves in trouble with the law after one of them falls in love with a wealthy rancher's daughter.

Title: The Crimson Rivers
Description: A murder detective must follow the footsteps of a brutal killer within the secrets of a classist college.

Title: Get Carter
Description: A Las Vegas mob enforcer travels back to his hometown to investigate his brother's mysterious death.

Title: Under Suspicion
Description: A wealthy attorney in San Juan comes to the police station for "10 minutes" of follow-up questions to finding a 12-year-old girl's body in a park. Another young girl was also raped and murdered weeks earlier and the evidence points to him.

Title: Wonder Boys
Description: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.

Title: Bless the Child
Description: Cody, a little girl abandoned by her mother and raised by her aunt, a nurse, is kidnapped. The girl's guardian, aided by an F.B.I. agent, learn that Cody has supernatural abilities, and the abductees are a Satanic cult willing to do anything to gain them.

Title: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
Description: When a girl is abducted by a vampire, a legendary bounty hunter is hired to bring her back.

Title: Joint Security Area
Description: After a shooting incident at the North/South Korean border/DMZ leaves 2 North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss/Swedish team investigates, what actually happened.

Title: Pollock
Description: A film about the life and career of the American painter, Jackson Pollock.

Title: Left Behind: The Movie
Description: The Biblical prophecy of Armegeddon begins when the Rapture instantly takes all believers in Christ from the Earth. A reporter left behind learns that the Anti-Christ will soon take power.

Title: The Guilty
Description: A young person gets hired to kill someone completely unknown, by someone equally unknown. Or is that true? Nothing is what it seems.

Title: The Weight of Water
Description: A newspaper photographer researches an 1873 double homicide and finds her own life paralleling that of a witness who survived the tragic ordeal.

Title: My Dog Skip
Description: A shy boy grows up in 1940s Mississippi with the help of his beloved dog, Skip.

Title: Waking the Dead
Description: A congressional candidate questions his sanity after seeing the love of his life, presumed dead, suddenly emerge.

Title: Werckmeister Harmonies
Description: A naive young man witnesses an escalation of violence in his small hometown following the arrival of a mysterious circus attraction.

Title: Faust
Description: A man sells his soul to the devil in order to gain superpowers and avenge the brutal death of his girlfriend. When he realizes that the price is the soul of his new love interest, he turns on the devil.

Title: La fidélité
Description: A talented photographer who lands a lucrative job in Paris with a scandal-mongering tabloid and becomes romantically involved with an eccentric children's book publisher while resisting the sexual advances of another photographer.

Title: The Golden Bowl
Description: A man marries an heiress for her money even though he is actually in love with her friend.

Title: The Claim
Description: A prospector who sold his wife and infant daughter in exchange for a mining claim, tries desperately to win them back as he helps to build the Pacific Railroad with a group of pioneer friends.

Title: The House of Mirth
Description: A woman risks losing her chance of happiness with the only man she has ever loved.

Title: Animal Factory
Description: A young man goes to prison and a tough, older convict takes him under his wing as a mentor.

Title: Skipped Parts
Description: An ungrounded young mother and her thoughtful teenage son are banished to a remote provincial town by her domineering father.

Title: Sade
Description: A man prepares himself to be transferred to a detention center and rest home where he will relive one more time the highlights of his youth.

Title: 101 Reykjavík
Description: Will the 30 y.o. Hlynur ever move out of his mother's apartment in Reykjavík? Social welfare keeps him passive but things change when his mother's Spanish friend, Lola, arrives and stays through Xmas and New Year's Eve.

Title: The Monkey's Mask
Description: A lesbian private detective dives head first into murder, manipulation and the consuming power of sex.

Title: Burnt Money
Description: Nene & Angel and their accomplice Cuervo participate in a botched bank robbery in 1965 Buenos Aires, then hide out from the police in Uruguay while the gang breaks down.

Title: Devils on the Doorstep
Description: Villagers in World War II China are unsure what to do with the two enemy prisoners who have been left in their care.

Title: Maybe Baby
Description: A comedy about a couple (Hugh Laurie and Joely Richardson) who are trying to conceive a child.

Title: Crime + Punishment in Suburbia
Description: A darkly romantic story of murder and redemption, set against an eerily familiar American landscape.

Title: Complicity
Description: Cameron Colley is a young scottish journalist, with an interest in exposing the wrongs committed by the rich and powerful. Life is comfortable enough but uneventful, until someone starts murdering the people in his articles.

Title: Up at the Villa
Description: A widow finds choosing a new husband might not be her choice at all, as the actions of her various prospects confine her freedom.

Title: Ritual
Description: A disillusioned filmmaker has an encounter with a young girl who has a ritual of repeating "Tomorrow is my birthday" everyday. He tries to communicate with her through his video camera.

Title: La captive
Description: An adaptation of Proust's "La Prisoniere" (book five of "Remembrance of Things Past"). Set in Paris, France, it is a serious tale of a tragic and dysfunctional love.

Title: Mercy
Description: Detective Catherine Palmer investigates a series of sexually gruesome serial murders and becomes embroiled in a world of lesbianism and bondage after she becomes obsessed with one of the victims' paramours.

Title: Ivans xtc.
Description: Update on Leo Tolstoy's "The Death of Ivan Ilyich," set in contemporary Hollywood.

Title: El mar
Description: Two young men and a woman who shared the same traumatic childhood experience during the Spanish Civil War are reunited years later at a hospital for tuberculosis treatment.

Title: Suspicious River
Description: A young married woman (Parker) sells her body, not just for money, to guests at the motel where she works as a receptionist.

Title: Purely Belter
Description: Two teenage boys will do anything to get money to buy season tickets for their local team.

Title: Ants in the Pants
Description: A late bloomer, 15-year-old Flo experiences his sexual awakening, relentlessly targeting his gorgeous classmate Leonie. Flos friends eagerly try to help him out. The only problem may be Leonies boyfriend.

Title: Jill Rips
Description: A tough guy goes undercover on a personal mission of vengeance into the hardcore world of S&M, to find out who's responsible for the death of his brother.

Title: Priyuralu Pilichindi
Description: An Indian adaptation of Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility" focusing on two sisters of opposing temperaments.

Title: Rancid Aluminum
Description: Pete in London inherits a company. The ambitious accountant makes a deal with a Russian mafia boss. The Russian wants hard currency and grand-kids but kills his daughter's lovers. His daughter needs an Englishman like Sir Francis Drake.

Title: Playing with Fire
Description: Two young people falling in love while exploring the politics of sexual awakening and social relations leading to a complex web of deceit and understanding.

Title: A Rumor of Angels
Description: An old woman helps a young boy resolve his feelings over the death of his mother.

Title: Divided We Fall
Description: In Nazi occupied Czech Republic (then Protectorate Bohemia and Moravia), a childless couple agree to hide a Jewish friend at great personal risk of discovery and execution.

Title: The Luzhin Defence
Description: Two worlds collide when an eccentric genius falls in love with a strong-willed society beauty.

Title: Held for Ransom
Description: Five spoiled high-school students are kidnapped and held for ransom in a remote swamp area.

Title: Six-Pack
Description: A few young women are murdered in Paris and as police progress in the investigation they realise that discovering the identity of the serial killer is not enough to bring the maniac to justice.

Title: Murderous Maids
Description: Based on the true story of two chambermaids (the Papin sisters) of 1930s France who murdered their employer and her daughter.

Title: Lion of Oz
Description: A circus lion (Jason Priestley) finds himself in a magical land where he becomes the leader of a journey to stop the Wicked Witch of the East (Lynn Redgrave), a task which may lead him to lose a part of himself.

Title: Dead Babies
Description: Residents prime themselves for both a visit from three Americans and a weekend of copious decadence.

Title: Prince of Central Park
Description: A young boy sets out to find his mother. After setting up camp in Central Park, he encounters a group of people even needier than himself.

Title: Gripsholm
Description: The summerly adventures of Kurt (Tucholsky) and girl friend staying in a Swedish castle whilst the political changes in Germany in the thirties.

Title: Come Sweet Death
Description: Ex-detective Brenner wants to keep himself out of trouble but several murder cases and his ex-girlfriend Klara finally get him involved. But making decisions is not one his strengths.

Title: The Ghost of Greville Lodge
Description: Inquisitive teenage orphan James is invited to stay at his uncle's country mansion. He explores the property and discovers the house holds many mysterious secrets.

Title: Living the Life
Description: Two childhood friends, now in a street gang, look to their dancing ability as a way out.

Title: La mécanique des femmes
Description: A man stands before the insatiable desire of women, their sensual instincts and carnivores, their hilarious seduction games, their grace, their rudeness, their needs; love them.

Title: Tinta roja
Description: Alfonso wants to be a writer, but he decides to practice as a journalist. When he is assigned to the crime section of a newspaper, he will witness the dirty world of Peruvian tabloids.

Title: Denti
Description: Antonio is a man who was born with unusually large incisors; his freakishly huge teeth make him an outcast from his peers as a child, and he attempts more than once to break off the offending choppers.

Title: The City of Lost Souls
Description: Violent gangster movie with a Brazilian protagonist.

Title: The Law of Enclosures
Description: Story of the same couple, first in their teenage years and then in their twilight years, paradoxically set in the same time during the backdrop of the Gulf War in the Middle East.

Title: Lázaro de Tormes
Description: A grown Lazaro has to prove to a court that his unlawful ways are not his choice but the only option to escape hunger.

Title: Taliesin Jones
Description: A lonely boy, from a broken family, becomes inspired by faith healers.

Title: Hassel/Förgörarna
Description: Roland Hassel meets the dangerous Russian mafia.

Title: I Went To
Description: New magistrate cleans up a corrupt town in his own comic Samurai way.

Title: Russkiy bunt
Description: A historical drama based on the novel of the same name.

Title: Srabon Megher Din
Description: The second movie directed by Humayun Ahmed. A village drama interweave around a charming girl, a folk singer, his love interest and the local aristocratic family's involvement, the movie provide with some beautiful songs.

Title: It Was an Accident
Description: An ex-con gets caught in the wrong place at the wrong time.

Title: Christie Malry's Own Double-Entry
Description: A man uses the principles of double-entry bookkeeping to settle his accounts with society.

Title: Saint-Cyr
Description: Madame de Maintenon rises from humble beginnings to become a courtesan to the royal court and eventually marries King Louis XIV. With the king's indulgence, Maintenon opens a special school for girls.

Title: Poor Liza
Description: A beautiful peasant girl is romanced and abandoned by a young nobleman.

Title: Crossfire
Description: A woman with the power to start fires with her mind searches for revenge for the murder of her friend by men above the law.

Title: Five Seconds to Spare
Description: A young musician travels to London in pursuit of his dreams, but winds up the sole witness to a bizarre murder.

Title: To Die (Or Not)
Description: Seven individual stories ending with each character meeting their doom are replayed with alternate endings, showing how one slight shift of events can change their fate.

Title: Tierra del fuego
Description: The chronicles of the Romanian engineer Julius Popper, a nationalized Argentine and one of the principle actors in the genocide of the Selk'nam, one of the indigenous peoples who inhabited the Tierra del Fuego Archipelago.

Title: Coronación
Description: A lonely man becomes increasingly obsessed with the beautiful teenager he used to help care for his grandmother.

Title: Blinker en het Bagbag-juweel
Description: Blinker, a boy who likes to play a detective, goes looking for the stolen family jewels of a baroness together with his friends Nellie and Sara.

Title: Way Past Cool
Description: Based on the award-winning best seller by Jess Mowry, "Way Past Cool" is a coming-of-age story told in reverse, for it is the story of a group of young black kids and their fight to reclaim their childhood.

Title: Anna
Description: Ambassador Anna leaves her husband in Morocco to go to Denmark and prepare a divorce.

Title: Lakeuden kutsu
Description: Erkki Hakala returns home from America.

Title: Karafuru
Description: Upon reaching the train station to death, a dejected soul is informed that he is 'lucky' and will have another chance at life. He is placed in the body of a 14-year-old boy named Makoto Kobayashi, who has just committed suicide.

Title: Telegram
Description: In Jakarta, a young journalist struggling to escape from the confines of familiar obligations, receives a telegram informing him that his mother is dying.

Title: Pelon maantiede
Description: When her sister is mugged and raped, Oili, a young female forensic dentist, meets a group of abused women who have taken matters to their own hands to make the living in fear and just letting it happen stop.

Title: Just Run!
Description: 13-year-old Milio admires his older brother Luis who belongs to a drug gang in a poor Madrid suburb. But after the death of a friend and gang member, Luis himself only wants to get out of the dealer scene and lead a normal life.

Title: La candide madame Duff
Description: Married to a younger woman, Jacob sinks into jealousy, alcohol and violence.

Title: Lijmen/Het been
Description: Story of two con men, Boorman and his younger assistant Laarmans, who are trying to sell companies their non-existing magazine.

Title: Y decirte alguna estupidez, por ejemplo, te quiero
Description: The adventures of a group of secondary school . Juan, one of the group, falls in love with Sara, the new girl.

Title: Nella terra di nessuno
Description: Beginning of the 80's: a politician is kidnapped and dies of heart attack during an interrogation. Before his death, the terrorists videotape his report on the exchange of money between businesspersons and politicians.

Title: The Boy Who Saw the Wind
Description: A boy has a powerful gift, a war hungery government comes to use him to create a weapon. He learns the origins of his power and units a people to over throw the evil government.

Title: Sulla spiaggia e di là dal molo
Baba
Description: A middle-aged man raises his son all by himself. He works as the chairman of the labor union and acts the way of putting on airs and cocky style both at work and home. He tries to build good relations with son but it does not work.

Title: Yeshe Dolma
Description: 'Song of Tibet', displays the last century of Tibetan history by telling the love story of Yeshe Dolma a Tibetan woman, her romance with three men and her whole life. The actors and actress are all of Tibetan nationality.

Title: De zwarte meteoor
Description: About the first black professional soccer player in the Netherlands Steve Mokone who played for Heracles. Based on true events.

Title: Pleure pas Germaine
Description: After the dead of the eldest daughter, Germaine and Gilles and their children leave for a holiday in the mountains to restore their bond. However, the killer of their daughter also resides in those mountains and Gilles wants revenge.

Title: Total Loss
Description: A drifter, the doctor who has fallen for him and a third man who has recently lost his father are involved in a fiery auto crash.

Title: Total Kheops
Description: A man is murdered soon after getting out of jail. His longtime friend, a cop, sets out to find out who did it and why.

Title: Samia
Description: Samia is the sixth of eight children in an Algerian family living in the outskirts of Marseille. Outside there are all the pressures and temptations of modern France; temptations Samia's brothers are watchful that she resists.

Title: Elze Is Gilijos
Description: At the end of the 19th century, proud but poor fisherman Jurgaitis gets imprisoned for a crime he did not commit. His beautiful daughter Elze is sent to live with rich German merchant Michael. There she falls for his son Endrik.

Title: Estorvo
Description: The journey of a middle-class amateur.

Title: El astillero
Description: To the ruins of an Argentinean town arrives Larsen as general manager of the shipyard, that is the source of income of that place.

Title: Chimhyang
Description: A young novelist just home from the army, receives notice of an old lover's death. He returns to the lake where they once spent time together, and becomes acquainted with the owner of a local inn.

Title: Voci
Description: A woman journalist is involved in a murder and must find the killer.

Title: The Loneliness of the Crocodiles
Description: A journalist looks for the reason of a young man's suicide. During his research, he talks to the oddest kinds of people and finds out that he himself is not very different from the dead man.

Title: El inocente
Description: A child worker of the Interior, in the frame of the decade of the '20 and of the myths and popular customs.

Title: Dreamland
Description: A documentary about the temptations of gambling, and the day to day challenges of living in Las Vegas.

Title: Rackelhane
Description: An old man fights to keep the government from building a dam on his fishing river.

Title: Fight Club
Description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

Title: Eyes Wide Shut
Description: A Manhattan doctor embarks on a bizarre, night-long odyssey after his wife's admission of unfulfilled longing.

Title: The Green Mile
Description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

Title: The General's Daughter
Description: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

Title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
Description: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

Title: The Haunting
Description: A study in fear escalates into a heart-stopping nightmare for a professor and three subjects trapped in a mysterious mansion.

Title: The Virgin Suicides
Description: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.

Title: Cruel Intentions
Description: Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

Title: Audition
Description: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.

Title: The Ninth Gate
Description: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

Title: The Bone Collector
Description: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

Title: The 13th Warrior
Description: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

Title: Tarzan
Description: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

Title: The Iron Giant
Description: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

Title: Stuart Little
Description: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

Title: The Cider House Rules
Description: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

Title: Stir of Echoes
Description: After being hypnotized by his sister-in-law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him.

Title: October Sky
Description: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

Title: Election
Description: A high school teacher meets his match in an over-achieving student politician.

Title: Payback
Description: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

Title: The Rage: Carrie 2
Description: A horrible massacre strikes up after an outcast teenage girl is taunted by a group of high school jocks, all of them unaware of her cutthroat telekinetic powers.

Title: Bicentennial Man
Description: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

Title: For Love of the Game
Description: After 19 years of playing the game he's loved his whole life, Detroit Tigers pitcher Billy Chapel has to decide if he's going to risk everything and put everything out there.

Title: Bringing Out the Dead
Description: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, a monumentally burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three increasingly turbulent nights.

Title: The Thirteenth Floor
Description: A computer scientist running a virtual reality simulation of 1937 becomes the primary suspect when his colleague and mentor is murdered.

Title: Drive Me Crazy
Description: Nicole and Chase used to be BFFs, then junior high happened. The high school centennial dance is coming but Nicole gets dumped. So does Chase. They stage a relationship to get at their exes. They visit each other's worlds. Love in the air?

Title: Mansfield Park
Description: Fanny, born into a poor family, is sent away to live with wealthy uncle Sir Thomas, his wife and their four children, where she'll be brought up for a proper introduction to society.

Title: Pola X
Description: A young writer becomes intrigued with a mysterious dark-haired woman who claims to be his long-lost sister, starting an unusual relationship with her and prompting a downward spiral involving his domineering mother and lovely fiancée.

Title: The War Zone
Description: An alienated teenager, saddened that he has moved away from London, must find a way to deal with a dark family secret.

Title: Message in a Bottle
Description: A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.

Title: Beau travail
Description: This film focuses on an ex-Foreign Legion officer as he recalls his once glorious life, leading troops in Djibouti.

Title: Ride with the Devil
Description: During the American Civil War, two friends join the Bushwhackers, a militant group loyal to the Confederacy.

Title: Random Hearts
Description: Police Sergeant Dutch Van Den Broek (Harrison Ford) and U.S. Representative Kay Chandler (Dame Kristin Scott Thomas) lose their spouses in a plane crash, and they soon discover that their spouses were having an affair with each other.

Title: True Crime
Description: Can an over-the-hill journalist uncover the evidence that can prove a death row inmate's innocence just hours before his execution?

Title: Eye of the Beholder
Description: A private eye shadows a female serial killer of men all over the U.S. without her knowing as he, strangely enough, occasionally acts as her guardian angel.

Title: The End of the Affair
Description: A desperate man tries to find out why his beloved left him years ago.

Title: In Dreams
Description: A suburban housewife learns that she has a dreamworld connection to a serial murderer, and must stop him from killing again.

Title: Anywhere But Here
Description: A mother and daughter search for success in Beverly Hills.

Title: Instinct
Description: When noted anthropologist Dr. Ethan Powell, who left society to live in the jungle is imprisoned for murder, it's up to young psychiatrist Theo Caulder to get through to him.

Title: The Deep End of the Ocean
Description: A film about a family's reaction when Ben, the youngest son is kidnapped and then found nine years later, living in the same town, where his family had just moved.

Title: Crazy in Alabama
Description: An abused wife heads to California to become a movie star while her nephew back in Alabama has to deal with a racially-motivated murder involving a corrupt sheriff.

Title: A Map of the World
Description: A woman's life falls apart after she's blamed for an accident on her property.

Title: Outside Providence
Description: After one too many run ins with the law, a punk teenager from a working class background is sent to prep school by his frustrated dad, and learns a thing or two.

Title: Jakob the Liar
Description: During World War II, an ordinary inhabitant of a ghetto fakes news about Allied offensives to inspire hope for other victims of the Nazi regime.

Title: Aimee & Jaguar
Description: In 1943 Berlin, a Nazi officer's wife meets and starts a passionate affair with a Jewish woman.

Title: Ring 2
Description: Reiko takes Yôichi into hiding when her son begins to display frightening powers. Meanwhile, Mai Takano and the authorities begin a desperate search for them, as the mysterious Ring curse spreads.

Title: Snow Falling on Cedars
Description: A Japanese-American fisherman is accused of killing his neighbor at sea. In the 1950s, race figures into the trial. So does reporter Ishmael.

Title: Thick as Thieves
Description: A thief is betrayed after a well done job in Detroit. Returning to Chicago, he decides on revenge. Things escalate.

Title: An Ideal Husband
Description: London 1895: Cabinet minister, Sir Chiltern, and bachelor, Lord Goring, are victims of scheming women.

Title: With Fire and Sword
Description: An epic story about the Ukrainian uprising against the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth magnates in the 17th Century.

Title: Gloomy Sunday
Description: Follows three men who are in love with a most beautiful waitress: An intellectual restaurant owner, a mysterious musician and an erratic businessman; taking place during the WWII.

Title: Marcel Proust's Time Regained
Description: A lush, elegant epic taking us on a time-swirling trip down the infinitely complex labyrinth that is Marcel Proust's memory lane.

Title: Breakfast of Champions
Description: A rich car dealer is losing his mind. His son lives in the bomb shelter. His suicidal wife has an affair with his transvestite sales manager.

Title: The Love Letter
Description: The life of a provincial town becomes stormy after the appearance of an anonymous love letter.

Title: The Minus Man
Description: Aimless Vann Siegert takes a bizarre turn in life and becomes a serial killer, tracking down the miserable, the self-destructive and those who otherwise seem willing to die.

Title: Captain Pantoja and the Special Services
Description: The Peruvian army captain Pantaleon Pantoja, a very serious and efficient officer, is chosen to set up a special service of 'visitors' to satisfy the sexual needs of the soldiers posted on remote jungle outposts.

Title: The Nameless
Description: 5 years after a mom's 6 y.o. girl is murdered, she gets a phone call from someone claiming to be the daughter. An ex cop and a reporter help. A secret group called The Nameless may be behind it all.

Title: The King and I
Description: Traveling to the exotic kingdom of Siam, English schoolteacher Anna Leonowens soon discovers that her most difficult challenge is the stubborn, imperious King himself.

Title: Taboo
Description: The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad.

Title: Felicia's Journey
Description: A young woman leaves Ireland to find her boyfriend in England, and while there is helped by a man hiding unsettling secrets.

Title: Women Talking Dirty
Description: A lively, outspoken single mother in Edinburgh, Scotland, develops an unlikely friendship with a shy cartoonist.

Title: The Road Home
Description: Prompted by the death of his father and the grief of his mother, a man recalls the story of how they met in flashback.

Title: Between Your Legs
Description: Javier's life gets complicated when a something unexpected turns up in his car's trunk.

Title: Little Crumb
Description: The journey of a homeless boy who tries to find his father, set in the 1920's in Holland.

Title: Virtual Sexuality
Description: A frustrated teenage girl creates her perfect man in a virtual reality machine and in a freak accident, gives him life.

Title: Paperback Hero
Description: An Australian truck driver writes romance novels. His engaged, tomboyish, crop duster best friend's name, Ruby Vale, is unasked used as author. Complications arise when his novel takes off. Will they remain friends or...?

Title: Tom's Midnight Garden
Description: A young boy journeys across the boundaries of reality to a secret, haunted place, half-a-century back in time, in this tale of enchantment, shadows and lost memories.

Title: Gemini
Description: A successful doctor, Yukio's picture perfect life is gradually wrecked, and taken over by his avenging twin brother, who bumps off his family members one by one and reclaims his lover who is now Yukio's wife.

Title: Walking Across Egypt
Description: An elderly widow befriends an orphaned juvenile delinquent.

Title: After the Rain
Description: During a downpour, a generous ronin and his supporting wife are stranded at a country inn. The ronin comes to the attention of a lord who wants to hire him as an instructor for his men, who treat the ronin with disrespect.

Title: The Last September
Description: In the heart of a young woman, lies a secret that divides a nation.

Title: Wisconsin Death Trip
Description: A series of grisly events that took place in Black River Falls, Wisconsin, between 1890 and 1900 are dramatized.

Title: Love & Rage
Description: This film is based on true events that happened on Achill Island off the West coast of Ireland, in The Valley House.

Title: Kanzen-naru shiiku
Description: A middle-aged man kidnaps a high-school girl with the intention of training her to be the perfect partner.

Title: Treasure Island
Description: An adaptation of the Robert Lewis Stevenson adventure classic, in which a young boy sets off on a voyage armed with a map to buried treasure.

Title: The Third Miracle
Description: The Vatican sends a priest to verify some miracles, performed by a woman who has been nominated for sainthood. During his investigation, the priest, who is experiencing a crisis of faith, re-discovers his own purpose in life.

Title: The Bridge
Description: The world of a young housewife is turned upside down when she has an affair with a free-spirited engineer.

Title: Railroad Man
Description: The touching reminiscing of an elderly railroad-station manager is interrupted by the sudden appearance of some good-natured girls.

Title: Kærlighed ved første hik
Description: 16 y.o. Danish high school sophomore Viktor falls in love with senior Anja at 1st hiccup. Their little brothers (BFFs) invite him to Anja's 18th birthday party. Viktor's 2 friends also help. Where does Anja's arrogant boyfriend fit in?

Title: The New Adventures of Pinocchio
Description: Puppeteer Geppetto becomes a puppet himself after drinking an elixir that Pinocchio bought from a traveling carnival.

Title: Manolito Gafotas
Description: The usually absent father of a chubby kid shows up to take him on a road trip.

Title: A Slipping-Down Life
Description: A shy, young woman, living a sheltered life in a small southern town, embarks on a journey to self-awareness when she falls in love with an eccentric rock star.

Title: Shiloh 2: Shiloh Season
Description: When Shiloh's abusive previous owner, Judd Travers, tries to retake Shiloh again, Ray tries to find a way to end the rivalry and open up the hidden kindness within the town drunk.

Title: Airspeed
Description: After lightening strikes Flight 109, the only chance for survival is a young girl.

Title: Beautiful Mother
Description: On his wedding day, Antoine falls madly in love with Léa, his mother-in-law.

Title: El coronel no tiene quien le escriba
Uninvited
Description: A man is accused of murdering his childhood love and her entire family.

Title: Jacob Two Two Meets the Hooded Fang
The Bumblebee Flies Anyway
Description: An amnesiac youth tries to piece together his past, but what he discovers may jeopardize his future.

Title: Himitsu
Description: A man is shocked to find out that after a deadly car accident involving his wife and daughter, his wife died, but her mind somehow got transferred into their daughter's body.

Title: Nadie conoce a nadie
Description: An aspiring novelist receives a charge that will change his life completely.

Title: Whatever
Description: Story of a man whose misanthropy goes out of control due to a business trip together with a colleague.

Title: Juha
Description: A farmer's wife is seduced into running away from her stolid older husband by a city slicker, who enslaves her in a brothel.

Title: Plenilunio
Description: After a murder of a child, a cynical detective has a romance with the child's teacher.

Title: Woman Wanted
Description: A new woman comes between a widower and his adult son.

Title: The First of May
Description: Eleven-year-old Cory (Dan Byrd) is a foster child nobody wants. Carlotta (Academy Award-nominee Julie Harris) is an elderly woman the world has forgotten.

Title: Mad Cows
Description: A single mother's postnatal state leads her on a race to save her child and her sanity.

Title: The Black House
Description: A timid insurance agent investigates a possible insurance fraud case that involves a death. As the facts are slowly revealed, he becomes progressively more frightened.

Title: La maladie de Sachs
Description: This is a story about the world of a doctor called Bruno Sachs.He wrote a book called 'La Maladie DE Sachs' in which he describes his consultations with different patients.

Title: Freak Talks About Sex
Description: Two friends spend their days smoking pot and talking about sex.

Title: Hakuchi: The Innocent
Description: In a future where World War II never ended, Japan is decimated by nightly bombings. The only building left standing is known as the Media Station, a broadcasting center responsible for all of Japan's entertainment.

Title: Quasimodo d'El Paris
Description: Quasimodo the hunchback is mistaken as the serial killer of El Paris. Can he clear his name?

Title: Pippi's Adventures on the South Seas
Description: A mysterious ship has sailed into Pippi's hometown and the Captain turns out to be her father. So it's off with her friends for a wild and wonderful, wind-blown adventure on the South Seas.

Title: Blinker
Description: A series of mysterious events and the pestering motor gang 'The Red Vampires' turns the idyllic holiday of Blinker and his friends into a thrilling adventure.

Title: The Mao Game
Description: Growing up neurotic in a Hollywood family.

Title: Sally Marshall Is Not an Alien
Fallen Angels Paradise
Description: A formerly successful man dies then his semi-crazy daughter makes arrangements while his street thug friends take the corpse out for one last night.

Title: Garasu no nô
Description: "Wake up! I'm a Prince!" 'Sleeping Bride' or 'Glass Brain' is teenage love-story of a girl who sleeps for 17 years, her only hope, a young boy...

Title: St. Pauli Nacht
Description: Cabby Robby drives in and around St.Pauli, Hamburg, from sunset to sunrise. He is surrounded by stories of the night.

Title: Vergeten straat
Description: A celebrated Flemish writer, occupying a small apartment in a big Belgian city, which he uses as a working-place, witnesses how the inhabitants of a dead-end street try to fight the injustice of expropriation.

Title: I Could Read the Sky
Description: The film tells of the memories and feeling of loss of an Irish immigrant who eventually winds up doing construction work in the anonymous cities of England.

Title: Klinkevals
Description: Copenhagen over century ago: a mother sees her sisters getting ahead in life while she's stuck due to her husband's long stays at a mental hospital. At a picnic with her sisters and families, she dances Klinkevals with a handsome stranger.

Title: The Dimension Travelers
Description: A teenage girl makes a new friend at her school who tells her that she has the ability to travel between worlds.

Title: Kin'yû fushoku rettô: Jubaku
Description: When a major bank is caught paying off a corporate extortionist, the media and prosecutors begin to dig, breaking open a money-and-favors scandal to its core.

Title: Gialloparma
Description: Margot is back in Parma, her hometown. She's coming back to seek revenge. Indeed, she was raped by several notables of the city when she was younger.

Title: Branchie
Description: Marco has a great passion for tropical fish and plan go to Delhi with the task of building a large aquarium.

Title: Souvenirs intimes
Description: The life of a paraplegic painter is shattered when an old girlfriend comes back into his life and accuses him of raping her 15 years earlier.

Title: Bulaklak ng Maynila
Description: The dark and harsh reality of life for the urban poor and how the weak become prey for the stronger.

Title: Le schpountz
Description: A naive guy, passionate cinemaddict, believes that his minor extras role is a first step to a shining star career.

Title: O Tronco
Description: A tax collector is sent to a small region where he starts to differ with the unusual way of the local to exercise power.

Title: The Old Woman
Description: Struggling writer, Danny, must cope with the unexpected arrival of a corpse.

Title: La guerra degli Antò
Description: The story of four implausible young rebellious in the Italy of the 90's.

Title: The Divine Ryans
Description: A young boy must come to terms with the events surrounding the death of his father.

Title: Der Vulkan
Description: Berlin, 1937. Marion von Kammer performs forbidden songs in a small theater that the Nazis are quick to destroy. Faced with the rise of fascism, Marion decides to leave for Zurich with her sister Tilly and their mother.

Title: The Famous Paparazzo
Description: A tabloid photographer is given the assignment to follow a politician suspected to have sexual relations with an underage girl.

Title: Kennedy et moi
Description: In the midst of a midlife crisis, writer Simon Polaris no longer wants to write. One day, his psychoanalyst told him that he had the watch that John F Kennedy would have worn on the day of his death. This watch becomes a fixation for Simon

Title: Doggy Bag
Description: A young woman neglected by her mother, who prefers her dog, plunges into a totally crazy dream. She imagines herself getting rid of this unwanted dog in the company of her bizarre driver.

Title: Paddy
Description: Jean and Paddy haven't recovered from Ben's death. Ben was Paddy's lover but also Jean's. Their threesome filled their existence. Today, while they still love each other, Jean and Paddy are torn apart.

Title: Kansas in August
Description: A brother and sister in west London and their search for love.

Title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Description: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

Title: The Parent Trap
Description: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, later discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

Title: Vampires
Description: Recovering from an ambush that killed his entire team, a vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to walk in sunlight.

Title: Ringu
Description: A reporter and her ex-husband investigate a cursed video tape that is rumored to kill the viewer seven days after watching it.

Title: What Dreams May Come
Description: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

Title: Psycho
Description: A young female embezzler arrives at the Bates Motel, which has terrible secrets of its own.

Title: The Man in the Iron Mask
Description: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

Title: Out of Sight
Description: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

Title: Mercury Rising
Description: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

Title: Beloved
Description: Based on the book by Toni Morrison, in which a slave is visited by the spirit of a mysterious young woman

Title: Great Expectations
Description: Modernization of Charles Dickens' classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York City pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.

Title: A Simple Plan
Description: Three blue-collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.

Title: L'ennui
Description: Martin is a philosophy teacher in the midst of a mid-life crisis. Lacking direction or purpose in his life, he initiates an affair with Cécilia, a young artist's model who might have killed her former lover.

Title: The Legend of 1900
Description: A baby boy, discovered in 1900 on an ocean liner, grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.

Title: Sphere
Description: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

Title: The Object of My Affection
Description: A pregnant New York City social worker begins to develop romantic feelings for her gay best friend, and decides she'd rather raise her child with him, much to the dismay of her overbearing boyfriend.

Title: Flowers of Shanghai
Description: In the "flower houses" (upscale brothels) of Shanghai, various interweaving stories of love, loyalty, and deceit play out subtly.

Title: The Horse Whisperer
Description: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

Title: The Mighty
Description: Two young boys, both social outcasts in their small town, form an unlikely friendship.

Title: Doctor Dolittle
Description: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

Title: Les Misérables
Description: Valjean, a former criminal, has atoned for his past and now finds himself in the midst of the French Revolution, avoiding a law-obsessed policeman hell-bent on capturing him.

Title: Phantoms
Description: In the peaceful town of Snowfield, Colorado something evil has wiped out the community. And now, its up to a group of people to stop it, or at least get out of Snowfield alive.

Title: Quest for Camelot
Description: An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit, and a goofy two-headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.

Title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
Description: Stella is a highly successful, forty-something San Francisco stock broker who is persuaded by her colorful New York girlfriend Delilah to take a well deserved, first-class vacation to Jamaica.

Title: Simon Birch
Description: A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.

Title: Primary Colors
Description: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for President of the U.S.

Title: A Civil Action
Description: A tenacious lawyer takes on a case involving a major company responsible for causing several people to be diagnosed with leukemia due to the town's water supply being contaminated, at the risk of bankrupting his firm and career.

Title: The Newton Boys
Description: The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.

Title: Hideous Kinky
Description: Unsatisfied with her life in England, young mother Julia relocates to Morocco with her small daughters, Lucy and Bea. Although the family enjoys various adventures, they struggle to make ends meet.

Title: One True Thing
Description: A career woman reassesses her parents' lives after she is forced to care for her cancer-stricken mother.

Title: L.A. Without a Map
Description: A British writer pursues a young actress to Hollywood and needs all the help he can get to win her love.

Title: The Patriot
Description: A respected doctor must race against time to find a cure for a lethal virus, unleashed by a paramilitary militia leader.

Title: The General
Description: The real-life story of Dublin folk hero and criminal Martin Cahill, who pulled off two daring robberies in Ireland with his team, but attracted unwanted attention from the police, the I.R.A., the U.V.F., and members of his own team.

Title: Palmetto
Description: A recently released ex-con gets involved in a fake kidnapping scheme that turns very real.

Title: The Phantom of the Opera
Description: Gory remake of the Gaston Leroux classic story, only this time, the phantom is not disfigured, but a man who was raised by rats deep under the Paris Opera House.

Title: A Cool, Dry Place
Description: Russell, single father balances his work as a lawyer with the care of his five-year-old son, after his wife abandoned them. When she reappears creating turmoil, he must deal with his new love interest and a job opportunity of a lifetime.

Title: Bongwater
Description: An indolent artist in Portland, Oregon becomes addicted to marijuana, prompting his girlfriend to flee to New York City with a heroin addict.

Title: Spiral
Description: A young pathologist seeks answers to the mysterious death of a friend and soon comes into contact with the same cursed videotape that caused the death of the friend's wife and son, which is haunted by the curse of Sadako, a relentless spirit.

Title: Little Men
Description: Based on the classic novel by Louisa May Alcott. When two homeless boys from Boston find themselves at Plumfield, a rural boarding school run by Jo and her husband, the boys learn both academic and life lessons they won't ever forget.

Title: The Acid House
Description: Three twisted tales of abuse, drugs, displaced personalities, and insect life by Scottish writer Irvine Welsh.

Title: Girl
Description: A straight-A teen explores Portland's rock scene.

Title: Under the Sun
Description: Olof lives alone on a farm after the death of his mother. Unable to read and write, he is dependent on his younger friend, Erik. Olof advertises for a housekeeper, and Ellen arrives. During summer Olof's heart and Erik's desires develops.

Title: Head On
Description: A 19 year old Greek Australian youth struggles with his sexual identity and has one clumsy heterosexual and several homosexual encounters.

Title: The Land Girls
Description: Three young women from very different walks of life join the women's land army during World War II, and are sent to work together on a farm in Dorset, where the experience changes their lives forever.

Title: Hamilton
Description: A nuclear armed SS20 will be smuggled from Russia via Finland to Sweden unless Swedish agent Hamilton +5 stop them with "no loose ends". What about the other stolen SS20?

Title: Basil
Description: A lonely young aristocrat in turn-of the century England stuggles to meet the approval of his over-bearing, class-conscious father while trying to please the selfish woman he loves.

Title: Cousin Bette
Description: When her sister dies in 1846, Bette moves from the château to Paris to work as a theater seamstress. She helps a handsome, starving artist. When her niece lures him away from her, she plans a devious revenge.

Title: B. Monkey
Description: A young woman attempts to end her criminal career. But she needs love to make it.

Title: The Hi-Lo Country
Description: Two cowboys have their friendship tested when they fall for the same girl.

Title: Earth
Description: It's 1947 and the borderlines between India and Pakistan are being drawn. A young girl witnesses tragedy as her ayah (nanny) is caught between the love of two men and the rising tide of political and religious violence.

Title: The Butcher
Description: A high class wife falls for a small town butcher.Its all lust.Its all desire.

Title: Love & Pop
Description: A high school girl engages in compensated dating in order to buy an expensive ring before the day ends.

Title: Divorcing Jack
Description: Black romantic comedy set around the troubled "peace process" and its effect on a cynical Belfast hack.

Title: Il mio West
Description: A cold-blooded killer provokes a legendary gunslinger into coming out of retirement to see who's really the fastest gun in the West.

Title: Un embrujo
Description: In 1930s Mexico, a young boy falls in love with his elementary-school teacher.

Title: Finding Graceland
Description: An eccentric drifter claiming to be Elvis Presley hitches a ride with a young man and they find themselves on an adventurous road trip to Memphis.

Title: Legend of the Mummy
Description: Louis Gossett, Jr. stars in this re-telling of Bram Stoker's "Jewel of the Seven Stars", in which an ages-old mummy is awakened and takes revenge on everyone in an old, gothic mansion.

Title: Left Luggage
Description: Against a background of holocaust memories, a liberal Jewish girl becomes a nanny to a young Jewish boy with a disability and grows fond of him.

Title: The Lost World
Description: A scientist discovers dinosaurs on a remote plateau in Mongolia.

Title: Barking at the Stars
Description: Comedy about teachers and students at a high school in a small provincial town. Mihailo tries to win the heart of a girl his brother is also chasing.

Title: Brown's Requiem
Description: Recovering alcoholic, ex-LAPD, private detective Fritz Brown, is hired by caddie "Fat Dog" to follow his kid sister, who is holed up with an old sugar daddy. The trail leads to his old police boss Cathcart, and the bodies start to pile up.

Title: Heaven
Description: Robert's wife is divorcing him for gambling etc. A strip club owner offers him work redesigning his club. Robert befriends a dancer there, who has premonitions.

Title: Talk of Angels
Description: A young Irishwoman becomes governess to 3 daughters of a rich family in Spain in 1936, just before the civil war. The mom likes Franco - the dad doesn't. She becomes family. She befriends 5 Irishwomen.

Title: Chûgoku no chôjin
Description: A salaryman and yakuza are each sent by their bosses to a remote Chinese village but discover more then they expected.

Title: Titanic Town
Description: A Belfast, Northern Ireland housewife takes up the peace cause, which causes her family trouble with I.R.A. sympathizers.

Title: The Misadventures of Margaret
Description: A married author (Parker Posey) tries to stimulate her imagination for an erotic novel with hands-on research.

Title: Nico the Unicorn
Description: As an 11-year-old boy struggles to cope with a disability, he finds a pony who gives birth to a unicorn which he takes care of.

Title: Watchers 4
Description: An extra-smart dog and detective team up to stop a DNA enhanced killer.

Title: Sista kontraktet
Description: Young police officer Roger is on the trail of the international master assassin, while the assassin follows his plan to murder Swedish Prime Minister Olof Palme.

Title: The Atrocity Exhibition
Description: A university professor is fascinated with humankind's history of violent self-destruction.

Title: The Grandfather
Description: After his son dies, an elderly man comes back to Spain from the US and hopes to find out which of his granddaughters is true and which one is bastard.

Title: A los que aman
Description: A secret and deep passion marks the life of a young doctor, and threatens the existence of those around him.

Title: Class Trip
Description: A schoolboy Nicholas always worries about something. When he goes on a school skiing trip, all his visions and nightmares take him over.

Title: Dr. Akagi
Description: At the end of WWII, Japanese doctor Akagi searches for the cure for hepatitis in the prisoner-of-war camp.

Title: The Man in the Iron Mask
Train to Pakistan
Description: Seen from the eyes of Hukum Chand the District Magistrate it is an account of the turmoil faced by the inhabitants of village Mano Majra in Punjab on the Indo-Pak border during the period of partition after India attained independence.

Title: The Scent of the Night
Description: A former policeman turns full-time criminal and goes on a downward spiral of crime in the 1990s Rome.

Title: Andoromedia
Description: After her sudden death a teenage girl finds her father has uploaded her mind to computer form. With a rival corporation wishing to capture her the girl is uploaded to her boyfriend's laptop.

Title: Albert
Description: Albert is always getting his friend Egon into trouble. After being grounded by his parents and having a fight with Albert, Egon disappears. Albert looks for him and finds him in an imaginary world filled with crooks.

Title: D-Zaka no satsujin jiken
Description: Detective Kogoro Akechi is faced with a peculiar murder case involving forgeries of classic pornographic artworks.

Title: Begging for Love
Description: A woman with an abusive childhood travels back to taiwan from japan with her daughter in order to find her father's missing ashes, confronting her past along the way, discovering many secrets that were hidden from her throughout her life.

Title: Lucky and Zorba
Description: A dying seagull entrusts her egg to a cat named Zorba, who promises three things: he won't eat the egg, he'll care for the egg, and he'll teach the baby seagull to fly.

Title: The White Raven
Description: In this action-packed crime thriller, a journalist evades pursuers as he ponders a riddle disclosing the whereabouts of a spectacular diamond.

Title: Monk Dawson
Description: Rites of passage moral tale based on the award-winning novel by Piers Paul Read, about a Catholic priest who falls from grace and descends into a world of forbidden love and betrayal in 1970's London.

Title: In the Winter Dark
Description: An intense psychological drama around four people in a remote country village; where a creature is killing the local animals.

Title: Young Thugs: Nostalgia
Description: A young boy grows up in a violent and dysfunctional family.

Title: Frankenstein Reborn!
Description: The classic story gets a new spin when a young girl is intrigued by the secret experiments of her uncle, until she's confronted by his creation.

Title: The Scarlet Tunic
Description: In nineteenth century rural England, a German hussar serving with King George III's personal cavalry, Matthaus Singer, falls madly in love with the only daughter of a West Country solicitor, Frances Groves.

Title: Campus
Description: A prestigious sociology professor and candidate for the position of President of the University trips over a troublesomely ended affair with a student and is accused of sexual harassment and sexual assault by the university apparatus.

Title: Victor... pendant qu'il est trop tard
Description: Young Victor experiences a traumatic flight from abusive parents and discovers a new mother in the prostitute Trish.

Title: When the Light Comes
Description: A young woman spends an adventurous winter with a trapper on Spitsbergen.

Title: José Rizal
Description: Jose Rizal's life and works are recounted through a series of non-linear flashbacks which reflect on various aspects of his life - as writer, propagandist, lover, friend, brother, doctor, and the man that inspired a revolution.

Title: Passion
Description: In this black-and-white Hungarian version of James M. Cain's The Postman Always Rings Twice, a wife and her lover plot to kill her older husband.

Title: El pianista
Description: Old friends meet after sixty years ... but everything has changed.

Title: Ámbár tanár úr
Description: High school teacher falls in love with his "best" female student.

Title: On Our Own
Description: Three siblings ingeniously avoid being sent off to a children's home while their single mother serves a short sentence in a prison for shoplifting by inventing a 'never present' dad who is looking after them.

Title: Mararía
Description: Fermín is a doctor who fall in love of Mararia in silence. Beltrahn appears and wins the love of Mararia and unleash the wrath of Fermin.

Title: The Sound of One Hand Clapping
Frau Rettich, die Czerni und ich
Thranes metode
Description: Thrane has always had his own method of dealing with life. He tends to slip away. But when he sees beautiful Mol the same day he moves to a new apartment, he knows he'll be staying, even though she's married. Her husband is away workdays.

Title: Tadon to chikuwa
Description: A cab-driver spends his days listening to his passengers' conversations. A writer faces a creativity bottleneck.

Title: I Wonder Who's Kissing You Now
The Teenage Textbook Movie
Description: Two highschool girls try to find their true loves among the guys who are wooing them.

Title: Kaçiklik diplomasi
Description: Nur is a woman who suffers from bipolar depression with psychosis. While she stays in a mental institution she confronts with her life; her childhood, her parents and her marriage...Can she ever learn to love herself?

Title: Little Teachers
Description: During World War 2 four italian university students join the resistence against the fascist government.

Title: Le bal masqué
Description: A story about the insecurity and instability in Belgium 1980's created by extreme-right-wing politicians, gangsters and corrupt police officers.

Title: Living in Paradise
Description: Set in France in 1961-1962 during the Algerian War, Living In Paradise is a thought-provoking examination of the lives of North African immigrants trying to find a place in the social system of Western Europe.

Title: Zheleznaya pyata oligarkhii
Description: Nikolai Petrovich comes to St. Petersburg to organize a revolution against the oligarchy.

Title: Requiem
Description: In Lisbon, French author Paul meets various people from his past who uncover forgotten memories.

Title: Murder of a Distance
Description: When a detective investigates the suicide of a man, he finds that it may be a murder, and everybody seems to be a suspect.

Title: My Mother's Early Lovers
Description: A young woman, while helping her father clean out his house, discovers her dead mother's intimate diary. As she transcribes the contents in order to make copies for her siblings, she discovers a shocking secret which transforms her life.

Title: Island, Alicia
Description: A young man gets obsessed with a mysterious older woman. After her tragic death he starts a strange sexual affair with her teenage daughter.

Title: Caminho dos Sonhos
Description: The drama of a Jewish immigrant who is going to study in a catholic school and falls in love with a black catholic girl.

Title: Ça ne se refuse pas
Description: Marthe, an aging queen of the night, roams the streets of a city haunted by the presence of an invisible murderer in search of money to pay a large gambling debt.

Title: Namjaui hyanggi
Description: Can a childhood crush survive into adulthood?

Title: A Tree in House
Description: Garrulous Zhang Damin is annoying and droll, lives together with his mother, two brothers and two sisters, in a orderly life.

Title: Dai-nana kankai hoko: Osaki Midori o sagashite
I Know What You Did Last Summer
Description: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

Title: Lolita
Description: An English professor falls for a minor, and has to face the consequences of his actions.

Title: L.A. Confidential
Description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

Title: The Devil's Advocate
Description: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

Title: Starship Troopers
Description: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

Title: Jackie Brown
Description: A flight attendant with a criminal past gets nabbed by the FBI for smuggling. Under pressure to become an informant against the drug dealer she works for, she must find a way to secure her future without getting killed.

Title: Contact
Description: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

Title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
Description: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

Title: Perfect Blue
Description: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

Title: The Rainmaker
Description: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.

Title: Kiss the Girls
Description: Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

Title: The Relic
Description: A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like god, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.

Title: The Postman
Description: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

Title: The Jackal
Description: An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

Title: The Saint
Description: Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.

Title: Cure
Description: A frustrated detective deals with the case of several gruesome murders committed by people who have no recollection of what they've done.

Title: Private Parts
Description: The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

Title: The Ice Storm
Description: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle-class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.

Title: Live Flesh
Description: After leaving jail, Víctor is still in love with Elena, but she's married to the former cop -now basketball player- who became paralysed by a shot from Víctor's gun...

Title: The Borrowers
Description: A secret family of four-inch people living inside the walls of a house must save their home from an evil real estate developer.

Title: The Man Who Knew Too Little
Description: Wallace Ritchie is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assassinate international leaders at a banquet.

Title: Affliction
Description: A deeply troubled small-town cop investigates a suspicious hunting death while other events jeopardize his sanity.

Title: The Sweet Hereafter
Description: A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems.

Title: The Wings of the Dove
Description: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.

Title: Anna Karenina
Description: Anna (Marceau) is a wife and mother who has an affair with the handsome Count Vronsky (Bean). Based on the novel by Tolstoy.

Title: Perdita Durango
Description: A psychotic criminal couple kidnaps a random teenage couple. The woman rapes the male captive, and lets him watch his lover being raped by the man. They then plan to sacrifice the couple.

Title: The Brave
Description: A down-on-his-luck American Indian recently released from jail is offered the chance to "star" as the victim of a snuff film, the resulting pay of which could greatly help his poverty stricken family.

Title: Fever Pitch
Description: A sports fan's romantic courtship clashes with his obsession with his favorite football team.

Title: Robinson Crusoe
Description: 1703: Robinson Crusoe has to leave Scotland for a year, but after months sailing, a storm wrecks his ship. He ends up as only survivor on a desolate island.

Title: Smilla's Sense of Snow
Description: A 6 y.o. Inuit boy runs off a snowy roof in Copenhagen and dies. Smilla, a half Inuit who lives in the building and knows the boy, looks into it. What makes an acrophobic boy run up on the roof? The clues take her to Greenland.

Title: That Darn Cat
Description: A maid is kidnapped and scratches a message onto D.C. the cat's collar and when his owner Patti discovers this, she plays amateur detective with the help of D.C. to try to find the culprits.

Title: A Thousand Acres
Description: A family is torn apart after a father gives his valuable farm land to his daughters.

Title: Going All the Way
Description: After returning home from the Korean War, two young men search for love and fulfillment in middle America.

Title: Touch
Description: At the discovery of his ability to work miracles, Juvenal becomes a media sensation, but now he's prone to those who want to exploit him.

Title: Mrs Dalloway
Description: In 1923 London, socialite Clarissa Dalloway's (Vanessa Redgrave's) well-planned party is overshadowed by the return of an old suitor she had known thirty-three years earlier.

Title: The Island on Bird Street
Description: During World War II a Jewish boy is left on his own for months in a ruined house in the Warsaw Ghetto, where he must learn all the tricks of survival under constantly life-threatening conditions.

Title: The Butcher Boy
Description: The antisocial son of an alcoholic father and a bipolar mother grows up in 1960s Ireland.

Title: Keys to Tulsa
Description: Richter is a lazy son of a wealthy woman, who's put up with too much so no more money. He's about to lose his local newspaper job arranged by his mom. Richter owes money to a violent drug dealer/blackmailer but sees his wife. Death wish?

Title: Metroland
Description: The sudden reappearance of his best friend Toni, after a ten year absence, causes Chris to remember his past, to question some of his lifestyle decisions and to re-evaluate his life and marriage to Marion.

Title: The Blood Oranges
Description: A swinging married couple pursues erotic pleasures with a dangerous husband and wife while vacationing in Italy.

Title: Washington Square
Description: In this adaptation of the Henry James novel set in 19th-century New York City, a wealthy spinster with an overbearing father is pursued by a handsome fortune hunter who may be only after her money.

Title: Pippi Longstocking
Description: Pippi is a little girl who lives alone in her house, while her father is sailing the seas. With Pippi we meet her horse, her monkey and her two friends Tommy and Anika. Together they go on many journeys through the neighborhood.

Title: The Eel
Description: A businessman kills his adulterous wife and is sent to prison. After the release, he opens a barbershop and meets new people, talking almost to no one except an eel he befriended while in prison.

Title: The Second Jungle Book: Mowgli & Baloo
Description: The story of Mowgli, a young boy abandoned in the wilds of India. Raised by a panther, an elephant and a bear, Mowgli must learn civilization's ways when his long-lost uncle and a circus scout from Barnum and Bailey come looking for him.

Title: Critical Care
Description: A hospital resident is put in the middle of a legal battle between two half-sisters on whether to pull their comatose dad's life support. But more seems to be at stake than dad's life - his inheritance.

Title: Character
Description: Jacob Katadreuffe lives mute with his mother, has no contact with his father who only works against him and wants to become a lawyer, at all costs.

Title: Behind the Lines
Description: Based on Pat Barker's novel of the same name, "Regeneration" tells the story of soldiers of World War One sent to an asylum for emotional troubles. Two of those soldiers are England's most important WW1 poets.

Title: Agir Roman
Description: A young car mechanic, while in the middle of an unlikely love affair, tries to protect the people in his poor gypsy neighborhood from a gangster who terrorizes the locals.

Title: The Education of Little Tree
Description: Little Tree is an 8-year-old Cherokee boy who loses his parents during The Great Depression and begins living with his Indian grandparents and learning the Cherokee way of life.

Title: Two Orphan Vampires
Description: A pair of teenage girls, who are blind by day, but when the sun goes down, they roam the streets to quench their thirst for blood.

Title: Four Days in September
Description: Brazillian urban guerrilla fighters kidnap the American Ambassador. Now, the diplomat's life hangs in the balance - helplessly caught between a government unwilling to cooperate - and his fear of the captors themselves.

Title: Welcome to Woop Woop
Description: A con artist escapes a deal gone wrong in New York and winds up in the Aussie outback in a strange town whose inhabitants are an oddball collection of misfits.

Title: The Gambler
Description: Russian author Fyodor Dostoyevsky (Sir Michael Gambon) must write a novel in twenty-seven days in a deal to pay off his gambling debts, and feverishly dictates the novel "The Gambler".

Title: The Chambermaid on the Titanic
Description: An ordinary foundry worker fakes a love story between him and the chambermaid from RMS Titanic. When ship sinks and chambermaid probably dies, his story gains popularity. But lie always has its price.

Title: Love and Death on Long Island
A Merry War
Description: Gordon Comstock quits his job at an advertising agency in order to write poetry, only to find that poets, like everyone else, need money.

Title: This World, Then the Fireworks
Description: In 1950s, two incestuous lovers, a depraved suave journalist and his equally depraved prostitute sister, plan to get rich through seduction and murder. Things complicate when their feeble-minded mother begins to suspect something.

Title: In Praise of Older Women
Description: In the turmoil of the Spanish Civil War, a young man comes of age sexually, through a string of relationships with a wide range of mature, older women.

Title: The Truce
Description: Based on Primo Levi's autobiographical "The Reawakening".

Title: Winter Sleepers
Description: Setting in a small mountain town, a man, looking for revenge because of his daughter's accidentally killing, mistakenly track out a young couple, troubling with their ordinary life problems.

Title: The Dog of Flanders
Description: A small poor boy lives with his caring grandfather in a small Flemish village in the 19th century Belgium, has a lovable pet dog, loves art and dreams of becoming a famous painter one day. Based on a famous Flemish novel.

Title: Love Walked In
Description: Leary and Sanchez-Gijon play "romantically involved down-and-out lounge singers" who get involved in a caper.

Title: Eighteen Springs
Description: In 1930s Shanghai, a young office girl falls in love with a factory worker in the same company.

Title: Labyrinth of Dreams
Description: Bus conductor Tomiko falls in love with driver Niitaka, even though she also suspects him of being a serial killer who killed his female conductors after tiring of them.

Title: My Son the Fanatic
Description: Pakistani taxi-driver Parvez and prostitute Bettina find themselves trapped in the middle when Islamic fundamentalists decide to clean up their local town.

Title: Stone Cold
Description: A young boy, tired of his mother's abusive boyfriend, sets out on an adventure to London meeting a friendly man. But there is fear on the streets and people are missing. Will link be next?

Title: Héroïnes
Description: Johanna mouths songs voiced by Jeanne & become a smashing success which gradually gnaws away at their friendship.

Title: Kalle Blomkvist och Rasmus
Description: Three kids in a small town pursue a group of kidnappers.

Title: Gaston's War
Description: A true story about a Flemish resistance warrior.

Title: Cudnovate zgode segrta Hlapica
Description: Fed up with the harsh treatment his master has given him, a brave little mouse (and later his dog, Brewster) sets off on an adventure.

Title: K
Description: An elderly German tourist is killed in Paris at the hands of Joseph Katz, an old junk dealer beloved by detective Sam Bellamy. Despite witnessing the crime, Sam covers for Joseph, upon which the latter vanishes in mysterious circumstances.

Title: Bájecná léta pod psa
Description: The story of an ordinary family living in Czechoslovakia from around 1963 until the Velvet Revolution. Based on the semi-autobiographical novel by Michal Wiewegh.

Title: Comanche Territory
Description: Spanish TV reporters covering the War in Bosnia. Based on true experience.

Title: The Gods Must Be Daring
Description: An old and invaluable statue is stolen from Mali in Africa.Its thief decides to go a step further and steals from other people too.

Title: Hannibal & Jerry
Description: Hannibal spends most of his day watching TV as there's no other kid in his area, his parents return home at 5 pm and his grandma is nearly deaf. He gets a dog, Jerry, who can't bark but it speaks. Jerry gets dognapped.

Title: Salige er de som tørster
Description: A crime wave hits Oslo just as summer arrives. There has been found several violent blood splattered scenes with no bodies found. It's only a matter of time before the bodies has to surface, and the start of a run against the clock.

Title: The Oyster and the Wind
Description: A fantasy/mystery about the disappearance of a lighthouse owner and his daughter.

Title: Valkanizater
Description: Two friends from a small Greek town travel to Bulgaria and Switzerland, hoping they can gain money from the difference in foreign exchange rates.

Title: Young Thugs: Innocent Blood
