Description: A group of high school graduates transition into adulthood in a dangerous and violent town in Japan.

Title: Una vacanza all'inferno
Description: Italian man unknowingly becomes a drug mule and gets arrested in Thailand. He is sent to tough prison where he plans escape with the help of another prisoner who also has a score to settle with the drug dealer who set the Italian up.

Title: The Woman in Red
Description: The woman in red is Ana Cumpanas, a Romanian emigrated to the US, which facilitates the killing of her lover, the famous gangster John Dillinger in Chicago. After an adventurous life, the woman returns to die in her homeland.

Title: Toki o kakeru shôjo
Description: A high-school girl acquires the ability to time travel.

Title: Hangor Nodi Grenade
Description: A tragic story of a mother who dedicates her only child for the sake of the freedom of the country during liberation war in 1971.

Title: The Kid from Chaaba
Description: In the sixties, around twenty families fled their Algerian village of el-Ouricia, driven by poverty or war. Refugees in Chaâba, a French shantytown, they face the hard learning of integration.

Title: Wild Games
Description: A man is trapped in an elevator, getting out proves to be more challenging than just asking for help.

Title: A Friend of the Deceased
Description: Tolla takes out a contract on himself and then changes his mind.

Title: El aroma del Copal
Description: A petroleum engineer from Texas travels to an oil operation in Central America where he clashes with his boss, romances two women, and finds himself caught in a guerrilla war.

Title: The Bachelor
Description: The story of a thirties bank employee whose wife becomes a luxury prostitute. The same would happen with the next woman who knows. Xouan a promoter says he belongs to a particular class of people and asks him to work together.

Title: Aisuru
Description: Two young people meet by chance and fall in love but the woman is diagnosed with leprosy and sent away to a remote mountain sanitorium.

Title: Hitler och vi på Klamparegatan
Description: When the nazi-movement strikes during the thirties, one Swedish family, lead by the couregous "brother" - played by Superstar Fredrik Sjöblom, strives towards equality and justice through vigilantism.

Title: The Flight
Description: The subject is widows in a traditional Indian community.

Title: In schwimmen-zwei-vögel
Description: Austrian avant-garde theatre director Kurt Palm adaption of Flann O'Brien's beer-soaked, brilliantly funny, modernist masterpiece for the screen.

Title: C'est pour la bonne cause!
Description: A French school introduces a campaign to give African refugees shelter for one month at local families. Young Tonin too wants to help but his parents disagree, so he keeps Moussa, an African boy his own age, hidden in their house.

Title: Saraka bô
Description: Commissioner Diamant investigates the murder of two black girls. They were sacrificed, hanged, their faces covered with a Malian ceremony mask.

Title: Destination: 9th Heaven
Description: A Chinese space scientist shows his loyalty to his career and family.

Title: A Time to Kill
Description: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

Title: Romeo + Juliet
Description: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

Title: The Island of Dr. Moreau
Description: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.

Title: Matilda
Description: This film adaptation of a Roald Dahl work tells the story of Matilda Wormwood, a gifted girl forced to put up with a crude, distant father and mother.

Title: Trainspotting
Description: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

Title: The First Wives Club
Description: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

Title: Crash
Description: After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car accidents and the raw sexual energy they produce to try to rejuvenate his sex life with his wife.

Title: Primal Fear
Description: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

Title: 101 Dalmatians
Description: An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal Dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat, but instead creates an extravagant mess.

Title: James and the Giant Peach
Description: An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

Title: The English Patient
Description: At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

Title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
Description: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

Title: Striptease
Description: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

Title: Emma
Description: While matchmaking for friends and neighbours, a young 19th Century Englishwoman nearly misses her own chance at love.

Title: Thinner
Description: An obese attorney is cursed by a gypsy to rapidly and uncontrollably lose weight.

Title: Diabolique
Description: The wife and mistress of the sadistic dean of an exclusive prep school conspire to murder him.

Title: White Squall
Description: Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.

Title: Bad Moon
Description: After being bitten by a werewolf in the jungle, Ted looks for a cure. His lawyer sister, with a son and dog, invites him to park his camper by her house in the woods and live out of her fridge.

Title: Muppet Treasure Island
Description: The Muppets' twist on the classic tale.

Title: The Fan
Description: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

Title: Foxfire
Description: Legs Sadovsky gets four other high school girls to think for themselves and react to a teacher's sexual harassment, which gets them suspended. They bond, and rebel, at an abandoned house.

Title: Jude
Description: In late 1800s England, Jude plans to go to the city and attend university but marries early and becomes a stonemason. When his wife leaves, he moves to the city, where he befriends his liberal cousin Sue.

Title: The Portrait of a Lady
Description: An American girl inherits a fortune and falls into a misguided relationship with a gentleman confidence artist whose true nature, including a barbed and covetous disposition, turns her life into a nightmare.

Title: Fly Away Home
Description: A father and daughter decide to attempt to lead a flock of orphaned Canada Geese south by air.

Title: Eye for an Eye
Description: When the courts fail to keep behind bars the man who raped and murdered her daughter, a woman seeks her own form of justice.

Title: Bastard Out of Carolina
Description: A mother and daughter find their lives adversely affected when a new man enters the picture. Will their family ever be what they expect?

Title: Harriet the Spy
Description: Harriet M. Welsch is a spy. But when her friends find her secret notebook the tables are turned on her. Can she win her friends back and still keep on going with the spy business?

Title: The Juror
Description: A juror in a Mafia trial is forced to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty by an obsessive mob enforcer.

Title: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
Description: When adventurous pets Chance, Shadow and Sassy are accidentally separated from their vacationing owners, they're left to fend for themselves on the mean streets of San Francisco, in search for the "golden bridge" that will take them home.

Title: The Preacher's Wife
Description: An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.

Title: The Adventures of Pinocchio
Description: One of puppet-maker Geppetto's creations comes magically to life. This puppet named Pinocchio has one major desire, to become a real boy someday, but he has to learn to act responsibly.

Title: Mary Reilly
Description: A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Henry Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Edward Hyde.

Title: Extreme Measures
Description: A young doctor confronts a famous colleague when he learns about the true methods of his work.

Title: The Chamber
Description: A young man fresh out of law school tries to win a reprieve for his racist grandfather who is on death row.

Title: Heaven's Prisoners
Description: A hardened New Orleans cop, Dave Robicheaux, finally tosses in the badge and settles into life on the bayou with his wife. But a bizarre plane crash draws him back into the fray when his family is viciously threatened.

Title: Mrs. Winterbourne
Description: Connie, unwed and pregnant, is heading to Boston by train when she meets wealthy newlyweds Hugh and Patricia. The train crashes, and when Connie comes to in the hospital, she is mistaken for Patricia, who died in the crash with Hugh.

Title: Before and After
Description: Two parents deal with the effects when their son is accused of murdering his girlfriend.

Title: Caught
Description: Joe and Betty run a fish market and have sunk into a comfortable/boring life. Enter the drifter Nick, who takes a job in the store. He awakes Joe's hope in the future and Betty's sexual passions. Until their son Danny returns home..

Title: The Stendhal Syndrome
Description: A young policewoman slowly goes insane while tracking down an elusive serial rapist/killer through Italy when she herself becomes a victim of the brutal man's obsession.

Title: Night Falls on Manhattan
Description: A newly elected District Attorney finds himself in the middle of a police corruption investigation that may involve his father and his partner.

Title: Mr. Toad's Wild Ride
Description: Mole's underground home is bought by the Weasels from wealthy landowner Mr. Toad and Mole is thrown out. He and Rat start to fight to get his home back from evil Weasels.

Title: Mother Night
Description: An American spy behind the lines during WWII serves as a Nazi propagandist, a role he cannot escape in his future life as he can never reveal his real role in the war.

Title: The Van
Description: Set in the fictional Dublin suburb of Barrytown, Bimbo is a baker who loses his job after being made redundant. Bimbo then acquires the help of his best friend, Larry, to set up a successful burger van.

Title: Caligula
Description: The young emperor's decision to force the senators of Rome to live under a regime as cruel, moronic, meaningless and random as he believes life itself to be. His decision is prompted by the death of his sister, with whom he was in love.

Title: The Whole Wide World
Description: In 1933 Texas, a schoolteacher and aspiring writer meets a pulp fiction writer, and a relationship soon develops between the two, but it is doomed by his slavishly devotion to his ailing mother and insistence on his freedom.

Title: The Associate
Description: A comedy about making it on Wall Street. Prejudices are hard to break and Laurel Ayres quickly learns that in order for people to take her seriously she has to work for an older white man or be one.

Title: The Last of the High Kings
Description: After finishing exams June 1977 near Dublin, Frankie spends the summer with his two friends, siblings and mom while dreaming of two cute girls and waiting for exam results. College?

Title: An Occasional Hell
Description: A former policeman-turned college professor of forensics, is asked by a widow to solve the murder of her unfaithful husband and the disappearance of his mistress who may have been linked to some drug dealers.

Title: Hard Core Logo
Description: A group of washed-up Canadian punk rockers get back together for a road trip in memory of a dear friend who was supposedly shot, or so rumors imply. As they travel, they ignore the underlying psychological darkness within each other.

Title: The Cold Light of Day
Description: A troubled detective befriends a single woman and her daughter with the intention of using them as bait for a serial killer.

Title: Captain Conan
Description: The war exploits of French captain Conan and his men during World War I and during the Allied intervention in the Russian Civil War.

Title: The Other Side of Sunday
Description: The Other Side of Sunday criticizes the small, and often tight church community. We follow the Preachers Daughter; Maria, in her journey to liberate herself from the stiff church community and her strict religious father.

Title: Djöflaeyjan
Description: The story of families living in barracks, left by the US Army in Reykjavik at the conclusion of World War II.

Title: The Disappearance of Finbar
Description: Finbar is an Irish youth who, late one night, leapt from a freeway overpass and was never heard from again. When he suddenly reappears three years later, his family and friend Danny attempt to rebuilt their shattered lives.

Title: Celluloide
Description: The difficult making of Roberto Rossellini's masterpiece 'Roma, città aperta (1946)' in a Rome still suffering from the wounds of just ended WWII.

Title: How the Toys Saved Christmas
Description: A group of toys take matters into their own hands when their Christmas delivery is in jeopardy.

Title: Tu nombre envenena mis sueños
Description: The investigation of an apparent suicide in post-war Spain leads Inspector Barciela to discover a story of revenge for the hatred and grudges of the past.

Title: La lupa
Description: She was tall, dark and thin, with a proud and voluptuous bust. They called her "The she-wolf" because she seemed never to be satisfied. All the men were obsessed with her but one day the she-wolf fell madly in love with young Nanni.

Title: Malena es un nombre de tango
Description: Malena's life from adolescence to adulthood, unraveling the history of her family and her own while she is strongly influenced by her older sister.

Title: The Ex
Description: In order to get her husband back, an architect's psycho ex-wife kills everybody she can get her hands on.

Title: Panna Nikt
Description: A devout Catholic peasant girl is corrupted by two new friends when her family moves to the city. An allegory of traditional Polish values under threat from materialism and decadence in the post-Communist era.

Title: Whirlpool of Passion
Description: Plot is set at the end of 19th century, in the crossroad between Muslim and Christian culture, intertwine by eternal Balkan story - war and peace between members of different religions...

Title: The Pupil
Description: Morgan, a sensitive 12-year-old, growing up in richness and royalty, finds a true friend in Julien, a young man hired to tutor him.

Title: Misty
Description: In a forest, a man was murdered and his wife raped. The eyewitnesses make their statements, but they are very contradictory. Who is telling the truth and who is lying?

Title: El último viaje de Robert Rylands
Description: Loosely (and controversial) adaptation of the novel "All Souls" by Javier Marias. It tells the story of a Spanish professor at Oxford who witnesses the return of a very popular man there.

Title: Love Always
Description: Julia (Marisa Ryan), a struggling actress living in San Diego, hits the road after an ex-boyfriend in Spokane, WA, sends her a postcard proposing marriage.

Title: The White Lioness
Description: In a world where international terrorism knows no national borders, Wallander and his South African colleagues must prevent a crime that would change the face of history.

Title: Under the Skin
Description: Passion, criminal instincts an traditions melt together in this film, that shakes our conception of crime.

Title: Cachito
Description: After her grandmother dies, a young woman decides to find her mother who abandoned her when she was a baby.

Title: Más allá del jardín
Description: Palmira, a woman belonging to the Sevillian aristocracy, as well known for her decrepitude and hypocrisy as the rest of her population, enters into an emotional crisis when she reaches maturity.

Title: Tiré à part
Description: Sir Edward Lamb, famous publisher, delights in reading the latest novel by his old friend Nicolas Fabry. The elegant English aristocrat learns with dismay that the Frenchy is responsible for the death of the one he loved in Tunisia.

Title: Too Late
Description: Dumitru Costa, a young trainee prosecutor is entrusted with the investigation about the suspicious death of a Jiu Valley coal miner in 1990s Romania. Accident or murder?

Title: Brennendes Herz
Description: Follows the life of the famous German politician, writer, and communist activist, Gustav Regler, from his birth in 1898, in the Saar, through the two World Wars and his many travels, until his death in 1963 in India.

Title: Swann
Description: Rose Hindmarsh finds herself at the centre of a controversy when she meets author Sarah Maloney as she investigates the life of Mary Swann, an obscure poet who was brutally murdered in a small town in rural Ontario.

Title: Everything Must Go
Description: Tony is a homosexual law student who quits his studies. With a van and a handful of cash, he hits the road hoping to become a salesman. This, however, turns out to be harder than he expected.

Title: Va' dove ti porta il cuore
Description: A grandmother writes a diary for her nephew, her grandson finds the diary after her death and finds out the true family story.

Title: The Double Lottie
Description: Two separated twins, each living with a single parent and unaware from other one's existence, meet each other and switch places.

Title: A Starry Sky
Description: Dalva, a young hairdresser, is leaving for Miami to receive a prize. Her journey is interrupted, when her former boyfriend, Victor, makes her a captive in her own house.

Title: Adosados
Description: Andrés and Paula are a middle-class couple who live in a terrace house in the outskirts of Madrid. Everything seems perfect in their married life until one day an apparently unimportant lie brings all their miseries to the surface.

Title: Jack Frusciante Has Left the Band
Elämä lyhyt, Rytkönen pitkä
Description: Land surveyor Taavetti Rytkönen remembers the old days like they were yesterday - but he can't remember yesterday. He sets out on a journey to hunt down the past.

Title: O Guarani
Description: The forbidden love affair between Peri, an Indian, and the beautiful Ceci, a Portuguese white girl, in the 17th century Brazil.

Title: Sortez des rangs
Description: WW1: A woman ,whose husband refused to get back on the offensive -for the eleventh time!- and then was shot as an example ,is harassed by her "patriot" neighbors and the Police:she winds up in an insane asylum.

Title: O Monge e a Filha do Carrasco
Festival
Description: A number of old family conflicts emerge when a writer returns to his hometown to attend his mother's funeral.

Title: Come to Me
Description: A man with no ambitions or scruples, upon his release from prison, meets a former classmate who has fallen on hard times and has lost his will to try to better himself and his life.

Title: What I Have Written
Description: Truth and fiction collide when sexual obsession leads to betrayal. A voyage of discovery realigns subject, object and victim - things are not always as they seem.

Title: Hit by Lightning
Description: The film is based on the novellas written by Jolita Skablauskaite, Petras and Povilas Dirgelos. Three different plays are about people who can't find their place in society and who keep living in the world of their fantasies.

Title: Clueless
Description: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.

Title: Jumanji
Description: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

Title: Casino
Description: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.

Title: Sense and Sensibility
Description: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.

Title: The Basketball Diaries
Description: A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.

Title: The Bridges of Madison County
Description: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

Title: Leaving Las Vegas
Description: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

Title: To Die For
Description: A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.

Title: Village of the Damned
Description: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

Title: Get Shorty
Description: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

Title: Babe
Description: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs on a rural English farm, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

Title: A Little Princess
Description: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.

Title: The Baby-Sitters Club
Description: Seven junior-high-school girls organize a daycare camp for children while at the same time experiencing classic adolescent growing pains.

Title: Dolores Claiborne
Description: A big city reporter travels to a small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman for whom she worked as a housekeeper.

Title: Congo
Description: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

Title: Just Cause
Description: A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after twenty-five years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.

Title: Rob Roy
Description: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

Title: Underground
Description: A group of Serbian socialists prepares for the war in a surreal underground filled by parties, tragedies, love and hate.

Title: Devil in a Blue Dress
Description: An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.

Title: The Indian in the Cupboard
Description: Omri, a young boy growing up in Brooklyn, receives an odd variety of presents for his birthday: a wooden cabinet from his older brother, a set of antique keys from his mother and a tiny plastic model of an Indian from his best friend Patrick.

Title: Fair Game
Description: Max Kirkpatrick is a cop who protects Kate McQuean, a civil law attorney, from a renegade KGB team out to terminate her.

Title: The Scarlet Letter
Description: An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.

Title: Waiting to Exhale
Description: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.

Title: Circle of Friends
Description: 3 women, who've been friends since childhood, meet at university in Dublin in 1957. Student and boyfriend life begins.

Title: Tom and Huck
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Title: Haunted
Description: A skeptical professor visits a remote British estate to debunk allegations of psychic phenomena, but soon finds himself haunted by a ghost from his own past.

Title: Delta of Venus
Description: A struggling American writer (England) and a fellow American expatriate (Mandylor) begin a sordid affair among the chaos and discord of 1940 Paris, France on the brink of World War II.

Title: Maborosi
Description: A young woman's husband apparently commits suicide without warning or reason, leaving behind his wife and infant.

Title: How to Make an American Quilt
Description: Bride-to-be Finn Dodd hears tales of romance and sorrow from her elders as they construct a quilt.

Title: Clockers
Description: Young drug pushers in the projects of Brooklyn live hard dangerous lives, trapped between their drug bosses and the detectives out to stop them.

Title: Wild Bill
Description: The early career of legendary lawman Wild Bill Hickock is telescoped and culminates in his relocation in Deadwood and a reunion with Calamity Jane.

Title: Angels and Insects
Description: In the 1800s a naturalist marries into a family of British country gentry.

Title: Restoration
Description: The exiled royal physician to King Charles II devotes himself to helping Londoners suffering from the plague, and in the process falls in love with an equally poor woman.

Title: La Cérémonie
Description: A newly hired maid for a rich countryside family befriends a post-office clerk who encourages her to rebel against her employers.

Title: Dr. Jekyll and Ms. Hyde
Description: A scientist creating perfumes inherits his great grandfather Dr. Jekyll's formula and decides to use modern technology to improve it. He ends up as an ambitious, ruthless woman. She tries to prevent returning into the spineless man.

Title: Hideaway
Description: Hatch gets a special resuscitative medicine after "dying" in a car accident. His wife and daughter only get minor injuries. He gets strange nightmares such as killing a teen girl. Is it just dreams?

Title: Midaq Alley
Description: The lives of men and women living on Callejón de los Milagros in Mexico City.

Title: Fluke
Description: After a man dies in a car crash, he is reincarnated as a dog and attempts to reconnect with his family.

Title: Night of the Running Man
Description: A Las Vegas cab driver discovers a stolen million dollars, and is tracked by a relentless and cold-blooded assassin sent to retrieve the money.

Title: A Chinese Odyssey: Part 2 - Cinderella
Description: The convoluted continuation of the adventures of the time-traveling, now-human Monkey King, who attempts to fulfill his divine destiny.

Title: Losing Isaiah
Description: The biological and adoptive mothers of a young boy are involved in a bitter, controversial custody battle.

Title: The Underneath
Description: A recovering gambling addict attempts to reconcile with his family and friends but finds trouble and temptation when caught between feelings for his ex-wife and her dangerous hoodlum boyfriend.

Title: The Grass Harp
Description: Becoming an orphan in 1935, Collin moves to his dad's cousins Verena and Dolly. Verena is a rich, bossy businesswoman. Dolly, Collin and the maid revolt, moving to a tree house.

Title: The Perez Family
Description: In 1980, USA opens to Cuban refugees. Once in Miami, Dorita tries to create a Perez "family" of 3 to get a sponsor. She wants Juan to be her "husband" - plus a "son" or "dad".

Title: The Horseman on the Roof
Description: In a time of war and disease, a young officer gallantly tries to help a young woman find her husband.

Title: Two Much
Description: A young gallerist is in love with two sisters at the same time. In order to solve the problem he decides to invent his own twin-brother.

Title: Panther
Description: A dramatized account of the story of The Black Panther Party of Self-Defense.

Title: Les Misérables
Description: A variation on Victor Hugo's classic novel by means of the story of a man whose life is affected by and somewhat duplicated by the Hugo story of the beleaguered Jean Valjean.

Title: Sarah... ang munting prinsesa
Description: The adventures of Sarah as she stays at Miss Minchin's boarding school.

Title: Cry, the Beloved Country
Description: A South African preacher goes to search for his wayward son, who has committed a crime in the big city.

Title: Fanny Hill
Description: Orphaned at a young age, naive Fanny Hill moves to London to make her fortune but is soon lured into the seedy world of prostitution in the bawdy houses of the city.

Title: Institute Benjamenta, or This Dream That One Calls Human Life
Description: A young man goes to a school for servants run by a brother and sister. In the dreamlike and surreal world that he enters, how will his presence impact the people there and possibly even the school itself?

Title: Sabse Bada Khiladi
Description: A police officer impersonates his murdered twin brother in order to bring his killers to justice.

Title: The Run of the Country
Description: In a small village on the border of Northern Ireland and The Republic of Ireland, the relationship between a short tempered policeman and his rebellious son becomes even more strenuous when the young man falls for a "wrong" girl.

Title: Stonewall
Description: A group of homosexual people try to live with dignity and self-respect while events build to the opening battle in the major gay rights movement.

Title: Feast of July
Description: After an abandoned young woman in late 19th Century England is taken in by a rural couple with three handsome sons, tragic consequences result.

Title: Frankie Starlight
Description: A writer with dwarfism shares the story of his unconventional, though not altogether bad, upbringing as his mother struggled to raise him in the mid 20th century, with the help of a surrogate father.

Title: Two Deaths
Description: A tale of power, passion, and obsession set in a politically torn Eastern European country.

Title: Zero Kelvin
Description: A young writer whose proposal was recently rejected goes to Greenland to spend a year at an outpost for hunting and trapping animals for furs. At the outpost he meets two men who are none too keen to spend the winter with the newcomer.

Title: Man with a Gun
Description: Madsen plays an assassin who's hired to kill the woman he loves.

Title: The Phoenix and the Magic Carpet
El palomo cojo
Description: A ten years old child, sick, comes to his grandparents house for a summer. The visitors and neighbours will make his stay very amusing.

Title: Body Switch
Description: An elite sports doctor with 2 months to live offers to help a basketball team, so as to find a healthy boy to switch bodies with. A teenager wakes up to find himself in the old doctor's dying body.

Title: Sebastian
Description: Sebastian is one of five youths who are always together. Suddenly he realizes that he is attracted to another boy (Ulf).

Title: All Men Are Mortal
Description: Melodrama about a man cursed with immortality, who tries to declare his undying love for a depressed actress.

Title: The Set Up
Description: Charlie Thorpe, a security systems expert, gets caught during a robbery. When he is released from jail he is hired by a bank owner to design a fool proof system during the refurbishing of a bank.

Title: Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
The Secret Weapon
Description: When Hector and Elvira, a pair of young monkeys from two opposing families, fall in love, Elvira comes into possession of a secret weapon, war breaks out among the families and only she can choose between power and love.

Title: The Turnaround
Description: Private investigator Nick Sharman accepts a case which at first seems intriguing, but ends up causing him bitter regret.

Title: A Young Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court
Pan
Description: Lt. Thomas Glahn and Edvarda fall in love, but love can turn to hate.

Title: Mondo
Description: Mondo is a homeless young boy, with a big smile, who wanders around Nice looking for food and a place to sleep.

Title: No te mueras sin decirme adónde vas
Description: It is the fantastic story of a couple that has the chance to live for centuries loving one another because of various reincarnations.

Title: Other Voices, Other Rooms
Description: Other Voices, Other Rooms

Title: O Quatrilho
Description: Two Italian-immigrant couples are part of a game that leads to treason and brings serious consequences to those who lose.

Title: Slayers
Description: Lina Inverse and her overly-endowed associate Nagha the Serpent travel to Mipross Island, where they encounter an old sage who enlists them in his battle to defeat the demon Joyrock.

Title: A Quiet Life
Description: Melodrama about the life of a mentally handicapped young man and his devoted sister after their famous novelist father and housewife mother go to Australia on a business trip.

Title: Endless Waltz
Description: Koji Wakamatsu's biopic about a Japanese free jazz/improvisation saxophonist named Kaoru Abe.

Title: Kivenpyörittäjän kylä
Description: Pekka returns to his native village to attend a wedding. The village has lost its younger generations, and the movie tells the story of the last wedding in the village.

Title: Croce e delizia
Description: In Paris, a small troupe is shooting the film "La Traviata". Alfredo is the actor Alberto Sanna and the dressmaker is Rosa, who years ago had a brief adventure with him.

Title: Kun en pige
Description: Based on the autobiographical books by Lise Nørgaard. About her childhood in Roskilde and her struggle as a young female journalist in the 1940's.

Title: Mrs. Munck
Description: A wronged woman takes revenge on her wheelchair bound father-in-law.

Title: Siao Yu
Description: Siao Yu needs a Green Card. Mario Moretti needs his debts paid. Getting married could solve their problems, or multiply them.

Title: Un eroe borghese
Description: An intriguing look at a sinister web of power, linking politics and the mafia in modern day Italy.

Title: Cronaca di un amore violato
Description: Luca could appear a regular guy interested in spacial engineering. He is not. He rapes a girl and then, without being recognized, courts her! In the mean time he tries to rape another girl.

Title: Deborah
Description: Poland, 1939. Painter Marek Wawrowski lives in a small town with his wife and son. He meets young, beautiful Jewish girl, Deborah, immediately falls in love with her and they start a passionate affair. Then the World War II breaks out.

Title: Dust of Life
Description: Based on a true story, after the US withdrawal and the fall of South Vietnam to the communist forces in 1975, many people are sent to reeducation camps. Several desperate boys in one of the camps begin planing their escape.

Title: La scuola
Description: It is the last day of school in a run-down technical institute in the Roman suburbs: the pupils are not really diligent and the teachers give their worst both from a working and personal point of view.

Title: Pari
Description: Haunted by a book found in her dead brother's room, Pari wanders around to find answers for a meaningful life.

Title: Suspicions
Description: Six friends are trapped in an isolated cabin reachable only by a rugged ten-mile hike. Then they start to die one by one.

Title: Elle
Description: "El" re-imagined by Ruiz and Sarmiento as a portrait of a marriage characterized by shared jealousy, paranoia and lunacy.

Title: Craii de Curtea Veche
Description: A subtile, soft exploration of the relation between love and death.

Title: Rudy, the Racing Pig
Description: Flat-dwelling urban family win a pig in a raffle, and decide to keep it. They lose their flat (no pets allowed) but eventually Rudi the pig makes good.

Title: Hoogste tijd
Description: Old entertainer gets a last chance to play a serious role.

Title: The Girl of Silence
Description: 14 year old Nakamura is sexually abused by her stepfather. She invents a friend who is coming to her rescue when she really needs it.

Title: Girl Guide
Description: An unemployed English teacher has private lessons with the fiancee of a mysterious American. When the foreigner suddenly disappears, the woman asks the teacher to help her find him.

Title: Legend of Crystania: The Motion Picture
Description: Dreams begin to haunt Lady Sheru -- dreams of her past life as Pirotesse. Her love, Ashram, is being tormented at the hands of the soul of Barbas posing as their former king, Beld of Marmo.

Title: Beladingala Baale
Description: An anonymous, mysterious caller who claims to be a huge fan of Revanth, the Chess Grandmaster from India, challenges him in many ways. It results in an inner quest for him as he literally sets out to track down the elusive caller.

Title: Kura
Description: In spite of a longstanding tradition forbidding women from working in a sake brewery, Retsu, a young blind woman, challenges herself to overcome her disability in order to save her family's sake business.

Title: Ya - Russkiy soldat
Description: In the autumn of 1941, the last defender of the Brest fortress continues a fight against the German invaders.

Title: As Meninas
Description: Inspired in Lygia Fagundes Telles's famous book, the film follows three very different girls (Lorena, Lia and Ana Clara) living in a boarding house during some of the most repressive moments of Brazil's military dictatorship.

Title: Blush
Description: The film charts the fortunes of two women who loved each other as sisters, but whose paths diverge when the Revolution brings an end to their old way of life in the brothel.

Title: Sinais de Fogo
Description: The film presents us with a reflection on the Spanish Civil War in the Portuguese society, At a time when Salazar ruled.

Title: Target
Description: A cynical woman (Champa) leads exploited workers in a revolt against a cruel landowner (Mohan Agashe) in India

Title: Le maître des éléphants
Description: On the death of his mother, Martin joins a father he does not know in Africa. Received rather freshly by this father more concerned about the reserve for which he is responsible than for this new son, Martin will discover this country

Title: Paul Bowles: Half Moon
Description: Three short stories by the American expatriate, Paul Bowles, are brought to sinister life - 'Merkala Beach', 'Call at Corazon' and the haunting 'Allal'.

Title: ...Pervaya lyubov
Description: First Love is based on the eponymous novella by Turgenev. The main character is a 15-year old boy spending his summer in the countryside with his parents. When a family moves in next door he becomes infatuated with a beautiful neighbor.

Title: Tag ditt liv
Description: A man tries to analyze the life of a deceased friend.

Title: Camp de aimasho
Description: A wedding planner wants to promote outdoor wedding and honeymoon but has it's first canceled days before. One of the two women in charge decides to step in and get married instead. Things don't go as planned - primarily due to one man.

Title: Als werkelijkheidszin bestaat moet mogelijkheidszin ook bestaan
Lagodna
Description: A grieving man tries to find the cause of his young wife's suicide by spending the night next to her dead body and bringing back memories from their past.

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
Description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

Title: Legends of the Fall
Description: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

Title: Little Women
Description: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

Title: Frankenstein
Description: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

Title: Clear and Present Danger
Description: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

Title: Once Were Warriors
Description: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

Title: Disclosure
Description: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

Title: The Client
Description: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

Title: The Getaway
Description: An ex-con and his devoted wife must flee from danger when a heist doesn't go as planned.

Title: The Jungle Book
Description: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

Title: Queen Margot
Description: Young Queen Margot finds herself trapped in an arranged marriage amidst a religious war between Catholics and Protestants. She hopes to escape with a new lover, but finds herself imprisoned by her powerful and ruthless family.

Title: Intersection
Description: While driving on a remote highway, a man is torn between choosing to reunite with his estranged wife or taking up with his lover.

Title: Dellamorte Dellamore
Description: A cemetery man must kill the dead a second time when they become zombies.

Title: Exit to Eden
Description: Elliot heads for the sexual fantasy island, Eden. He takes some photos of diamond smugglers. They and undercover cops want the photos and follow him to Eden.

Title: Satantango

Title: The Specialist
Description: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

Title: Nobody's Fool
Description: A stubborn man past his prime reflects on his life of strict independence and seeks more from himself.

Title: The Postman
Description: A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

Title: North
Description: Sick of the neglect he receives from his mom and dad, a young boy leaves home and travels the world in search of new parents.

Title: Of Love and Shadows
Description: Chile 1973 is ruled by the dictator Pinochet. The wealthy don't see the violence, terror, executions etc. including Irene. She's engaged to an officer in the fascist military. She meets Francisco who opens her eyes to truth and love.

Title: No Escape
Description: A soldier convicted for murdering his commanding officer is dumped and left to die on a prison island inhabited by two camps of convicts.

Title: Monkey Trouble
Description: A young girl's life turns hairy when her new pet monkey turns out to be a trained pickpocket on the run from a scheming Gypsy.

Title: Black Beauty
Description: The fates of horses, and the people who own and command them, are revealed as Black Beauty narrates the circle of his life.

Title: The Road to Wellville
Description: A story about the ins and outs of one unusual health facility in the early twentieth century, run by the eccentric Dr. John Harvey Kellogg.

Title: The Puppet Masters
Description: The Earth is invaded by stingray-shaped alien "slugs" that ride on people's backs and control their minds.

Title: Ashes of Time
Description: A broken-hearted hit man moves to the desert where he finds skilled swordsmen to carry out his contract killings.

Title: To Live
Description: After Fugui and Jiazhen lose their personal fortunes, they raise a family and survive difficult cultural changes during 1940s to 1970s China.

Title: S.F.W.
Description: An alienated and misanthropic teenager gains sudden and unwanted celebrity status after he's taken hostage by terrorists where his indifference to their threats to kill him makes news headlines.

Title: Trading Mom
Description: Three children have had it with their mother, and magically make her disappear. The kids then head out to the "Mommy Market" for a replacement mom.

Title: A Simple Twist of Fate
Description: His life was emotionally closed off from the world, until an orphaned baby showed up at his house.

Title: It Runs in the Family
Description: In this sequel to A Christmas Story (1983), it is now summer in the Parker family and the usual number of events is happening in their separate lives.

Title: Venus in Furs
Description: Two people with help of some friends explore their sexuality.

Title: Felidae
Description: A cat must investigate brutal murders of other cats in a neighborhood he has moved into with his owner.

Title: Faust
Description: An ordinary man is lured into a strange puppet theatre by a map and finds himself embroiled in a production of the Faustian legend.

Title: La pasión turca
Description: Desideria, a married Spanish woman who has a quite boring and hidden sex-life, goes to Istanbul where she meets Yaman, a Turkish tourist guide, who makes her discover new physical experiences.

Title: A Good Man in Africa
Description: In a West African nation, the womanizing British 1st Secretary of the High Commissioner deals with different issues.

Title: Imaginary Crimes
Description: A recently widowed, small-time hustler struggles to raise his two teenage daughters on his own, and still make a dishonest living in 1950s Indiana.

Title: Second Best
Description: Graham, a lonely Welsh postal worker, adopts James, a troubled ten-year-old boy. Graham always wanted a son, but James loves his biological father too much to give Graham a chance. Will the two be able to accept each other as family?

Title: Con gli occhi chiusi
Description: Pietro is the sensitive son of Domenico, a gruff father. Pietro falls in love with a beautiful girl, Ghisola, who lives with her grandparents.

Title: The Maidens of Heavenly Mountains
Description: Legend has it that in a faraway place beyond the edge of the earth, there exists a broken-hearted man with infinite power. Abandoned by his loved ones, the inheritance of the old man's chi power becomes a battleground for evil outsiders.

Title: Yvonne's Perfume
Description: How the life of Victor Chmara toppled during the course of a single day during the summer of 1958 ?

Title: The Teddy Bear
Description: Professor Jean Rivière receives phone calls accusing him of murder. A teddy bear arrives by mail.

Title: Krummerne 3 - fars gode idé
Description: The Krunborg family has new problems: a freshly painted house that won't dry, a tent with holes and a car that won't go anywhere and much much more.

Title: The Night and the Moment
Description: A young marchioness who loves the way of free-thinking and flatterers invites an author into her house who pretends to seduce her...

Title: Zamok
Description: The story of Kafka's Castle.

Title: Mouvements du désir
Description: During the long train ride from Montreal to Vancouver, a man and woman find themselves increasingly attracted to each other.

Title: Back to Back, Face to Face
Watchers III
Description: When a new and dangerous "Outsider" chases an intelligent golden retriever in the South American jungles, Terror grips a team of ex-Military convicts sent to capture the creature.

Title: Huck and the King of Hearts
Almost Dead
Description: A woman psychologist, who specialises in research about twins, is haunted by her dead mothers ghost.

Title: Tikhie stranitsy
Description: A hungry, homeless, socially isolated and socially alienated young man living on the streets of an anonymous Russian big city in the 19th Century is looking for answers about himself.

Title: Vildbassen
Description: Torben is 14 year old teen, whose imagination often gets him in trouble. His father sends him away to a farm during a summer break, and it doesn't take long for him to get in trouble again.

Title: Novia que te vea
Description: Two Mexican Jewish girls of come of age in Mexico City during the 1960s.

Title: ...and the Earth Did Not Swallow Him
Foreign Student
Description: A French football playing exchange student falls in love.

Title: Jamila
Description: In the 1940s, young Kirghiz boy falls hopelessly for Jamilla, but their love has no future.

Title: Quand j'avais 5 ans je m'ai tué
Cache Cash
Description: Antoine, 11, is on holiday with his grandfather. One night he catches thieves hiding their booty in a pond. Antoine seizes the 40 million. But Liza, his new friend, is the daughter of one of the criminals. Both children soon face threats.

Title: Ti kniver i hjertet
Description: The young teenager Otto is entering the summer holidays in 60s Oslo, without getting a real holiday, and he is not accepted in the gang or the football team. But then he meets exciting mysterious Frank, which changes everything.

Title: Lust
Description: The restaurateur and womanizer Jerrie meets the guest Sara. A passionate but stormy relationship begins. Sara is not like the other women Jerrie has met. Soon Sara is the boss.

Title: Ava's Magical Adventure
Description: Ava is a 10-year-old girl who runs away from home with her best friend, Nellie, a 2-ton circus elephant. They are pursued by everyone from the police to the circus' owner.

Title: Under Heat
Description: Dean is 36 and recently diagnosed as HIV positive. He has come home to tell his mother and his older brother Milo.

Title: Exile
Description: When Peter Costello is exiled to a deserted island for stealing sheep, Mary, a maid, decides to join him there.

Title: The Wizard of the Emerald City
The Taebaek Mountains
Description: Based on the great river story, (Taebaegsanmaek) The Taebaek Mountains chronicles the lasting generational conflict between proprietors and peasants in South Korea.

Title: Charachar
Description: A bird catcher's empathy for the birds interferes with his livelihood.

Title: Bollywood
Description: Abulah seeks revenge on Pak Daddy and Vihishnu for the death of his wife. A series of funny and mindless events ensue.

Title: Wonder Boy - De sueur et de sang
Bonsoir
Description: Alex lost his job and home. He meets the lesbian Caroline who gives him a new start.

Title: Under the Domim Tree
Description: Individual memories of a group of teenage Holocaust survivors in Israel creates sharp conflicts among them.

Title: La hija del Puma
Description: Chronicle of the dramatic situation of human rights in Guatemala, narrated by a young indigenous woman who witnessed a massacre that occurred in the Central American country.

Title: Windigo
Description: A reporter struggles to cover a Native American group's battle with the government for independence in a remote area of Canada.

Title: Without Compassion
Description: Based on Dostoyevsky's 'Crime and Punishment': Ramón is a lonely laws student that lives in a rented room and thinks he has committed the perfect crime, but can't stand the consequences. A story of irrationality, anxiety and suffering.

Title: Sixten
Description: 13 year old Sixten really wants his father to meet someone he can marry. Without telling his father, he and his friends write an ad for the personal sections.

Title: Des feux mal éteints
Description: 1962, in Algeria. The journalist Jérome Cartier is called into the ranks of the French army, where he meets his friend François. The latter is the victim of an attack by the OAS. Jérome tracks the culprits.

Title: Saturnin
Description: A gentleman Jiøí Oulický hires a sevant Saturnin and from that day he goes through many unusual situations...

Title: The Awkward Age
Description: Adaptation of the highly popular children's novel by Branko Copic, who in this book resembles his school and college days in Bihac, Bosnia, in the years before WWII.

Title: Zivot a neobycejna dobrodruzstvi vojaka Ivana Conkina
The Secret of Queen Anne or Musketeers Thirty Years After
Description: The 3rd part of the famous trilogy by Alexandre Dumas about d'Artagnan and his 3 friends Athos, Porthos and Aramis.

Title: Le joueur de violon
Description: Arman, a truly brilliant violin player, one day decides to take a break from his career and descends into the bunkering world of tube stations.

Title: A Shadow You Soon Will Be
Barnabo of the Mountains
Description: A man and a woman meet an elf, whose name is Barnabo, and who knows the secret.

Title: Le bateau de mariage
Description: France, free zone, autumn 1940. A couple of young married women whose husband is a teacher and two teenagers who love each other secretly.

Title: Kawao tee Bangpleng
Description: An entire village meets a bizarre fate when all of its female inhabitants become pregnant at the same time, impregnated seemingly by an unknown force.

Title: Les faussaires
Description: Jack Baker arrives in Tahiti to write a new biography of Paul Gauguin. There he meets Cohn, famous for his swindling and drinking, and who claims to be the painter's heir.

Title: Cultivating Charlie
Description: A vegetarian (Jake Webber) takes a detour from a cross-country trip to promote his father's (David Huddleston) burger chain.

Title: Lumière noire
Description: When a man's best friend is shot in cold blood by two corrupt policemen, he must track down the only eyewitnesses, who have deported to Mali.

Title: Dreams of Innocence
Description: Little Benjamin and Margalit are raised in the boondocks of Israel by their long-suffering mother, but they have in them something of their father, who can't stay in a place with no prospect of riches and excitement.

Title: Life and Death of the Hollywood Kid
Description: The story of film director Yun Myoggil and his best friend Lim Byoungsuk whom has obsessive with watching American film. Lim gave his playscript to Yun to make a film. Yun begins to realise that the most of script was replicated.

Title: How to Be Miserable and Enjoy It
I natt går Jorden under
Description: The boys Johan and Ove are best friends. When Ove's father dies, Ove gets a little "weird" and they lose contact.

Title: Neoege narul bonaenda
Description: A failed writer given to plagiarism gets a buzz at the door from a bright young working girl with a highly original approach to life and sex and his life and work is totally thrown off balance.

Title: Edogawa Rampo gekijo: Oshie to tabisuru otoko
The Lover of Silent Films
Description: A boy has an unusual upbringing in a romantic setting , the household of a former film star, who reminisces about his past.

Title: On the Edge
Description: Based on a novel by Yehoshua Kenaz.

Title: Priez pour nous
Description: The Guidon de Repeygnac, a family of aristocrats ruined by the Stock Exchange, leave their mansion in Neuilly for two F4s in the red suburbs.

Title: Jurassic Park
Description: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

Title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
Description: A young man in a small Midwestern town struggles to care for his mentally-disabled younger brother and morbidly obese mother while attempting to pursue his own happiness.

Title: Mrs. Doubtfire
Description: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

Title: The Firm
Description: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

Title: Carlito's Way
Description: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

Title: Indecent Proposal
Description: A billionaire offers $1,000,000 to a young married couple for one night with the wife.

Title: The Age of Innocence
Description: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

Title: The Three Musketeers
Description: France, 1625: Young d'Artagnan heads to Paris to join the Musketeers but the evil cardinal has disbanded them - save 3. He meets the 3, Athos, Porthos and Aramis, and joins them on their quest to save the king and country.

Title: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
Description: A fun-loving American bulldog pup, a hilarious Himalayan cat, and a wise old golden retriever embark on a long trek through the rugged wilderness of the Sierra Nevada mountains in a quest to reach home and their beloved owners.

Title: The Secret Garden
Description: A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all of her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings, and its secrets.

Title: The Remains of the Day
Description: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

Title: Alive
Description: A Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.

Title: Sliver
Description: A woman moves into an exclusive New York City apartment building, which she soon discovers houses tenants with all manner of shocking secrets.

Title: The Pelican Brief
Description: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

Title: Needful Things
Description: A mysterious new shop opens in a small town which always seems to stock the deepest desires of each shopper, with a price far heavier than expected.

Title: What's Love Got to Do with It
Gettysburg
Description: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

Title: Body Snatchers
Description: A teenage girl and her father discover alien clones are replacing humans on a remote U.S. military base in Alabama.

Title: The Vanishing
Description: The boyfriend of an abducted woman never gives up the search as the abductor looks on.

Title: The House of the Spirits
Description: A rancher, his clairvoyant wife and their family face turbulent years in South America in this adaptation of Isabel Allende's best-seller.

Title: The Joy Luck Club
Description: The life histories of four East Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

Title: The Man Without a Face
Description: Chuck wants to leave home but can't make the grade for boarding school. Then he finds out the disfigured recluse living nearby is an ex-teacher.

Title: The Cement Garden
Description: Four children live with their terminally ill mother. After she dies, they try to hold things together. In their isolated house, they begin to deteriorate mentally, whilst they hide their mom's decomposing corpse in a makeshift concrete sarcophagus.

Title: Rising Sun
Description: When an escort girl is found dead in the offices of a Japanese company in Los Angeles, detectives Web Smith and John Connor act as liaison between the company's executives and the investigating cop Tom Graham.

Title: Farewell My Concubine
Description: Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and will endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.

Title: Searching for Bobby Fischer
Description: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

Title: The Adventures of Huck Finn
Description: In Missouri, during the 1840s, young Huck Finn fearful of his drunkard father and yearning for adventure, leaves his foster family and joins with runaway slave Jim in a voyage down the Mississippi River toward slavery free states.

Title: The Dark Half
Description: A writer's fictional alter ego wants to take over his life...at any price.

Title: Fearless
Description: A man's personality is dramatically changed after surviving a major airline crash.

Title: Germinal
Description: In mid-nineteenth-century northern France, a coal mining town's workers are exploited by the mine's owner. One day, they decide to go on strike, and the authorities repress them.

Title: The Real McCoy
Description: A woman is released from prison, an expert bank robber who wants to settle down and go straight, but her parole officer and her former employer try to get her to pull one more heist.

Title: Ordinary Magic
Description: The misadventures of a boy sent to live with his aunt in Canada, where he and a group of unlikely heroes take a stand against the ski resort infringing upon his new home.

Title: Jack the Bear
Description: Danny DeVito is John Leary, a professional clown, whose wife's death in a car accident has left him to care for his two young boys.

Title: Carnosaur
Description: A genetically manipulated and very hungry dinosaur escapes from a bioengineering company and reeks havoc on the local desert town. A security guard and a girl environmentalist try to stop both it and the company's doomsday bioweapon.

Title: Boiling Point
Description: A pair of sociopath killers take on the police and the mob in order to make one last big score.

Title: Ethan Frome
Description: A new pastor arrives in a stark Vermont village and is intrigued by crippled, misshapen Ethan Frome living on an isolated, hardscrabble farm with his sickly wife Zeena.

Title: Private Lessons II
Description: An insecure young Asian man, played by Japanese pop star Goro Inagaki, meets an interesting sensual European woman who teaches him the secrets of love and life.

Title: The Bride with White Hair
Description: Cho Yat-Hang, the unwilling successor to the Wu-Tang clan throne and the unsure commander of the clan's forces in a war against an evil cult, falls in forbidden love with Lien Ni-Chang, a killer for the evil cult.

Title: Morning Glory
Description: An ex-convict who is on parole is accused of murdering a loose woman in the town where he works.

Title: Green Snake
Description: Two snake spirits become human and learn about love and suffering. A monk discovers his own weaknesses and finds that morality is not as simple as he had thought.

Title: The Innocent
Description: A British telecommunication expert comes to 1950s Berlin to help the Americans spy on USSR. He meets a cute, mysterious local woman.

Title: Household Saints
Description: Unsettling drama about three generations of Italian-American women struggling to get by in post-World War II New York's Little Italy.

Title: The Music of Chance
Description: A thrill seeker agrees to help a shady professional gambler win a high stakes poker game. However, they lose and become captives of two eccentric rich men who decide to forcibly keep them on their remote gated ranch as indentured servants.

Title: Dirty Weekend
Description: This is the story of Bella, who woke up one morning and realized she'd had enough. All it took was one rather nasty man to transform her from a meek and mild secretary into a murderous femme fatale.

Title: Fanfan
Description: A hang-up man tries to love in a different way from normal, and finally manages the psychological shadow for love.

Title: Emmanuelle 7
Description: Through the wonders of virtual reality, Emmanuelle tries to help a former schoolmate to overcome a traumatic sexual past.

Title: Maya
Description: A beautiful, wealthy woman's insatiable appetite for romance leads to tragedy and a police investigation.

Title: Swordsman III: The East Is Red
Genghis Cohn
Description: A former SS officer is haunted by the ghost of a man he murdered during WWII.

Title: The Rebel
Description: After being caught for stealing, two sisters are sentenced to a religious institution for reform.

Title: El amante bilingüe
Description: Joan Mares' obsession for the luscious Norma takes epic proportions because he can't let go of her. After he is injured by some skinheads, he uses his scars to pursue his life as a street musician. He devises a plan to get to her.

Title: Sopyonje
Description: Despite its falling popularity, a father teaches his two children the Korean musical tradition of Pansori (one singer accompanied by one drummer).

Title: Butterfly and Sword
Description: Dynamo Michelle Yeoh stars as a loyalist who attempts to keep the King's empire from being overthrown by a revolutionary group.

Title: Stolen Spring
Description: We follow 4 classmates in a strict boys' secondary school in 1950s Copenhagen, where a sadistic teacher torments his students. We meet them again at their 35 year class reunion.

Title: Akasmika
Description: A police officer investigates a prostitution racket.

Title: A Warrior's Tragedy
Description: Adventures of a silent halting swordsman and a bright open-minded swordsman in a frontier town.

Title: The Mystery of Edwin Drood
Description: An opium-addicted choirmaster develops an obsession for a beautiful young girl and will not stop short of murder in order to have her.

Title: Lotta 2 - Lotta flyttar hemifrån
Description: A feisty five-year-old girl Lotta decides to move away from home. And no, she doesn't want to put on the stupid sweater.

Title: Me and the Kid
Description: A lonely and emotionally neglected rich kid forms an attachment to one of the men who kidnap him during a botched robbery of his father's safe.

Title: The Padma Boatman
Description: Hossain, a Bengali Muslim wants to establish a little Utopia on an island in the Padma delta. He doesn't care if the people who populate it are Hindu or Muslim.

Title: Telegrafisten
Description: Mack is the most important man in a little society in North Western Norway around 1900. Telegrapher Rolandsen is a smart, funny and charming the ladies, even Mack's daughter.

Title: The Little Apocalypse
Description: An unknown Polish writer can't publish his novels, so his ex-wife decides to help him and get some of the profit for herself. She finally finds a publisher, but there's a strange single condition that could cost the writer his life.

Title: Coo: Come from a Distant Ocean Coo
Eight Hundred Leagues Down the Amazon
La guagua aérea
Description: Ten Puerto Ricans looking for a better life take an airplane trip to New York during 1960's.

Title: Drug-Taking and the Arts
Description: How drugs have influenced artistic production in the course of the last 200 years, focusing on major European and American literary figures and visual artists.

Title: Sweet Killing
Description: A business man decides to kill his wife but the plan sets off a chain of weird events that cause his life to become a living hell.

Title: De blå ulvene
Description: This time Pelle's father joins an activist group and Pelle has to face up to his father.

Title: Krücke
Description: Losing his mother to WW2, 13-year-old Tom visits his aunt but finds her missing. Not knowing what to do, he is befriended by Krücke, a one-legged war veteran, and finds shelter with a Jewish woman who sells alcohol to the Allied soldiers.

Title: Tirano Banderas
Description: In Santa Fe de Tierra Firme, an imaginary Latin American country, the indigenous dictator Santos Banderas rules with an iron fist. A group of rebels trying to seize power by force while some liberals try a change of government legally.

Title: Hidden Fears
Description: Several years after her husband's murder, a haunted widow approaches the police with new evidence. Unfortunately the perpetrators discover that the case is re-opened, and they set out to kill the eyewitnesses and the widow herself.

Title: Blackfellas
Description: An Aboriginal man is caught between his allegiance to his people and his aspirations to escape the cycle of self-destructive behaviour.

Title: The Punk
Description: A London street kid falls in love with a rich girl but their romance is frowned upon by their parents and peers. When he kills a man in self-defense, he goes on the run from his policeman father, while she tries to find him first.

Title: The Little Blonde Dead
Description: Poet Valentijn comes in contact with his former teacher Mieke. After a brief relationship Valentijn leaves her. But when he later gets to know his son, a bond develops between the two.

Title: L'enfant lion
Description: Set in the past, follows young African boy who uses his friends, the wild animals, to defend his village from Arab slave traders.

Title: Vals licht
Description: A young student is intrigued by a prostitute who works in the red light district, then falls in love with her. A relationship that's much harder to maintain than he thought.

Title: Tierno verano de lujurias y azoteas
Description: A youngster recently arrived to Spain from Russia falls in love with his own cousin who is an astonishingly beautiful actress and, besides, much older than him.

Title: Funes, un gran amor
Description: A group of musicians, prostitutes, gamblers, and laborers, react to the arrival of a tango pianist at a saloon.

Title: Mizu no tabibito: Samurai kizzu
Description: A special effects filled fantasy adventure, in which an 8 year old boy encounters an ancient samurai warrior who is only six inches tall.

Title: Predskazaniye
Description: A popular middle-aged writer is warned by a fortuneteller that strange things are about to happen to him. He then meets a man, who claims to be him. The writer uses this bizarre situation to change his life and take revenge.

Title: Fei hu wai zhuan
Description: A swordsman learns about love and life when he falls for one woman and another girl falls for him. Meanwhile, he and the one he is in love with must fight an evil warlord bent on corruption.

Title: O Fio do Horizonte
Description: Spino, a pathologist, receives an unidentified body which looks familiar to him... himself, 30 years younger.

Title: Black Box
Description: Based on a novel by Amos Oz..

Title: Høyere enn himmelen
Description: Based upon the novel by Klaus Hagerup, we follow the grumpy 12 year old Mari, without any friends, not at all content with her body or her family. Interesingly enough, quite like her grumpy teacher, actually.

Title: Hoffman's honger
Description: Felix Hoffman, a Dutch ambassador in Prague always on the lookout for things to fill both his belly and his mind with, falls for a beautiful Czech spy during a lecture of the famous philosopher Baruch Spinoza.

Title: Tsuki wa dotchi ni dete iru
Description: Story of everyday life and romance of a taxi driver who is a Korean resident in Japan.

Title: Den russiske sangerinde
Description: A Danish embassy secretary in Moscow and a prostitute are found dead. Both the Danish ambassador and the Russian authorities are eager to close the case that looks like murder involving a general. A diplomat investigates.

Title: Coitado do Jorge
Description: One night Jorge will meet with a Japanese industrialist, who will allow him to abandon his teaching position and resume his chemical work. However, when he gets home he finds a person there.

Title: Justinien Trouvé, ou le bâtard de Dieu
Description: Young Justinien, aka Cyrano-Nose-The-Less, born in 1683, leaves his adoptive parents to join a monastery, only to live a series of misadventures through which he will learn the secrets of his birth.

Title: The Little Dolphins
Description: In the 30's, two children who spend their summer holidays in a village of Amvrakikos, support a child with tuberculosis who lives alone in a hut.

Title: Gladiator po naymu
Description: A detective/crime drama based on the novel "The Case of the Velvet Claws" by Erle Stanley Gardner.

Title: Coma
Description: Victim of a train accident, a man regains consciousness in the house of the woman who shared his compartment.

Title: La nuit sacrée
Description: In the 1920s, the story of the eighth daughter of a Moroccan family whose sex was hidden from everyone and who was raised in the tradition of males until the age of 21 under the name of Ahmed.

Title: Palayam
Description: Noble, a lorry driver, claims that he is the son of a judge. After learning about him, his stepbrother plans to murder him to amass his mother's wealth.

Title: Ap' to hioni
Description: This film follows a few men from Albania as they travel to Greece looking for a better life in Athens.

Title: Zhao le
Description: A charming story of a group of senior citizens who set up a Peking Opera club in hopes of finding revitalization through singing and dancing. Fast paced and delightful.

Title: Harjunpää and the Persecutors
Description: A police story, where the policeman Timo Harjunpää works on a case where two losers start a harassment campaign against a rich and successful computer expert. Tragedy cannot be avoided.

Title: Sidestroke
Description: A Ménage A Trois ,on the banks of the lake of Annecy.

Title: Bisangguga eobtda
Description: A man begins a murder spree in a misguided effort to narrow the gap between the very rich and the very poor but when he starts to doubt his mission he finds that he has become addicted to killing and cannot stop

Title: Anego - Gokudô wo aishita onna: Kiriko
Dracula
Description: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

Title: The Last of the Mohicans
Description: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

Title: Aladdin
Description: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

Title: A River Runs Through It
Description: Two sons of a stern minister - one reserved, one rebellious - grow up in rural 1920s Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

Title: Scent of a Woman
Description: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

Title: The Lover
Description: In 1929 French Indochina, a French teenage girl embarks on a reckless and forbidden romance with a wealthy, older Chinese man, each knowing that knowledge of their affair will bring drastic consequences to each other.

Title: Howards End
Description: A businessman thwarts his wife's bequest of an estate to another woman.

Title: Of Mice and Men
Description: A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

Title: Patriot Games
Description: When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

Title: Single White Female
Description: A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

Title: Bitter Moon
Description: After hearing stories of her, a passenger on a cruise ship develops an irresistible infatuation with an eccentric paraplegic's wife.

Title: The Player
Description: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected, but which one?

Title: Chaplin
Description: An elderly Charlie Chaplin discusses his autobiography with his editor, recounting his amazing journey from his poverty-stricken childhood to world-wide success after the ingenious invention of the Little Tramp.

Title: Damage
Description: A member of Parliament falls passionately in love with his son's fiancée despite the dangers of discovery.

Title: The Power of One
Description: An English boy, living in Africa during World War II, through his boxing prowess, becomes a symbol of hope, in a time of war.

Title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
Description: After a freak accident, a company executive turns completely invisible, goes on the run and becomes hunted by a treacherous CIA official, whilst trying to cope with his new reality.

Title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
Description: The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.

Title: Orlando
Description: After Queen Elizabeth I commands him not to grow old, a young nobleman struggles with love and his place in the world.

Title: Freejack
Description: Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race car driver to New York City in 2009, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.

Title: Like Water for Chocolate
Description: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

Title: Wuthering Heights
Description: A man becomes obsessed with vengeance when his soul mate marries another man.

Title: Shining Through
Description: An American woman of Irish, Jewish-German parentage goes undercover in Nazi Germany.

Title: South Central
Description: A former gangster fresh out of prison wants to change his life for the better and must save his 10 year old son who has already chosen a gang life.

Title: For a Lost Soldier
Description: Set in The Netherlands at the end of WW II, this touching story, told in flashbacks, explores the complex and romantic relationship between an adult soldier and a displaced, lonely adolescent boy.

Title: Gas Food Lodging
Description: A waitress lives with her two teen daughters in a trailer park in New Mexico. They all want a boyfriend.

Title: Diggstown
Description: Gabriel's released from prison. His con man friend makes a foolish bet with Diggstown's owner on who'd win the boxing matches - their man against ten Diggstown men.

Title: A Midnight Clear
Description: This WW2 psychological drama plays out at Christmas. US GIs hold an isolated cabin in the Ardennes against a handful of Germans cut off from their main force. Combat-weary and short of rations, both sides are determined to survive.

Title: The Mambo Kings
Description: Two Cuban brothers bring a new music to the 1950s USA. They are as different as the problems that await them.

Title: That Night
Description: Long Island, NY, summer 1961: Preteen Alice follows, from across the street, the glamorous love life of Sheryl, 17, with bowling alley Rick. A friendship develops as Alice helps Sheryl see Rick.

Title: The Lost World
Description: Two rivaling professors - a journalist, a young wealthy woman and a teenage boy - travel through Africa in search of "The Lost World", a place where dinosaurs still roam.

Title: City of Joy
Description: An American doctor, a British nurse and an illiterate Indian farmer join together to transform a Calcutta ghetto in this uplifting, inspirational movie starring Patrick Swayze and Pauline Collins.

Title: Waterland
Description: Pittsburgh, 1974: A high school history teacher slowly losing it tells his class about his experiences as teenager in England during WWII incl. curious 16 y.o. Mary.

Title: Night and the City
Description: The story about a cheating and incompetent lawyer (Harry Fabian) who suddenly gets obsessed on becoming a boxing promoter.

Title: This Is My Life
