Description: A stand-up comic (Julie Kavner) neglects her two daughters in the midst of her newfound fame.

Title: La Vie de Bohème
Description: Three struggling artists try to make passable livings in Paris despite knock backs and tragedies.

Title: Shadow of the Wolf
Description: In Canada's North during the 1930s, a young Inuit kills a White trader and is pursued by the police but his father is determined to protect his fugitive son at any cost.

Title: Swordsman II
Description: Ling Wu Chung decides to hide from the chaotic world. Before leaving, he visits his friends, a tribe of snake-wielding women warriors. However, he finds that the tribe have been attacked, and their leader Yam Ying Ying has been abducted.

Title: Blue Ice
Description: A former British Secret Service Agent falls for an American woman, and becomes entangled in a web of espionage.

Title: Storyville
Description: While investigating his own blackmailing, a young politician uncovers his family's deep secrets.

Title: Divertimento
Description: More than just an abbreviated form of "La Belle Noiseuse", Rivette re-cut his footage with some important differences in point of view - this one being more from Marianne's point of view.

Title: Lotta på Bråkmakargatan
Description: Lotta is angry because she is considered too small to make all the fun things as her older siblings Mia and Jonas can do.

Title: Clowning Around
Description: Follows a boy who realizes there is more to being a clown, than just clowning around.

Title: Double X: The Name of the Game
Description: While taking a holiday in Scotland, American traveller Michael Cooper pulls elderly man Arthur Clutten into his car following an explosion at a hotel. Cooper discovers Clutten's back story, and learns why people are out to kill him.

Title: The Setting Sun
Description: A Japanese soldier is forced to question alliances when he meets and falls in love with the leader of the rebel movement.

Title: The Cat
Description: An adaptation of the novel Old Cat, by Ni Kuang. A cat from outer space teams up with a young alien girl and her knight, along with an adventure novelist named Wisely, to fight a murderous alien that possesses people.

Title: Cilveka berns
Description: A story about Pavulans family life in Latgale, traditions and values that are passed down from generation to generation. Little Bonuks from an early age learns to build relationships with family members and others, with God and nature.

Title: Don Quixote
Description: The story of a Spanish gentlemen gone mad and his dim-witted squire Sancho Panza, who set forth on a journey to right wrongs and accomplish good deeds in the name of chivalry.

Title: Hostage
Description: UK black ops agent is sent to Argentina to find a kidnapped special ops analyst and take out the terrorists who took him. When a pretty girl who may somehow be involved catches his eye things get very complicated fast.

Title: The Democratic Terrorist
Description: Swedish secret agent infiltrate a German terrorist group.

Title: Det skaldede spøgelse
Description: 11 y.o. Jasper's only friend, an old retired sailor living alone by the stream, dies. He gets his cat. A ghost appears. At the village school, he's bullied by the vicar's son, but there are also two nice girls in his class.

Title: Comet in Moominland
Description: Moomin, Sniff and My set out to stop a comet approaching the Moomin valley. Along the way they meet Snusmumriken, the beautiful Snorkfröken, Snorken and a Hemul, who join them in their quest.

Title: Crumb at a Gallop
Description: Everything is normal with the Krumborg family, Two robbers want to kidnap Krumme all the while Krumme's present accidentally winds up with Mrs.Olsen.

Title: Lakki... The Boy Who Could Fly
Description: A friendless, lonely boy who dreams of escape from a broken home with an neglectful, promiscuous. alcoholic mother and self-centered, clueless, absent father.

Title: The Stolen Diary
Description: The time of a summer, a girl (Virginia) will know the ideal love through that of three of his friends, Anne, Maurice and Jacques.She keeps a diary that is stolen by a young man who loves her although she is in a lesbian relationship.

Title: Ciao, Professore!
Description: A teacher must deal with the underworld of Naples and his students' family problems.

Title: Detour
Description: A nightclub piano player (Tom Neal Jr.) hitchhikes to the West Coast and soon figures into two deaths.

Title: Le retour de Casanova
Description: After many years of rambling across Europe the aging Giacomo Casanova is impoverished. He wants to return to Venice but he doesn't dare going there directly, because he was a fugitive when he left.

Title: Alan & Naomi
Description: Set in the forties. A young Jewish boy is called on by his parents to help a young girl come out of her shell, imposed after she watched her father die at the hands of the Nazis.

Title: Coyote
Description: The film tells the story of a violent and passionate love between two ambitious teenagers in the background of nowadays Montreal.

Title: Sweetheart
Description: A young police inspector is sent to Zurich to keep an eye on an important business man.However,things get complicated when the young inspector seems to mix things and people.

Title: Gô-hime
Description: Chronicles the trials and tribulations of Oribe, the successor to tea-master Rikyu, Usu, his gardener, and Princess Goh, who attempt to balance artistic expression and duty amid political intrigue in feudal Japan.

Title: Rosa, I Love You
Description: Story of daydreaming rebellious Rosa searching for love from her teenage years to her deathbed.

Title: Landslide
Description: Amnesiac geologist Robert (Bob) Boyd is working on a project that he had been retained to do. He has no memory of the past, but during the project, his memory begins to return, and the memories are not happy ones.

Title: L'Atlantide
Description: Morhange, a former French army officer, goes to Hoggar in search of Saint-Avit, a comrade in arms who disappeared during a patrol. He finds him in a village, but this one, bewitched by the beautiful Antinea, refuses to leave.

Title: Domnisoara Christina
Description: Christina's ghost haunts the mansion where she was born.

Title: Original Sin
Description: The story about an extramarital affair between the wife of an estate agent and a 22 year old man.

Title: Sexes faibles!
Description: The La Chesnays live in a castle threatened with destruction to accommodate a TGV line. While Gilles, the husband, agrees to receive compensation, his wife, Maud, fights with the other villagers so that the project does not materialize.

Title: Pierscionek z orlem w koronie
Description: A young resistance fighter tries to deal with the harsh reality of post-war Poland, where communists come to power.

Title: Méchant garçon
Description: A teenager, Ronald, unintentionally causes the death of a young girl on a beach. So that the police do not find him, his mother locks him in a cubicle, under the stairs of the house. On her death, the house was rented to an English family.

Title: Golmaal Govindam
Description: A trickster blackmails a trio of men, all of whom ill-treated a woman.

Title: Beck - De gesloten kamer
Description: A police officer investigates the case of a man shot dead in a room locked from the inside. A suicide? Then where's the gun?

Title: La vie fantôme
Description: A literature professor successfully lives two fulfilling lives: one with his wife and two children, and another with his librarian mistress. He loves everyone equally but something occurs that threatens everything.

Title: The Nun and the Bandit
Description: Outlaws kidnap their 14-year-old cousin and hold her for ransom. The girl is being chaperoned by a visiting nun, who refuses to abandon her during the kidnapping.

Title: Das kleine Gespenst
Description: A little ghost longs to see the world in daylight. When his wish comes true, chaos ensues.

Title: Odisseya Kapitana Blada
Description: The English doctor, by mistake the convict on a hard labor, managed to run. The former prisoners who took the Spanish frigate are forced to hoist the black piracy colors. They still beyond the law, and this hunt is started for them.

Title: Les eaux dormantes
Description: Whatever happened to my father?

Title: El juego de los mensajes invisibles
Det perfekte mord
Description: Film director Pierre is making an erotic thriller with his girls friend Greta, the mysterious "G" loving men until they disappear. Soon parallels between the movie and real life is obvious. Men start disappearing.

Title: The Hummingbird Tree
Description: A story of first love set in Trinidad in the 1940s.

Title: Siempre es difícil volver a casa
Description: Four friends go to the small town where one of them spent his childhood, with the intention of robbing the town's bank. The robbery does not go according to plan, and they have the entire town after them.

Title: The Price of Head
Description: Commissioner Maigret's new case. At the rate of his further service in the police.

Title: De zondagsjongen
Description: Anton is the son of a Dutch magician and his German assistant. He was born on a Sunday in Germany at the end of the war and grew up in the Netherlands. He never feels completely at home in either country.

Title: Un chien sur la route
Description: Gregor Zidar (Roger Jendly), a quarter of a century after an extraordinary feat of bravery, finds himself face to face with his own bronze statue. So here he is raised to heavenly glory. But at what price ?

Title: Gudrun
Description: The 12 year old girl Gudrun experiences the end of childhood in a little town near Nuremberg. Her father is fighting far away on the Russian front, her mother packs Gudrun off to her grandmother.

Title: To pethameno liker
Description: In late-1950s Athens, a big sister and her twin brothers sneak in their grandfather's distillery to perform a strange rite. But, how important is the last drop of the rare "Dead Liqueur" to the experimenting adolescents' budding sexuality?

Title: Cynics
Description: 1918, Petrograd. The young historian Vladimir meets Olga, the daughter of the wealthy parents who have emigrated from the country after the first decrees of the Soviet power. Olga both hates revolution, and is fascinated by her.

Title: Tridtsatogo unichtozhit!
Description: When a man is forced to return to a secret Russian training camp, he decides to plan his escape, not knowing who to trust.

Title: Boulevard des hirondelles
Description: Inspired by a story, that of a woman who, in the 1940s, organized a commando operation on Boulevard des Hirondelles to get her lover out of prison.

Title: Võlausaldajad
Description: Anxiously awaiting the return of his new wife, Adolph finds solace in the words of a stranger. But comfort soon turns to destruction as old wounds are opened, insecurities are laid bare and former debts are settled.

Title: Enker Panjuni
Description: Screen version of Yervand Otyan's "Comrade Panjuni" is powerful satire on demagoguery and hypocrisy of the Armenian politicos and political party activists.

Title: La sévillane
Description: An orange, yellow and gray film which tells a love story or more precisely the birth of the feeling of love.

Title: Duplet
Description: Ecological criminal intrigue during the international billiard tournament in Riga.

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Title: Hook
Description: When Captain James Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

Title: Cape Fear
Description: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

Title: Fried Green Tomatoes
Description: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

Title: Father of the Bride
Description: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

Title: Sleeping with the Enemy
Description: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

Title: The Rocketeer
Description: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high-flying masked hero.

Title: Sex and Zen
Description: A man marries a beautiful wife, but decides to go out and experience as many sexual conquests as possible, with unusual and often hilarious results. Meanwhile, his wife is forced to enter a brothel and work as a prostitute.

Title: Paprika
Description: A young country girl comes to town and works in a brothel in order to help her fiance get the money to start his own business. "Paprika" is the name given to her by the madam.

Title: Naked Lunch
Description: After developing an addiction to the substance he uses to kill bugs, an exterminator accidentally kills his wife, and becomes involved in a secret government plot being orchestrated by giant bugs in a port town in North Africa.

Title: The Commitments
Description: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

Title: Doc Hollywood
Description: A young doctor on his way across the country to a job interview crashes his car in a small town and is sentenced to work for several days at the town hospital.

Title: Toy Soldiers
Description: A group of troublemaking boys decide to take a stand when terrorists seize control of their boarding school.

Title: The Beautiful Troublemaker
Description: The former famous painter Frenhofer revisits an abandoned project using the girlfriend of a young visiting artist. Questions about truth, life, and artistic limits are explored.

Title: Rush
Description: Two small-town Texas cops go undercover to catch a major drug dealer and are sucked into the drug culture, compromising their assignment.

Title: The Prince of Tides
Description: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

Title: Shattered
Description: After a horrific car wreck leaves him an amnesiac, a man slowly begins to unravel his shocking past.

Title: White Fang
Description: Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.

Title: Raise the Red Lantern
Description: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

Title: Dying Young
Description: A nurse falls in love with a terminally ill man.

Title: El rey pasmado
Description: After spending a night with a sensual prostitute, the King of Spain decides that he wants to see his wife naked. His decision causes a real revolution amidst his subjects.

Title: Black Robe
Description: In the 17th century, a Jesuit missionary nicknamed Black Robe by the natives and his small party of companions try reaching the Huron tribe in Canada all while facing mistrust, Iroquois warring parties and harsh winter conditions.

Title: Enchanted April
Description: Four English women, after World War I, who are unhappy with their lives, and their time away on vacation in a beautiful Italian villa.

Title: King Ralph
Description: A regular guy from America becomes king of England after a royal wipe-out puts him next in line.

Title: Flight of the Intruder
Description: During the air war over Vietnam, a U.S. Navy A-6 Intruder bomber pilot schemes with a hardened veteran to make an unauthorized air strike on Hanoi.

Title: Rambling Rose
Description: A young woman who exudes sexuality battles temptation.

Title: Beastmaster 2: Through the Portal of Time
Description: Dar is a warrior who can talk to the beasts. He is forced to travel to Earth to stop his evil brother from stealing an atomic bomb and turning their native land from a desert into, well - a desert.

Title: Body Parts
Description: After losing his arm in a car accident, a criminal psychologist has it replaced with a limb that belonged to a serial killer.

Title: A Kiss Before Dying
Description: A determined student murders his pregnant secret girlfriend and moves onto her twin sister who gradually becomes suspicious of her new lover.

Title: Poison
Description: A boy shoots his father and flies out the window. A man falls in love with a fellow inmate in prison. A doctor accidentally ingests his experimental sex serum, wreaking havoc on the community.

Title: Where Angels Fear to Tread
Description: After a rich Edwardian widow impulsively marries a handsome but poor Tuscan dentist and dies in childbirth, her English in-laws try to gain custody of the baby.

Title: At Play in the Fields of the Lord
Rhapsody in August
Description: Three generations' responses to the atomic bombing of Nagasaki.

Title: Year of the Gun
Description: Two young Americans, he a journalist and she a photojournalist, experience Red Brigades terrorists close up in Rome, 1978.

Title: Tous les matins du monde
Description: The story of Monsieur de Sainte Colombe, fierce and somber man, grand master of the viola da gamba and professor of Marin Marais, prestigious musician in the court of Louis XIV.

Title: V.I. Warshawski
Description: A female PI babysitting for a boyfriend gets stuck with his daughter and the case of her murdered father.

Title: Voyager
Description: April 1957: Rational engineer Faber's plane crashes in Mexico. He learns that he became a dad in 1938. He takes a ship from NYC to France and meets cute, young Sabeth. Fate?

Title: A Rage in Harlem
Description: A gangster's girlfriend flees to Harlem with a trunkload of gold after a shootout, unaware that the rest of the gang are on her trail.

Title: Madame Bovary
Description: In nineteenth-century France, the romantic daughter of a country squire marries a dull country doctor. To escape boredom, she throws herself into love affairs with a suave local landowner and a law student, and runs up ruinous debts.

Title: The Children Thief
Description: In 1925 Paris, the Colonel kidnaps unhappy or abandoned boys, providing them and his wife with comfort and joy in his rich mansion. Then things become complicated when he adopts a girl.

Title: Husbands and Lovers
Description: A scriptwriter working in Rome becomes distraught over his beauteous wife and the "arrangement" they have when she discovers S&M with her longtime pianist lover.

Title: Crooked Hearts
Description: How the discovery of a father's affair affects each member of his family.

Title: Clearcut
Description: He's not a "militant"... he's manito. Spirit Being.

Title: The Crumbs
Description: The tween, Mads, finds it hard to fit in. Having feelings for a girl in class and a clumsy farther who is a teacher at his school doesn't help. By an uforseen chance of events, Mads becomes somewhat of a hero, but will he win the girl?

Title: Paris Trout
Description: In a small Georgia town in the 1950s, bigoted store owner Paris Trout kills a young black girl when his brother refuses to pay his debts.

Title: The Dark Wind
Description: A Navajo police officer is mixed up in drug smuggling and murder on the reservation.

Title: Grand Isle
Description: An adaptation of Kate Chopin's "The Awakening," about a Victorian woman who rebels against the societal norms of her time.

Title: Malina
Description: A female writer and her relationships with two different men, one joyous and one introverted.

Title: Cabeza de Vaca
Description: A handful of survivors from a disastrous 1528 Spanish expedition to Florida journey across the coast until they reach Mexico.

Title: The Favour, the Watch and the Very Big Fish
The Ballad of the Sad Cafe
Cold Heaven
Description: An adulterous woman's faith in God is tested when her husband dies and miraculously comes back to life.

Title: A Demon in My View
Description: A strangler known as the Kenbourne Killer has been murdering streetwalkers for 25 years. The police set out to track him down.

Title: Millions
Description: Billy Zane leads a pack of money-grabbing relatives who try to take over his ailing uncle's industrial empire.

Title: Shuttlecock
Description: Major James Prentis VC (Sir Alan Bates) is a British spy of World War II and war hero who goes under the code name of "Shuttlecock". Alienated from his family and children, he ends up in a mental institution in Lisbon, Portugal.

Title: Mother
Description: The saga of an Armenian family that immigrated to France after the break-up of the oppressive Ottoman Empire.

Title: Eye of the Widow
Description: A new international terrorist group attack the castle of an Austrian prince during his party, but one of the guests, a CIA contractor, deals with them. CIA hires him to find the men behind the attack and take them out.

Title: L'année de l'éveil
Description: A sensitive, 14 year old orphan in a military school learns about life and love from his classmates and teachers.

Title: 30 Door Key
Description: A young writer in 1939 Warsaw faces the conflict of acting his age or relapsing into childhood during the brink of World War II.

Title: Diplomatic Immunity
Description: Cole Hickel, a Marine, pursues his daughter's killer when he is allowed to go back to Paraguay because of "diplomatic immunity."

Title: Beltenebros
Description: Madrid, 1962. More than twenty years after the civil war has finished, a communist comes back to Spain to kill a traitor.

Title: Money
Description: A young man whose father's fortune was stolen by his closest friends sets out to get revenge in this odyssey through the world's major financial centers.

Title: Den store badedag
Description: Copenhagen 1930. Through the eyes of a boy, his family and the outside world is depicted. A well knit, working class family. The boy has great expectations on his father. This leads to the involuntary unmasking of the father.

Title: Charuga
Description: Based on the true story about Jovo Stanivukovic, alias Caruga, a bandit who became a legend in post-WW1 Slavonia.

Title: La strana voglia
Description: A theater director picks up a young homeless woman off the street, and she becomes the object of his desire. Soon, his ex-girlfriend finds out about the new lover in his life and decides to seduce her.

Title: The Old Lady Who Walked in the Sea
Chizuko's Younger Sister
Description: Follows two sisters, one clumsy and ignored, the other a perfect child. After the latter dies in an accident, she returns as a ghost to guide her little sister.

Title: Committed
Description: A nurse is taken hostage by a patient pretending to be a doctor and is forced to minister to everyone.

Title: The Three Muscatels
Description: Richard Pryor stars in this parody of The Three Musketeers follows a coed who falls asleep while reading the book and dreams about a trio of swashbuckling heroes.

Title: Life on a String
Description: A blind man's master told him that after he has broken 1000 strings on his Banjo, he can open the Banjo to get a script for his eyes. After 60 years he broke the 1000th string...

Title: Oh Boy!
Description: Film crew whose members can't stand each other is trying to make a slapstick comedy in the style of Buster Keaton. It's about Boy, who runs a failing desert service station. Things get even worse when a business competitor arrives.

Title: I Will Wait for You in Heaven
Description: Mistreated foundling Heathcliff and his stepsister Catherine fall in love, but when she marries a wealthy man, he becomes obsessed with getting revenge, even well into the next generation.

Title: Yakuza Ladies Revisited
Description: The wife of a yakuza lieutenant tries to keep the peace when the clan's heir suddenly dies and a succession conflict threatens to break out.

Title: Netchaïev est de retour
Description: Freshly landed in Paris, Daniel Laurençon, who calls himself Netchaïev, who was believed dead five years ago in Gibraltar, warns a commercial center of a bomb attack a few minutes before its completion.

Title: Ante Geia
Description: In high hopes of becoming a singer, instead, a young dreamer becomes the object of desire for three diverse women. Now, a storm is brewing, stirring unspoken passions and unfulfilled dreams. Will he lose everything in search of love?

Title: Gauri Ganesha
Description: Lambodara, an unemployed witty young man takes advantage of weaknesses in people to his monetary benefit.

Title: Anna Göldin, letzte Hexe
Description: This is a movie about the last "witch" that got burned in switzerland. It's based on a true story and is a movie adaptation of the well known book by Eveline Hasler.

Title: The Adventures of Oliver Twist
Description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

Title: Eline Vere
Description: Eline Vere is a neurotic young woman with a turbulent family.

Title: El invierno en Lisboa
Description: Jim is the drummer for the great black musician Billy Swann. With him, he plays in a club called San Sebastián, owned by his friend Floro, every summer.

Title: The Tombs
Description: "El Pollo," a 13-year-old child in reform school, witnesses and experiences the brutalization of the guards and the other inmates.

Title: The Vampire
Description: At the ball, the young prince Runevsky attracted Dasha, the niece of the landowners Sugrobins. Being invited to their estate, Runevsky did not realize that all Dasha's relatives were vampires.

Title: Tanz auf der Kippe
Description: The tragic love story between 17 year-old Gerat Lauter, who is in search of the truth, and his much older teacher Claudia, as it becomes a criminal case with state complicity in the chaotic GDR autumn of 1989.

Title: La tribu
Description: Olivier Rohan, a young doctor, has just opened a general practice. However, having only a small clientele, he continues to work in the hospital's emergency room. One night, he will witness the unnatural death of a young man.

Title: De provincie
Description: Frank de Roover returns to the village of his birth, Portland. There he reconnects with his childhood friends Peter and Koos, as well as the girl all three of them fell in love with, Lili.

Title: How to Be a Woman and Not Die in the Attempt
Gyeongmajang ganeun kil
Description: R returns from studying in France and reunites with J, whom he used to live with in Paris. For some reason, however, J refuses to have sex with R. Angered by her refusal, R travels to his hometown of Daegu.

Title: Americano rosso
Description: Italy 1935: Vittorio works in a matrimonial agency, and although the agency is closed for summer vacations, he tries to find an Italian wife for an American man. At last he finds a suitable girl, but a surprise is awaiting for him.

Title: Erfolg
Description: Munich in the 1920's. An art-gallery manager puts on a show featuring the scandalous works of a woman artist who committed suicide. He is unjustly accused of having committed adultery with her, and the authorities decide to intervene.

Title: St. Petri Schnee
Description: In Morwede, a remote Westphalian village, the doctor meets Dr. Amberg in the 1930s.

Title: Høfeber
Description: A judge just wants a quiet life but no. His wife and his best friend have a relationship. His son wants money. His chess partner wants sex and her lover wants him dead - plus he has hay fever.

Title: Elias of het gevecht met de nachtegalen
Description: Elias has hardly left his childhood behind him than he is sent to boarding school with his older cousin.

Title: Dzayn barbaro...
Description: Armenia in the Middle Ages ... the desert ... the bell-tower of a half-destroyed church ... Martiros languishes in the desert. His heart strikes out beyond the narrow monastic circle.

Title: Shimanto-gawa
Description: A young boy, Atsu, grows up along the banks of the Shimanto River in rural southern Shikoku. He comes to grips with the unfairness of life and the emotional pain involved in the loss of innocence.

Title: Tinerete franta
Description: Two parallel stories about unhappy marriages that take place during inter-war period in the Banat village within Romanian minority in Serbia.

Title: Pirtua pirtua
Description: Criminal gangs find profit in distilling and bootlegging moonshine during the Finnish prohibition in the 1930s.

Title: Punainen huone
Description: A young cleaning girl, Kukka-Maaria, goes to work in the city and rent a luxury apartment. In return, the landlord gradually subjugates the girl as a sex partner to himself and his acquaintances.

Title: Solitud
Description: Matthias has finally found work on a remote mountain in the Pyrenees. He is accompanied by his wife, Mila, who does not find it easy to adapt to the new environment.

Title: Jeolmeun nalui chosang
Description: Failing to enter the university of his choice, a young man is forced to enter a local college, but a series of disappointments causes him to give up his studies and begin a life of aimless travel

Title: Maboroshi panti
Description: Panty Mask is a super-heroine in skimpy Indian outfit who wears leather undies on her head - as disguise. Panty Mask fights a group of evil whip wielding Catholic nuns in an all-girl version of Tombstone.

Title: T. Sventon och fallet Isabella
Description: The horse Isabella is the circus director Gustavsson's pride. But the master criminal Ville Vessla has an evil plan for Isabella.

Title: Qingchun wu hui
Description: Zheng Jianong, a bulldozer driver, has been suffering from illness for years and his wife leaves him

Title: Aryun
Description: Young man is given an opportunity to live his life over again.

Title: Kamigata Kugaizoshi
Description: Set during Japan's Meiji period, three sisters are abused and exploited by their harsh father, including a daughter who plays the three-corded shamisen for pilgrims visiting the sacred chapel of Ise.

Title: Shahr dar dast-e bacheha
Description: A group of children flee from their homes using kites, to make a new adventure without their parents.

Title: The Witches
Description: A young boy stumbles onto a witch convention and must stop them, even after he has been turned into a mouse.

Title: Misery
Description: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

Title: The Hunt for Red October
Description: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain, in a new undetectable sub, violates orders and heads for the U.S. The American CIA and military must quickly determine: Is he trying to defect, or to start a war?

Title: Dances with Wolves
Description: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Native Americans, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

Title: The Exorcist III
Description: A police Lieutenant uncovers more than he bargained for as his investigation of a series of murders, which have all the hallmarks of the deceased Gemini serial killer, leads him to question the patients of a psychiatric ward.

Title: Awakenings
Description: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

Title: Die Hard 2
Description: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

Title: Wild at Heart
Description: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

Title: Nightbreed
Description: A troubled young man is drawn to a mythical place called Midian where a variety of friendly monsters are hiding from humanity. Meanwhile, a sadistic serial killer is looking for a patsy.

Title: Presumed Innocent
Description: As a lawyer investigates the murder of a colleague, he finds himself more connected to the crime than anyone else.

Title: Lord of the Flies
Description: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

Title: Miller's Crossing
Description: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

Title: The Hot Spot
Description: Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter quickly gets into trouble with the local authorities - and the local women - after he robs a bank.

Title: The Handmaid's Tale
Description: Under a dystopian religious tyranny, most women cannot conceive children. Those young women who can live in a form of sexual slavery to provide children for influential families.

Title: The Bonfire of the Vanities
Description: After his mistress runs over a young teen, a Wall Street hotshot sees his life unravel in the spotlight and attracting the interest of a down and out reporter.

Title: Revenge
Description: A retired US Navy pilot comes to Mexico, where he falls in love with the wife of a powerful businessman. The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen.

Title: Mermaids
Description: An unconventional single mother relocates with her two daughters to a small Massachusetts town in 1963, where a number of events and relationships both challenge and strengthen their familial bonds.

Title: The Grifters
Description: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend, both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

Title: Henry & June
Description: Anaïs Nin meets the American writer, Henry Miller, in Paris in 1931. She keeps a diary of her sexual awakening which includes Henry and his wife, June.

Title: The NeverEnding Story II: The Next Chapter
Description: A young boy with a distant father enters a world of make-believe and magic through a portal within an antique book.

Title: Quick Change
Description: Three thieves successfully rob a New York City bank, but making the escape from the city proves to be almost impossible.

Title: The Russia House
Description: An expatriate British publisher unexpectedly finds himself working for British intelligence to investigate people in Russia.

Title: Miami Blues
Description: An ex-con's first act of freedom is moving to Miami where he restarts his old criminal ways with even more potency.

Title: The Ages of Lulu
Description: The story of a young woman's descent into the kinky and dangerous sexual underground in Madrid.

Title: White Palace
Description: Lust turns to love for a 40-ish working-class woman and a 20-ish yuppie adman with little in common.

Title: The Boyfriend School
Description: Cartoonist Gus has survived cancer treatment and now his romance novelist sister tries to find him a woman and guide him. Will they succeed?

Title: The Sheltering Sky
Description: An American couple travel abroad to revitalize their relationship. But as the trip drags on, their attempt at recovering what they once had seems futile.

Title: The Comfort of Strangers
Description: A couple retreat to Venice to work on their relationship, but an encounter with a stranger leads them into a world of intrigue - where their darkest desires are in reach.

Title: The Guardian
Description: A young couple with a newborn baby don't realize that the nanny they hired is a magical nymph who sacrifices infants to an evil tree.

Title: A Shock to the System
Description: When electrocuted by the fuse box at home, Graham gets ideas concerning his nagging wife and the guy, who got Graham's promotion at the office.

Title: An Angel at My Table
Description: Janet Frame was a brilliant child who, as a teen, was misdiagnosed with schizophrenia. Explore Janet's discovery of the world and her life in Europe as her books are published to acclaim.

Title: Desperate Hours
Description: An escaped con, on the run from the law, moves into a married couple's house and takes over their lives.

Title: Mountains of the Moon
Description: The legendary true-story of Capt. Richard Francis Burton and Lt. John Hanning Speke's tumultuous expedition to find the source of the Nile river.

Title: White Hunter Black Heart
Description: A thinly fictionalized account of a legendary movie director, whose desire to hunt down an animal turns into a grim situation with his movie crew in Africa.

Title: A Cry in the Wild
Description: A boy crash-lands in Canada bear country and survives with a hatchet his divorced mother gave him.

Title: Mr. & Mrs. Bridge
Description: Set during World War II, an upper-class family begins to fall apart due to the conservative nature of the patriarch and the progressive values of his children.

Title: Cadence
Description: Charlie Sheen plays a rebellious inmate in an Army stockade.

Title: Stanley & Iris
Description: A struggling widow falls in love with an illiterate short-order cook whom she teaches to read and write in her kitchen each night.

Title: The Fourth War
Description: Cold War drama about two gung-ho border commanders (Roy Scheider, Jurgen Prochnow) who carry out their own private war against each other on the German - Czechoslovakia border.

Title: Stella
Description: Chronicling a strong, but eccentric woman's devoted relationship to her daughter through the years.

Title: The Voice of the Moon
Description: The amusing and entertaining adventures of a recently released mental patient and his band of misfits, discover conspiracies to concur while looking for love.

Title: Jours tranquilles à Clichy
Description: Expatriate Henry Miller indulges in a variety of sexual escapades while struggling to establish himself as a serious writer in Paris.

Title: My Father's Glory
Description: At the end of the nineteenth century, little Marcel lives with his parents in the Provence countryside. During his holiday, Marcel meets Lili, a local boy who knows all the secrets of the hills, and the two become fast friends.

Title: Why Me?
Description: A jewel thief steals a sacred ruby which sets off a chase by the police, the Turkish government, nutty American terrorists, and the C.I.A.

Title: Tune in Tomorrow...
Description: New Orleans, 1951: A law student, working at WXBU radio station, falls in love with his cute aunt, who's looking for a third husband. Then Pedro starts writing radio series at WXBU, stirring up things.

Title: My Mother's Castle
Description: Every holiday Marcel and his family go to their cottage near Marseilles. During one of these holidays he meets Isabelle, a pretty but conceited girl... Adapted from the cult classic novel from Marcel Pagnol.

Title: Whispers
Description: A woman is stalked by a psychopathic killer. She eventually kills him, only for the man to show up again, this time sane and without any knowledge of the attacks. The police don't believe her, but one detective agrees to look into it.

Title: The Swordsman
Description: A kung-fu manual known as the sacred scroll is stolen from the Emperor's library. An army detachment is sent to recover it. Meanwhile, a young swordsman and his fellow disciple are accidentally drawn into the chaos.

Title: The King's Whore
Description: Set in the seventeenth century, an Italian nobleman weds an impoverished countess, who is wooed by the King of Piedmont and faces pressure from his entire court to succumb to his wishes.

Title: Crossing the Line
Description: Unemployed Scottish miner Danny Scoular (Liam Neeson) is forced into bare-knuckle boxing to make ends meet.

Title: Mister Johnson
Description: In 1923, a local resident of British Colonial Nigeria tries to be equal with the colonial administration.

Title: Thousand Pieces of Gold
Description: In 1880s China, a girl is sold into marriage by her father. Rather than becoming a bride, Lalu ends up in a gold-mining town where she forges a path for her own freedom and, ultimately, true love.

Title: December Bride
Description: At the beginning of the 20th century, a young servant provokes an independent Irish farm community by her relationship with two brothers. Pregnant, she refuses to reveal the name of the father.

Title: Dr. M
Description: Investigating a series of suicides, police detective reveals a sinister plot.

Title: Watchers II
Description: A genetically re-engineered dog develops a psychic link with a monster created in a lab experiment which goes awry.

Title: Strike It Rich
Description: A London accountant on his honeymoon gets swept away by gambling fever.

Title: Spy Story
Description: A British spy is framed, so he must evade the KGB, the CIA and the British Intelligence to reach the the heart of the conspiracy in Arctic.

Title: A Woman's Revenge
Description: After the suicide of her husband, a widow is trying to get a confession from his mistress that it was her fault.

Title: King of the Wind
Description: In 1727, an Arab colt is born with the signs of the wheat ear and the white spot on his heel, evil and good and thus begins the life of Sham.

Title: Fools of Fortune
Description: A Protestant Irish family is caught up in a conflict between Irish Republicans and the British army.

Title: The Children
Description: Rose Sellars (Kim Novak) is a middle-aged woman who falls in love with a widower (Sir Ben Kingsley). However, his children believe that their father is too old to start a new relationship.

Title: An American Summer
Description: Divorcing Chicago parents send their only son to live with his aunt in Los Angeles for the summer, where he befriends a local, learns to surf, gets a girlfriend, and witnesses a murder.

Title: Mathilukal
Description: Its a story of Basheer, an author who experiences his prison life. In it he finds friendship, loneliness, fear and finally love, but that remains questionable.

Title: Saturday, Sunday and Monday
Description: Peppino and Rosa have been married for about 30 years. They live in a large house with a sea view in the Rione Terra with their children Rocco and Giulianella, grandfather Don Antonio, and Aunt Amelia.

Title: The Monk
Description: The monk Ambrosio is renowned for his faith and his strength of will, a saint in the eyes of the populace. However, when he discovers the beautiful Matilda hidden in his own monastery, all his repressed passions begin to show themselves.

Title: Paper Mask
Description: A lowly hospital orderly impersonates a recently deceased doctor and goes to work in the busy ER of a small hospital where he meets and befriends a nurse who slowly figures out his secret and helps him maintain his charade.

Title: Border Shootout
Description: Young rancher Kirby Frye is appointed deputy in a small town tyrannized by ruthless Phil Sundeen, the son of one of the founders of the town.

Title: The Sting of Death
Description: Period drama set in the 1950's about a couple isolating themselves from the outside world as they attempt to salvage their faltering marriage, no matter what the costs, after the husband has an affair.

Title: Full Fathom Five
Description: Adapted from the best-selling novel. Navy Captain Peter Mackenzie is sent on his toughest assignment when the Soviet nuclear submarine Kirov is stolen and the weapons are aimed at the United States.

Title: Kawashima Yoshiko
Description: A fictionalized account of the life and death of Kawashima Yoshiko, the last princess of Manchuria and a spy for the Japanese during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

Title: Al imbrator
Description: A remake of "scarface",tells the turbulant world of drug dealing,damaged personal relationships,and the rise and the fall of a drug lord.

Title: The Color of Evening
Description: An aging artist (Martin Landau) seeks his muse and a young lover in the form of a beautiful model.

Title: Burndown
Description: Women are killed and raped in a small town near a condemned nuclear power plant. The bodies turn out to be very radioactive. The sheriff and a female reporter start to investigate.

Title: Janggunui adeul
Description: The first chapter of the the General's Son trilogy follows Kim Du-Han's childhood, from the loss of his mother at age 8, to his rise as a gang leader who protects local vendors from expanding Yakuza forces in Japanese occupied Korea.

Title: The Bachelor
Description: A Pre-World War I physician in Austria struggles with his decision about which woman he will marry. Miranda Richardson plays the roles of two different women in his life.

Title: Il male oscuro
Description: After his father's death, a middle-aged screenwriter struggles with his obsessions and neuroses.

Title: Silent Gunpowder
Description: When traditional Serbian populated village in Bosnia gets in the middle of two ideologies during World War II, two groups, communist and monarchist fight over the destiny of its population among each other.

Title: Like the Clouds, Like the Wind
Description: Country girl Ginga leaves her home in hope of becoming one of the Emperor's Wives.

Title: Payback
Description: A right-wing revolutionary group called Strikeforce goes on a kidnapping and murdering spree in order to obtain a lethal top secret weapon. A Vietnam Vet called Jason Shepherd is called in to track the group down.

Title: Karartma geceleri
Description: The story of teacher who is also writer, trying to hide from the police during WW2 in Turkey. He is wanted because of his leftist articles and books.

Title: Landstrykere
Description: The Knut Hamsun story about young adventurer Edevart and his friend and admirer August., which goes on a stray as salesmen, before they grow apart, split up due to life and love, before they meet up again.

Title: The Comic Book Christmas Caper
Description: Set in Canada in December 1945. A boy sets out to investigate an attack on his friend's father.

Title: Ono
Description: The bureaucratic epos on dialogues and M.E.Saltykova-Shchedrina's plots, life of the city of Glupov led by petty tyrants - city's mayors.

Title: Il maestro
Description: A renowned conductor suddenly pulls out of an evening rehearsal of Madame Butterfly. The opera director senses something is going on and forces the musician to explain himself.

Title: A Short Love Affair
Description: Situated in the small poverty stricken town of Woomukbaemi, South Korea, this film centers on a clothes factory manager and the triangular relationship between himself, his insatiably jealous and violent wife, and one of his employees.

Title: The Guardian Angel
Description: In a fictional country, around 1912, student are rioting. There are cries for democracy and to overthrow of the old regime. The revolt is brutally downcast by the regime's forces. The leader of the rebellion is arrested.

Title: Le bal du gouverneur
Description: A French civil servant throws The Governor's Party when his daughter comes of age regardless of colonial unrest and her parents' stormy marriage.

Title: C'era un castello con 40 cani
Description: This movie was based on the novel "Au bonheur des chiens" (To the Happiness of Dogs), by Rémo Forlani.

Title: Madonna: A Case of Blood Ambition
La femme fardée
Description: Marivaudages of a privileged group embarked on the "Narcissus" for a musical cruise in company of the famous diva La Doria.

Title: Manden der ville være skyldig
Description: Author Adam lives in a future society where adventure is forbidden. But he defies the ban and the authorities abduct his wife and child to reach Adam's fairy-tale publisher.

Title: Ameriikan raitti
Description: Two small-time crooks take off to Florida to escape unpaid taxes and failure.

Title: Ti, koyto si na nebeto
Description: This film deals with a dying man who reveals to his young friend, a child of 8, the fairy world of music. The immortal theme of art is related to the problems of morality, honesty and beauty.

Title: Sauna
Description: Two women meet in a sauna. The one, wife of an advertising creative, the other, a rock singer. The publicist, who works on sock ads, has a crazy mother. He is also crazy, by inheritance .

Title: Karot
Description: Real life tragic story of Arakel whose anguish towards lost homeland made him cross Soviet-Turkish border during Stalin era.

Title: Faux et usage de faux
Description: Fleeing fame, the writer Anatole Hirsch decides to publish his new book under the name of his cousin, Martin Bassane. This book wins the Prix Goncourt. A film inspired by the story of Romain Gary.

Title: La sombra del ciprés es alargada
Farewell to Autumn
Description: Decadence, homosexuality, excess wealth, infidelity, alcoholism and drugs all played a major role in the decline of aristocracy.

Title: Zagadka Endkhauza
Description: The young mistress of a large estate suddenly becomes the target of several assassination attempts. The famous Hercule Poirot begins an investigation, the result of which will stun even him.

Title: The Trace Leads to the Silver Lake
Miss Missouri
Description: Nathan loved Helen, a young American comedian. He lets her return back to the United States. When he realized he made a mistake, he decides to go to Chicago and find her.

Title: Hasanboguldu
Description: The story of Hasan, who must carry 40 kilos of salt on his shoulder in order to marry the most beautiful girl of Oba, Emine.

Title: Minyeli Abdullah
Description: Abdullah, accused of opposing the government, continues his religious conversations in prison. The chief of police, who is disturbed by this situation, tries every way to have Abdullah executed.

Title: Gavre Princip - Himmel unter Steinen
Description: In 1914 Sarajevo, a student radical touches off World War I by assassinating Austria's archduke.

Title: Vidma
Description: In the Ukrainian village of Konotop, the chief Centurion wants to marry a beautiful girl and asks for the help of a young witch.

Title: Damskiy portnoy
Description: Set in Kiev, Russia, on 29 September 1941, this feature chronicles the last 24 hours in the lives of a Jewish tailor and his family just prior to their deportation and execution at Babi Yar.

Title: Plein fer
Description: Jean wants to avenge his father, killed in Marseille.

Title: Mutthina Haara
Description: Mutthina Haara - A Necklace of Pearls - tells the tale of an Indian (Coorg) soldier, Achchappa and an army nurse, Annapurna (Anu) and the toils of warfare on them during the 1940's to the 1960's.

Title: Tetri bairagebi
Description: Zaza Nakashidze is imprisoned for a murder he never committed. While in jail he tries to prove his innocence and with other prisoners, real murderers and thieves, dreams of freedom.

Title: La teranyina
Description: A portrait of Spanish society at the beginning of the 20th century through the history of the Rigau family, one of textil's Catalan bourgeois. Based on Jaume Cabré's novel.

Title: Ævintýri Pappírs Pésa
Description: Follows the adventure of a group of kids and a paper boy named Peter. Plane ride, box car racing and bad neighbors are all included.

Title: Il gèle en enfer
Description: A convict and a prostitute plan a robbery.

Title: Despoina
Description: Suffocating under the overwhelming pressure of compromise between social dictation and the need to break free, a tempestuous young woman living in a secluded village will finally get her chance in the person of her ephemeral saviour.

Title: Regina
Description: Regina is a wife of a alcoholic. Can she carry on or should she divorce and find herself a new man ?

Title: Kmete, kmete
Description: A 70-year-old man, a former village mayor, recalls his life: the difficult post-war years, the forced collectivization of the land, the migration of the population. He sacrificed his personal life, trying to do his job conscientiously.

Title: Skoljka sumi
Description: A pharmacist travels from the island to the usual medical treatment at hospital in Zagreb. He's followed by low-ranked regime official whose conduct reveals all the misery that arises between people living in totalitarian systems.

Title: Zalcio Zvilgsnis/A Glance of the Serpent
Description: A philosophical story about Crime and Penalty.

Title: Honungsvargar
Description: The young girl Mignon spend her life within art circles and among the quasi-intellectuals.

Title: Pet Sematary
Description: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

Title: Dead Calm
Description: After a tragedy, John Ingram and his wife Rae are spending some time isolated at sea, when they come across a stranger who has abandoned a sinking ship.

Title: The War of the Roses
Description: A married couple try everything to get each other to leave the house in a vicious divorce battle.

Title: Wait Until Spring, Bandini
Description: Young Arturo Bandini loves his father Svevo, his mother Maria and his brothers.

Title: Drugstore Cowboy
Description: A pharmacy-robbing dope fiend and his crew pop pills and evade the law.

Title: Valmont
Description: France before 1789: When a widow hears that her lover is to marry her cousin's daughter, she asks the playboy Valmont to take the girl's virginity. But first she bets him, with her body as prize, to seduce a virtuous, young, married woman.

Title: She-Devil
Description: A surprisingly resourceful housewife vows revenge on her husband when he begins an affair with a wealthy romance novelist.

Title: Last Exit to Brooklyn
Description: Set in Brooklyn during the 1950s against a backdrop of union corruption and violence. A prostitute falls in love with one of her customers. Also a disturbed man discovers that he is homosexual.

Title: The Phantom of the Opera
Description: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a horribly disfigured composer, who has plans for those who oppose him or the young singer.

Title: Let It Ride
Description: A nosy cab driver gets a hot tip on a race horse and wins big, but he can't seem to stop gambling. Will he go broke or walk home with a pretty penny?

Title: Dad
Description: While his mom recovers in hospital from a heart attack, John puts his busy life on hold to fly home and help his elderly dad around the house. John's son later joins them and they all truly bond for the first and, tragically, final time.

Title: My Nights Are More Beautiful Than Your Days
Description: A story of doomed passion by two mortally ill people: he is physically, she is mentally.

Title: Johnny Handsome
Description: After being double crossed and thrown in jail, a deformed gangster gets a new face and rehabilitation, but his desire for revenge looms.

Title: A Dry White Season
Description: A white middle class South African suburbanite with no interest in politics agrees to help his black gardener find his jailed son. His investigation opens his eyes to the horrors committed by the secret police and turns him into a target.

Title: Baxter
Description: A white Bull Terrier named Baxter is given to an elderly woman by her daughter. As time passes, the dog develops aggressive and murderous behavior in order to be adopted by another family.

Title: The Mighty Quinn
Description: When police officer Xavier Quinn's childhood friend, Maubee, becomes associated with murder and a briefcase full of ten thousand dollar bills, The Mighty Quinn must clear his name. Or try to catch him, which could be even trickier.

Title: Family Business
Description: An ex professor offers Adam $1,000,000 to "get" some plasma from a high tech company's lab. Adam asks his criminal grandpa for help. Can they convince Adam's now honest dad to join?

Title: Cat Chaser
Description: A Miami hotel owner finds danger when he becomes romantically involved with the wife of a deposed general from the Dominican Republic where he fought many years back.

Title: The Rainbow
Description: A young woman deals in her own personal way with the trials of adolescence and young adulthood in early 1900s England.

Title: Ten Little Indians
Description: Ten people are invited to go on an African safari, only to find that an unseen person is killing them one by one. Could one of them be the killer?

Title: Twister
Description: Delusional and spoiled Maureen and her eccentric brother Howdy decide to track down and meet their estranged mother, all while the drama of dysfunctional relationships, disastrous weather conditions and a dark family secret ensue.

Title: The BFG
Description: A young orphan girl, Sophie, gets taken away to a faraway land populated by Giants and Dreams.

Title: The Return of the Musketeers
Description: In France in 1649, the services of the Four Musketeers are needed again, and they run into some old foes from twenty years before.

Title: The Winter War
Description: In 1939, two Finnish brothers are conscripted in the army to fight in the war between Finland and the Soviet Union.

Title: Black Rain
Description: The story of the aftermath of the Hiroshima bombing, based on Masuji Ibuse's novel.

Title: Enemies, A Love Story
Description: A ghostwriter finds himself romantically involved with his current wife, a married woman and his long-vanished wife.

Title: The Black Cat
Description: An actress starts seeing visions of a witch character called Levana, which she's supposed to play in an upcoming horror movie, and slowly begins to discover a supernatural plot against her life.

Title: Monsieur Hire
Description: A recluse is accused of murdering a young woman simply because his neighbors think he is strange.

Title: Es ist nicht leicht ein Gott zu sein
Winter People
Description: In 1930s Appalachia, a widowed city clock maker falls in love with an unwed mother and finds himself in the middle of a long-standing feud between two clans.

Title: Worth Winning
Description: TV weatherman (Mark Harmon) must woo three women to wed, with video proof.

Title: Heart of Dixie
Description: Three young sorority women try to find love with potential men, while worrying about changes in their way of life when integration begins at their college in 1957 segregated Alabama.

Title: Slaves of New York
Description: Benadette Peters stars in this ironic film based on Tama Janowitz's best-selling collection of short stories that defined the downtown New York art scene of the 1980s

Title: Het sacrament
Description: The Heylen family's annual get-together to commemorate their mother derails completely.

Title: In Country
Description: A young girl whose father died in the Vietnam War becomes determined to find out more about him and his experiences.

Title: Sinbad of the Seven Seas
Description: Sinbad and his shipmates aid a young prince, who must battle an evil wizard to gain the hand of a beautiful princess.

Title: The Delinquents
Description: A small town in Australia, in the late 1950s: Brownie and Lola are deeply in love. But because they are under-age, their parents are against their relationship and try to separate them.

Title: Food of the Gods II
Description: A growth hormone experiment gets out of hand, when the the resulting giant man-eating rats escape, reaking havoc on the unsuspecting campus. Much blood-letting follows.

Title: Cheetah
Description: A "born free" type story set in Kenya about an orphaned cheetah cub that is adopted and raised by an American family.

Title: The Misadventures of Mr. Wilt
Description: An unlucky lecturer's wife goes missing and he's accused of her murder.

Title: Treasure Island Part II: Captain Flint's Treasure
Description: Cartoon adaptation of Robert Louis Stevenson's most famous adventure novel.

Title: Tennessee Waltz
Description: A British attorney on vacation in Tennessee is blamed for a local murder.

Title: The Wolves of Willoughby Chase
Description: Willoughby Chase is the grand but remote home of Sir Willoughby and Lady Green and their daughter Bonnie.

Title: Street of No Return
Description: A rock star-turned-bum, his vocal chords severed at the height of his career for the love of a woman, reclaims his forgotten past after viewing a music video and seeks revenge against the mobster who maimed him.

Title: Time of Miracles
Description: September 1945. The village school was burned down in a fire and the new communist authorities get into the church, hanging the flag of the Communist Party and overpaint frescoes. But, frescoes each time miraculously returned.

Title: I'm the King of the Castle
Codename Coq Rouge
Description: His name is Carl Hamilton from a Swedish noble family - trained by the CIA and a army SEAL. When a group of terrorists based in Sweden threatens to initiate their diabolic plans - the Coq Rouge Carl Hamilton is activated.

Title: Killing Dad or How to Love Your Mother
Description: A man, always very devoted to his mother, decides to look for his father whom he never met. He meets a seductive older woman prone to drinking and her aged boyfriend with whom she has grown tired.

Title: The Kill Reflex
Description: A Chicago policeman (Fred Williamson) hunts his partner's killer and catches on to a cover-up.

Title: Nightmare in Venice
Description: A brilliant surgeon and millionaire, married to a beautiful woman, and highly regarded in the society of Venice, wants more from life and searches for new sensations.

Title: Comment faire l'amour avec un nègre sans se fatiguer
Rikyu
Description: Legendary tea master Sen no Rikyu is faced with his warmongering lord's unrealistic pretensions.

Title: The Favorite
Description: The true story of Aimee Dubuca De Rivery, a French girl sold into slavery to the Sultan of the Ottoman Empire.

Title: Kronvittnet
Description: Thomas, a scientist, lives in a childless marriage. When his wife travels to Copenhagen he begins an affair with a girl of 19. The girl and large amounts of drugs disappears from Thomas laboratory.

Title: Caddie Woodlawn
Description: The exciting adventures of an 11-year-old tomboy growing up in the Wisconsin frontier of the 1860s. Based on the children's book.

Title: Uncle Cyril
Description: A surreal look at madness in a brooding Czech countryside mansion.

Title: Shadow of China
Description: A Chinese political refugee tries to make his way to the top as a businessman in Hong Kong while his former radicalism is transformed into cynicism. His past comes back to haunt him.

Title: Migrations
Description: Based on the famous novel of Milos Crnjanski, the story follows Serbian migrations from the Austro-Hungarian Empire during the XVIII century.

Title: Try This One for Size
Description: An insurance investigator is looking for a stolen priceless medieval Russian icon.

Title: Papa est parti, maman aussi
Description: A coming-of-age film: When Laurette's parents disappear following a row, Laurette assumes responsibility for the family. The initial fiesta of children alone gives way to abandonment and the pressures of responsibility.

Title: Rituals
Description: In a crash on the stock exchange Inni Wintrop (40) loses his fortune and his girlfriend, on the same day. Adrift and looking for something to hold on to he becomes obsessed with Japanese rituals of faith, death and eroticism.

Title: Georg Elser - Einer aus Deutschland
Description: A true story about Johann Georg Elser, a quiet carpenter who tried to assassinate Hitler with an explosive device in 1939.

Title: Dark Heritage
Description: Reporter Clint Harrison is sent to investigate a massacre at a Louisiana campground and finds that it may be linked to the Dansen clan an old local family thought to have died out years ago.

Title: The Rose Garden
Description: In Germany, an old man attacks another old man and is arrested. The attacker refuses to speak. A female lawyer is appointed to him. She discovers that the attacker has numbers tattooed on his arm and the attacked man was a German officer.

Title: Loos
Description: A lawyer must defend a nightclub owner accused of committing a crime-of-passion.

Title: Nocturne indien
Description: A young Frenchman (Jean-Hugues Anglade) finds adventure in India while searching for a lost friend who disappeared. During his search he will find strange people but he will discover too a new fascinating country.

Title: The Feud
Description: When Dolf Beeler enters Bud Bullard's hardware store with his cigar lit and ignores the no-smoking store policy, this small faux pas turns into an escalating fiery feud. However, not all members of the two families hate each other.

Title: Innocent Victim
Description: A woman is attempting to cope with her son's tragic death when her mother arrives on an ill-timed visit with her own remedies.

Title: The Kill-Off
Description: Business at The Pavilion bar is down so Pete and Rags decide that the best way to get The Pavilion off the skids is to turn it into a strip joint.

Title: Memories of a Marriage
Description: The active Regitze and passive Karl Aage have a party with friends and family at their allotment garden. He reminisces his life with her from meeting her during WWII, having a son, the son graduating, etc. up to present day.

Title: Evenings
Description: Frits van Egters' life in the last ten days of the year 1946.

Title: L'orchestre rouge
Description: The Red Orchestra which was implanted right into the very heart of the nazi empire was considered the most important espionage net of World War II.

Title: Rudranetra
Description: Agent Nethra is summoned to stop a maniac out to poison India.

Title: Buon Natale... Buon anno
Description: What shall we do with our folks when we, young ones,want to have fun and to make the best of our life ?

Title: Venus Peter
Description: Peter, a young boy living in the fishing village of St Monans, Scotland during 1940s, learns about life and the beauty of imagination from his grandfather and female teacher in this touching semi-autobiographical story about childhood.

Title: Gu-Ga
Description: About battalions of penalized persons of times of World War II, month of service in which was equated by ten years of prison.

Title: Rouge Venise
Description: Venice. March 1735. The carnival in full swing, everyone is in a happy mood and the busy streets are filled with musicians, mimes, acrobats clowns and pickpockets who each practice their craft, deploying a rainbow of colors and sounds.

Title: Comédie d'été
Description: After failing his officer exams, the son of a colonel comes home for the summer and falls for an attractive houseguest.

Title: Buddies
Description: The film tells story of a close friendship undone by love.

Title: Powrót wabiszczura
Description: After the accident in which the protagonist's daughter dies, he ends up in a town dominated by punks. The mayor urges them to abide by their laws and customs. Soon a series of crimes takes place, and the punks are under suspicion.

Title: Beim nächsten Mann wird alles anders
Bille en tête
Description: The irresistible rise of a young man, whose grandmother is extraordinary, and who wants everything immediately and who succeeds.

Title: Novye priklyucheniya yanki pri dvore korolya Artura
Radio Raven
Description: In a small French town, a pirate radio begins telling lies (or are they unsavory truths) about people and nobody seems able to catch the guilty party or even guess his or her identity.

Title: Raffles Hotel
Description: A mystery takes place in the decorous halls of the Stamford Raffles Hotel in Singapore.

Title: Mull
Description: An Australian film about a teenage girl who takes responsibility for keeping her "family" together.

Title: Jeniec Europy
Description: On the island of Saint Helena, a prisoner Napoleon resisted allies who, through the voice of the English governor, Hudson Lowe, tried to humiliate him, break him, poison him in the figurative sense of the word, and perhaps literally.

Title: Piry Valtasara, ili noch so Stalinym
Description: A dance troupe from the autonomous region of Abkhazia in western Georgia perform for Stalin, Lavrentiy Beria, Abkhaz leader Nestor Lakoba, and other high-ranking party officials in the Black Sea coastal town of Gagra.

Title: Sakura no ki no shita de
Description: A mother and daughter become enemies for the same lover.

Title: Diploma za smrt
Description: Two young bright university graduates start a brilliant career of gangsters.

Title: O Grande Mentecapto
Description: Viramundo is a sympathetic guy, perhaps insane, perhaps a genius, who decides to leave his tiny hometown and turn the world upside down.

Title: The Long Road Home
Description: In the late 1960s, a Harvard dropout's decision to take a job in Canada is misinterpreted as a political statement.

Title: Bueno y tierno como un ángel
Ang lahat ng ito pati na ang langit
Le crime d'Antoine
Description: A young man loses his fiancee, struck by lightning, on his wedding day.

Title: Zelazna reka
Description: The year is 1575 when Transylvanian prince Stefan Batory sends his loyal servant, Szymon Mroczek, to Warsaw. The mission is to gain support for him to become the next king of Poland.

Title: Kung kasalanan man
Description: Irma was the innocent wife, who was caught in a web of evil woven by the people she loved. Confused, alone and penniless, she had only Mike to turn to that is if he would believe her.

Title: He Who Was Abandoned by His Fathers
Description: A mute young man takes the conflict between his parents very painfully. The doctor tries to find out what is the reason of the boy's aggressiveness. The effort bears fruit: the boy starts to speak.

Title: Comédie d'amour
Description: Writer with proverbial misanthropy, Paul Léautaud lives only for literature and its cats, despising and mistreating those around him, rare and almost exclusively female.

Title: Kaze no Matasaburô - Garasu no manto
The Corsican Brothers
Description: A vendetta between two Corsican families is the background to Alexandre Dumas 's story of the strange bond between Siamese twin brothers, who are separated at birth.

Title: Waller's Last Trip
Description: Waller, an old track inspector will be forced out of work, because his railway line will be shut down. In flashbacks he reflects his past while walking for his final inspection.

Title: The Return of the Dead Army
Description: A military and a priest are trying to find the bones of the Italian army in Albania 15 year after the end of World War II.

Title: Die Hard
Description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

Title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
Description: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

Title: Grave of the Fireflies
Description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

Title: Beaches
Description: A privileged rich debutante and a cynical struggling entertainer share a turbulent, but strong childhood friendship over the years.

Title: The Lair of the White Worm
Description: When an archaeologist uncovers a strange skull in a foreign land, the residents of a nearby town begin to disappear, leading to further inexplicable occurrences.

Title: Dangerous Liaisons
Description: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

Title: Scrooged
Description: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

Title: The Vanishing
Description: Rex and Saskia, a young couple in love, are on vacation. They stop at a busy service station and Saskia is abducted. After three years and no sign of Saskia, Rex begins receiving letters from the abductor.

Title: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
Description: Central Europe, 1968: A Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

Title: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
Description: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences across late 18th-century Europe with his band of misfits.

Title: Oliver & Company
Description: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York City.

Title: Monkey Shines
Description: A quadriplegic man has a trained monkey help him with his paralysis, until the little monkey begins to develop feelings, and rage, against its new master.

Title: Funny Farm
Description: A couple swap city life for the country, but their picturesque new hometown turns out to be just a little bit different to what they were expecting.

Title: On the Silver Globe
Description: A team of astronauts land on an inhabitable planet and form a society. Many years later, a single astronaut is sent to the planet and becomes a messiah.

Title: Bright Lights, Big City
Description: A disillusioned young writer living in New York City turns to drugs and drinking to block out the memories of his dead mother and estranged wife.

Title: A Cry in the Dark
Description: A mother whose child was killed in a dingo attack in the Australian Outback fights to prove her innocence when she is accused of murder.

Title: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking
Hero and the Terror
Description: Danny was lucky 3 years ago at the arrest of Terror, a serial killer of young women. Danny's about to be dad, when Terror escapes prison and is back killing. Will Danny get lucky this time?

Title: Paperhouse
Description: A young girl lost in the loneliness and boredom of reality finds solace in an ill boy, whom she can visit in a surreal dream world that she drew in her school composition book.

Title: The Accidental Tourist
Description: An emotionally distant writer of travel guides must carry on with his life after his son is killed and his marriage crumbles.

Title: Appointment with Death
Description: When a former prison wardress who dominates the lives of her three adult stepchildren and her daughter is found dead at an archaeological dig near the Dead Sea, there are a great many suspects.

Title: Talk Radio
Description: A rude, contemptuous talk show host becomes overwhelmed by the hatred that surrounds his program just before it goes national.

Title: Messenger of Death
Description: A Denver reporter investigates the mass murder of a family of Mormons in rural Colorado.

Title: Pin
Description: Isolated by his strange parents, Leon finds solace in an imaginary friend, which happens to be an anatomy doll from his father's doctor office. Unfortunately, the doll begins to take over Leon's life, and his sister's life as well.

Title: The Bear
Description: An orphan bear cub hooks up with an adult male as they try to dodge human hunters.

Title: Vice Versa
Description: A divorced executive named Marshall and his 11-year-old son, Charlie, casually touch a magical Tibetan skull, releasing a mysterious power that transfers Marshall's mind to Charlie's body and vice versa. Their problems have just begun.

Title: Straight for the Heart
Description: A war photographer returns home to Montréal to discover that his two partners have left him to be together. Alone in the city, he photographs what he sees, trying to heal both his war memories and a broken heart.

Title: 36 fillette
Description: A night in the life of a young woman who wishes to learn and experience more of life. The men she meets have as much to learn from her as they can offer her, or more.

Title: Alice
Description: A surrealistic revision of Alice in Wonderland.

Title: The Milagro Beanfield War
Description: An accidental breakdown of a valve on the irrigation ditch launches a hot confrontation between local farmers and corrupt authorities.

Title: Watchers
Description: A boy takes in a stray dog, later discovering that it is an ultra-intelligent runaway being stalked by a dangerous creature from the same genetic research lab.

Title: Emmanuelle 6
Description: 5 models board a cruise ship with a cute Indian stowaway in Emmanuelle's trunk. A 2nd officer plans a kidnap of them with jewels once they reach the Amazon jungle.

Title: A Handful of Dust
Description: The wife's affair and a death in the family hasten the demise of an upper-class English marriage.

Title: Cop
Description: An obsessive, insubordinate homicide cop is convinced a serial killer is loose in the Hollywood area and disobeys orders in order to catch him.

Title: Gor II
Description: An Earthman returns to the planet Gor, and fights against tyranny.

Title: The Couch Trip
Description: A burnt-out shrink needs a temp. A charming escaped convict takes over his practice and radio show.

Title: Crusoe
Description: Robinson Crusoe is shipwrecked and he finds himself all alone on a tropical island. With a few tools he manages to rescue from the wreck he has to learn to support himself until help arrives.

Title: The Good Mother
Description: A divorced mother may lose custody of her young daughter to her ex-husband after he learns that the little girl crawled into bed with the mother and her boyfriend.

Title: Everybody's All-American
Description: A Louisiana football legend struggles to deal with life's complexities after his college career is over.

Title: The Chocolate War
Description: The Vigils are a gang of students at Trinity Catholic School... part of the tradition. They control the other boys by intimidation and the threat of violence.

Title: Me and Him
Description: A man's enthusiastic penis starts talking to him, getting him into awkward situations and convincing everyone he tells that he's completely insane.

Title: Story of Women
Description: A housewife in Nazi-occupied France struggles to make ends meet when her husband returns home after being wounded in the war.

Title: Stars and Bars
Description: A British art expert travels across America in order to purchase a rare Renoir painting in the South but comes across some crazy characters in the process.

Title: Pascali's Island
Description: A secret agent in Turkey is persuaded by his superiors to assist a couple of English cons in the theft of a priceless Greek statue.

Title: The Deceivers
Description: Fact-based account of a secret society of murderers, and of the man who exposed them in British India 1825.

Title: Clara's Heart
Description: A Jamaican woman becomes the housekeeper for a rich Baltimore family and bonds with a disillusioned teenage boy.

Title: The Boost
Description: A real estate developer who enjoyed short-lived success seeks to regain his edge by using cocaine, but takes himself to new lows as he gets lost in the downward spiral of drug addiction.

Title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
Description: Young people exploring a cave in Hawaii fall into a hole, and wind up in the lost city of Atlantis.

Title: La leggenda del santo bevitore
Description: An alcoholic homeless man is given two hundred francs by a stranger, who requests that when he can he will return the money to Saint Therese in the cathedral.

Title: Frankenstein General Hospital
Description: A mad doctor puts together a new body by using body parts he steals from a mortuary at the hospital where he works.

Title: Haunted Summer
Description: In 1815, authors Lord Byron, Mary Shelley and Percy Shelley get together for some philosophical discussions, but the situation soon deteriorates into mind games, drugs and sex.

Title: Stealing Heaven
Description: In medieval Paris, a young religious scholar and the beautiful niece of a local patrician fall madly in love and consummate their passion for each other. In the religious uproar that follows, they are condemned and brutally punished.

Title: Iguana
Description: In the 19th century, a bullied, disfigured man dubbed Iguana flees from abusive locals, finds his own island and declares himself tyrant of his new domain. A man and a woman get stranded there and become victims of his new sadistic nature.
