Title: The Tunnel
Description: A painter becomes obsessed and begins an affair with a mysterious woman who was touched deeply by one of his works.

Title: Madame Sousatzka
Description: Renowned Russian piano teacher Irina Sousatzka gets a new student - Bengali piano prodigy Manek. They are both immigrants in the UK and bond quickly. When Manek's single mother's business fails, he must make a career decision.

Title: The Wizard of Loneliness
Description: After his mother dies and father goes to fight in World War II, a young boy moves in with his aunt and uncle who live in the countryside. Lonely and unhappy, he starts believing he has super powers. Then a "dead" man shows up.

Title: The Dressmaker
Description: In England during World War II, a repressed dressmaker and her sister struggle looking after their seventeen-year-old niece, who is having a delusional affair with an American soldier.

Title: The Dawning
Description: An I.R.A. gunman (Sir Anthony Hopkins) on the run from the government. He meets up with an idealistic young woman (Rebecca Pidgeon) and attempts to win her support for his cause.

Title: Les possédés
Description: In 1870 Russia, a group of young and idealistic anarchists plots to overthrow the established order through violent means.

Title: Dogura magura
Description: A young man kills his bride on the day of his marriage and goes insane. He wakes up in an asylum with no memory, left in the hands of two mysterious doctors who relate his condition with his biological identity.

Title: The Gamble
Description: A young man joins a feisty runaway as he flees from the noblewoman who won him in a wager.

Title: Ne réveillez pas un flic qui dort
A Soldier's Tale
Description: A British soldier falls in love with a French woman wanted by the resistance for crimes against her country.

Title: Hotel St. Pauli
Description: Based upon the novel "Jord!" by Erland Kiøsterud about Jor, living in Copenhagen, trying to make a living as an artist. Meanwhile he has to live off his girlfriend Gerda's prostitution. Then Morgan turns up, creating trouble.

Title: Freeway
Description: A deeply-disturbed priest goes on a murderous night-time rampage across America's highways.

Title: Manifesto
Description: In a small European country, the king is scheduled to visit a small, quiet and "safe" village. It turns out that while the village may indeed be small, it's neither as quiet nor as safe as it's expected to be.

Title: Da
Description: A New York playwright is summoned to Ireland to bury his father (his "Da"). While at his boyhood home, he encounters his father's spirit and relives memories both pleasant and not.

Title: Little Sweetheart
Description: A criminal couple, hiding out in a remote property become the unwitting victims of a plot to blackmail them by the most unlikely of conspirators.

Title: Days of Eclipse
Description: Days of Eclipse is filmed in a psychedelic manner close to stream of consciousness using unusual cinematographic techniques. The action is set in Middle Asia.

Title: Die Katze
Description: Two bank robbers hold the clerks hostage and demand 3 million German marks as ransom. What the police do not realise is that the true criminal mastermind watches them from outside the bank, anticipating every move.

Title: En toute innocence
Description: Paul Duchene, owner of a thriving enterprise, works with his son Thomas and his wife Catherine. Drama begins when Paul unexpectedly catch his daughter-in-law sleeping with one of his son's colleagues.

Title: Judgment in Berlin
Description: American judge in Germany must decide if the hijacking of an East German plane into West Berlin was justified.

Title: Fiela se Kind
Description: A coloured woman in South Africa finds a white baby on her doorstep and raises him as her own. Nine years later, he is discovered and taken away.

Title: Tokyo: The Last Megalopolis
Description: A demonic reincarnation of a Japanese general from the 10th century appears in the early 20th century Tokyo with a mission to destroy the blooming city.

Title: We Think the World of You
In a Shallow Grave
Description: When a physically and emotionally scarred soldier returns home from World War II, he mistakenly trusts a mysterious young drifter to deliver a secret love letter to his old sweetheart.

Title: Os Canibais
Description: A drama following stories of characters from the Portuguese High Society.

Title: Ögretmen
Description: Husnu has got issues and inabilities about the complex and expensive metropolitan life who was a successful teacher in his little town and got a promotion and appointment to Istanbul.

Title: On the Black Hill
Description: The story covers eighty years in the lives of a pair of Welsh identical twins with an unusual bond, as they go through war, love affairs and land disputes.

Title: Garasu no naka no sho-jo
Description: A girl from a wealthy family falls in love with a working-class boy.

Title: Folk og røvere i Kardemomme by
Description: The three robbers Kasper, Jesper and Jonathan lives together with their always hungry lion in the little town of Kardemommeby , the home to a fair but kind police officer, and the strict Aunt Sofie.

Title: King of the Children
Description: This film is adapted from the novel of Ah Cheng. During the Cultural Revolution (1966-1976), a young man is assigned to teach in village school.

Title: Wuthering Heights
Description: A retelling of Emily Bronte's tale of vengeance and obsessive love, set in medieval Japan.

Title: El placer de matar
Description: The story of two men with very different lives but united for the pleasure of killing.

Title: The Outside Chance of Maximilian Glick
Description: A young Jewish adolescent from an overbearing family likes a Christian girl and is helped by a fun-loving rabbi.

Title: The Nature of the Beast
Description: A boy reads about the attacks of a unknown animal on livestock in the town. He plans to run his own investigation. The so called beast however is also used as a metaphor for every day problems the townsfolk face.

Title: Diamond's Edge
Description: When the man who left a package in his care is murdered, detective Tim Diamond suddenly has every major gangster in the city after him. With only the package and the help of his little brother, he sets out to unravel the mysterious plot.

Title: Chilsu and Mansu
Description: A painter quits his job and looks to an old acquaintance for work and a place to stay.

Title: The Tribulations of Balthazar Kober
Description: A dream-like odyssey of a young man across plague-ridden 16th century Germany.

Title: Bokura no nanoka-kan sensô
Description: Junior-high students are restrained by their teachers and parents... One day, they plan a rebellion.

Title: Hostile Takeover
Description: A man takes three co-workers hostage while working overtime on Thanksgiving weekend. He has no demands.

Title: Quicker Than the Eye
Description: An expert magician is hired to entertain world leaders at a peace summit. Unfortunately, he finds himself hopelessly entangled in an elaborate terrorist assassination plot.

Title: La passerelle
Description: Jean Nevers is a solitary middle-aged bachelor whose apartment is next to that of Cora Elbaz, an erotic dancer who lives alone with her five year old son Antoine.

Title: Carmen 1945
Description: During the post-World War II occupation of Japan, a group of women forced to resort to prostitution band together in the ruins to save up for a dancehall.

Title: Kadinin adi yok
Description: A woman's fight for her identity and freedom as a woman.

Title: Hard Times
Description: A film adaptation of the Charles Dickens novel "Hard Times" set in a Portuguese industrial town of the 1980s.

Title: Mangeclous
Description: A mysterious letter lures a family to Geneva in search of a treasure.

Title: Råttornas vinter
Description: Two men pick up fourteen-year-old prostitutes girls. One of the girls begins to fight her client. A neighbor intervenes.

Title: Jarrapellejos
Description: In La Joya, Extremadura in 1912 a local leader : Pedro Luis Jarrapellejos has the power . Two of his followers committed a horrible crime and it makes every effort to conceal the guilt of them.

Title: Geierwally
Description: A young maiden is the victim of an arranged marriage and runs away to the mountains to avoid her fate.

Title: And the Violins Stopped Playing
Description: This is the true story about a group of Romani's (gypsy) in occupied Poland during World War II as they confront the atrocities and tragedies of a forgotten holocaust.

Title: Luzia
Description: A young girl is raised as a man by an old cowboy. Her purpose is to kill her parents' murderers and go to the sea.

Title: La maison de jade
Description: During a ceremony in an orthodox church in Paris, a 40-year-old writer and journalist is seduced by a young man, whom with she will live an extraordinary story of love and passion that will drive them to madness.

Title: A Chaos of Flowers
Description: Poet Akiko Yosano is a poor woman with many children, she composes while doing the housework. Her passion flows towards Takeo Arishima, a noted novelist.

Title: Eugene Onegin
Description: Onegin visits a friend, his fiancee and her sister Tatiana, who believes Onegin is her fated love. She writes a note telling him so, but he rejects her. Years later he returns, finding her married, but now he's smitten with her.

Title: Fréquence meurtre
Description: Jeanne Quester is a psychologist-on-the-airwaves in a radio station.She got a raw deal when she was a child.

Title: Phantom of the Ritz
Description: A man buys an old, abandoned theater and puts on '50s-type rock shows. Then people start being killed in a rash of "accidents"...

Title: Hanazono no meikyu
Description: A serial killing occurs at a port town brothel.

Title: Hong lou meng
Description: The decline of the Jia clan in imperial China.

Title: La furia de un dios
Description: On the beach lies the body of Claudio O'Riley, heir to a monopoly shrimp, and his voice recounts his rise to power: the incestuous relationship with his sister, the degrading treatment to their partners and so on.

Title: Quest for Love
Description: Set against a political backdrop in Africa, the story spanning several years, unfolds around the powerful interaction between two women, their strong sexual allure, and their search to find meaning through it all.

Title: Anego
Description: The widow of a murdered yakuza boss serves jail time for attacking the man she believes killed her husband. After her release, as she is shadowed by a hitman, she returns to thoughts of revenge.

Title: I fanela me to '9'
Description: Bill, a great football talent, experiences the rise and fall of his career while being introduced to the world of Greek professional football.

Title: Lumberjacking
Description: Lumberjacking is a second part of saga about young author, Kalle Päätalo. It's a story about growing up and becoming a storyteller in hard times when their father was in the forced labour camp. He was a lunatic.

Title: Trójkat bermudzki
Description: Three old friends living in distant cities decide to help each other get rid of people who stand in their way to achieve happiness.

Title: La Bohème
Description: Paris, 1910. On Christmas Eve, a young woman knocks on her neighbor's door to borrow some lamp oil. A touching romance is ignited even as the young woman becomes very sick.

Title: Prisoner of Zenda
Description: The King of Ruritania is kidnapped by his scheming brother: can his British double save him?

Title: Himmel og helvede
Description: A young girl emerges into womanhood and transcends the restricting emotional poverty in which she was forced to live.

Title: The Keepers of the Fog
Description: Images and reality intermingle in this account of a writer's experiences under a totalitarian regime.

Title: Çil horoz
Description: The story of three sisters living in slums.

Title: Aakhari Poratam
Description: The story is about CBI officer Pravallika (Sridevi) trying to expose the illegal activities of a notorious criminal Anantananda Swamy (Amrish Puri). Stage artiste Vihari (Akkineni Nagarjuna) helps Pravallika in this mission.

Title: Sunset at Chaopraya
Description: Romance between Imperial Japanese solider, Kobori and Thai woman, Angsumalin during the period of World War II.

Title: Dandy
Description: A selection of seemingly unconnected scenes featuring Nick Cave, Blixa Bargeld, Nina Hagen and Lene Lovich. Losely based on Voltaire's satire "Candide".

Title: Those Swell Yakuza
Description: After getting a beating from a yakuza, a record store owner decides that being a yakuza would be his dream job.

Title: Moonzund
Description: Captain Artenyev is in love with a beautiful lady-spy Klara.

Title: Fegefeuer
Description: The story of Austrian, Johann "Jack" Unterweger, who wrote a book about his criminal past while serving a life term in prison for assault.

Title: The Glory and Misery of Human Life
Description: Two young lovers, Anna and Martti, are split apart but are reunited many years later when their lives have changed considerably. Anna is a war widow; Martti a writer, is married, and has five children.

Title: Priklyucheniya Kventina Dorvarda, strelka korolevskoy gvardii
¿Nos traicionará el presidente?
Description: An international group is trying to destabilize Mexico by assassinating the President.

Title: Gallego
Description: An adolescent leaves his homeland to emigrate to Cuba in 1916. The film covers his life until the 1960s and at the same time reflects on the history of the country that becomes his second homeland.

Title: Deux minutes de soleil en plus
Description: Vic picks up his wife Cat after leaving the mental hospital. Writer ruined by the game, Vic benefits from a recent hype thanks to a book for which he owes him half of his copyrights.

Title: La posta in gioco
Description: Renata Fonte, council member in the town of Nardò, is assassinated. The inquiry will bring to the discovery of an involvement of the Mafia in redevelopment projects which Renata Fonte had tried to fight back.

Title: Khleb - imya sushchestvitelnoe
Description: Epic film about life of three generations in central Russia on the Volga river.

Title: Gli invisibili
Description: At the beginning of the eighties, Sirio, a young worker at the steelworks in Terni with a past in the student struggles, decided to abandon his job as a soldier in an extreme left-wing group.

Title: Les années sandwiches
Description: Victor got a raw deal:his parents were victims of the Vel'D'Hiv roundup,and he had to escape from France.

Title: O lyubvi govorit' ne budem
Description: After spending six years in prison Brigita returns to her hometown. Husband Induls is now married to another and their son is growing up in his new family. Meetings of former spouses go through sad memories.

Title: Ville étrangère
Description: Gregor Keuschning, press attaché at the Austrian Embassy, leads a normal family life, until the day - or rather, the night - when he dreams of murdering an old woman.

Title: Schodami w góre, schodami w dól
Trinadtsatyy apostol
Description: A film adaptation of Ray Bradbury's book The Martian Chronicles.

Title: Yin yang jie
Description: Complex tale of love and revenge following the bloody adventures of bandits, communists, and the nationalist army in the 1930s.

Title: Lun hui
Description: Shi Ba is a self-employed profiteer, skilled in deceiving, bragging, speculating and playing. He deceives others, who fool him too

Title: Osen, Chertanovo...
Description: In a vacation spot north of Moscow where technocrats and intellectuals gather, a woman fools around with different men including a computer scientist and a screenwriter, the resulting squabbling and back stabbing end tragically.

Title: Tous les nuages sont des horloges
Seraya mysh
Description: A dramatic story of moral degradation of a former plant director, who have taken to spirits.

Title: Die Wiese der Sachen
Description: A terrorist defector comments on the fate of an abducted car salesman.

Title: V debryakh, gde reki begut...
Description: Based on James Oliver Curwood's adventure novel "The Country Beyond", "In the Wild, Where the Rivers Run" follows Roger McKay, a wrongly accused man hiding in the Canadian wilderness, a mixed-breed dog, Peter, and its lovely owner, Nada.

Title: Did You Know? Well You Should!
The Princess Bride
Description: While homesick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

Title: Full Metal Jacket
Description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

Title: The Witches of Eastwick
Description: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

Title: The Running Man
Description: In a dystopian America, a falsely convicted policeman gets his shot at freedom when he must forcibly participate in a TV game show where convicts, runners, must battle killers for their freedom.

Title: Empire of the Sun
Description: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.

Title: Flowers in the Attic
Description: Children are hidden away under an attic by their conspiring mother and grandmother.

Title: Angel Heart
Description: A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.

Title: Malone
Description: An ex-C.I.A. hit man running from his past (Malone) finds just how difficult it is to retire when he runs across a small town controlled by mercenaries and a family that's resisting their control.

Title: Less Than Zero
Description: A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.

Title: A Return to Salem's Lot
Description: A man and his son vacation to the quiet vampire populated town of Salem's Lot.

Title: No Way Out
Description: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

Title: Maurice
Description: After his lover rejects him, a young man trapped by the oppressiveness of Edwardian society tries to come to terms with and accept his sexuality.

Title: The Believers
Description: A New York psychiatrist finds that a brujería-inspired cult, which believes in child sacrifice, has a keen interest in his own son.

Title: Man on Fire
Description: A former CIA agent, John Creasy, is hired as a bodyguard for a girl in Italy, who becomes the daughter he never had. When she is abducted, Creasy's fiery rage is unleashed, and despite being badly wounded, embarks on a bloody revenge spree.

Title: The Fourth Protocol
Description: John Preston is a British Agent with the task of preventing the Russians detonating a nuclear explosion next to an American base in the UK. The Russians are hoping this will shatter the "special relationship" between the two countries.

Title: The Big Town
Description: A dice roller falls in love with a talented dancer who happens to be the wife to a gangster.

Title: Mio in the Land of Faraway
Description: A lonely boy who is transferred from his dull life with his adoptive parents to the land where his real father is the King. In that country, he sets out on a quest, together with his new friend, to destroy the evil Knight Kato.

Title: Gor
Description: American professor Tarl Cabot is transported via a magical ring to planet Gor, where he must help an oppressed country overthrow its evil king and his barbarian henchmen.

Title: Ironweed
Description: An alcoholic drifter spends Halloween in his home town of Albany, New York after returning there for the first time in decades.

Title: Gandahar
Description: An evil force from a 1000 years in the future begins to destroy an idyllic paradise, where the citizens are in perfect harmony with nature.

Title: The Bedroom Window
Description: A young executive starts an affair with his boss's wife which then escalates into a nightmare after he lies to the police in order to protect her.

Title: Pelle the Conqueror
Description: When his wife dies, Lasse takes his 12-year-old son, Pelle, from their home in Sweden to Denmark in search of a better life.

Title: Ice Palace
Description: A couple of twelve-year-old Norwegian girls struggle with their intense, taboo relationship during the 1930s.

Title: Rampage
Description: Liberal district attorney decides to seek the death penalty for a man who slaughtered a family at Christmastime, then drank their blood. He escapes, though, and starts killing again.

Title: Dead of Winter
Description: A fledgling actress is lured to a remote mansion for a screen-test, soon discovering she is actually a prisoner in the middle of a blackmail plot.

Title: Love Rites
Description: Hugo, a vain clothing buyer, meets Myriam on a train and pursues a relationship with her. He is delighted to learn she is a prostitute and has no idea she has more in mind than Hugo bargained for.

Title: The Sicilian
Description: Egocentric bandit Salvatore Giuliano fights the Church, the Mafia, and the landed gentry while leading a populist movement for Sicilian independence.

Title: Cobra Verde
Description: During the 1800s, paroled Brazilian bandit Cobra Verde is sent to West Africa with a few troops to man an old Portuguese fort and to convince the local African ruler to resume the slave trade with Brazil.

Title: Siesta
Description: An American skydiver wakes up in the middle of nowhere in Spain and must recount the last five agonizing days to figure out how she got there.

Title: White Mischief
Description: In 1940s Kenya, a married couple join other affluent British expatriates in a lifestyle of recklessness and excess, but soon find themselves in a troubling situation.

Title: Gardens of Stone
Description: A Sergeant must deal with his desires to save the lives of young soldiers being sent to Viet Nam. Continuously denied the chance to teach the soldiers about his experiences, he settles for trying to help the son of an old Army buddy.

Title: Nightflyers
Description: Professor hires a spaceship to get to the source of weird signals from deep space. The trip is cut short however when the ship's computer gets jealous because the captain is in love with one of the female passengers and it gets homicidal.

Title: A Prayer for the Dying
Description: Martin, an I.R.A. hitman, is seen by a Catholic priest while carrying out a hit. He grows a bond with the priest and his niece. But his past and his former employers put all their lives in danger.

Title: Dark Age
Description: A park ranger is tasked with dealing with a killer crocodile that appears to have a spiritual connection with the local Aboriginals.

Title: A Month in the Country
Description: Two soldiers (Colin Firth, Kenneth Branagh) recover from World War I while spending a summer in a Yorkshire village.

Title: Square Dance
Description: A 13-year-old girl changes a pleasant life in the countryside for a troubled life in the city.

Title: Housekeeping
Description: After their mother commits suicide, two sisters end up living with their kind but peculiar aunt in their grandmother's old house in a small 1950s town.

Title: Burglar
Description: A retired cop blackmails ex burglar Bernice into paying him $20,000 - thus burgling. Paid to get a dentist's jewelry back from her ex's apartment, someone murders the ex and Bernice is a suspect. She investigates.

Title: The Misfit Brigade
Description: War story of the 27th Panzers, Hitler's heavy-duty combat regiment composed of prisoners. In 1943, this motley tank crew is sent on a suicide mission behind enemy lines to destroy a Soviet train that's carrying fuel for the Red Army.

Title: Pinocchio and the Emperor of the Night
Description: Pinocchio and his friends, a glow worm and a marionette, search for a magic music box. However, so is the evil Scalawag and the Emperor of the Night.

Title: Little Dorrit
Description: Arthur returns to London after working abroad for many years with his now deceased father. Almost at once he becomes involved in the problems of his mother's seamstress Amy and of her father residing in the Marshalsea debtors' prison.

Title: A Tiger's Tale
Description: A young man falls for his girlfriend's mother.

Title: Ten Little Indians
Description: A psychological thriller based on the novel by Agatha Christie. Ten strangers are forced to come face to face with their dark pasts after receiving invitation to an isolated island off the coast of England.

Title: Under the Sun of Satan
Description: A priest stuck in a rural congregation and burdened with his overwrought spirituality, finds purpose in a troubled woman accused of murder.

Title: The Rosary Murders
Description: A priest is put in a dilemma when the serial killer who has been murdering priests and nuns confesses to him.

Title: The Lonely Passion of Judith Hearne
Description: A middle-aged spinster falls in love with a fellow resident of her boardinghouse, who mistakenly believes she has the money to help him start a new business.

Title: Summer Heat
Description: Feeling lonely and neglected by her overworked husband, Roxy, a Depression-era farm wife, is drawn into an ill-advised affair with Jack, their hired hand.

Title: Going Bananas
Description: While on vacation in a fictitious African country, the young son of a US senator, his guardian and their guide must stop the corrupt local police chief and the shady owner of a local circus from capturing their new friend - a talking ape.

Title: Diary of a Mad Old Man
Talking Walls
Description: A sociology student films sexual encounters in a motel for his thesis, and falls in love with a French girl in the process.

Title: Motherland Hotel
Description: The lonely proprietor of a small hotel in a provincial Turkish town develops a passion for a departed guest and the reality of routine everyday-life starts crumbling into pieces.

Title: L'été en pente douce
Description: Fane wants nothing but a quiet countryside life with the woman and the sweet, brain damaged brother he loves. Envious neighbours however have plans of their own.

Title: Beauty and the Beast
Description: To save her father, a girl who always puts others before herself promises to live her life in a lavish castle with a strange beast.

Title: The Gold Rimmed Glasses
Description: A Jewish family and a homosexual doctor suffer persecution in Fascist Italy. Based on a novel by Giorgio Bassani.

Title: Police des moeurs: Les filles de Saint Tropez
Description: A police captain's niece is trapped by white slavers.

Title: Morometii
Description: The story of a family: Problems, marriage, taxes, revenge, friendship, army and much more.

Title: Hibiscus Town
Description: Love, humiliation and politics play out in a distant village of China during the cultural revolution.

Title: The Enchanted Forest
Description: In the fantastic world of the "bosque animado" meet some people who have been transported to this place by a magic force. Now their histories cross one another.

Title: Le cri du hibou
Description: After separation from his wife Robert moves to Vichy where he observes beautiful Juliette. Her fiance Patrick becomes jealous and attacks Robert. When Patrick disappears Robert is suspected to have killed him.

Title: Flower and Snake: Ultimate Rope Discipline
Les fous de Bassan
Description: In a small town on Quebec's Gaspé peninsula in 1936, a young man returns home after a five-year absence. A hit with the local ladies but not with the object of his heart's desire, the town is thrown into turmoil as rape and murder ensues.

Title: Dragonard
Description: On an 18th century Caribbean island run by debauched colonial plantation owners, an enslaved Scotsman joins a slave revolt.

Title: De ratelrat
Description: A rich Frisian farmer is murdered in Amsterdam. Police duo Grijpstra and De Gier are assigned to the case.

Title: Devil's Paradise
Description: At the start of the 20th century, a man lives in solitude on an island. One day on the mainland, he saves a young woman from some nasty folk and takes her with him to his island. Her former captors soon find the island as well.

Title: The Lonely Voice of Man
Description: Nikita, haunted by the civil war, meets Luba, who is as deeply moral and lonely as he is.

Title: More About the Children of Noisy Village
Description: There are only a handful of children living in Bullerbyn. This film follows their story through the fall and winter, picking up at the moment "The Children of Noisy Village" finishes.

Title: The Right Hand Man
Description: A stagecoach driver goes to work for a dying, one-armed aristocrat in 1860s Australia.

Title: Konets vechnosti
Description: Based on the novel by Isaac Asimov.The End of Eternity is a science fiction film with mystery and thriller elements on the subjects of time travel and social engineering.

Title: Original Dirty Pair: Project Eden
Description: WWWA Trouble Consultants Kei and Yuri team up with a petty thief to stop a mad scientist and his legions of mutated creatures.

Title: Master of Dragonard Hill
Description: Abdee, the formerly enslaved Scottish nobleman living on the lush 18th century colonial Caribbean island of St. Joseph's, is framed for murder and forced to lead a new rebellion.

Title: Dernier été à Tanger
Description: In 1956, with the independence of Morocco, the Fedala conference in Tangier is set in a city of turmoil.

Title: Bialy smok
Description: A satire of Cold War politics, where Red bureaucrats meet U.S. corporate greed, and a witch and a dragon.

Title: Elysium
Description: A remarkable anti-war film about a 9 year old Jewish boy who is picked up by the police and sent to a concentration camp while his parents do their best under difficult circumstances to find him.

Title: Maschenka
Description: A story about true love, set in the Berlin of the 1920s. In a shabby lodging-house inhabited by a number of faintly ludicrous characters, the young Russian exile Ganin is unexpectedly confronted with his past.

Title: Czarne stopy
Description: A group of Boy scouts who name themselves Black Feet learn lessons about honor and brotherhood in a camp.

Title: Nad Niemnem
Description: 1880s, Korczyn on the Nemunas. The nobility and peasants are trying to adapt to the new post-uprising reality. Justyna Orzelska meets Jan Bohatyrowicz, who shows her how valuable work is.

Title: Slate, Wyn & Me
Description: Meandering drama of Brothers Burke and Sacks, who rob a bank, kill a cop and kidnap Thornton, a witness to their crime.

Title: Les noces barbares
Description: Nicole is a rape victim. Her son, the result of this tragic event, is cut off, harassed, unloved, ostracized. He develops a neurotic personality, despite attempts to engage his hostile mother in a dialogue of affection and recognition.

Title: Antarjali Jatra
Description: A father encourages his daughter to marry a dying man in order to inherit his wealth.

Title: Ballad of dog beach
Description: In Portugal, in the 60s, the corpse of a man appears on Dog's Beach. The corpse is identified as the major Dantas, a man wanted by authorities after his escape from a military prison where he was awaiting trial for insurrection.

Title: Al acecho
Description: Deceit and treachery in the currency smugglers underworld.

Title: Starlight Hotel
Description: It is Depression era New Zealand and school-kid Kate is missing her father badly. The temptation to seek him out leads her into diverse and intense encounters with fate.

Title: Fucking Fernand
Description: A bombing raid makes travelling companions of a blind man, Fernand, and Antoine, a criminal. Fernand is a virgin and is depending on his new friend to find him a woman. But to Antoine, on the run, his fellow victim is more a burden than a boon.

Title: The Place at the Coast
Description: Ellie and her father leave the city for their holiday house at the quiet seaside town of Kilkee.

Title: Si le soleil ne revenait pas
Kuroi doresu no onna
Description: A woman arrives as an acquaintance of a sister in law for a day under the bar master Tamura who had guided Yakuza's escaping.

Title: Donga Mogudu
Description: It is a remake of an English movie, Trading Places(1983) directed by John Landis with the lead roles of Eddie Murphy, Dan Aykroyd and Ralph Bellamy.

Title: Farewell, Mr. President
Description: Asko Mertanen is a waiter who is very interested in shooting. He gets fed up how the things are run in Finland, so he thinks that the best way to change them is to shoot the Finnish president.

Title: The Jester
Description: Set four years after the Portuguese revolution and the simultaneous loss of the Portuguese empire in Africa, the story concerns a director who sells guns to finance his play.

Title: Iris
Description: When Iris moves to the country to start a veterinary practice, she finds a lot of skeptical villagers as well as disapproval from her city bound boyfriend.

Title: Iron Earth, Copper Sky
Description: Despite the hostility of the mayor, the villagers of Anatolia regard as a saint the man who defends them against a creditor of the city.

Title: Rebel High
Description: In a school ruled by its violent students who regularly fight each other, attack teachers, and damage school property, the staff struggles to keep a principal before they quit, get scared off, or killed.

Title: Die Alleinseglerin
Description: A young mother and upcoming academic has her life further complicated by an unexpected heritage. A sailing boat that proves to be a real challenge.

Title: Engagements of the Heart
Description: The border between collaboration and resistance may be thin ,and that's Charles's dilemma.

Title: 72. kogus
Description: During the Second World War, Ahmet Kaptan was one of the prisoners living in the 72nd Ward.

Title: The Romance of Book and Sword
La brute
Description: Based on Guy Des Cars novel La Brute. A Deaf and blind young boy is accused of commiting a brutal murder.

Title: Gramofon avrat
Description: In the 1930s in Konya, Turkey, the famous belly dancer Cemile dreams of going to the big city. Murat falls in love with her.

Title: O Desejado
Description: João is the spiritual heir (the term he prefers to bastard) of Manuel Brandão, his dying godfather, and at the same time the political leader of a small party of a disintegrating governmental coalition.

Title: Le testament d'un poète juif assassiné
Description: Paltiel Kossover leaves his home country Russia because of the Jewish persecutions. From Berlin to Paris, he will discover politics, poetry, love before coming back to his native land.

Title: Captured Mother and Daughter: She Beast
Feldmann saken
Description: Jacob and Rachel was killed on their flight to Sweden in 1942, and a year later their bodies are discovered, but after the war the case is again is opened, and the guilty is hunted.

Title: Nageuneneun kileseodo swiji anhneunda
Description: A young man travels to various regions of South Korea to scatter the ashes of his dead wife.

Title: Adada
Description: Adada tells the story of a deaf-mute woman who lives in a small town in South Korea during the 1920s.

Title: Las aventuras de Oliver Twist
Description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

Title: Menavor enkuzeni
Description: The village Lernasar is doomed to destruction. Its inhabitants, headed by the teacher Kamsaryan, come to defend their history.

Title: Laura, del cielo llega la noche
Never Travel on a One Way Ticket
Description: Among human remains, barely alive, operates the investigator. A bitter man, a mole that digs his way among the facts and fictions of life. Beaten, broke, hungry and liable to be evicted.

Title: The Children of the Swallow
Description: A director travels to the villages of mt. Helidona in Greece to interview six siblings living there, whose lives where defined by the events of the Greek Civil War.

Title: Svet nic neví
Description: The story takes place in the Czech-German border region in 1938. The hero Tomás Jakl marries but the marriage is not very lucky and falls apart. His German friend forced him to enter the Nazi party.

Title: Terug naar Oegstgeest
Description: Literary adaptation: an artist returns to the stifling atmosphere of the small Dutch village where he grew up, a place marked by morbidity, suppression of emotion, Calvinist hypocrisy and a suffocating patriarchy.

Title: Soshedshie s nebes
Description: A pair of lovers survive in the catacombs during the WWII and try to live on.

Title: Deaf to the City
Description: A middle-aged woman is abandoned by her wealthy husband and moves into a cheap, dilapidated hotel where she develops relationships with the eternally optimistic owner and her deaf and terminally ill child.

Title: La rusa
Description: A Spanish government adviser falls in love with a young woman with militant leftist extremists accused of being a member of the KGB. He must conduct negotiations with the terrorist movement ETA.

Title: Bee Bop highschool; Koko yotaro march
Description: A sly prep school thug uses his girlfriend to lure Hiroshi and Toru to a fight, but the scheme escalates to an all-out war between everyone involved.

Title: Ossegg oder Die Wahrheit über Hänsel und Gretel
Otstupnik
Description: Scientist creates a machine that is able to clone human beings. Soon the Government wants to take hold of it for military purposes.

Title: Yarin yarin
Description: The story of a woman living a bourgeois life and a left-wing man.

Title: Samo ti, sartze
Description: The title of the film is taken from the popular Bulgarian song. This is a film about the life of a common Bulgarian worker. The action focuses on his family, his relatives, and his friends.

Title: Le journal d'un fou
Description: In the nineteenth century, in St. Petersburg. Poprichtchine, a small official living almost in misery, decides not to go to the office. Coming from a noble family, he can not stand his condition anymore.

Title: La chica de la piscina
Description: A famous television showman is suffering a mental and spiritual crisis. But fortunately three friends who once have all been lovers of his try to help him...

Title: Ayokong tumungtong sa lupa
Description: ONCE IN A RARE WHILE - YOU GER TO SEE TH KIND YOU REALLY WANT TO SEE!!. THE LOVE TRIANGLE IN THIS MELODRAMA INVOLVES A LONG-SUFFERING WIFE, A POOR CHILDHOOD SWEETHEART, AND A MENTALLY DERANGED HUSBAND.

Title: ESD
Description: The orderly universe of the Borejko family crackles completely when the mother of four daughters ends up in a hospital. The oldest of the four children, Gaba does her best to take over after her mother.

Title: Manhunter
Description: Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer dubbed "the Tooth Fairy" by the media.

Title: 9½ Weeks
Description: A woman becomes involved with a man she barely knows. Complications develop during their sexual escapades.

Title: The Name of the Rose
Description: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

Title: The Color of Money
Description: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

Title: Cobra
Description: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far-reaching plans.

Title: Betty Blue
Description: A lackadaisical handyman and aspiring novelist tries to support his younger girlfriend as she slowly succumbs to madness.

Title: Deadly Friend
Description: After his friend is killed by her abusive father, the new kid in town attempts to save her by implanting a robotic microchip into her brain.

Title: The Mosquito Coast
Description: An inventor spurns his city life and moves his family into the jungles of Central America to make a utopia.

Title: The Whistle Blower
Description: A war veteran tries to investigate the murder of his son who was working as a Russian translator for the British intelligence service during the Cold War. He meets a web of deception and paranoia that seems to be impenetrable.

Title: The Great Mouse Detective
Description: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

Title: 52 Pick-Up
Description: A secret fling between a man and his mistress leads to blackmail and murder.

Title: The Clan of the Cave Bear
Description: A young Cro-Magnon woman is raised by Neanderthals.

Title: Heartburn
Description: She's a magazine writer who gives up her career for love and family. He's a playboy newspaper columnist who can't quite give up his old tricks. And if that combination doesn't give a relationship Heartburn, nothing will.

Title: Allan Quatermain and the Lost City of Gold
Description: Allan Quatermain once again teams up with Jesse Huston where the discovery of a mysterious old gold piece sends Quatermain looking for his long-lost brother, missing in the wilds of Africa after seeking a lost white race.

Title: Manon of the Spring
Description: A beautiful but shy shepherdess plots vengeance on the men whose greedy conspiracy to acquire her father's land caused his death years earlier.

Title: 8 Million Ways to Die
Description: A former police detective, still recovering from his alcohol addiction, is seemingly drawn into L.A's criminal underworld after stumbling upon a local drug ring.

Title: Jean de Florette
Description: A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.

Title: The Majorettes
Description: A high school majorettes are being methodically killed by a mysterious masked figure. Meanwhile, a local gang are involved in suspicious activities around the school.

Title: Absolute Beginners
Description: In London in 1958, a young photographer seeks media stardom to keep the love of a beautiful, aspiring fashion designer.

Title: Half Moon Street
Description: A brilliant researcher in London who works as a high-class hooker in her spare time, becomes a pawn in a dangerous political game, when her latest client, a nobleman who is negotiating an Arab-Israeli peace treaty, falls for her.

Title: Blue City
Description: A drifter returns to his Florida hometown only to discover that his father, the local mayor, was mysteriously murdered during his absence. Vowing to find the killer and avenge his father's death, he starts his own investigation.

Title: Tai-Pan
Description: Historical fiction set against the backdrop of Hong Kong in its early years of British rule.

Title: The Ladies Club
Description: A raped policewoman forms a vigilante group of various rape victims. They abduct and castrate men whom have committed repeated violations of women, and got away with it through legal technicalities.

Title: Heat
Description: Las Vegas is the backdrop for all the torrid action of heat, as Burt Reynolds plays the soft-hearted bodyguard who's out to protect his friends.

Title: Shanghai Surprise
Description: Shanghai, 1938: A missionary woman hires a fortune hunter to help her find 1100 lbs. opium lost, as wounded need the morphine. Adventure and romance follows.

Title: Summer Camp Nightmare
Description: A group of campers revolt against their strict camp director and take over the camp for themselves.

Title: The Serpent's Way
Description: A salesman and his son sexually abuse the generations of women of a poor family as payment for debt. Janni must see his mother, sister, niece and wife all being exploited, and the family grow bigger with the abuser's kids.

Title: Il camorrista
Description: Rise and fall of an Italian crime empire.

Title: The Assault
Description: A Dutch doctor, haunted by grueling childhood memories of World War II, struggles to find peace as he spends his life looking for answers about the tragic night that shaped him.

Title: Cours privé
Description: Jeanne Kern is a history teacher in a private mixed class. Passionately provocative, she does not ignore the effect she has on men.

Title: Native Son
Description: In 1940s Chicago, a young black man takes a job as a chauffeur to a white family, which takes a turn for the worse when he accidentally kills the teenage daughter of the couple and then tries to cover it up.

Title: The Children of Noisy Village
Description: The story of the children who live in Bullerbyn, Sweden, through the spring and summer months.

Title: Where Are the Children?
Description: Two children are kidnapped and held for ransom by a madman. Soon, however, the children's father begins to suspect that their mother may possibly have had something to do with the crime.

Title: The Princess and the Call Girl
Description: Two beautiful look-alike women, one a rich socialite, the other a high-end call girl, switch places to gain new experiences.

Title: Flower and Snake: White Uniform Rope Slave
His Motorbike, Her Island
Description: After a failed romance, a temperamental young biker meets a carefree rural girl while riding through her island hometown and gets her obsessed about riding a motorcycle.

Title: Desiderando Giulia
Description: A young man falls in love with extra-liberated Giulia. Their relationship becomes very passionate, but Giulia has no limits in her sexual fantasies and games.

Title: Saving Grace
Description: A young pope who feels he has lost touch with the people accidentally locks himself out of the Vatican and believes it is part of God's plan for him.

Title: Playing Beatie Bow
Description: A discontented Sydney teenager travels back in time to 1873, whilst watching an old fashioned children's game.

Title: La machine à découdre
Description: The insane Doctor Enger is obsessed with his plan to build a hospital to cure blind children, and goes on a killing and kidnapping spree with the police in pursuit.

Title: Foreign Body
Description: An unemployed Indian engineer emigrates to England to find work and through a series of circumstances, ends up impersonating a doctor to win the attention of an attractive young woman.

Title: Courier
Description: The story of a teenager boy in times of the comunism fall in the Soviet Union.

Title: Separate Vacations
Description: A young architect finds himself in a situation that he never had to deal with before--now that he is successful (and married), sexy young women are throwing themselves at him. He and his wife take separate vacations to follow their urges.

Title: Namukku Parkkan Munthiri Thoppukal
Description: A man falls in love with his new neighbor but then finds that her family life is difficult.

Title: Treasure Island
Description: Raúl Ruiz's fabulist modern-day riff on Robert Louis Stevenson's classic novel.

Title: The Fringe Dwellers
Description: Story of an aboriginal family who tries to move out of the fringe into the main white community.

Title: Family Council
Description: French rocker Johnny Hallyday stars as a professional thief just released from jail. He returns to stealing to support his family. After several successful thefts, he decides to include his under-aged kid into the "family business".

Title: Kangaroo
Description: A mild-mannered English conscientious objector moves to what he feels will be the relative calm of Australia after World War I, but gets caught in the middle of violent battles between the rising trade unions and fascist groups.

Title: The Sea and Poison
Description: Downed American fliers in WWII are vivisected by Japanese surgeons in cruel medical experiments.

Title: Vecernja zvona
Description: Trials and tribulations of a Croatian Communist intellectual in the turbulent years before, during and after WW2.

Title: Ek Chadar Maili Si
Description: Rani, a loving wife, lives a peaceful life with her husband Trilok, a horse carriage driver. However, Rani's life takes a new turn when Trilok is killed.

Title: Dancing in the Dark
Description: The present unfolds along with scenes from the past in this intense psychological drama about Edna, a woman in the hospital who each day writes down her memories.

Title: Witch from Nepal
Description: A Hong Kong man vacations to Nepal where a local tribe imbues him with magical powers which he must use to fight a growing evil.

Title: Toki no Tabibito
Description: Time Stranger is the story of a bunch of teenagers getting transported back in time through Japan's history, and getting mixed up with samurai shenanigans.

Title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
Description: In the 1840s, two boys get mixed up with an Indian accused of stealing money and rescue a pretty girl who is trapped in a cave.

Title: Terry on the Fence
Description: A mixed-up, teenage runaway becomes involved with a tough teenage street gang and its lawless activities while trying to find a way to redeem himself.

Title: Springen
Description: "Semper Vivax" is not just another retirement home. The guests there get their best real-life memories played out for them.

Title: Early Spring
Description: A movie based of a book, follows a young girl named Ester, and her family and friends as poor danish citizens, in a rough area of Copenhagen in the 1930's.

Title: H.M. Deserters
Description: In 1918, a group of soldiers of various nationalities conspires to desert the imperial Austro-Hungarian army.

Title: Le paltoquet
Description: Miss Lotte has her residence in a big hangar near a port.She seems to be having nice time with five clients but the arrival of a policeman disturbs their lives.

Title: Keshin
Description: It depicts the sadness of a man who tries to transform himself into a good woman and is flirted with her who has gone beyond her hopes. Generally, men are women.

Title: Massey Sahib
Description: Francis Massey works as a clerk in deputy commissioner's office in the colonial administration of British India. He aspires to become one of the rulers and does everything he can to impress his boss.

Title: Asilacak kadin
Description: The life adventure and suicide of a female hero named Melek, who was forced to marry a man with a sick soul and sexual perversions.

Title: The Journey
Description: An unusual family story about two father and son generations, beginning on a German country side and ending in the students' revolt in Berlin.

Title: Zone rouge
Description: Claire Rousset visits her ex-husband Pierre who lives in the Lyon region. For some time now, Pierre's health and that of the other inhabitants of the village has deteriorated to the point of becoming worrying.

Title: Tiempo de silencio
Description: Adaptation of the novel by Martin Santos, which describes the society of the late 1940s, where humans lived like rats.

Title: La rebelión de los colgados
Description: The drama of the Indians of tropical Mexico in the early twentieth century. The Rebellion of the Hanged is the intense story of the rise of the oppressed pawns and their struggle to achieve freedom and independence.

Title: I Hate Actors
Description: Hollywood in the 1940s. A tyrannical producer, a paranoid director, a starlet engaged twenty-four times, an actor who refuses to age - all against a backdrop of a series of murders.

Title: Cabaret
Description: University student sax player gets a lesson in the hard-boiled noir life.

Title: Ye shan
Description: The story of two brothers who are faced with great upheavals when they set up in business after years of communal farming.

Title: Amor a la vuelta de la esquina
La mansión de Araucaima
Description: A young model runs away from the set of a commercial spot she's filming and enters the mansion of Araucaima, where its dwellers indulge in strange rites.

Title: Jubiabá
Description: Jubiabá is a French-Brazilian film based on the homonym novel by Jorge Amado. The film tells the story of the interracial love between the daughter of a rich Commander and Antonio Balduíno, a rascal, fighter and famous lover from Salvador.

Title: Oka Radha Iddaru Krishnulu
Description: Murali Krishna marriages rad ha and acts as double in order to take revenge against His father in law for killing his father in his childhood which includes in hilarious conversations.

In 1938, Austria is about to become a part of the Third Reich. A theater actress and a Jewish journalist fall in love and spend time together completely ignoring the political turmoil of the time despite friendly warnings.

Title: Elämän vonkamies
Description: A curious and stubborn boy Kalle has to grow up fast in northern Finland in the 1920s. When his lumberjack father gets ill, Kalle has to take his place as a provider for the family.

Title: De wisselwachter
Description: A woman gets off a train by mistake and finds herself stranded alone with a peculiar man who doesn't even speak her language.

Title: Tarot
Description: A film director, his fiancée, a scriptwriter and a student interact and discuss their emotions, at length.

Title: Sacrificed Youth
Description: A young girl from the city is sent out to work in a village of Dai people in China's cultural revolution. Here she learns to enjoy being young and gains a new outlook on life.

Title: The Last of Philip Banter
Description: An alcoholic partier becomes a paranoid maniac when a manuscript that predicts real-life horrors takes possession of his mind.

Title: Memoirs of a Sinner
Description: A recently resurrected corpse recounts his life story, focusing on his strange relationship with a murderous alter-ego.

Title: A Promise
Description: An old woman has died and her widower with dementia confesses to killing her. After this, the story goes back in time to show the events leading up to her death.

Title: Rao Saheb
Description: Adaptation of a literary work on the slow deterioration of an orthodox family, where the women are unable to achieve emancipation and the men succumb to insanity.

Title: Blue Moon
Description: Zita, a young fashion designer shifts to Berlin. Casually she gets witness of a murder case and gangsters are chasing her brutally.

Title: Kupa kizi
Description: A married woman with problems secretly starts working as a prostitute and lives a double life.

Title: The Smile of the Lamb
Description: Based on a novel by David Grossman.

Title: Chantabbai
Description: A comedy about the famous (Self-proclaimed) detective - James Pond - as he tries to find the lost son of a famous industrialist

Title: Hard Traveling
Description: During the 1930s Great Depression, a widow begins a romance with an uneducated janitor but he is accused of murder as their story is moving forward.

Title: Genesis
Description: A parable of man's exploitation of his fellow man. A weaver and a farmer live peacefully on the edge of a desert until, one day, a woman wanders into their world, and her presence slowly disrupts their routine existence.

Title: Murder in the Dark
Description: A womanizing reporter investigates death of his friend in Copenhagen's sporting district and the detective finds himself caught between clunky ordeals of police and gangsters involved in drug trafficking.

Title: Les longs manteaux
Description: A reporter becomes involved with a band of terrorists hiding in the mountains between Peru and Bolivia.

Title: Undercover Gang
Description: Four kids witness an arsonist start a fire, but no one believes them.

Title: Corps et biens
Description: The romantic and cruel escapades of a gigolo and a mysterious woman.

Title: Kidnapped
Description: In Scotland in 1751, young David Balfour is shanghaied aboard a ship where he meets Jacobite rebel Alan Breck Stewart with whom he escapes to the Scottish Highlands, dodging the redcoats.

Title: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
Description: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

Title: Mon cas
Description: Four versions of the same story, first in the perspective of a theatre play, second in the perspective of a silent film, third in the perspective of a film of the 50s and finally in a biblical philosophical perspective.

Title: Da obichash na inat
Description: This is a film about the general collision between the generations. The film tells us the story of a 14 year old boy and his father, and the way they fight over all the problems.

Title: Rus iznachalnaya
Description: Action of a picture happens in Ancient Russia (Rus) - in those days when the Slavs who have united in army under leadership of Ratibor, the son Vseslav managed to win the first victories over tribes of nomads.

Title: Huwag mo kaming isumpa
Description: SHOULD A GIRL SUFFER FOR THE THE SINS OF HER FATHER? - A YOUNG MAN AVENGES HIS MOTHER'S FATE IN THE HANDS OF HER PHILANDERING HUSBAND BY SEDUCING THE LATTER'S DAUGHTER FROM AN EARLIER MARRIAGE.

Title: Akli Miklós
Description: A jester's adventures in the court of Franz Joseph I.

Title: Te naddelyaha
Description: The film tells about the organization and activities of the partisan brigade "Chavdar".

Title: Lutra
Description: Egy vidra ilete is egy vadasz szerelme.

Title: Min pappa är Tarzan
Description: Moa is seven years. She lives with her confused mother and her golden hamster. They have just moved into a new house, which is barely half done. New is also the man's her mother one day drags home.

Title: Bitte laßt die Blumen leben
Description: A lawyer who survives a plane crash takes the opportunity to take a new identity and begin a new life.

Title: The New Morning of Billy the Kid
Dziewczeta z Nowolipek
Description: Coming of age story of four girls living in the same poor district of Warsaw just before the outbreak of World War One.

Title: Cudzoziemka
Description: A life story of an unhappy woman violinist, who makes life hell for herself and those around her.

Title: Oi kekarmenoi
Description: March, 1953. The Greek Civil War has ended but its marks are still there. Five soldiers will tell their stories, each one from his side, from the life in a military camp, a miniature of society.

Title: Bilanggo sa dilim
Description: Mike de Leon screen adaptation of John Fowles' creepy film The Collector.

Title: Valkoinen kääpiö
Description: The story of one man's struggle after he gets caught in a nuclear fallout and gets sick with leukemia.

Title: Tommaso Blu
Description: A factory worker in the south of Italy, frustrated by work and marriage, withdraws into nature, but in the search for love and human warmth he ends up "on the dog" in the sense of the word.

Title: Bibi chelchele
Description: Majid is poor and the relationship between him and his parent is not that good and they don't understand each other until Javad meet him and relationship between grows stronger as time goes on.

Title: Dubultnieks
Description: It's been 25 years. Unexpectedly two already grown twin brothers meet. They are united by the mystery of their mother but the desire to know the past brings them even closer together.

Title: Ri Chu
Description: A woman leaves her husband after the death of their son. She becomes a well-known but unhappy courtesan.

Title: Zhena za Monasi
Description: In an outback mountain village in Bulgaria, the main character Monasi is looking for a wife. The movie evolves when he finally finds the wife of his dreams and gets married.

Title: Epizod Berlin West
Description: Jan Bard is a Polish intellectual and writer, leaves for West Berlin. He is working on another novel. In Germany, he meets his old love Iza. She is the ex-wife of the publisher of the Bard's latest novel.

Title: Stepni hora
Description: The taste of adventure, the dynamic narrative, the costumes - all these make the film a real story about love and revenge, honor and justice, wealth and pure love.

Title: Pochti valshebno priklyuchenie
Description: Two city guys meet a strange man. He is a wizard, and he is surrounded by a talking dog and a parrot. Two boys experience unusual adventures-they turn into Indians, princes, magicians.

Title: Shuvoda
Description: This is the story of a struggling women whose husband is an addict, daughter becomes widow after a few days, and with a widowed sister-in-law.

Title: Zielone kasztany
Description: High school student Marek dreams of getting into the Legia professional football team, in spite of numerous obstacles and personal problems.

Title: The Lonely Passion of Brian Moore
Cocoon
Description: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor.

Title: Return to Oz
Description: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

Title: A Room with a View
Description: Lucy meets George in a Florence pensione and the two share a brief romance before Lucy returns home, where she becomes engaged to Cecil. However, it isn't long before George unexpectedly enters her life again.

Title: The Color Purple
Description: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

Title: Silver Bullet
Description: In a small town, brutal killings start to plague the close knit community. Marty Coslaw, a paraplegic boy, is convinced the murders are the doings of a werewolf.

Title: To Live and Die in L.A.
Description: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

Title: Fletch
Description: Irwin M. "Fletch" Fletcher is a newspaper reporter being offered a large sum to off a cancerous millionaire, but is on the run, risking his job and finding clues when it's clear the man is healthy.

Title: Ladyhawke
Description: The thief Gaston escapes the dungeon of medieval Aquila through the latrine. Soldiers are about to kill him when Navarre saves him. Navarre, traveling with his spirited hawk, plans to kill the bishop of Aquila with help from Gaston.

Title: The Black Cauldron
Description: A young boy and a group of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

Title: Brewster's Millions
Description: A minor league baseball player has to spend $30 million in thirty days, in order to inherit $300 million. However, he's not allowed to own any assets, destroy the money, gift it, give it to charity or tell anyone about the deal.

Title: Vision Quest
Description: A high school wrestler in Spokane, Washington has trouble focusing on his training regimen when a beautiful young drifter takes up temporary residence at his home.

Title: Howling II: ... Your Sister Is a Werewolf
Description: A man discovers that his sister was a werewolf, and helps an investigator track down a gang of the monsters through the United States and eastern Europe.

Title: Prizzi's Honor
Description: Two professional assassins fall in love.

Title: Year of the Dragon
Description: A police detective cracks down on organized crime in Chinatown after the murders of Triad and Mafia leaders.

Title: Kiss of the Spider Woman
Description: A gay man and a political prisoner are together in a prison. The gay man narrates the stories of two fake movies and his own life.

Title: Remo Williams: The Adventure Begins
Description: An officially "dead" cop is trained to become an extraordinary unique assassin in service of the US President.

Title: My Life as a Dog
Description: A boy and his brother don't get along well. In order to let their ill mother rest, they're separated and sent each one with their relatives.

Title: The Quiet Earth
Description: A man named Zac Hobson awakens to find himself alone in the world. In a desperate attempt to search for others, he finds only two who have their own agenda.

Title: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
Vampire Hunter D
Description: When Doris Lang is chosen as the next bride for the vampire Count Magnus Lee, she will hire a mysterious vampire hunter known only as D in an attempt to escape her ill-gotten fate.

Title: King Solomon's Mines
Description: Fortune hunter Allan Quatermain teams up with a resourceful woman to help her find her missing father lost in the wilds of 1900s Africa while being pursued by hostile tribes and a rival German explorer.

Title: Desert Hearts
Description: While waiting for her divorce papers, a repressed professor of literature is unexpectedly seduced by a carefree, spirited young lesbian.

Title: Fortress
Description: An Australian school teacher and her students are kidnapped. She and the children fight for their lives and try to escape from their captors.

Title: That Was Then... This Is Now
Description: Two juvenile delinquents find themselves growing apart, for one is growing up, and the other is staying young and reckless.

Title: Gymkata
Description: An American gymnast travels to a foreign country to compete in a deadly game not won by anyone other than a native in more than 900 years.

Title: Burning Flowers
Description: The film is about the teenager Hermann (Hølmebakk) who develops a relationship with the middle-aged Rosa (Fjeldstad).

Title: The Mean Season
Description: When a teenager is shot at the beach, a journalist from The Miami Journal is sent to cover the story. He's called by the murderer and told there'll be four more.

Title: The Holcroft Covenant
Description: The son of a German General becomes part of a mysterious conspiracy to gain hidden Nazi funds.

Title: Hold-Up
Description: A bank in Montréal is held up by Grimm (dressed as clown) and Co. Escaping a bank surrounded by cops is the easy part.

Title: Creator
Description: An eccentric scientist teaches a student in his own manner while he looks for a way to clone his deceased wife.

Title: King David
Description: The Biblical story of Israel's greatest King.

Title: The Doctor and the Devils
Description: In Victorian England, two grave robbers supply a wealthy doctor with bodies to research anatomy on, but greed causes them to look for a more simple way to get the job done. Based on the horrifying Burke and Hare case.

Title: The Aviator
Description: A 1920s mail pilot and a rich man's daughter crash-land on a mountain full of hungry wolves.

Title: Compromising Positions
Description: An ex-newspaper woman who is now a suburban housewife can't resist getting involved in an investigation of the murder of a philandering dentist who had been having affairs with several of her neighbors.

Title: Lamb
Description: An Irish reform school priest questions his calling as a young, epileptic runaway arrives. Each recognizes the other as kindred spirits and escape together. As police close in and money dwindles, the desperate priest makes bad decisions.

Title: Stick
Description: Released from prison, Stick meets up with a friend and joins him on a job delivering a bag. His friend gets killed in the setup. Stick gets away and is ready to forget all and see his daughter, but they won't forget.

Title: Wild Geese II
Description: A group of mercenaries is hired to spring Rudolf Hess from Spandau Prison in Berlin.

Title: He Died with His Eyes Open
De leeuw van Vlaanderen
Description: A tale centered on the Battle of the Golden Spurs in 1302 where the Flemish rank and file won a major victory over the glorious French knights.

Title: Bad Medicine
Description: Unable to gain acceptance into an American medical school, aspiring physician Jeff Marx studies abroad in a small Latin American medical program run by the country's dictator.

Title: Maxie
Description: A 1920s flapper who haunts her old house possesses a reserved housewife who just moved in. However, she cannot leave before she receives her massive audition for a Hollywood studio.

Title: Kenji Miyazawa's Night on the Galactic Railroad
Description: Two kittens go on a metaphysical journey on a magical railroad train.

Title: Time of Wickedness
Description: Filled with guilt over his forbidden desires, young man leaves home and his studies. He finds a new smaller place to stay, a low-paying but satisfying job and a girlfriend. Then his mother, unable to fight her forbidden desires, shows up.

Title: Code Name: Emerald
Description: Emerald is an agent the Germans "have" inside allied intelligence 1944/WWII. With "help" from Emerald, the Germans catch Wheeler, believed to know the when and where of D-Day. Emerald is sent to be Wheeler's cell mate. Let the game begin.

Title: Land of Doom
Description: Earth has been ravaged by a nuclear war, and a feminist warrior is forced to join up with a soldier of fortune in her journey to find a rumored "paradise" as they battle gangs of rampaging bandits.

Title: Bliss
Description: After a near-death experience, a man wonders if he actually did die and is now in Hell.

Title: The Assisi Underground
Description: A simple friar and a local bishop set up a pipeline for hundreds of Jews to hide and escape the Nazis in World War II Assisi.

Title: Bettada Hoovu
Description: Ramu, a poor boy, has higher ambitions in life. He works hard and saves money to buy a book. But, situations drive him to take a hard decision when his family members suffer in cold weather.

Title: Orions belte
Description: A group of seamen from Norway find a Soviet listening station and they become targets for both America and Russia. Another cold war takes place.

Title: Cop Au Vin
Description: In a small provincial French town, Dr Morasseau, Mr Lavoisier and butcher Filiol decide to create a significant estate business but Mrs Cuno and her son Louis do not want to sell their house. Louis presumably provokes the death of Filiol.

Title: Moy drug Ivan Lapshin
Description: Russian provincial town in the middle of the 1930s Stalin's Great Purge. Ivan Lapshin, the head of the local police, does what he has to do. And he does it well.

Title: Otra vuelta de tuerca
Description: A sexually conflicted young man is hired to take care of two orphaned siblings in a remote seaside mansion, and soon realizes that the ghosts of two former servants are trying to possess the children.

Title: A Killing Affair
Description: The story of a widow (in West Virginia) who takes in a drifter who she believes killed her husband. She begins to fall for him but cannot be sure if she should trust him.

Title: Joshua Then and Now
Description: The story of a Jewish writer, from his life as a young boy in Montreal to his more complicated grown-up life.

Title: She'll Be Wearing Pink Pyjamas
Description: Eight women attend one of Britain's toughest survival schools to challenge themselves and conquer their fears. They learn that there is more to survival than passing the course.

Title: Zuma
Description: Zuma is a movie remake of one of the oldest and most popular comic books in the Philippines. It stars Zuma, a creature donning a snake over his shoulder which perfectly accentuates his monster-like features.

Title: Flower and Snake: Sketch of Hell
Description: Kaori Aso lives in the wealthy family. She cheated her stepmother that she has been kidnapped by somebody. Unfortunately, Aso's accomplice really does kidnap her and her stepmother.

Title: Life Is Beautiful
Description: Sick with the system he works in, the engineer stops the train in the middle of nowhere. The passengers decide to spend time in a local café and their arguments lead to violence.

Title: Dust
Description: A South African spinster (Jane Birkin) murders her father (Trevor Howard) after he rapes the wife of the black foreman for his plantation.

Title: Tristesse et beauté
Description: Hugo is a writer whose one great book was based on an affair he had with Lea, a sculptor. Bereft of inspiration for a follow-up, Hugo returns years later to rekindle the flame of romance and creativity.

Title: Déjà Vu
Description: A writer who believes that he was reincarnated believes that his present fiancée possesses the soul of his fiancée in his previous life, a ballerina.

Title: The Naked Country
Description: A rancher comes in conflict with a gang of renegade Aborigines on the run from their tribe's posse. They try to kill him, but he gets away and hides in the woods. His posh wife and her lover, a local alcoholic cop, go to rescue him.

Title: The Treasure of Swamp Castle
Description: In the turmoilous 18th century, young poor Hungarian aristocrat Jonas helps Szaffi, a young pretty gypsy Romani girl and the illegitimate daughter of a Turkish pasha, get the treasure that's owed to her by the right of inheritance.

Title: L'arbre sous la mer
Description: A young geologist lands on a Greek island. He falls under the spell of a mysterious young woman.

Title: Naerata ometi
Description: A sensitive girl struggles with first love and bullying in a 1980's Soviet orphanage.

Title: The Lover
Description: Gabriel makes arrangement with garage-owner Adam to pay for repairs to his grandmother's car by giving his depressed wife French lessons. But the relationship goes beyond that of teacher and pupil as a passionate love affair develops.

Title: Wuthering Heights
Description: Mistreated foundling Heathcliff and his stepsister Catherine fall in love, but when she marries a wealthy man, he becomes obsessed with getting revenge, even well into the next generation.

Title: Le due vite di Mattia Pascal
Description: Unlike in the previous 3 adaptations of the book,here Mattia narrates in flashback,back at his library job in his village,how he changed his name when mistakenly thought dead and tried to start a new life in Rome.

Title: Usugeshô
Description: A man who is jailed for murdering his family after he confessed, escapes. His only chance at freedom is his new love interest that tries to shield him from the authorities.

Title: The Empty Beach
Description: A down-on-his-luck P.I. is hired by a beautiful woman to find her missing husband who disappeared after receiving some tapes.

Title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
Description: In 1866, a sea monster is hunting the depths of the oceans and rising only to attack and destroy military ships. Experts around the world are trying to discover the identity of the monster and destroy it before even more lives are lost.

Title: The Burmese Harp
Description: After becoming separated from his platoon, a Japanese soldier dons a Buddhist monk's robe and tends to the bodies of the many war casualties strewn across the countryside.

Title: Ciuleandra
Description: After he kills his beloved wife, Puiu Faranga is helped by his father to fake insanity.

Title: Kai
Description: The story of Iwago, a troubled Japanese man who has grave personal problems and strained relationships with his wife and step children.

Title: Réquiem por un campesino español
Description: Paco is a young peasant who joins the Republican Party just before the start of the Spanish Civil War, only to become involved in that awful conflict.

Title: L'homme aux yeux d'argent
Description: After serving his sentence, a robber returns to his small, quiet hometown to retrieve the loot. But a ruthless Police inspector and his equally nasty young subordinate are after the criminal.

Title: Capone Cries a Lot
Description: Umiemon is a naniwa-bushi singer who travels with his wife to the United States in hopes of achieving fame and fortune.

Title: Came a Hot Friday
Description: This eccentric rural New Zealand tale follows two con men as they attempt to trick a small town into their illegal gambling scheme.

Title: Hodja from Pjort
Description: Adventure film about the boy Hodja who gets a magic carpet of a wise old carpet man. A wicked and desirous of power sultan will get their hands on the carpet.

Title: Papa Was a Preacher
Description: A minister, his wife and their large family are moved from Dallas to a needy rural church in 1950s Texas.

Title: Scemo di guerra
Description: The medical sub-lieutenant Marcello Lupi, endowed with a great humanity and common sense, at the end of 1940 was assigned to a health section installed near the oasis of Sorman, Libya and commanded by Major Bellucci.

Title: Urgence
Description: A reporter discovers a neo-fascist conspiracy.

Title: Kuei-mei, a Woman
Description: This film tells of a woman's never-ending struggle to keep herself and her family fed and clothed.

Title: For Kayako
Description: A film about the substantial population of Koreans living in Japan, and the love affair between Kayako, a Japanese girl, and Im, a Korean.

Title: Escalier C
Description: Foster, a cynical art critic, becomes more human thanks to his relationship with the young homosexual Claude.

Title: Morenga
Description: Set in 1904, this is an uneven tale of war and intrigue between native South Africans, German colonialists, and British colonialists, a war no one really wins.

Title: Voyage of the Young Composer
Description: In 1905, young composer Nikusha, travels to the villages of a post-revolutionary Georgia to collect folk songs.

Title: Luna caliente
Description: Returning to Argentina, an engineer trained in Europe visiting a friend of his father and meets the teenage daughter, who begins a relationship of love and passion.

Title: Pasácek z doliny
Description: The film is set in 1947 Beskydy. It follows a 10 year old boy who regularly shepherds cows next to a destroyed German tank.

Title: Das Mal des Todes
Description: A beautiful, nameless woman is hired to spend several days and nights with a man in his apartment. Not only does he want to sleep with her, but he is obsessed with the desire to look at her naked body.

Title: Der Schneemann
Description: Siegfried Blum is a small scale criminal, who happens to gain possession of 2 kg Cocaine. When he tries to turn it into cash, he learns that this kind of business is much too big for him.

Title: Kára plná bolesti
Description: The fate of people in cruel conditions. A dramatic story of two poor bachelors in a Slovak village during the fight against fascism. The struggle for survival becomes the most difficult test of character and human heroism.

Title: Na istarski nacin
Description: An insight into multi-layered relations between natives and newcomers in the town of Pula following WWII and departure of Angloamerican forces.

Title: Sem stikhiy
Description: An alien from a long-dead planet comes to Earth to spread the message of the Seven Elements: Earth, Water, Air, Fire, Life, Intellect, and Love.

Title: The Dream
Description: On the turn of the 20th century, in Netherlands, three socialist activists and brothers are imprisoned for a crime they didn't commit. The prosecutor tries to get to the truth, but their comrades and others betray them.

Title: Pobeda
Description: 30 years after the end of World War II, a Soviet and an American journalist meet again for realizing post-war paths of their countries.

Title: Le caviar rouge
Description: Russian spy boss in Geneva spends a night interrogating two spies to see who is a traitor.

Title: Bambi's Childhood
Description: A Soviet take of Felix Saltens classic story of Bambi.

Title: Smartta mozhe da pochaka
Description: Two orphans, a 18-year-old prostitute and her long-lost brother, go to the capital to start a new life. They fall into the hands of morality police inspector Meranzov - a cynic who knows all about the insignificance of human nature.

Title: Havlandet
