Description: Famine and poverty is their every day life in the 1860s on the farm. One day their uncle from the north and tells wonderful things about their lives up there, making young Heiki go to see the Northern lights.

Title: Ni avec toi ni sans toi
Description: Pierre and Mathilde meet again after having been separated for ten years. They realize that they can not live without each other, but not under the same roof.

Title: Hong yi shao nu
Description: Sixteen-year-old An-ran gets into repeated trouble because she refuses blind obedience to authority, openly challenging and correcting a teacher who makes a mistake in class. She is different.

Title: Um Filme 100% Brasileiro
Description: French poet Blaise Cendrars arrives by sea on the city of Rio de Janeiro and lives s life of bohemian parties during the celebration of carnaval.

Title: Kobieta z prowincji
Description: A look back at the life of an ordinary 60-year-old woman named Andzia. Although she has faced numerous difficulties, she has always tried to do her best for the sake of her two children.

Title: Flores robadas en los jardines de Quilmes
Description: After a chance meeting, two former lovers look back on their relationship.

Title: Pobojowisko
Description: Soon after the end of the war, a former officer moves to a small seaside town in the Recovered Lands. The situation in this post-German territory is still unsettled.

Title: Dune
Description: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis to free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

Title: Once Upon a Time in America
Description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

Title: The NeverEnding Story
Description: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

Title: 2010: The Year We Make Contact
Description: A joint USA-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn exactly what happened to the "Discovery" and its H.A.L. 9000 computer.

Title: Firestarter
Description: A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telepathic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.

Title: Against All Odds
Description: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

Title: The Natural
Description: A middle-aged unknown comes seemingly out of nowhere to become a legendary baseball player with almost supernatural talent.

Title: The Cotton Club
Description: Meet the jazz musicians, dancers, owner and guests (e.g. gangster Dutch Schultz) of The Cotton Club in 1928-30s Harlem.

Title: Birdy
Description: After two friends return home from the Vietnam War one becomes mentally unstable and obsesses with becoming a bird.

Title: The Hotel New Hampshire
Description: The film talks about a family that weathers all sorts of disasters and keeps going in spite of it all. It is noted for its wonderful assortment of oddball characters.

Title: A Passage to India
Description: Cultural mistrust and false accusations doom a friendship in British colonial India between an Indian doctor, an Englishwoman engaged to marry a city magistrate, and an English educator.

Title: Razorback
Description: As a vicious wild boar terrorizes the Australian outback, the husband of one of the victims is joined by a hunter and a farmer in a search for the beast.

Title: The Evil That Men Do
Description: A professional killer comes out of retirement to investigate and avenge the brutal murder of an old friend.

Title: All of Me
Description: A dying millionaire has her soul transferred into a younger, willing woman. However, something goes wrong, and she finds herself in her lawyer's body - together with the lawyer.

Title: The Razor's Edge
Description: He had everything and wanted nothing. He learned that he had nothing and wanted everything. He saved the world and then it shattered. The path to enlightenment is as sharp and narrow as a razor's edge.

Title: The Pope of Greenwich Village
Description: Two cousins unknowingly rob the mob and face the dangerous consequences.

Title: Under the Volcano
Description: A day in the life of a self-destructive British consul in Mexico on the eve of World War II.

Title: Ordeal by Innocence
Description: Dr Calgary returns home from an expedition and goes looking for a hitchhiker whom he gave a lift to two years previously in order to return the man's address book. He discovers the man has been executed for his mother's murder.

Title: She
Description: In a post-apocalyptic world, She aids two brothers' quest to rescue their kidnapped sister. Along the way, they battle weird creatures before standing against the odds to defeat the evil Norks.

Title: Flashpoint
Description: Two U.S. border patrolmen find a buried 20+ year old jeep in the desert with a skeleton, riffle and $800,000. They keep the money. Suddenly, the FBI shows a lot of interest in the car.

Title: Best Defense
Description: A military weapons engineer struggles to do his job responsibly, while a hapless tank commander has to live with the consequences in combat years later.

Title: Where the Boys Are
Description: Four college coeds, travel to Fort Lauderdale for their Easter week of Spring Break, and become involved in a series of adventures and misadventures.

Title: The Little Drummer Girl
Description: An American actress with a penchant for lying is forcibly recruited by Mossad, the Israeli intelligence agency, to trap a Palestinian bomber, by pretending to be the girlfriend of his dead brother.

Title: Year of the Jellyfish
Description: Chris, a sexy teenager who appears mostly bare-breasted on the French Riviera, has a crush on Romain, her mother's lover. In reaction to her inability to attract his attention, she experiments with other risque affairs.

Title: The Bostonians
Description: A Boston feminist and a conservative Southern lawyer contend for the heart and mind of a beautiful and bright girl unsure of her future.

Title: The Naked Face
Description: A Chicago psychoanalyst's patient and secretary are murdered and he becomes the police's prime suspect despite his claims that someone is trying to frame him.

Title: Alphabet City
Description: A New York City drug dealer decides to get out of the business, but has to flee from mobsters.

Title: The Shooting Party
Description: While Europe stands on the brink of World War I in Autumn 1913, Sir Randolph Nettleby hosts a weekend of shooting on his estate for European aristocrats.

Title: The Ambassador
Description: An American ambassador to Israel tries to bring peace to the Middle East conflict through unconventional methods, but his efforts are hampered at every turn and his personal life threatened.

Title: Ciske the Rat
Description: A poor 11-year-old schoolboy with a heart of gold grows up in 1930s Amsterdam.

Title: Cheech & Chong's the Corsican Brothers
Description: Superfecund twins Louis and Lucien, who can feel pain from each other's injuries, revolt against a tyrannical regent who holds France under his iron fist.

Title: Kaos
Description: Five stories by Luigi Pirandello set in turn-of-the-century Italy.

Title: A Sunday in the Country
Description: An elderly painter whose son visits with his family on the weekends, is also surprised by a visit from his still-single daughter.

Title: Carmen
Description: In 1820s Spain the soldier Don José falls in love with the fiery and charismatic factory worker Carmen. Conflicts and grievances multiply, however, as it becomes apparent their views on love and commitment are fundamentally incompatible.

Title: Oh, God! You Devil
Description: George Burns returns as God, and as Satan. They battle over the soul of a young rock star who is willing to sell his soul to the devil.

Title: The Vultures
Description: In 1943 in Tunisia, a unit of the French Foreign Legion fights the Germans over possession of a bank treasure in gold bars.

Title: The Holy Innocents
Description: Spain, 1960s. People from a very poor family work in the country, at the service of a rich family of landowners...

Title: Misunderstood
Description: Busy and often absent father must take care of his two boys after his wife dies. They all live in Tunisia because of their father's job. The older boy is handling the difficult changes much better than the younger one.

Title: Farewell to the Ark
Description: A surreal, isolated village sees its inhabitants gradually leave behind their mutual traditions and superstitions as they leave for the city. Among them are two cousins who love each other and who get into a quarrel with other villagers.

Title: The Twin
Description: Matthias Duval is in love, but he can't choose between the two twin sisters Betty and Liz Kerner. To pick up the two sisters, he invents his own twin brother and will play both characters.

Title: Lady Libertine
Description: Tale of erotic romance in turn of the century England.

Title: Conan the Future Boy: The Big Giant Robot's Resurrection
Chuchelo
Description: Unpopular girl being bullied in her class.

Title: Slagskämpen
Description: "The Inside Man" is based on a real-life incident during the days of the Cold War when a Soviet submarine was spotted in Swedish waters.

Title: Das Eismeer ruft
Description: 1934 in Prague in Czechoslovakia, several children set forth to save the shipwrecked passengers who are on brash ice in the Arctic Ocean.

Title: Memed My Hawk
Description: In 1920s Turkey, young peasant Memed elopes with beautiful Hatche, who was promised in an arranged marriage to the local potentate Abdi Aga's son, and later joins a group of bandits.

Title: Secret Places
Description: Secret Places follows the story of schoolgirls in England during WW2.

Title: Class Relations
Description: After making the domestic servant pregnant, a woman who doubles his age, a young man of only seventeen years from the German bourgeoisie is sent by his family to the United States in order to avoid a huge scandal.

Title: Una
Description: A romantic thoughtful interview intended student list entirely changed the lives of two people, professors and eminent students.

Title: Bandhana
Description: A doctor falls in love with his student.

Title: Tutku
Description: When a mother and daughter fall in love with the same man, things get out of control.

Title: Frankenstein 90
Description: An obsessed scientist assembles a living being from parts of exhumed corpses.

Title: Love in a Fallen City
Description: A cynical playboy pursues an introverted divorcee in the decadence of Hong Kong on the eve of the 1941 Japanese invasion.

Title: Tengoku ni ichiban chikai shima
Description: A high school girl travels to the island of New Caledonia and has magical adventures.

Title: Thieves After Dark
Description: A couple goes on the run after being accused for a crime they didn't commit.

Title: Pallet on the Floor
Description: Rape, murder and blackmail result when the town's most beautiful woman gets married.

Title: The Silent One
Description: A mythological children's tale about the friendship between a deaf mute boy, Jonasi, and a rare white turtle.

Title: Le bon plaisir
Description: In Paris, a women's bag, which contains an embarrassing letter from the french president, is stolen.

Title: Kill the Referee
Description: Michel,a referee has to suffer the consequences of having whistled a penalty against a team which is supported by football hooligans.

Title: Os Trapalhões e o Mágico de Oróz
Kung mahawi man ang ulap
Description: Catherine goes through all the travails of a young woman, who had to deal with a scheming stepfather out to dupe her of her inheritance.

Title: Polar
Description: A private detective ponders another profession until a mysterious woman hires him to solve her roommate's murder.

Title: Memórias do Cárcere
Description: Graciliano Ramos' period he spent in prison after being considered a subversive element by the government.

Title: Other Halves
Description: A middle-class woman and Maori boy who lives on the streets meet in drug rehab and kindle a friendship.

Title: Últimas tardes con Teresa
Description: A handsome hoodlum charms his way into the life of a pretty rich girl in 1950s Barcelona.

Title: Le matelot 512
Description: Max, who dreams of adventures, abandons his studies at 18 to become involved in the navy. He becomes the sailor 512.

Title: Mahjong Horoki
Description: A mahjong neophyte loses everything to game master only to hone his skills, take on all challenges and plan for an ultimate revenge match.

Title: Whale Hunting
Description: A disillusioned student meets a eccentric beggar and a mute prostitute he falls in love with. Together, without money, they cross South Korea to help the girl go home.

Title: Barbarous Street
Description: Daniel Chetman is tired of the violent neighborhood, and takes on the local gangster Mathias Hagen and his tugs.

Title: The Winds of Jarrah
Description: Australia 1946. A young woman escapes from an unhappy affair to become tutor to three children who are being raised by their uncle.

Title: The Street of Desire
Description: A valet at a fancy nightclub hatches a plot to punish those responsible for his father's death.

Title: Moord in Extase
Description: De Cock & Vledder investigate the robbery of an armored truck which leads to several murders.

Title: Reflections
Description: A stoic historian rents a lodge for the summer in the idyllic Irish countryside to finish his biography of Sir Isaac Newton, but his attention refocuses on his landlords, the dysfunctional lower-upper class Lawless family.

Title: Challenge
Description: The story of a young un-employed youth, who instead of despairing uses his skills to earn tons of money to show to the world that anything is possible if there is will to do it.

Title: El señor Galíndez
Description: Two men who do dirty work for a mysterious Mr. Galíndez, whom they have never seen, are asked to train a new recruit.

Title: Appassionata
Description: Tsuya Shimamura, is born in Kyoto as the second daughter of a tea trader who dies before her birth. Tsuya, who loves painting more than anything and is hopeless at housework, attends art school.

Title: Les cavaliers de l'orage
Description: A married polish doctor has a lover who disappears at the Battle of the Dardanelles in 1915.

Title: Xin fei hu wai chuan
Description: In the great tradition of Hsu Tseng Hung's The Silver Fox and Chang Cheh's Lengend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between all the clan leaders and certain death is one young woman.

Title: Bhat Dey
Description: A story of poverty and hunger.

Title: Flight to Berlin
Description: A woman is being taken from her German hotel to be interrogated by police agents.

Title: Surorile
Description: The life of three sisters during WW2 and after the installation of the communist regime.

Title: Dirty Story
Description: The director of one of Finland's largest company, United Metal, discovers the company's Chairman dead in the office. A chain of bribes unravels.

Title: Annas Mutter
Description: Based on the real case of Marianna Bachmeier from 1981, the film tells the story of a mother calmly and resolutely firing seven shots at the killer of her little daughter Anna in the courtroom.

Title: John the Fearless
Description: Sailor Jan/John cleans up his home town plagued by thieves and becomes known as fearless. His jealous cousin tries to scare him, but things end badly. Now an outlaw, John teams up with a local servant to slay a shapeshifting demon.

Title: Kun Hunttalan Matti Suomen osti
Description: An arrogant and self-confident businessman tries to assure people of a small village that he can turn the village's economy better with planning new factories.

Title: Strikebound
Description: The dramatised story of a coal-miners' strike in 1930s Australia, in the small south Gippsland town of Korumburra. The story is told through the struggles of Agnes and Wattie Doig, two Scottish immigrants, who were real people.

Title: Sudden Love
Description: Still reluctant to call it quits on her dying marriage, a conventional Athenian housewife gets caught up in a whirlwind romance with a successful man. Will this deliciously dangerous affair lead to true love or sharp disappointment?

Title: Skazka o tsare Saltane
Description: Czar marries one of three sisters and they have a son. The other two consumed by jealousy throw the girl and the boy into the sea. They end up on an island where the boy meets a magical swan who grants wishes. The boy uses three.

Title: Crónica dos Bons Malandros
Description: Living in expeditions, a gang of friendly Malandro Lisboetas is one day contacted by mysterious Italian (from the Mafia, it is assumed) to steal part of the Lalique Collection, at the Calouste Gulbenkian Foundation Museum.

Title: Don Chisciotte
Description: A self-proclaimed "knight" and his hapless squire travel the Spanish countryside, attacking "giants" that are really windmills in his attempt to win the love of the fair Dulcinea.

Title: De mica en mica s'omple la pica
Cuarteles de invierno
Description: A boxer and a singer are hired by the Armed Forces to entertain the people of a small town. When their personalities and principles get them in trouble with the authorities, they support each other as they face their destiny.

Title: The Mirror
Description: A man who killed the son of the owner of the land they worked on for hanging on his wife, bury him in the barn. From this moment on, a spiritually tense process begins for the man and his wife.

Title: Huckleberry no Bouken
Description: The adventures of an orphan boy Huckleberry and an escaped slave together on a raft along the Mississippi.

Title: Atómstöðin
Description: "The Atom Station" deals with the most controversial issue in Iceland after World War II: the attitude towards the NATO base in Keflavik.

Title: The Old Curiosity Shop
Description: The classic fictional tale of the adventures of Little Nell and her grandfather have been brought to the screen in this high quality entertaining animated feature for your kids and family.

Title: Angela's War
Description: Angela serves during Finland's Continuation War (1941-1944) as a nurse at a war hospital. There she meets Thomas Schmidt, a German officer who, in part, lost his memory due to her injuries. They fall in love.

Title: Among the Cinders
Description: Teen Nick is estranged from his family, and blaming himself for his Maori mate's climbing death. He runs away to his straight talking grandfather - who takes him bush - and loses his virginity to Sally.

Title: Hare tokidoki satsujin
Description: Kanako returns from the USA to a troubled mother who witnessed a man leaving a murder scene and is consequently under persistent threat. For the time being.

Title: Sista leken
Description: Viktor heads off for his usual summer vacation to some islands where he can ostensibly look for antiques for his wife's shop in Stockholm. Once on the islands, he makes friends with a little girl.

Title: Papirfuglen
Description: The young Oslo lawyer Helen sees a man fall from a balcony, and realizes afterwards it's her father. Suicide or murder?

Title: I kathodos ton 9
Description: Near the end of the Greek Civil War the last DSE rebels of the Taygetus mountain range try to reach the sea alive.

Title: El juguete rabioso
Description: Silvio, a young poet and inventor, struggles to find employment and to give meaning to his life.

Title: Der Mann mit dem Ring im Ohr
Hissatsu!: Sure Death!
Description: A group of seemingly ordinary merchants is really a band of assassins for hire. When they discover that all the assassins in Edo are being killed they must act quickly to find the culprit.

Title: Malkiyat Sodom
Description: The years after the First World War. Captain Abarov sees that his dreams, feelings, and ideals are in ruins. His family is broken. His friends are desperate. There is only one way out for Abarov-to leave this world.

Title: Min farmors hus
Description: A century ago a nanny brings a 6 y.o. to his wealthy grandmother in Copenhagen. His father is too busy and his mother has just died. He loves his nanny but hates his grandmother, who cares more about appearances than for him.

Title: Bangkang papel sa dagat ng apoy
Description: UNFAIR LABOR PRACTICES ARE EXPOSED BUT GIVEN A TRADITIONAL SOLUTION IN THIS OTHERWISE ERAP ACTION FILM.

Title: Delo 205/1913
Description: The film traces the last year of the life of the great Bulgarian poet Peio Yavorov. A real love tragedy started from the shot that took the life of the poet's wife to the last moment of Yavorov's life.

Title: Unikum
Description: Mixture of social satire and fantasy, in which a worker at a science research facility uses his newfound ability to transmit his dreams and sets up a business to sell them to a sleeping audience.

Title: Chandranath
Description: A story of the superstition of low cast.

Title: The Outsiders
Description: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.

Title: Scarface
Description: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

Title: Christine
Description: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

Title: The Hunger
Description: A love triangle develops between a beautiful yet dangerous vampire, her cellist companion, and a gerontologist.

Title: A Christmas Story
Description: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

Title: Octopussy
Description: A fake Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

Title: Jaws 3-D
Description: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.

Title: Cujo
Description: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

Title: The Dead Zone
Description: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

Title: Something Wicked This Way Comes
Description: In a small American town, a diabolical circus and its demonic proprietor prey on the townsfolk.

Title: Terms of Endearment
Description: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.

Title: Rumble Fish
Description: Absent-minded street thug Rusty James struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days of gang warfare.

Title: The Keep
Description: Nazis are forced to turn to a Jewish historian for help in battling the ancient demon they have inadvertently freed from its prison.

Title: The Lonely Lady
Description: Hoping to achieve success in Hollywood, a young aspiring screenwriter allows others to exploit her. She goes through affair after sordid affair in her attempt to write her own screenplay and have it produced.

Title: Yor: The Hunter from the Future
Description: A warrior seeks his true origins in a seemingly prehistoric wasteland.

Title: The Key
Description: In 1940s Venice, after twenty years of marriage, a Professor and his younger wife witness the passion wane. Now, all that remains is to confess the rousing thoughts to an elaborate diary hoping to break free from ties and inhibitions.

Title: Merry Christmas Mr. Lawrence
Description: During W.W. II, a British colonel tries to bridge the cultural divides between a British P.O.W. and the Japanese camp commander in order to avoid blood-shed.

Title: Eddie and the Cruisers
Description: A television newswoman picks up the story of a 1960s rock band whose long-lost leader Eddie Wilson may still be alive, while searching for the missing tapes of the band's never-released album.

Title: One Deadly Summer
Description: Oozing sensuality, a young woman arrives in a small town and gets married to the local mechanic. Was it love at first sight? What links her enigmatic presence to the family's piano? Is it curiosity or is it something far more sinister?

Title: Doctor Detroit
Description: A pimp on the run trusts his sex workers to a meek professor of literature, who accepts the challenge.

Title: Gorky Park
Description: A Moscow police officer investigates a vicious triple homicide and stumbles upon a high-level international political conspiracy.

Title: The Osterman Weekend
Description: During the Cold War, a controversial television journalist is asked by the C.I.A. to persuade certain acquaintances, who are Soviet Agents of the Omega network, to defect.

Title: The 4th Man
Description: A man who has been having visions of an impending danger begins an affair with a woman who may lead him to his doom.

Title: House of the Long Shadows
Description: An American author finds a dilapidated Welsh manor perfect for writing until the residents host a bizarre family reunion.

Title: High Road to China
Description: During WW1, an alcoholic American biplane pilot is hired by the spoiled daughter of an industrialist to find her father who disappeared in Asia.

Title: Le ruffian
Description: Aldo, in his fifties, works in a gold mine in Northern Canada, in the middle of a bunch of adventurers.

Title: Stroker Ace
Description: The title character, a popular NASCAR driver, clashes with the fried-chicken mogul that sponsors his racing team.

Title: Nana
Description: A beautiful and willful prostitute puts her appearance and body to use to become the toast of the town.

Title: Of Unknown Origin
Description: A man becomes destructively obsessed with killing a dangerous rat, which has taken residence in his recently renovated house.

Title: Without a Trace
Description: Estranged New Yorker (Kate Nelligan) turns to police after son disappears.

Title: Beyond the Limit
Description: During Dirty War, half-English doctor in Argentina befriends the police, the rebels and the alcoholic Honorary British Consul, whose Latino wife he seduces. When the consul is mistakenly kidnapped by the rebels, he must pick a side.

Title: The Lords of Discipline
Description: In 1960s America, a black cadet is allowed acceptance into a seemingly prestigious military academy, unleashing a barrage of corruption within the system that another cadet is willing to expose.

Title: Reuben, Reuben
Description: A drunken Scottish poet, who has not written a word in years, feels compelled to regain control of his life and work after meeting a beautiful young woman.

Title: Daniel
Description: Daniel Isaacson attempts to determine the true complicity of his parents Paul and Rochelle Isaacson, who were executed for espionage in the 1950s.

Title: Heat and Dust
Description: Anne is investigating the life of her grand-aunt Olivia, whose destiny has always been shrouded with scandal. As Anne delves into the history of her grand-aunt, she is led to reconsider her own life.

Title: El Sur
Description: A woman reflects on her childhood relationship with her father, attempting to understand the depths of his despair and the truth of his myths.

Title: The Jigsaw Man
Description: An MI6 defector has his appearance altered by the K.G.B. and is sent back to Britain to retrieve top-secret documents.

Title: The Moon in the Gutter
Description: He is a revenge-obssessed stevedore whose sister was brutally raped and murdered. She is a wealthy, elusive woman. They try hard to get together... or do they?

Title: The Black Stallion Returns
Description: A teenager loses his horse in Morocco and gets him back after various daredevil adventures.

Title: Savage Attraction
Description: Horrific true tale set in late-1970s Australia and later West Germany about an abused wife who learns in horror that her sadistic German-born husband is actually a fanatical neo-Nazi.

Title: Slayground
Description: Thieves run over a child while escaping after a robbery. A deadly hitman who likes to taunt his targets is hired to track them down. Stone moves to England, but the assassin follows. Loosely based on Donald Westlake's cult crime novel.

Title: Crime and Punishment
Description: An adaptation of Dostoyevsky's novel, set in modern Helsinki. Slaughterhouse worker Rahikainen murders a man, and is forced to live with the consequences of his actions.

Title: Night of Open Sex
Description: A beautiful and erotic cabaret dancer Moira is hired to impersonate another woman who turns out to be a secret agent and must receive an important message in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.

Title: Eddie Macon's Run
Description: A young man, harshly sentenced for a few minor infractions, escapes from a prison in Huntsville Texas and flees to Laredo, Texas, where he hopes to cross into Mexico for a reunion with his wife and small son.

Title: A Friend of Vincent
Description: The friendship between two men is put to the test when one of them is accused by a woman of having killed her sister.

Title: The Makioka Sisters
Description: The orphaned Makioka sisters look for a husband for their third sister, Yukiko, as the rebellious youngest sister, Taeko, is kept waiting her turn.

Title: Deadly Circuit
Description: A P.I. is obsessed with a cute woman, who seduces and kills rich men around W. Europe.

Title: Order of Death
Description: A pair of corrupt cops spend their illegal cash on an uptown New York City apartment.

Title: Village of Doom
Description: An emotionally distraught young man goes on a violent killing spree after his tuberculosis keeps him from serving in World War II and is frowned upon by his fellow villagers.

Title: Sugar Cane Alley
Description: Set in 1931, Sugar Cane Alley paints a rich impasto of native life under French colonial rules, filtered through the coming-of-age of a bright, sweetly opportunistic boy.

Title: The Prize of Peril
Description: In a futuristic society, contestants pit their survival skills against each other in a fight to the death for cash prizes, and the contest is aired live on television.

Title: I Am the Cheese
Description: A teenage lad struggles to piece together his reality following a traumatic event.

Title: Now and Forever
Description: A couple's seemingly "perfect" marriage is shaken when the husband is charged with rape.

Title: Revenge in the House of Usher
Description: A young doctor visits the secluded home of his ailing mentor - Eric Usher - who believes the house itself is alive and plotting to drive him insane, manifesting itself through ghostly apparitions.

Title: Toki o kakeru shôjo
Description: A high-school girl acquires the ability to time travel.

Title: Dance of the Dwarfs
Description: An anthropologist hires a down-on-his-luck helicopter pilot to fly her into the jungle, where she is searching for a scientist who is investigating reports of a tribe of reptile-men.

Title: The Ballad of the Valiant Knight Ivanhoe
Topsy Turvy
Description: 1939 pre-WWII Denmark: 17 y.o. Thomas and his conservative parents move in next to a liberal/eccentric family. He vacations with them near the beach and gets to know the same age twins' liberal/erotic ways.

Title: Wu Song
Description: Wu Song is a Chinese legend, one of the 108 heroes of Liangshan, as described in the book The Water Margin. He was known as The tiger killing hero. This movie portrays his personal life and relationship between him and his elder brother.

Title: Au nom de tous les miens
Description: A story of the life of a Polish Jewish Holocaust survivor.

Title: Eine Saison in Hakkari
Description: A urban Turkish teacher is transferred for political reasons to a backward Kurdish village in the mountains near the Iranian border. He is welcomed with distrust, but during that harsh year the mutual cultural misunderstandings fade away.

Title: How I Was Systematically Destroyed by an Idiot
Als je begrijpt wat ik bedoel
Description: Bumble the Bear (Olivier Bommel) finds an egg that, it turns out, has a cute little dragon in it. However, this dinosaur grows huge every time it is upset. As this causes a lot of problems, Ollie Bommel has to face a difficult dilemma.

Title: P & B
Description: Pettersson and Bendel are both worn, run-down and broke. Despite this they decide to start a business and become rich. Unexperienced they are open to any deal. They tamper, scam and exploit loopholes that exist.

Title: Tian can bian
Description: Hsu Shao-chiang stars as a veritable "Spider-Swordsman" - master of the "Silkworm Style" - in this eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts phantasmagorical which truly warrants the description: "unforgettable."

Title: Yôkirô
Description: The loves and tragedies of a geisha in 1933 Japan.

Title: Marvin & Tige
Description: Marvin is a heavy-drinking widower who's seen better days and now ekes out a living at odd jobs. He meets Tige, an 11-year-old boy about to kill himself because his mother has just died. With nowhere else to stay, Tige moves in

Title: J'ai épousé une ombre
Description: After a train accident, a woman survives and is mistaken for an other woman she just met on a train before the accident.

Title: Paano ba ang mangarap?
Description: A young woman suffers such great difficulties in life that she has forgotten how to dream.

Title: Manji
Description: A married kleptomaniac (Sonoko) and a younger woman (Mitsuko) begin an unusual love affair which develops fast into a kinky sexual love triangle when Sonoko's husband gets involved.

Title: Sherlock Holmes and a Study in Scarlet
Description: The great detective investigates a murder that has a far flung revenge motive.

Title: Sherlock Holmes and the Valley of Fear
Description: A withdrawn violinist and smoker met with a doctor and attaches him to the criminal world.

Title: The Sandwich Man
Description: Three vignettes from three different directors that tell stories of ordinary people during Taiwan's Cold War period.

Title: Gospodin za edin den
Description: This film is a comedy about a poor man, named Poorco. Poorco always fails in his attempt to escape from poverty. The film illustrates the social and the moral atmosphere in Bulgaria during the 1930's.

Title: Dusty
Description: The story of a friendship between an older Australian man and his instinctively wild dog.

Title: Equator
Description: Novel-based crime drama about naive Timar, who goes to Gabon, French Equatorial Africa in the 1950s with dreams of making fortune. He's seduced by Adele, a shady owner of a local hotel, Libreville, who uses him to commit murder.

Title: Un dimanche de flic
Description: Frank and Rupert are police commissioners. Fred, a former police officer, is informed that a major heroin and money transaction to take place.

Title: Bearn o la sala de las muñecas
Une jeunesse
Description: After the birthday party of his wife Odile, Louis accompanies a friend to the station. When the train leaves he starts reminiscing about his youth.

Title: Effraction
Description: During a robbery that goes wrong, Valentin Tralande kills his accomplices and bank customers.

Title: Gyoei no mure
Description: A young man tries to overcome the hostility of his girlfriend's father, a tuna fisherman, by getting the older man to teach him the secrets of his dangerous trade.

Title: The Wild Pony
Description: To save her ranch after the accidental death of her husband, a woman marries the man responsible for the mishap.

Title: Innocence
Description: In the 19th century, a country girl is seduced by a young doctor who's staying at her house for a few days, caring for her, and tries to hide the forbidden romance from her father, who disapproves of the relationship.

Title: L'indic
Description: Inspector Bertrand wants to put an end to the criminal activities of Ange Malaggione, the head of the Corsican clan.

Title: Sherlock Holmes and the Sign of Four
Description: When a woman receives a message apparently from the sender of a series of valuable pearls after the disappearance of her father, Sherlock Holmes is hired to investigate.

Title: Otto er et næsehorn
Description: While out playing with his friend, Viggo, Topper comes across a magical pencil. When he draws a fish, it comes alive. When he draws a rhino on a 3rd floor wall, it comes alive, too. The boys name him Otto, like Viggo's dad.

Title: Izakaya Chôji
Description: Eiji, also known as Choji, quits the shipyard to start Izakaya Choji (snack bar) with his wife Shigeko on the outskirts of Hakodate.

Title: Los renglones torcidos de Dios
Description: Detective Alicia Gould, investigating the murder of a client's father, decides to go undercover to an asylum.

Title: Nipernaadi
Description: The story is about an Estonian Don Juan, who actually is a writer, who leaves home in spring and is brought home again in autumn, by his wife.

Title: Todo un hombre
Description: An unusual role for Vicente Fernandez who plays a complicated man, out of touch with his feelings due to a childhood incident which left him "damaged" as well as the people who love him.

Title: The General of the Dead Army
Der Aufenthalt
Description: Teenage German soldier is falsely accused of being a war criminal and arrested in Poland of 1945.

Title: Little Dragon Maiden
Description: Little Dragon Maiden mixes the old with the new to create pure golden magic as kung-fu fighting veterans Chen Kuan-Tai and Lo Lieh join relative newcomer Leslie Cheung in a far-out swordplay love story that rocks.

Title: Die Schaukel
Description: The life of three sisters in Munich before the First World War. Based on the book by Annette Kolb.

Title: Un bon petit diable
Description: One of the Comtesse De Ségur's most popular works,it tells the tale of an orphan ,Charles,mistreated by his wicked old cousin Madame Mac Miche.

Title: Cucaracha
Description: A policeman is torn between doing his job, following his code of honor and being dedicated to his love interest.

Title: The Crazy Story of the Three Musketeers
Henrietta
Description: Pettersson, a director in the porn industry, is traveling around the country with two rather coarse strippers and a gay flasher. Then he meets Henrietta and falls in love.

Title: Le bâtard
Description: The erratic life of Patrice who, after having murdered the pimp of his mother to avenge the death of her, goes from town to town.

Title: Les mots pour le dire
Description: Marie has has her period for many years endlessly. She's tires, faints everywhere. Because she might be somatizing, she starts a therapy. A new life opens to her.

Title: Abhilasha
Description: A young lawyer strives to remove the death sentence from the judicial system. With support from his mentor, he devises an ingenious plan. When the plan goes terribly wrong halfway through, he has to race against time to save his own life.

Title: It's All Right, My Friend
Description: In this sci-fi parody, Peter Fonda's plays an alien who falls from the sky and is befriended by some Japanese people who help him stop an evil group out to get him.

Title: Growing Up
Description: The story follows a young man as he changes from an intelligently aware youth, to a teenager with much less confidence than he once had, and finally, to a stable adult.

Title: Iso vaalee
Description: The summer of an ice hockey player.

Title: Phatik Chand
Description: Mystery-drama about a botched kidnapping of a Calcutta schoolboy and his relationships and adventures.

Title: Gentle Sinners
Description: A runaway boy goes to live with his uncle, in a small village, trying to escape his parents' religious fanaticism. There, he finds love, but with the wrong girl. And his parents come after him.

Title: Een zaak van leven of dood
Description: Hans meets the lively typist Eva at work and they marry after a short while. And then their lives change as she develops agoraphobia.

Title: Flics de choc
Description: Two young girls abducted by pimps to make them participate in perverse shows, testify against their captors. Following the assassination of the two girls, Commissioner Beauclair will attack a prostitution network in the Paris region.

Title: Lunnaya raduga
Description: After a strange incident, a group of russian space commandos starts developing supernatural powers. But how did they acquire such abilities and what is their intentions?

Title: Babo seoneon
Description: This is a film which ridicules the weaknesses of South Korean society.

Title: Salut la puce
Description: Robert Dumortier and his son "La Puce" live on a barge moored to an island of the Seine and Robert dreams of cruising remote and exotic seas.

Title: Sitaara
Description: Sitaara becomes a film star with the help of Devdas who likes her. She had loved Raju who is believed dead. When her past about her brother gets exposed, she is dejected. Devdas learns that Raju is alive and strives to get them reunited.

Title: Putování Jana Amose
Description: The dramatic story of Jan Amos Comenius, a 17th century Christian hero and a testimony of the persistence of Christian courage.

Title: O Mágico e o Delegado
Description: Powerful magician goes to jail for creating illusion of affluence in Brazilian town.

Title: Los viajes de Gulliver
Description: Gulliver washes ashore on Brobdingnag and becomes an object of curiosity for its gigantic inhabitants.

Title: Zhenshchina i chetvero yeyo muzhchin
Description: A balladic story from a Baltic fishermen's settlement set at the turn of the 19th and 20th centuries.

Title: Balles perdues
Description: Sam must marry Vera, his office colleague.

Title: Un foro nel parabrezza
Description: A journalist meets a mysterious blonde. The meeting upsets his existence. Indeed, the man risks losing it completely.

Title: Circus Performers at the North Pole
Description: In the sequel to Saltimbancii (1981), Fram the polar bear and the performing Marcellonis weather plotting competetors, bumbling kidnappers and family tragedy in this entertaining family film.

Title: Skorost
Description: Film, based on Valeriy Musakhanov's novel about auto-racing, drivers and automobiles.

Title: Carmen
Description: Spain 1820. It's meal time at the cigar factory. Carmen spends her break in the square. Close by is Don José cleaning his weapons.

Title: I parexigisi
Description: An ex-prisoner, a betrayal and a robbery that goes south.

Title: Il disertore
Description: Set in a Sardinian village in 1922. A collection is set up to build a war memorial, but the poor villagers have little to give, except for Mariangela whose sons were killed in the war, who gives her life savings to the fund.

Title: Daughter of the Flames
Description: A man from a shamanistic upbringing, tries to come to terms with the spirit of his mother who visits him in dreams.

Title: Orisiya
Description: This is a film about old fashioned Bulgarian customs and moral rules. A pre-arranged marriage of two children is no obstacle to true love.

Title: Slona róza
Description: A young Pole, veteran of the Spanish Civil War, is recuperating in a spa in Karoly Vary, where he begins an affair with a Jewish violinist Ida Fisher.

Title: In the Year of the Ape
Zvyozdnaya komandirovka
Description: He did not understand how he got to this strange planet. You need to choose, because it turned out that there is also a certain alien, who in the same time appeared on Earth.

Title: Søsken på Guds jord
Description: Somewhere in Northern Norway, in a not too distant past the orphan Margit lives a life with many demanding and mentally challenged kids at a farm.

Title: Za gospozhitzata i neynata mazhka kompaniya
Blade Runner
Description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

Title: First Blood
Description: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

Title: Sophie's Choice
Description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

Title: The Entity
Description: A woman is tormented and sexually molested by an invisible demon.

Title: The Beastmaster
Description: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

Title: The Year of Living Dangerously
Description: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

Title: The Secret of NIMH
Description: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

Title: Firefox
Description: A pilot is sent into the Soviet Union on a mission to steal a prototype jet fighter that can be partially controlled by a neuralink.

Title: The Verdict
Description: An outcast, alcoholic Boston lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

Title: The World According to Garp
Description: A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.

Title: The Last Unicorn
Description: A beautiful unicorn sets out to learn if she truly is the last of her kind in this sparkling animated musical.

Title: Evil Under the Sun
Description: Trying to find how a millionaire wound up with a phony diamond brings Hercule Poirot to an exclusive island resort frequented by the rich and famous. When a murder is committed, everyone has an alibi.

Title: The Final Option
Description: It's suspected that a peace/anti-nuke organization in UK has some extremists willing to use terrorism. The action will probably be against an embassy in London. The SAS/Special Air Service try to get the organization infiltrated.

Title: The Beast Within
Description: A young woman gets raped by a mysterious man-creature, and years later her son begins a horrific transformation into a similar beast.

Title: Midnight
Description: A young woman fleeing her sexually abusive stepfather hitches a ride with two young men, but the three soon find themselves at the mercy of a backwoods Satanic cult.

Title: White Dog
Description: A trainer attempts to retrain a vicious dog that's been raised to attack black people.

Title: The Plague Dogs
Description: Two dogs escape from a laboratory and are hunted as possible carriers of the bubonic plague.

Title: Tex
Description: After their mother dies and their father leaves them, teenage brothers Tex and Mason McCormick struggle to make it on their own.

Title: Honkytonk Man
Description: A boy with a music talent goes on a journey with his uncle for a stage concert.

Title: The Simple-Minded Murderer
Description: A mentally challenged man escapes from his tyrannical master and finds happiness when a poor family takes him in.

Title: Les maîtres du temps
Description: Piel, a 7 or 8 year old boy, is alone on the desert planet Perdide, only survivor of an attack by giant hornets. Calling for help, Piel's father's friend Jaffar keeps contact with the kid and hurries across space toward Perdide.

Title: Kiss Me Goodbye
Description: The ghost of a dead husband haunts his wife as she moves back to their house in NYC. She's about to marry an egyptologist there.

Title: I, the Jury
Description: A PI investigates the murder of his one-armed friend, a PI working on a case. Clues lead to a sex clinic. Bodies pile up.

Title: Battletruck
Description: Post World War III futuristic tale of collapsed governments & bankrupt countries heralding a new lawless age.

Title: The House Where Evil Dwells
Description: A young American family moves to a House in Kyoto, Japan. It turns out to be haunted by the ghosts of a woman and her lover, who were killed by the woman's husband, as well as the ghost of the husband, who killed himself afterward.

Title: Wrong Is Right
Description: A TV reporter finds himself in the middle of an Arab leader buying two portable nukes, terrorists, arms dealer, a reporter/CIA spy killed, a US president ordering a K-I-L-L etc.

Title: Monsignor
Description: An ambitious priest seduces a nun and leads the Vatican into shady business during and after World War II.

Title: Enigma
Description: A C.I.A. Agent tries to infiltrate Soviet intelligence to stop a murderous diabolical plot.

Title: Deadly Eyes
Description: Contaminated grain breeds overgrown, killer rats in this Golden Harvest production. Dachshunds were dressed up as rats for the special effects.

Title: Hammett
Description: Fictional account of real-life mystery writer Dashiell Hammett, and his involvement in the investigation of a beautiful Chinese cabaret actress' mysterious disappearance in San Francisco.

Title: The Quack
Description: Abandoned by his wife and daughter, a famous surgeon starts drinking, hurts his head and loses his memory. His medical knowledge gradually resurfaces and he becomes a village healer, not remembering who he is.

Title: Some Kind of Hero
Description: A Vietnam vet returns home from a prisoner of war camp and is greeted as a hero, but is quickly forgotten and soon discovers how tough survival is in his own country.

Title: If You Could See What I Hear
Description: A light comedy/love story based on the life of blind musician Tom Sullivan.

Title: The Flight of the Eagle
Description: In 1897 Swedish engineer S. A. Andrée with 2 colleagues prepares to fly over the North Pole in his balloon "Eagle".

Title: The Cool Lakes of Death
Description: Tragic story of a wealthy woman whose sexual desires change her into a prostitute, working on the streets of Paris during the 1880s.

Title: Slapstick of Another Kind
Description: A rich, beautiful couple give birth to deformed alien twins who, when their heads are together, are the smartest kids on the planet.

Title: Fast-Walking
Description: A corrupt prison guard becomes involved in a plot to murder a black revolutionary serving time in his prison.

Title: Yes, Giorgio
Description: A famous opera singer, Giorgio Fini, loses his voice during an American tour. He goes to a female throat specialist, Pamela Taylor, whom he falls in love with.

Title: Les Misérables
Description: The story of Jean Valjean, a Frenchman convicted of minor crimes, who is hounded for years by an unforgiving and unrelenting police inspector, Javert.

Title: Mansion of the Living Dead
Description: A group of vacationing waitresses visit a resort hotel on the Canary Islands, only to find that the former monastery's monks nearby have returned as living blind dead.

Title: Bemisal
Description: Bemisal is the story of a noble orphan, Sudhir who sacrifices everything he has, from the love of his life to his profession and reputation, to save his foster family.

Title: Dögkeselyü
Description: Two old women who happen to be pickpockets stole money from Simon, the taxi driver. The police are unable to find the thieves, so Simon decides to find them himself.

Title: Onimasa
Description: A yakuza melodrama, covering decades in the lives of Boss Onimasa, his adopted daughter Matsue, and his biological daughter Hanako.

Title: Le choc
Description: An assassin tries to retire against his bosses' will.

Title: The Hatter's Ghost
Description: Labbé is a quiet hatter in a small town, living with his handicapped wife who never goes out. His neighbour, a tailor, is fascinated by him. A series of female murders shakes the town. Is Labbé involved?

Title: The Wizard of Oz
Description: Animated version of the classic story of a young farmgirl who is transported to the magic land of Oz.

Title: An Unsuitable Job for a Woman
Kamikaze 89
Description: In a totalitarian society of the future, in which the government controls all facets of the press, a homicide detective investigates a string of bombings, and finds out more than he bargained for.

Title: Doktor Faustus
Description: A musician beds down a prostitute he knows is diseased in order to gain inspiration, an act he later believes to have been a tacit pact with Satan.

Title: Jimmy the Kid
Description: Gang of bumbling crooks kidnap a bratty little kid, find out they got more than they bargained for.

Title: El lago de las vírgenes
Description: Jess Franco's (loose) adaptation of Robert Louis Stevenson's Treasure Island, a story about a guy who looks for treasure on an island and gets seduced by the sirens.

Title: Heidi's Song
Description: Orphan Heidi lives with her grandpa in Swiss Alps. She brings joy to all there. However, her aunt takes her to the city to live as a servant girl to a cold rich strict family and their nice but sad handicapped daughter.

Title: Espion, lève-toi
Description: Sébastien Grenier,a secret agent eliminates all his rivals in order to decipher who has killed some of his associates.

Title: Za reipu
Description: 2 boys get drunk and rape a girl.

Title: Gauche the Cellist
Description: A cellist in a small orchestra receives help from animals to help him practice his music.

Title: Friend or Foe
Description: Two children in wartime England find a German fighter pilot.

Title: The Dirty Seven
Description: Seven commandos lose their captain and must begin a brutal attempt to survive.

Title: L'étoile du Nord
Description: In 1934, a mysterious Frenchman returns to Europe from Egypt.

Title: Forty Days of Musa Dagh
Description: Armenian guerrilla troops fight against the Turkish forces on the mountain of Musa Dagh.

Title: Giwaku
Description: The story follow a court case of a woman accused of having killed her husband.

Title: Alicja
Description: Alice falls in love with a jogger called Rabbit.

Title: Hécate
Description: North Africa in the 1930s. Julien, a young, bored diplomat meets Clothilde, whose husband is on a mission in Siberia. He becomes infatuated with her, and soon ends up spending all his time with her, longing to know everything about her.

Title: Out
Description: A self-styled "urban guerrilla" in Greenwich Village is sent on various assignments across the country by a mysterious "commander."

Title: Sinasamba kita
Description: CLOVER-LEAF LOVE CHAIN INVOLVES TWO ANTAGONISTIC SISTERS, THE MAN WHO LOVES ONE AND IGNORES THE IGNORES THE OTHER, AND A SECOND MAN WHO LOVES THE IGNORED BUT IS LOVED BY THE OTHER SISTER.

Title: La plaça del Diamant
Description: The life of a young woman in Barcelona during the Spanish Civil War and its aftermath.

Title: Lovers Lost
Description: A love story between a 29-year-old woman, who has once been a prostitute but is now the mistress of a wealthy jewelry merchant, and a 19-year-old college student.

Title: The Parallel Corpse
Description: A mortuary worker uncovers the identity of a serial killer after finding one of his victims in the mortuary's coffins. However, instead of turning him over to the police, he blackmails him. Complications ensue.

Title: Austeria
Description: During a pogrom in Poland on the eve of World War I, a group of Jews seek refuge from the Cossacks. The fugitives hide out in a rural inn, terrified that they may be given away at any moment.

Title: Morte in Vaticano
Description: An eremit who has had contact to terrorists is planning to kill the pope by poisoning.

Title: Tangiers
Description: A former CIA agent is forced by crooked agents of the government to pose as a notorious smuggler.

Title: Last Days of the Victim
Description: The story of a hitman, a man who kills other people for money, and the dangers that come with the job.

Title: Planetata na sakrovishtata
Description: A villain wants to stop the crew from getting to a gem that will bring life back to earth

Title: Mysterious Planet
Description: A spaceship crash-lands on a planet, and the crew is astonished to find that it holds a beautiful woman who can heal the sick and injured and a race of super-intelligent beings.

Title: Killing 'em Softly
Description: The girlfriend of a man murdered for a debt falls in love with the killer.

Title: Klippet
Description: A truck driver and his job colleagues figures out how to make the smart move, on their many trips to Finland: Tinkering with cargo pallets that can be sold illegal.

Title: Y a-t-il un Français dans la salle?
Description: Horace Tumelat,a powerful politician was raised by his uncle Eusèbe.He has to find a letter written by his uncle who committed suicide.

Title: Klynham Summer
Description: The same night as a girl is slain in the woods, the teenagers Sam and Les are robbed of all of their hard earned hens. In the quest for their hens they cross the murderer's path.

Title: Kono ko no nanatsu no oiwai ni
Le grand frère
Description: Violence and intrigue ensue when a French doctor "Gérard Depardieu" kills his wife and lover and joins the Foreign Legion.

Title: Nestor Burma, détective de choc
Description: Detective Nestor Burma begins an investigation into the corrupt drug-ridden punk rock music world.

Title: Padayottam
Description: A prince comes back to his native land to take revenge on those who conspired against him. Inspired from the novel The Count of Monte Christo

Title: Cyclops
Description: Melkior Tresic is one of many intellectuals in 1941 Zagreb who is helplessly waiting for the encroaching war.

Title: She Kept Asking for the Moon
Ma femme s'appelle reviens
Description: Abandoned by his wife, a man meets a fashion photographer who is also suffering from loneliness.

Title: The Case Is Closed
Description: The servant boy, a minor, engaged in a middle class family dies mysteriously locked in a kitchen.

Title: Que les gros salaires lèvent le doigt!
Description: The cynical boss of a big insurance agency invites his top-salary employees to spend a week-end in his country house. A modest clerical worker, also invited, discovers the hidden reason for this party - and decides to take advantage of it.

Title: Uliisses
Description: Director Werner Nekes has created this experimental film in the mode of James Joyce's Ulysses to the extent that human interactions are represented by poetic, symbolic images and language, with a certain amount of nudity added in.

Title: Kaikyô
Description: In 1954, Go Akuzu (Ken Takakura) travels to the Tsuruga Straits that separate Japan's northernmost island of Hokkaido from the island of Honshu, to investigate the tragic loss of a passenger ship in the treacherous waters of the straits.

Title: Vida/Perra
Description: Juanita Narboni, a provincial spinster, remembers her memories in an extensive monologue along which all her personal and family ghosts will appear: her mother, her sister, her only boyfriend .

Title: Den ubetænksomme elsker
Description: The 38-year-old doctor Jacob Holme lives deeply rooted in the world of normality with a medical practice, house and a marriage without excitement. He is drawn to a young schizophrenic girl and his wife leaves him.

Title: Aspern
Description: A publisher seeks information on a writer who died long ago.

Title: Miris dunja
Description: Thanks to his friendliness towards Nazis, Sarajevo businessman is more and more rich during WW2. However, his infatuation towards the Jewish girl will cause his demise.

Title: Tessa, a Gata
Description: Tessa, Debora and Roberta have a strong bond. Surrounded by perverted men whose only pleasure is sadistic sex games, far out drug fantasies and to humiliate and abuse women, they must take action.

Title: Esenno slantze
Description: The script of the film is based on the prose of the Bulgarian classic writer Konstantin Konstantinov.

Title: Lavina
Description: This film shows serious moral problems in the society which become visible in an extreme situation, when happiness, trust, sense of life are so precious.

Title: Días de combate
Description: Several young women are murdered in a small community, and a detective moves in to solve the crimes.

Title: Ulvova mylläri
Description: Miller Gunnar Huttunen falls so heavily in love that he starts to howl.

Title: Brothers
Description: News photographer Adam and journalist Kevin, two fictional estranged brothers who witnessed the real life 1975 killing of the Balibo Five in Timor, reunite after five years only for their PTSD to resurface and tear them apart.

Title: Devdas
Description: Two childhood sweethearts departs from each other for religious prejudice and misery starts at life of the protagonist.

Title: Dobrodruzství Robinsona Crusoe, námorníka z Yorku
Kaliyugaya
Description: Piyal and Nanda have now aged, and their children have left them. Priya reminisces on her life after her son sends her a letter from London accusing her and her husband of various faults.

Title: Krab i Joanna
Description: Just before the end of an 18-month-long journey from Africa, a fishing ship is sent on another 2-month cruise. The crew members miss their loved ones a lot.

Title: Padurea nebuna
Description: A young communist returns to a small provincial town.

Title: The Last Hero
Description: The Story about Kitano Akio competing in All Japan Road Race Championship , the International Class A 500cc class.

Title: Boldyn
Description: A psychological movie set in the times of Second World War in occupied Poland. Partisans, commanded by autocratic General Boldyn who becomes unbearable during inactivity, start to submit false reports on sudden moves of German troops.

Title: Sete Dias de Agonia
Description: After a heavy rain storm, several vehicles get stuck on a muddy road. Soon hunger and fatigue change people's manners, making them behave in a very noncivilized way.

Title: Seishun no mon: Jiritsu hen
Description: Mid 50s: the trials and tribulations of Shinsuke Ibuki, freshly arrived in Tokyo from Kyushu.

Title: Der lange Ritt zur Schule
Description: A young boy fantasizes his way to school into a battle between cowboys and Indians, where the bad guys want to steal some gold medals. Real events and fantasy interacts in his mind.

Title: Boj na poziralniku
Description: Based on a novel by Prezihov Voranc, it tells a story about a farmer's family who live in Northern Slovenia before WW2.

Title: Maria Danneels (of het leven dat we droomden)
De camisa vieja a chaqueta nueva
Dein unbekannter Bruder
Description: A communist is released from prison in 1935 Hamburg. He tries to link up with the Party again, but is unsure as to who he can trust, and has difficulty adjusting to life in Nazi Germany.

Title: Luk e-san
Description: A historical drama set in the 1930s Isan province Thailand, telling the travails of a small clan of subsistence farmers and their village as a particularly bad drought reduces them to bush living.

Title: La invitación
Description: A man is invited to an estancia to hunt deer. As a young woman from the host family develops an interest in the guest, his hidden intentions are revealed.

Title: 24 chasa dazhd
Description: A gray border, dull village. Time seems to have stopped in this place. The appearance of a beautiful woman breaks the monotonous way of life and challenges the colorless group of men and makes them come out of their shells.

Title: Le corbillard de Jules
Description: Alphonse and Aldo, two soldiers during the Second World War, are responsible for transporting the body of Jules, who died in battle, to his country of origin. Nothing is going to go as planned.

Title: India, Daughter of the Sun
Description: A white man finds a beautiful Indian in a diamond extraction site in the State of Goiás, Brazil, and falls in love.

Title: Deseti brat
Description: Based on the novel by Josip Jurcic and set in rural Yugoslavia in the 1840's. The tenth brother of a family returns to the family home to take revenge on his father who had abandoned him as a child.

Title: Los pasajeros del jardín
Description: After learning that her partner is terminally ill, a woman tries to make the best of the few months they have left to be together.

Title: To fragma
Description: A government-mandated expert on dams arrives at a rain-soaked village to inspect a weather-beaten barrier, and his fears come true. Amid corruption, bureaucracy, and superstition, failure is inevitable. Will the water claim back its land?

Title: Nay-tezhkiyat gryah
Description: In the last moments of his life, the writer turns over episodes from his past. He finds the cause of another death, ahead of the last breath.

Title: Hugh MacLennan: Portrait of a Writer
Elegiya
Description: This is a film about the collision between father and son. The cynicism and ruined moral values of the son crush the patriarchal world of the father.

Title: The Howling
Description: After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.

Title: For Your Eyes Only
Description: James Bond is assigned to find a missing British vessel, equipped with a weapons encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

Title: Das Boot
Description: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

Title: Endless Love
Description: A high-school student's love for a 15-year-old girl is thwarted by parental disapproval, circumstance, and accident; he burns down her family's house and is committed to a psychiatric hospital.

Title: Beau-père
Description: After her mother dies, fourteen-year-old Marion falls in love with her stepfather, Remy.

Title: Thief
Description: An ace safe cracker wants to do one last big heist for the mob before going straight.

Title: The Fox and the Hound
Description: A little fox named Tod, and Copper, a hound puppy, vow to be best buddies forever. But as Copper grows into a hunting dog, their unlikely friendship faces the ultimate test.

Title: The French Lieutenant's Woman
Description: Anna and Mike portray two characters in a film set in 19th century England who fall in love despite the fact that Mike's character is engaged.

Title: Ghost Story
Description: Two generations of men find themselves haunted by the presence of a spectral woman. When the son of one of the elderly men returns to his hometown after his brother's mysterious death, they attempt to unravel her story.

Title: Private Lessons
Description: An immigrant housemaid seduces a 15-year-old boy and later fakes her own death as part of his chauffeur's blackmail plot. Troubles arise when the two start to fall in love.

Title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
Description: The sensuous wife of a lunch wagon proprietor and a rootless drifter begin a sordidly steamy affair and conspire to murder her Greek husband.

Title: Quest for Fire
Description: This story takes place in prehistoric time when three tribesmen search for a new fire source.

Title: Ragtime
Description: A young black pianist becomes embroiled in the lives of an upper-class white family set among the racial tensions, infidelity, violence, and other nostalgic events in early 1900s New York City.

Title: Taps
Description: Military cadets take extreme measures to ensure the future of their academy when its existence is threatened by local condo developers.

Title: Gallipoli
Description: Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.

Title: Lady Chatterley's Lover
Description: After a crippling injury leaves her husband impotent, Lady Chatterly is torn between her love for her husband and her physical desires. With her husband's consent, she seeks out other means of fulfilling her needs.

Title: Butterfly
Description: In 1937 Nevada, silver mine caretaker Jess Tyler is reunited with his teenage daughter Kady who will do anything to persuade Jess to let her have claim to the mine.

Title: Sharky's Machine
Description: Tom Sharky is demoted to vice after a bust goes terribly wrong. He and his team stumble across a mob murder tied to prostitution and government.

Title: Eye of the Needle
Description: A ruthless German spy, trying to get out of Britain with vital information about D-Day, must spend time with a young woman and her crippled husband.

Title: The Professional
Description: Victim of a plot which has resulted in his imprisonment in a Central African jail for two years, a French secret agent arrives in Paris to settle accounts.

Title: Wolfen
Description: A New York cop investigates a series of brutal deaths that resemble animal attacks.

Title: Venom
Description: Terrorists in the process of kidnapping a child get trapped in a house with an extremely deadly snake.

Title: The Incubus
Description: A small town's doctor takes matters into his own hands after a series of gruesome and bizarre rape crimes perplex the clueless authorities.

Title: The Hand
Description: A comic book artist loses his hand, which in turn takes on a murderous life of its own.

Title: Cutter's Way
Description: Richard spots a man dumping a body, and decides to expose the man he thinks is the culprit with his friend Alex Cutter.

Title: Diva
Description: Two tapes, two Parisian mob killers, one corrupt policeman, an opera fan, a teenage thief, and the coolest philosopher ever filmed all twist their way through an intricate and stylish French-language thriller.

Title: Neighbors
Description: A quiet man's peaceful suburban lifestyle is threatened by the new, obnoxious couple that moves in next door.

Title: The Monster Club
Description: A writer of horror stories is invited to a "monster club" by a mysterious old gentleman. There, three gruesome stories are told to him; between each story some musicians play their songs.

Title: Mephisto
Description: In early-1930s Germany, a passionate stage actor finds himself before a dilemma: renounce his apolitical stance and comply with the Reich's doctrine, or face oblivion. But, Faustian bargains never end well. What is the price of success?

Title: Fruits of Passion
Description: A girl loves an older man. He demands that she goes in a brothel, as evidence that she loves him.

Title: Storie di ordinaria follia
Description: Poet/lecturer Charles Serking awakens from his alcoholic haze long enough to take a bus back to L.A. and plunge into an orgy of drink and sexual depravity.

Title: Condorman
Description: Cartoonist Woody becomes the superhero he draws. Using his gadgets he helps a Soviet spy defect to the West.

Title: Tree of Knowledge
Description: We follow the Danish students in a class at Århus Katedralskole late 1950s, from age 13 till 16.

Title: True Confessions
Description: A worldly ambitious monsignor clashes with his older brother, a cynical Los Angeles homicide detective who is investigating the brutal murder of a young prostitute.

Title: Quartet
Description: Marya Zelli finds herself penniless after her art dealer husband, Stephan, is convicted of theft. Marya accepts the hospitality of a strange couple, H.J. and Lois Heidler, who lets her live in their house.

Title: The Incredible Shrinking Woman
Description: A housewife grows smaller and smaller in reaction to chemicals found in cosmetics and household products.

Title: The Fan
Description: Douglas, a record salesman, is an obsessive fan of actress Sally Ross. When his letters are rejected, he strikes out at her and her loved ones.

Title: The Black Cat
Description: A professor with the psychic ability to communicate with the dead uses his powers on his pet cat in order to take vengeance upon his enemies.

Title: Puberty Blues
Description: The mating rituals of two teenage surf chicks from the southern suburbs of Sydney.

Title: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Miss Osbourne
Description: In 19th century London, a sex maniac sneaks into the engagement party of Dr. Henry Jekyll and Miss Fanny Osbourne, turning the event into a nightmarish whirlpool of murder and debauchery.

Title: Sailor Suit and Machine Gun
Description: A teenage delinquent schoolgirl named Izumi Hoshi inherits her father's Yakuza clan.

Title: The Chosen
Description: In 1944, in Brooklyn, two Jewish kids become friends. One is from a very conservative family, and the other is more liberal. The issues of importance of tradition, parental expectations and the formation of Israel cause constant friction.

Title: The Survivor
Description: When a pilot becomes the sole survivor of an airliner crash that kills over 300 people, he works with a psychic and a priest to determine who is responsible for the incident and pacify the vengeful souls of the victims.

Title: Sphinx
Description: Egyptologist Erica Baron finds more than she bargained for during her long-planned trip to The Land of the Pharoahs: murder, theft, betrayal, love, and a mummy's curse.

Title: Mystics in Bali
Description: A woman researches a book that takes her to the black magic cult of Leák in Bali. She meets an evil witch who promises to train her dark arts. But she is tricked and turned into a flying vampire with internal organs hanging from her neck.

Title: Pour la peau d'un flic
Description: Victim of manipulation, Cop Choucas is wanted for two murders and searched for by every cop in town.

Title: Coup de Torchon
Description: A pathetic police chief, humiliated by everyone around him, suddenly wants a clean slate in life - and resorts to drastic means to do so.

Title: The Pursuit of D.B. Cooper
Description: A speculation on the fate of the famous hijacker who parachuted with his ransom and disappeared in the mountains, has Cooper following a meticulous plan to disappear into anonymity despite the best efforts of a dogged cop.

Title: Lili Marleen
Description: In 1938, a German singer falls in love with a Jewish composer in Zurich, who helps Jews flee Nazi Germany. She wants to help but is forced back to Germany. Her song "Lili Marleen" becomes a hit with soldiers and the Nazi top.

Title: The Cabbage Soup
Description: 2 buddy farmers are visited by aliens who like their domestic cabbage soup.

Title: The Skin
Description: After the Allies liberate Naples in 1943, the life for the locals is not much easier, especially for women. Many sacrifice their dignity and morale to survive.

Title: Hababam Sinifi Güle Güle
Description: A literature teacher who was born in a village comes to Hababam Sinifi. However, the students in the class mock him because of his accent.

Title: The Grilling
Description: A police inspector, suspecting an attorney of two child sex murders, has him held for a questioning session that goes on for hours.

Title: Lady of the Camelias
Description: A young girl from the provinces, comes to Paris with one goal: to become a part of the rich bourgeoisie. To achieve this she will use her unique beauty and charm.

Title: Green Ice
Description: A down on his luck engineer gets involved in an adventure with a mysterious woman and an emerald magnate.

Title: The Little Fox
Description: Famous, great hunters, better stay away, here comes Vuk! (They say he is cunning as a fox!)

Title: Deep Water
Description: Melanie enjoys flirting and having little affairs. Her husband Victor seems to bear her antics with utmost calm and nonchalance. This impression turns out to be wrong, very wrong indeed.

Title: Surfacing
Description: A young girl and her friends set off on an expedition into the wilderness in order to find her missing father.

Title: Kagero-za
Description: A 1920s playwright meets a beautiful woman who may be the ghost of his patron's deceased wife.

Title: Loophole
Description: When architect Stephen Booker loses his partnership, he finds jobs hard to come by, and with money in short supply, he unwittingly becomes involved in a daring scheme to rob one of London's biggest bank vaults.

Title: Rubber Tarzan
Description: A weak, dyslexic boy is bullied in school. His Tarzan obsessed dad calls him Rubber Tarzan. He makes a friend in crane driver Ole, who tells him: There's always something, you're good at. You just have to know, what it is.

Title: The Girl with the Red Hair
Description: The story of Hannie Schaft, Dutch Resistance, told in flashback as they try to bring collaborators and criminals to justice in 1945.

Title: Muddy River
Description: In post-War Japan, a boy from a noodle store-owning family befriends a neighboring boy living in poverty.

Title: The Mysterious Castle in the Carpathians
Description: In 1897, in a castle near the town of Werewolfville in the Carpathians, a slightly deranged Professor Orfanik experiments with his new inventions which include, even at this early date, television and a film camera.

Title: Samurai Reincarnation
Description: The villain is called Amakusa Shiro Tokaisada. He is actually based on a real christian samurai. The movie was one of the inspirations for the game called 'Samurai Shodown' (actual spelling)

Title: Malevil
Description: A group of ordinary French survived a nuclear war and found themselves in the face of what was left of civilization.

Title: Three Brothers
Description: Three men face their mother's death.

Title: Francisca
Description: The life of a young man, son of an English officer who lets himself become a prisoner of love resulting in fatalism and disgrace.

Title: Peter-No-Tail
Description: The British dub of Peter No-Tail premiered in 1983. The American dub of Peter No-Tail premiered on September 21, 1983.

Title: Fantasma d'amore
Description: Over two decades after their affair ended, a married man is haunted by the presence of his former lover.

Title: Two Queens and One Consort
Description: At the deathbed of his used-to-be militant mother an older man looks back at his childhood, when he was in love with his sensual aunt Coleta.

Title: Circle of Deceit
Description: A German journalist, escaping from broken marriage, goes to Lebanon to cover the civil war. Soon, he realizes that he can't handle the truth.

Title: Looks and Smiles
Description: Mick and Alan, two friends who have just left school, are full of dreams for the future. But against the background of Thatcher's Britain, the two soon wake up to reality. From acclaimed Director Ken Loach.

Title: Memoirs of a Survivor
Description: Set in a bleak future where roving gangs of children terrorize city streets, and reality is often an illusion.

Title: Secrets of the Satin Blues
Description: Tells the tale of sexual encounters of one woman and several friends, family members and acquaintances, as seen (and told) from the perspective of a pair of satin blue panties.

Title: Americana
Description: In a small town in rural Kansas, a troubled veteran attempts to restore an old merry-go-round ride.

Title: The Grass Is Singing
Description: In the 1940s, a city girl moves from America to her husband's failing farm in Southern Rhodesia in colonial Africa. Unhappy and unhinged, she starts an affair with their black servant which leads to tragedy.

Title: Hard Feelings
Description: It's 1963 and teenage Barnie has problems. School bullies are after him, his family is dysfunctional and his girl Leslie screws around. On the run from bullies, he hides in the African-American part of town and meets cute Winona.

Title: Gamiani
Description: A countess and a writer are in love with the same girl.

Title: The Sword Stained with Royal Blood
Description: "Godfather of the kung-fu film", Chang Cheh, made this treasured and beloved adventure featuring a sword, training manual, treasure map and a secret message. The kung-fu which ensues is as impressive as it is glorious.
