Title: Dorotej
Description: In medieval Serbia, a young monk, a master of herbal medicine, attracts the attention of a warlord's wife.

Title: Distant Thunder
Description: Urban sprawl and corrupt materialism have a devastating effect on farming families near Tokyo.

Title: The Island of Adventure
Description: Four British teens on vacation visit an island and discover that a terrorist group is using it as their headquarters.

Title: Light Years Away
Description: A young drifter meets up with a strange old man who claims that he has been taught to fly by birds.

Title: Silvestre
Description: The daughters of a nobleman give shelter to a stranger. After that visit ends with a severed hand, the pilgrim takes on different identities to seek revenge. The nobleman goes missing and his youngest has to pose as a knight to save him.

Title: Your Ticket Is No Longer Valid
Description: An influential businessmen is stressed out by work. This leads to him being unable to perform in bed. He gets paranoid that his wife will start cheating on him. This idea, however, slowly becomes more and more appealing to him.

Title: Les Plouffe
Description: The lives of the average Quebecois Plouffe family during the final years of the depression and through World War II.

Title: Mandala
Description: A story that follows the lives and interactions of two Buddhist monks living in South Korea.

Title: Gol Krali
Description: Said funny events that have to be engaged to endear himself to the beloved players.

Title: Grendel Grendel Grendel
Description: This is an animated story covering the ancient legend of Beowulf, as narrated in a Monty Pythonesque way by Grendel (Sir Peter Ustinov), the "monster" in the legend.

Title: La cripta
Description: A patient is released from a mental hospital to help the police find a student who disappeared a few days ago.

Title: Slow na boogie ni shitekure
Description: A young cat burglar begins a love triangle with a reckless older man and her on-again-off-again bonehead biker boyfriend.

Title: San-Antonio ne pense qu'à ça
Description: Walter Klozett is a spy arrested and imprisoned by the French Police who know him in possession of stolen booty which the French secret services would like to recover at all costs.

Title: Ulvetid
Description: Anna and Tom live in a remote place while Anna suffers from depression after an abortion, and is afraid of losing Tom's affection. An admirer of Tom's writing, Ellinor, adds to the problem, when she appears with a tame wolf.

Title: The Carpathian Castle
Description: In late 19th century, a Transylvanian revolutionary fleeing the Imperial authorities goes to Italy where he meets a beautiful soprano who later disappears under mysterious circumstances.

Title: Manon
Description: The story of the rise and fall of a young courtesan.

Title: Signé Furax
Description: The notorious and mysterious criminal Furax steals France's famous monuments, replacing them with replicas.

Title: Ranganayaki
Description: Life of theater artistes. The Oedipus complex. The tragic life of a quintessential movie heroine. These are some of the themes handled by ace director Puttanna Kanagal with his characteristic finesse in Ranganayaki.

Title: A Q zheng zhuan
Description: The True Story of Ah Q is set during the 1911 revolution. Ah Q is a lowly peasant who wants to rise above his class, or at least get out of his grinding poverty.

Title: El gran perro muerto
Description: In a small town, a dead dog on the middle of the main street, then a bureaucratic process begins to determine who is responsible for removing dead dog.

Title: El infierno de todos tan temido
Akuryo-To
Description: About and ex-hippies memories of the death of John Lennon and the strange encounter with the murder mystery of a woman turning schizophrenic of grief.

Title: Ten Little Indians
Description: Filipino take on Agatha Christie's classic story about ten people stuck in a remote place, who are killed one by one by someone as punishment for their supposed crimes.

Title: Los viernes de la eternidad
Description: A prostitute tries to communicate with one of her lovers who died in a duel, but who appears to him is his other lover, greater than the previous one, died in the same duel.

Title: Saltimbancii
Description: A circus family encounters hard times and family strife, but is brought into the limelight through their chance encounter with a polar bear cub.

Title: Yuki
Description: Set in feudal Japan, the film focuses on Yuki, an adolescent goddess whose task is to clean up the Earth, both by ridding it of oppressive authorities and by covering it with a blanket of snow.

Title: Nezakonchennyy uzhin
Description: Martin Beck has to search through the large company's director Palmgren's many enemies when the business man is shot in front of a dozen witnesses at a prestigious restaurant.

Title: Pugowitza
Description: World War II is over and Heinrich, a German young boy, influenced by the Russians, starts to act according to the Communism in a small German village.

Title: Gazija
Description: Gazija are military men who patrol the boundaries of the Ottoman Empire in mid-18th century. One such man has trouble reconciling times of peace with his Gazija standing.

Title: Als Unku Edes Freundin war
Description: A boy and a gypsy girl become friends and face prejudice in Berlin in the twenties.

Title: Pourquoi pas nous?
Description: A wrestler and a bookseller disgraced by life fall in love with each other.

Title: Unser kurzes Leben
Description: An idealistic young architect moves from the big city to a small town intended to become an industrial center. Her ambitions meet the realities of socialist economics, bureaucracy, and indifference.

Title: Sentimental
Description: Four friends, one of them dies, and another, who discovers that he was killed, gets involved in a crime network.

Title: Snadji se, druze
Description: Based on a TV sit-com series and set in World War II, about how an ordinary woodcutter develops into an active partisan fighter.

Title: The Hidden Trail of the Beasts
Boyanskiyat maystor
Description: This is a film about the moral and philosophical sides of the life and the art, about the complex relations between the artist and the rough rules of the time in which he lives.

Title: Shang shi
Description: Two young people fell in love and it became a tragedy after they got married, a story written by Xun Lu, which took place after the May 4th Movement.

Title: Nanjeongiga soaolrin jakeun kong
Description: A dwarf and his poor, but loving, family who are forced out of their house by a real estate agent.

Title: To ergostasio
Description: In high hopes of getting a loan to update his antiquated machinery, a financially hard-pressed owner of an old tannery turns to a well-to-do migrant who wants to marry his young daughter. Could he be the solution to the family's problems?

Title: Otec ma zderie tak ci tak
Tarnovskata tzaritza
Description: The action takes place at the beginning of the 20th century in the provincial Bulgarian town, Turnovo. A rich young doctor suffers because of his love to his housemaid. Meanwhile the First World War is beginning.

Title: Yazovetzat
Description: A beautiful middle-aged French woman comes to Bulgaria for a vacation. In a village by the sea, she meets a local fisherman. He likes to draw. The Frenchwoman likes his paintings. They fall in love with each other.

Title: The Shining
Description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

Title: The Blue Lagoon
Description: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

Title: Ordinary People
Description: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.

Title: Altered States
Description: A psycho-physiologist experiments with drugs and a sensory-deprivation tank and has visions he believes are genetic memories.

Title: Somewhere in Time
Description: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

Title: The Watcher in the Woods
Description: When a family moves to a country home, the young girls experience strange happenings that have a link to an occult event years past.

Title: Cruising
Description: A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

Title: Urban Cowboy
Description: Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.

Title: Tender Cousins
Description: With the outbreak of WWII, the sudden call to arms will send the men of a family's estate to the front, leaving a curious adolescent alone with the remaining women of the house, in need of a warm embrace and, possibly, a daring kiss.

Title: The Ninth Configuration
Description: A former marine arrives at a mental asylum housed in a remote castle to run it. There he attempts to rehabilitate the patients by letting them act out their craziest fantasies and desires.

Title: The Hunter
Description: Bounty hunter Ralph "Papa" Thorson is receiving death threats from a criminal he helped put away. This while his girlfriend is about to give birth, an event he isn't looking forward to.

Title: Breaker Morant
Description: Three Australian lieutenants are court martialed for executing prisoners as a way of deflecting attention from war crimes committed by their superior officers.

Title: The Stunt Man
Description: A fugitive stumbles onto a movie set just when they need a new stunt man, takes the job as a way to hide out and falls for the leading lady while facing off with his manipulative director.

Title: The Mirror Crack'd
Description: Miss Jane Marple comes to solve the mystery when a local woman is poisoned and a visiting movie star seems to have been the intended victim.

Title: The Dogs of War
Description: Mercenary James Shannon, on a reconnaissance job to the African nation of Zangaro, is tortured and deported. He returns to lead a coup.

Title: Cattle Annie and Little Britches
Description: In 19th-century Oklahoma, two teen girls who love stories about outlaws, are on a quest to meet and join up with them. They find a shadow of a former gang and although disappointed, still try to help them escape from a vigorous Marshal.

Title: Raise the Titanic
Description: Once they said God himself couldn't sink her. Then they said no man on Earth could reach her. But an underwater research agency, headed by Admiral James Sandecker, is assigned the job of finding the doomed ship in her North Atlantic grave.

Title: The Island
Description: A journalist takes his son with him to investigate pirate activity off the coast of Florida. But he gets stranded on a mysterious island--where he might not be alone.

Title: The Awakening
Description: An archeologist discovers his daughter is possessed by the spirit of an Egyptian queen. To save mankind he must destroy her.

Title: North Sea Hijack
Description: When terrorists take over two oil rigs, and threaten to blow them up if their demands are not met, an eccentric anti-terrorism expert volunteers his unique commando unit to stop them.

Title: Secrets of a French Maid
Description: Frau Oberst has 2 young nieces who are very open with their sexuality. She hopes to find adequate lovers for her nieces and along the way finds herself in some precarious sexual situations.

Title: Tusk
Description: An English girl and an Indian elephant, born on the same day, share a common destiny.

Title: Inside Moves
Description: Handicapped after an unsuccessful suicide attempt, a man finds common ground in the troubled souls at a local dive bar.

Title: Death Watch
Description: In a future where dying of illness is exceedingly rare, a terminally ill woman becomes a celebrity and a man with camera implants goes to secretly record her for a morbid TV show.

Title: Hopscotch
Description: Grounded with a desk job by incompetent superiors, a clever CIA agent retires and writes a tell all memoir that will embarrass his bosses, prompting him to go on the run and elude them.

Title: When Time Ran Out...
Description: An active volcano threatens a south Pacific island resort and its guests as a power struggle ensues between the property's developer and a drilling foreman.

Title: Virus: The End
Description: After a virus devastates the global human population, survivors in Antarctica desperately try to find a cure and save the human race.

Title: The Formula
Description: The synthetic fuel production formula, invented by the Nazis at the end of World War II, is sought after by some who aim to sell it, and by others who wish to destroy it.

Title: The First Deadly Sin
Description: A police inspector, nearing retirement, tracks a serial killer who is terrorizing New York.

Title: The Fiendish Plot of Dr. Fu Manchu
Description: When Fu's age-regressing elixir vitae is spilled by a hapless flunky, Fu Manchu sends his lackeys to round up supplies for a fresh batch of elixir, including a precious jewel, which prompts a team of agents to track him down.

Title: The Black Marble
Description: A romantic comedy which explores the pressures on police officers.

Title: Just Tell Me What You Want
Description: A married, egotistical, middle-aged head of a corporate empire man and his mistress and protegee, who wants a more serious commitment and ends up dating a younger man, are in a casual love/hate relationship and engage in a battle of wits.

Title: Rough Cut
Description: Two sophisticated jewel thieves join forces to steal $30 million in uncut jewels. Despite a continuous exchange of quips they eventually become romantically involved.

Title: Windwalker
Description: In 1797 Utah, an aged Cheyenne patriarch helps his kin to fight off a raiding party of rival Crow warriors and he tells his grandchildren the story of their family.

Title: Obsession
Description: The story of the impossible love between a schoolgirl and a sixty-year-old painter.

Title: Zigeunerweisen
Description: A surreal period film following an university professor and his eerie nomad friend as they go through loose romantic triangles and face death in peculiar ways.

Title: Night of the Juggler
Description: A tough, New York City ex-cop relentlessly searches for his kidnapped teenage daughter whom is held by a twisted psycho after mistaking her for the daughter of a wealthy businessman.

Title: The Man with Bogart's Face
Description: In contemporary Hollywood, private investigator Sam Marlow gets plastic surgery to look like Humphrey Bogart and solves various cases just like Bogart's silver-screen detective characters from the 1940s.

Title: The Godsend
Description: When a strange woman has her baby at the Marlowe's house, then disappears, Kate Marlowe is forced to keep the baby, Bonnie. She loves the child, but when her own children are systematically killed, suspicion turns to Bonnie.

Title: Oh, God! Book II
Description: God asks a young girl to help spread his word and influence with a slogan.

Title: Double Negative
Description: Mentally tortured photojournalist attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

Title: A Few Days from the Life of I.I. Oblomov
Description: St. Petersburg, mid 19th century: the indolent, middle-aged Oblomov. He sleeps much of the day. His boyhood companion, Stoltz, now an energetic and successful businessman, adds Oblomov to his circle and introduces him to Olga.

Title: The Agency
Description: A millionaire is suspected of buying an ad agency to use it as a way of brainwashing the public for his political ends.

Title: The Return of Josey Wales
Description: Gunfighter Josey Wales travels to Mexico to get a friend out of jail.

Title: Fabian
Description: Novel-based story of Jacob Fabian, a somewhat liberal Berlin advertising copywriter who witnesses the collapse of the prewar German society during the 1930s.

Title: Below the Belt
Description: A New York City waitress decides to become a professional wrestler.

Title: The Pilot
Description: Mike Hagan is a pilot in passenger service and candidate for the honor "Best Pilot of the Year". Nobody knows that he's got private sorrows - he's an alcoholic. A stewardess notices his regular visits of the toilet and reports it.

Title: The Good Thief
Description: In AD 33, a fake magician from Galilee shares his fate with Jesus Christ, whom he mistakes for a rival swindler.

Title: Girl with the Golden Panties
Description: Luis, an aging Falangist author with guilty conscious, is writing fake memoirs. Two reporters, his niece Mariana and her lesbian friend Elmyr, arrive to do a piece on him. While fact-checking his memoirs Mariana becomes attracted to him.

Title: Three Men to Kill
Description: A man is pursued by killers after helping someone at a car crash.

Title: Madicken på Junibacken
Description: Madicken never means for anything to go wrong, but somehow it gets that way. Neither this time, when her little sister got a concussion, and it's not her fault that she puts a pea up her own nose.

Title: The Kidnapping of the President
Description: Based on the novel by Charles Templeton, a secret service chief leads a game of cat and mouse when a gang of third-world terrorists kidnap the President.

Title: Klondike Fever
Description: This movie chronicled Jack London's epic journey from San Francisco to the Klondike gold fields in 1898.

Title: Sweet William
Description: A young woman has a perfect love affair with a zealous writer. When she finds out that he's also a highly manipulative womanizer, it's too late - she's already too much in love to quit him. Things start to get really complicated.

Title: See You in the Next War
Description: The two enemies from war, Slovenian partisan Berk and German soldier Bitter, meet each other during holidays in Spain. Recalling the war through conversation, Berk remembers Anton, his fellow comrade he had spend the most time with.

Title: Yajû shisubeshi
Description: A journalist steals a gun from a cop after killing him and goes on a spree of robbery and murder.

Title: Ion: Blestemul pamîntului, blestemul iubirii
Description: Set in the 1910's Transylvanian countryside, a poor but industrious peasant must choose between his obsessive lust for riches and his desire for true love.

Title: Heroes Shed No Tears
Description: Kao is given a mission by his elderly master to take a cursed sword and solve petty squabbles between skilled martial masters.

Title: The Man Who Went Up in Smoke
Description: A Swedish journalist disappears in Budapest and Martin Beck takes the case.

Title: I Sent a Letter to My Love
Dead Man's Float
Description: A group of young surfers try to foil a gang of drug-smugglers.

Title: Manganinnie
Description: Aboriginal woman Manganinnie survives a Black Line raid which claims the life of her husband, Meenopeekameena.

Title: Izgubljeni zavicaj
Description: The funeral in his native village evokes the main character's reminiscences from the childhood, but the bygone time exist only in his memories.

Title: Pile ou face
Description: For inspector Baroni,Monsieur Morlaix is the main suspect who might have killed his wife.

Title: Suzanne
Description: An unhappy married woman has an affair with a violent criminal. She gets pregnant with his baby, but he gets arrested and goes to prison. Now what?

Title: Iron Chain Assassin
Description: Teng Piao went to jail for fifteen years on a frame up for drug smuggling. Now that he's out, along with his iron chain and hungry for revenge.

Title: Vavilon XX
Description: The small town of Vavilon hears of the recent Russian Revolution, but attempts to communize it are met with resistance from the rich people living in the town. The Red Army finally puts down the resistance.

Title: Last Night of Love
Description: In 1916 Romanian Army lieutenant Tudor Gheorghiu jealously obsesses over his wife Lena's apparent infidelity and contests against gigolo lawyer Nicolau for Lena's love.

Title: Land og synir
Description: An Icelandic farmer's son has to move from his farm during the depression. He leaves everything to start a new life elsewhere. Set in the crisis years, it describes tension between the farms and cities.

Title: Za spichkami
Description: In Eastern Finland, in Liperi to be exact, Anna-Liisa Ihalainen asks her husband Antti to get some matches from the Ihalainen household. Unfortunately that trip takes a little longer than expected.

Title: From the Apennines to the Andes: The Movie
Koto
Description: Koto is a 1980 film directed by Kon Ichikawa starring Momoe Yamaguchi and Tomokazu Miura in an adaptation of Yasunari Kawabata's story The Old Capital.

Title: Legend of the Fox
Description: Chin Siu Ho plays a young man who believes himself to be an orphan. Until one rainy night when he and three different men find themselves taking shelter from the storm in the same place.

Title: Devlet Kusu
Description: Indirect satire dramatization on the differences between social classes features a lazy but handsome underdog and a high-class society girl who falls in love with him just because he looks like "Jean-Paul Belmondo" in her starry dreams.

Title: Days of Fury
Description: An obscure collection of examples of today's problems, featuring tornadoes, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, tidal waves, locust swarms, fires, floods, plane crashes, racing accidents, assassinations, riots and animal killing.

Title: Misterio
Description: An actor blurs reality and fiction with the character he plays in a soap opera.

Title: L'entourloupe
Description: Two little criminals without major, dream of adventure and easy life. They agree to go to work in the Poitou as representatives of musical encyclopedias luxury. But their friend Valerie arrive from Paris and just changes their life.

Title: La verdad sobre el caso Savolta
Angela Markado
Description: A waitress is repeatedly gang-raped, humiliated, and left for dead by five men whom she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.

Title: The Wicked
Description: A selfish playboy uses rich women to pay off his debts. Divorcing his wife and marrying the woman he loves throws him into a spiral of destruction.

Title: L'empreinte des géants
Description: The life of workers and their families in a construction site of a highway in 1965.

Title: Den enes död...
Description: A man is released from prison. He returns to the small community he used to live in.

Title: Yunost Petra
Description: Part one of a pair of historical films about the life of Peter the Great.

Title: ...Y al tercer año, resucitó
Description: On November 20, 1978 a truck driver picks up a man on the road, that tells him to take him to Pardo's Palace. Soon, the truck driver begins to realize who this person is.

Title: Jin zhan hua
Description: Lin plays a young woman with difficult family obligations, who falls in love with the father of a girl she is tutoring. Jealous ex-lovers are thrown into the mix, and love must venture to conquer all.

Title: Attentat
Description: A parliamentary debate on nuclear power is ongoing. Suddenly a shot is fired, aimed at the Minister of Energy. Is the act political, an act of terrorism or an ordinary murder?

Title: The Woman from Sarajevo
Description: The adaptation of a lesser known novel by Nobelist Ivo Andric, which describes the life of a spinster who was overwhelmed by a single passion: avarice.

Title: Temné slunce
Description: A remake of the 1948 atomic-age film, "Krakatit", by the same director. A scrupulous scientist is in the throes of a serious ethical dilemma after creating a highly-efficient explosive which may bring immeasurable suffering to mankind.

Title: O lacrima de fata
Description: The discovery of a drowned young girl's body makes the local authorities start an investigation.

Title: Pompa
Description: A YOUNG GIRL HAS A TREASURE TO GET OR TO FORGET.

Title: Rannyaya rzhavchina
Description: A young, beautiful woman with a colorful, eventful life but she is doomed only by its gray side. So tempting are the opportunities that are attributed to the cream of society.

Title: Svart hav
Description: In a near future the sea is almost drained for it's resources, due to big trawlers from UniFish emptying the sea for anything alive., ruining the lives of the small fisher men.

Title: Desde el abismo
Description: A single mother descends into alcoholism. At an AA meeting, she tells the story of how the habit destroyed her personal and professional life.

Title: Nakaw na pag-ibig
Description: Peter L. Gan presents a stirring love drama that sets the pace for 1980.

Title: Petrovka, 38
Description: Detective Kostenko is trying to find a group of criminals responsible for killing a policeman.

Title: Zhong yuan yi dian hong
Description: After a bet on a fight is made and an attempted assassination is thwarted, a man recently returned to town finds himself on the trail of a skilled killer leaving only a Mark of Blood on his victims.

Title: Jian qi xiao xiao kong que ling
Apocalypse Now
Description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

Title: The Warriors
Description: In the near future, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down.

Title: Stalker
Description: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

Title: Moonraker
Description: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

Title: Nosferatu the Vampyre
Description: Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

Title: Kramer vs. Kramer
Description: After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.

Title: Escape from Alcatraz
Description: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possibly successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

Title: Being There
Description: After the death of his employer forces him out of the only home he's ever known, a simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful tycoon and an insider in Washington politics.

Title: Time After Time
Description: H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.

Title: The Tin Drum
Description: In 1924, Oskar Matzerath is born in the Free City of Danzig. At age three, he falls down a flight of stairs and stops growing. In 1939, World War II breaks out.

Title: The Wanderers
Description: The Wanderers is a teenage, Italian gang in Bronx, NYC, 1963. They have their confrontations with other gangs. Drugs and weapons are uncool. Adult life awaits them.

Title: Tess
Description: A strong-willed young peasant girl attracts the affection of two men.

Title: The Black Stallion
Description: After being shipwrecked with a magnificent horse off the coast of Africa in the 1940s, a boy bonds with the stallion, and trains him to race after their rescue.

Title: Lupin III: The Castle of Cagliostro
Description: A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid policeman struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches, and learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to.

Title: The Concorde... Airport '79
Description: A supersonic airborne disaster. In order to survive a flight headed for the Moscow Olympics, passengers of the Concorde must endure aerial acrobatics to dodge missiles and survive a device that decompresses the plane.

Title: Prophecy
Description: A government health inspector is dispatched to assess the damage a logging company is causing to a patch of forest claimed by Native Americans, and comes face to face with true terror wrecking havoc in the woods.

Title: The Great Santini
Description: As he approaches manhood, Ben Meechum struggles to win the approval of his demanding alpha male father, an aggressively competitive, but frustrated Marine pilot.

Title: The Bitch
Description: The owner of a trendy disco starts having problems with the men in her life and the Mafia, which is trying to move in on her place.

Title: North Dallas Forty
Description: A satire of American professional football in which a veteran pass-catcher's individuality and refusal to become part of the team family is bitterly resented by his disciplinarian coaches.

Title: I Am Maria
Description: 11-year-old Maria is forced to stay with her relatives in a small town. She becomes friends with a quirky, drunken painter.

Title: My Brilliant Career
Description: A proud young woman in early 20th century Australia must choose between marriage and independence.

Title: A Little Romance
Description: An American teenager living in Paris meets and falls in love with a local.

Title: Wise Blood
Description: Fresh out of the army, Hazel Motes attempts to open the first Church Without Christ in the small town of Taulkinham.

Title: Vengeance Is Mine
Description: Chronological exploits of Iwao Enokizu, a murderous thief on the run.

Title: Starting Over
Description: A divorced man falls in love, but somehow he can't get over his ex-wife. This affects his love life in comic ways. Based on Dan Wakefield's novel.

Title: Bloodline
Description: When her father is murdered, a pharmaceutical heiress becomes the next target of an unknown killer amid the international jet set.

Title: Good Luck, Miss Wyckoff
Description: An abusive sexual relationship between a white spinster schoolteacher and an young black janitor in 1956 Kansas complicates her struggle to come to grips with her sexuality and emotions.

Title: Winter Kills
Description: The younger brother of an assassinated US President is led down a rabbit hole of conspiracies and dead ends after learning of a man claiming to be the real shooter.

Title: Beyond the Poseidon Adventure
Description: An extension of the previous film, wherein a cache of adventurers return to the overturned ship to seek several fortunes.

Title: Sunburn
Description: After a rich old man dies in a suspicious car accident in Acapulco, Mexico, his widow wants his insurance company to pony up five million dollars. Hotshot investigator Jake Decker (Charles Grodin) and charming model Ellie (Farrah Fawcett-Majors) come in to check it out.

Title: Tim
Description: A somewhat mentally handicapped 20-year-old man works as a laborer, but everyone abuses his naiveté. A nice 40-year-old American woman hires him one day and they become close. However, the town and his family see her as predatory.

Title: Saint Jack
Description: Jack Flowers, an American hustler in early 1970s Singapore, dreams of building a fortune by running a brothel and returning to the States to lead a life of luxury.

Title: Ashanti
Description: Dr. Anansa Linderby (Beverly Johnson) is kidnapped in a medical mission in Africa by a slave trader. From this moment, her husband will do anything to recover her and to punish the bad guys, but that will be not an easy task.

Title: Avalanche Express
Description: Soviet KGB General Marenkov defects to the Americans and together with his CIA handler Harry Wargrave they plan an operation meant to reveal the KGB agents in Europe.

Title: Twice a Woman
Description: When a museum directer, who has long been divorced, takes a young girl as a lover things quickly become more complicated when her ex-husband also engages in a relationship with the girl.

Title: Last Embrace
Description: Harry breaks down and loses his job after his wife is assassinated - could it be his turn next ?

Title: Nightwing
Description: Killer bats plague an Indian reservation in New Mexico.

Title: Dominique
Description: A millionaire, who drove his wife to commit suicide, starts believing that he is being haunted by her spirit.

Title: The Odd Angry Shot
Description: In between drinking cans of Fosters beer, Australian soldiers tread on a few landmines, and generally experience the war in Vietnam.

Title: Unidentified Flying Oddball
Description: An astronaut and his android double travel back to the time of King Arthur.

Title: Bear Island
Description: On the remote Norwegian Bear Island, used as a submarine base by the Germans during World War II, U.N. scientist Larsen sends a distress signal using an emergency N.A.T.O. frequency, and is received by scientific vessel Morning Rose.

Title: The Human Factor
Description: When a leak of information in the African section of British Intelligence is discovered, security man Daintry is brought in to investigate.

Title: The Passage
Description: During World War II, a Basque shepherd is approached by the underground, who wants him to lead a scientist and his family across the Pyrenees while being pursued by a sadistic German.

Title: Christ Stopped at Eboli
Description: A doctor in Fascist Italy is exiled to a remote village for his political views.

Title: The Prisoner of Zenda
Description: In order to save King Rudolph of Ruritania from assassins and murderous usurpers, the kingdom hires a look-a-like London cabby to impersonate the Monarch.

Title: The Fifth Musketeer
Description: When French King Louis XIV (Beau Bridges) learns that his twin brother, Philippe (Beau Bridges), could usurp his crown, he sets out to imprison him in the Bastille prison but four loyal musketeers are protecting Philippe.

Title: Cop or Hood
Description: Commissaire Stanislas Borowitz is going undercover as gangster Antonio Cerutti in order to expose corrupted policemen.

Title: The Lady Vanishes
Description: While travelling in pre-war Nazi Germany, a young couple realize a passenger seems to have been kidnapped off of their train, but, no other passenger aside from themselves, recalls her.

Title: Womanlight
Description: Two strangers help each other survive a night of great loss.

Title: The Riddle of the Sands
Description: In 1901, two British yachtsmen visiting Germany's Frisian Islands accidentally discover a German plot to invade England.

Title: Du är inte klok, Madicken
Description: Madicken is a Swedish girl from the upper level family, growing up during the time of first world war which did not include Sweden. She lives happily with her family, experiencing the world and making brave and crazy things.

Title: Confessions from the David Galaxy Affair
Description: Playboy David Galaxy is a suspect in a robbery case and needs an alibi, and the only credible witness to his innocence won't help. He also has to prove his mettle with "the only woman in the world who's never had an orgasm."

Title: The Shape of Things to Come
Description: Some time in the future, man has set up colonies on the Moon, when Earth becomes uninhabitable. A madman decides to destroy the Moon colonies with his robots and automated ships, and only three people and their robot can stop him.

Title: The Bell Jar
Description: As the horrors beneath the idealized 1950's come about, a successful young woman finds herself having a serious mental breakdown when she returns to New England.

Title: Hurricane
Description: The desperate love affair between a young Samoan chief and an American painter, against the will of her father. Amid this man-made tension comes a hurricane so devastating, the lives of the lovers and the entire island are imperiled.

Title: Effects
Description: While a small film crew are shooting a low budget horror movie in a house in the woods, the lines between reality and fiction start to blur, and the movie slowly starts to turn into a "snuff" film.

Title: The Magician of Lublin
Description: Yasha is a Jewish stage magician who tours through eastern Europe while destroying his career through personal problems. He has one more chance at theatrical success, but he needs to do a brand new trick in a Warsaw theater.

Title: The Outsider
Description: A young American man joins the IRA in Ireland but soon finds out that he is being used for political purposes and propaganda.

Title: Dead Mountaineer's Hotel
Description: Police gets a call-out to a lonely hotel in the Alps. When an officer gets to the hotel everything seems to be alright. Suddenly an avalanche cuts them out from the rest of the world and strange things are going to happen.

Title: The World Is Full of Married Men
Description: David Cooper works in advertising but spends more time on his love life despite the fact that he is married. When his wife Linda discovers his girlfriends, she decides to find get revenge by having an affair.

Title: Dr. Jekyll Likes Them Hot
Description: A lusty young woman decides to use her sexual powers to "tame" the evil and murderous Dr. Jekyll.

Title: The Great Gambler
Description: After unwittingly using his skills to obtain military secrets, a gambler is pursued by a police officer who happens to be his doppelganger.

Title: Memorias de Leticia Valle
Description: Based on the 1945 Memorias de Leticia Valle Memoirs of Leticia Valle is the fictionalized diary of an eleven-year-old girl who records an "inconceivable" seduction.

Title: Joi Baba Felunath: The Elephant God
Black Jack
Description: When honest young Tolly is forced on the run with 'Black Jack' adventure and mishap are never far away. Based on Leon Garfield's popular novel, Ken Loach's Black Jack is a dark and complex adventure film set in the 18th Century.

Title: Nightmares
Description: The life and times of a sensitive, poetic Polish boy who watches his country strive towards the liberation movement.

Title: Stone Cold Dead
Description: Sergeant Boyd's police search to find a sniper who has been shooting hookers.

Title: Game for Vultures
Description: The South African businessman David Swansey (Richard Harris) is delivering illegal German helicopters to Rhodesia. That makes patriot Gideon Marunga (Richard Roundtree) an angry man.

Title: Lesson of a Dead Language
Description: A young lieutenant Kiekeritz wants to give some meaning to his life. He starts to collect works of art.

Title: Naná
Description: Mexican adaptation of the Emile Zola novel.

Title: Ravagers
Description: In a post-apocalyptic world divided between two groups called the Flockers and the Ravagers, an adventurer and his "pleasure girl" try to find their way to a rumored safe haven called the Land of Genesis.

Title: She Came to the Valley
Description: A family moves to a border town near the Rio Grande and opens up a store. Unfortunately, Pancho Villa and his man storm the town and rob the place. The wife is left to fend for herself, so she gets in touch with the man who works for Villa.

Title: Natural Enemies
Description: A man hires hires five hookers to fulfill a final fantasy before killing himself and his family.

Title: The Medic
Description: The story is set in June 1983. Famous surgeon Jean-Marie Desprée was left by his wife 1 month ago and now he works in a modern movable hospital, where the 3rd world war is taking place.

Title: Tatsu no ko Tarô
Description: A young boy has to make a voyage to a distant lake to save his mother, who has been turned into a dragon.

Title: Christiana
Description: Sequel to Pilgrim's Progress. Christiana decides to follow in her husband's footsteps and make a pilgrimage to the Celestial City with her children and a friend.

Title: Tarka the Otter
Description: A family movie which follows the life of a real otter and its adventures in the wild.

Title: West Indies
Description: This vast musical fresco covers hundreds of years of history from enslavement to 20th-century immigration. Set on an enormous slave ship and boasts a dazzling array of brilliant choreography, wide-ranging musical styles and sharp satire.

Title: Life Sentence
Description: A former felon is blackmailed by a corrupt policeman and forced to commit a crime.

Title: Un si joli village...
Description: Bertin is a wealthy and respected man in his town. His power is put in jeopardy when he accidentally kills his wife in a domestic argument.

Title: Az eröd
Description: A World War II-style "war game" setting the wealthy customers against skilled mercenaries goes awry when the simulated war gets too real.

Title: La viuda de Montiel
Description: While a train takes a woman to her destination, accompanied by her only daughter, she remembers the events that marked the life of her dead son and that led her to such a tragic outcome.

Title: Victoria
Description: The tragic romance between the son of a miller and a landlord's daughter.

Title: From the Cloud to the Resistance
Yuan yue wan dao
Description: Inspired from a famous martial arts tale, a young swordsman becomes obsessed with sword supremacy and challenges another kung fu master, where everything begins.

Title: Surja Dighal Bari
Description: A poor family returns to their village from Dhaka after The Great Bengal Femine 1943. This movie centers on their struggling life during the World War II period.

Title: Terror e Êxtase
Description: Girl and her boyfriend are kidnapped. She develops a strange attraction to her kidnapper and the two get involved.

Title: The Secret of Steel City
Description: Two scientists use their inherited fortune differently. One designs a beautiful town called Fortuna, while the second builds huge factories to make munitions known as Steel City.

Title: Jûhassai, umi e
Description: Kei and Atsuo were both enrolled in summer school. After school, the two head to the beach, they find another student against a local gang member, to see who is able to hold his breath longer under water. They decide to try too.

Title: Iracema, a Virgem dos Lábios de Mel
Description: The loves and life of a beautiful Brazilian Indian woman.

Title: Ajándék ez a nap
Description: Irén and Attila, a not-so-young couple, are in love. All they want is a flat of their own where they could live together. Unfortunately, Hungary in the 70s is no place for dreams.

Title: Les fabuleuses aventures du légendaire Baron de Munchausen
Description: 1979 animated cartoon of legendary Baron of Münchausen, including stories like hunting wild ducks with bacon or his escape from inside a whale.

Title: The House of Hanging
Description: Kosuke visits a photo studio to take photo for his passport. There he happens to meet a daughter who came to request a wedding anniversary photo shoot.

Title: Rend mig i traditionerne
Description: An 18 y.o. Danish man is arrested after barking and biting a policeman. He ends up in a mental hospital where the comedy continues.

Title: Devil's Flute
Description: Famous detective Kindaichi investigates a series of mysterious murders revolving around a wealthy family.

Title: Peruvazhiyambalam
Description: This is a National award winning and critically acclaimed film by P Padmarajan, based on his novel of the same name. The film explores the angst of a teenage mind remorseful of murder and the changes life brings in the aftermath.

Title: La boda del señor cura
Description: The evolution of Jesuit priest Juan Camí, from his early years of great faith and Falange-supporting patriotism, to the moment he loses his faith, becomes a Communist and marries a stripper.

Title: Kort Amerikaans
Description: Erik is avoiding the Nazi occupants and stay out of the hands of the Germans, and instead in Elly's arms.

Title: Cathy's Child
Description: A father kidnaps his three-year-old daughter and goes to Greece. The mother comes in contact with a journalist who helps her to get her daughter back.

Title: L'esprit de famille
Description: Pauline, Cécile, Claire and Bernadette, young adolescent girls are gradually discovering the adult world and its disappointments. Between an impossible love, running away and multiple arguments, parents no longer know where to turn.

Title: Au revoir à lundi
Description: The daily life of two young women in Montreal.

Title: Kassbach - Ein Portrait
Description: The Viennese vegetable merchant Karl Kassbach becomes a member of the right-wing extremist organization "Initiative", which plans numerous attacks and assassinations in the Vienna.

Title: These Ruins That You See
Description: A literature teacher in Mexico City decides to move back to his hometown. Even before reaching his destination, complications arise. Once in Cuévano he gets quickly enmeshed by the social climate of the town.

Title: Le coup de sirocco
Description: Paul Narboni remembers his happy childhood in Algeria before leaving the country in 1954. With his family, he then arrives in Marseille before reaching Paris. His father Albert, a grocer, will have to adapt to this new country.

Title: The Three Undelivered Letters
Description: A young Japanese-American man arrives at his grandmother's old hometown in Yamaguchi, begins to stay at her family's elite but dysfunctional household, and gets entangled in a sinister plot of murder.

Title: Yorgun savasci
Description: The role played by the regular army in the Turkish War of Independence. This film's footage was burned by the military junta in 1983.

Title: And Quiet Rolls the Dawn
Description: The daughter of an economically middle-class family fails to return home one night.

Title: El rediezcubrimiento de México
Description: The story of an Spanish immigrant. His misfortune, success and return to his beloved Asturias is displayed in this movie.

Title: Jukyusai no chizu
Description: Yanagimachi's first feature film is about a young man who makes a map of a neighborhood in which he delivers newspapers. He keeps a dossier on each family, recording their habits and rating how much he dislikes them.

Title: Johnny Larsen
Description: The coming of age of a young man in the 1950s.

Title: A Summer of Love
Description: The middle-aged married scientist David falls in love head over heels with the teenage girl Eva.

Title: Paco l'infaillible
Description: In 20's Spain, young low-class women want to be hired as nannies by rich families. To get milk, these women ask help to young worker Paco to be pregnant. Paco, whose wife is sterile, accepts and earns money that way.

Title: Kong que wang chao
Description: Kung Fu knight Shen Lang stumbles across grave robbers while on the trail of a martial arts mass murderer.

Title: Ballë për ballë
Description: A translator at the conference of communist parties witnessed the biggest break between the two communist parties. The dramatic events in the military conflict take place on a naval base in Albania, which the Soviets did not dare to adopt.

Title: Tenshi o yûwaku
Description: This story of the everyday life of a couple living together is made all the more powerful by the lead's real off-screen romance.

Title: The Finzi Detective Agency
Description: Riccardo Finzi is a private investigator On his first night in town he meets a mysterious girl named Susy, who is later found dead. Convinced of foul play, he and his assistant Giuseppe decide to investigate.

Title: A Matter of Love
Description: While on vacation, a pair of married couples decide to trade spouses.

Title: O Guarani
Description: The love affair between Ceci, a white woman and a handsome Indian, Peri, in Brazil.

Title: The Street Smarts
Description: Fresh out of prison after four hard years of incarceration, a criminal mastermind and respected ringleader reunites with his old gang, only to relapse into his old habits. However, is everything as it seems?

Title: Dead Angle
Description: A crime story about a sociopath businessman and his associates who cheat small businesses out of their money with shady contracts in the early 50s.

Title: Kejsaren
Description: Elje, a mentally handicapped and bullied young man, is longing for his mother. He acquaints the local whore, a polish woman, who resembles his mother.

Title: Für Mord kein Beweis
Description: A week after a fight with her husband of 20 years, a woman's naked body is found in a lake. Was it an accident, suicide or - murder?

Title: Ena gelasto apogevma
Description: After a long decade of separation, a rising politician accompanies his ex-wife to the airport, thirsting for closure. As both fight with their inner demons, a suicide bomber threatens them. Will they find redemption this smiling afternoon?

Title: The Dead Cast a Shadow
Description: Depicts the life of the socialist underground in Poland during World War II. Devotion, loyalty, suspicion, betrayal, and double agents.

Title: Historien om en moder
Description: A young mother is alone with her baby, as Death comes to pick it up. Motherly love drives her to do everything to get the baby back. Modern day story inspired by H.C Andersen's 1847 fairy tale.

Title: Trællenes oprør
Description: This film follows the young slaves Gerd, Jöran and Anders through the centuries.

Title: Rallarblod
Description: In a rich town somewhere in Norway in 1910, a railroad is made with the bare hands of traveling railroad workers. With them follows noise and trouble, due to drinking and fighting. On of them, Sjugurd, sets his eye on a farmer daughter.

Title: Cuando Pizarro, Cortez y Orellana eran amigos
Description: An anthropological fable surrounding the clash of two cultures in the conquest of America.

Title: Kristoffers hus
Description: A divorced Swedish photographer is offered a secret photo shoot. He is hired to photograph an old dead man's apartment. Dead for several months. He becomes very engaged by the man's fate and refuses to leave the pictures for publication.

Title: Chcialbym sie zgubic...
Description: Believing his mother is alive, Alek is sure he will meet her one day. Anna, the educator who inspires him to trust, now tells him that he has no mother. The hurt boy becomes aggressive and withdrawn, and runs away from the orphanage.

Title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
Description: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, California, where they replicate the residents into emotionless automatons one body at a time.

Title: Death on the Nile
Description: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

Title: Watership Down
Description: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

Title: The Lord of the Rings
Description: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

Title: The Fury
Description: A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from terrorists, who want to use his mental powers for evil.

Title: The Wiz
Description: An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.

Title: Magic
Description: A ventriloquist is at the mercy of his vicious dummy while he tries to renew a romance with his high school sweetheart.

Title: Coma
Description: When a young female doctor notices an unnatural amount of comas occurring in her hospital she uncovers a horrible conspiracy.

Title: The Boys from Brazil
Description: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

Title: The Great Train Robbery
Description: England, 1850s. A master criminal aims to rob a train of a large sum of gold. Security is incredibly tight and the task seems an impossible one. However, he has a plan and just the right people to carry it out.

Title: The Swarm
Description: A huge swarm of deadly African bees spreads terror over American cities by killing thousands of people.

Title: The Wild Geese
Description: A British banker hires a group of British mercenaries to rescue a deposed African President from the hands of a corrupt African dictator.

Title: Straight Time
Description: After being released on parole, a career burglar assaults his former probation officer, returns to a life of crime, and goes on the run.

Title: The Big Sleep
Description: Grizzled American private detective in England investigates a complicated case of blackmail turned murder involving a rich but honest elderly general, his two loose socialite daughters, a pornographer and a gangster.

Title: Behind Convent Walls
Description: On the surface the women at the convent are your average nuns. However, what they get up to in their spare time is far from what you'd expect from nuns.

Title: The Buddy Holly Story
Description: The story of the life and career of the early rock and roll singer, from his meteoric rise to stardom, to his marriage and untimely death.

Title: The Medusa Touch
Description: A telekinetic novelist causes disasters simply by thinking about them.

Title: The Silent Partner
Description: A timid bank teller anticipates a bank robbery and steals the money himself before the crook arrives. When the sadistic crook realizes he's been fooled, he tracks down the teller and engages him in a cat-and-mouse chase for the cash.

Title: The Manitou
Description: A psychic's girlfriend finds out that a lump on her back is a growing reincarnation of a 400-year-old demonic Native American spirit.

Title: Empire of Passion
Description: A married woman and her lover murder her husband and dump his body into a well. After a while, his ghost comes to haunt them while the local gossip grows stronger.

Title: Beauty and the Beast
Description: In this gothic rendition of the classic fairy tale, a merchant's youngest daughter is held prisoner by a mysterious winged beast.

Title: The Brink's Job
Description: A fictional retelling of the infamous Brink's Company robbery in Boston, which took place on January 17th, 1950, with a score of $2.700.000, and cost the American taxpayers $29.000.000 to apprehend the culprits with only $58.000 recovered.

Title: The Betsy
Description: The aging, retired founder of an auto giant comes out of retirement to try to develop a safe, fuel-efficient car.

Title: Gray Lady Down
Description: A Navy Captain uses his experimental Snark to reach a nuclear submarine stuck on an ocean ledge.

Title: Go Tell the Spartans
Description: During the early 1960s, U.S. military advisers in South Vietnam discover the same challenges that plagued the French army in Indochina ten years prior.

Title: International Velvet
Description: Velvet's orphaned niece Sarah follows her dream of Olympic glory with her horse Arizona Pie.

Title: Who'll Stop the Rain
Description: This gripping, action-intensive and thought-provoking film focuses on the drama and desperation of drug smuggling and heroin addiction and stars Nick Nolte and Tuesday Weld. In HD.

Title: The Thirty Nine Steps
Description: In March 1914, a mining engineer named Richard Hannay tries to prevent Prussian Agents from executing a political assassination designed to trigger World War I.

Title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
Description: A Sherlock Holmes spoof about a family that has been haunted for years by the curse of a horrible hound.

Title: The Big Fix
Description: An ex-'60s radical now working as a private eye is hired by an old flame to investigate a political smear campaign. The case becomes more dangerous as it unfolds.

Title: The Water Babies
Description: This children's fantasy tells the story of a 12-year-old boy who discovers a complex underwater world where young children are held prisoner by an evil shark and an eel.

Title: Who Is Killing the Great Chefs of Europe?
Description: One by one, the greatest Chefs in Europe are being killed. Each chef murdered in the same manner that their own special dish is prepared in. Food critics and the (many) self-proclaimed greatest Chefs in Europe demand the mystery be solved.

Title: The Chant of Jimmie Blacksmith
Description: Jimmie Blacksmith, the son of an Aboriginal mother and a white father, falls victim to much racist abuse after marrying a white woman, and goes on a killing spree and finds himself on the run in the aftermath.

Title: Rosie Dixon - Night Nurse
Description: Young Rosie Dixon starts her nurse training at St Adelaide's Hospital, but the student doctors and randy male patients just can't keep their hands off her.

Title: Brass Target
Description: In 1945, General Patton sends Germany's confiscated gold reserves to Frankfurt, but the Army train is robbed by plotters who also hire a Swiss hitman to kill the General.

The consequences of the Destruction of Smyrna and the Genocide of the Greeks in Turkey, as seen through the eyes of three characters who were dragged to the arid plains of Anatolia only to succumb to hunger, thirst, and the winner's knife.

Title: Les liens de sang
Description: Homicide detective Steve Carella is trying to solve the brutal murder of 17-year-old Muriel Stark. Her younger cousin Patricia, who saw the killer and barely escaped with her life, helps him. However, the case soon takes a bizarre turn.

Title: Pilgrim's Progress
Description: Journey with Pilgrim as John Bunyan's famous allegory leaps from its pages to a movie.

Title: Bloodbrothers
Description: A young man is torn between following in his brothers' footsteps or striking out on his own.

Title: Caravans
Description: In 1948, at the U.S. embassy in Zadestan, a young diplomat is ordered to find the missing daughter of an influential U.S. Senator.

Title: Perceval
Description: The exploits of Sir Perceval, a legendary exemplar of knightly chivalry and one of the champions of King Arthur's Round Table.

Title: Boarding School
Description: This film tells the story about a group of girls at an exclusive German girls boarding school. Across the lake is an exclusive boys boarding school...

Title: Men Can't Be Raped
Description: A woman is raped. She starts to follow and study her rapist.

Title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
Description: A young boy becomes an apprentice for a mysterious sorcerer, working at the sorcerer's strange and sinister mill where secretive black magic is being taught and performed at a very heavy price.

Title: Despair
Description: In early-1930s Berlin, an elegant Russian émigré and eccentric chocolatier convinces himself that he has seen his doppelgänger, and hatches a murderous plan to trade his existence for an entirely new one. Will he get over the deep despair?

Title: Money Movers
Description: An armoured car company is the target of repeated heists. Company leadership is enforcing new measures in order to tighten security. The biggest danger of a new heist lies from within the company's own ranks.

Title: Bandits vs. Samurai Squadron
Description: Kumokiri Nizaemon, a former samurai warrior, has abandoned his class to become the leader of a gang of thieves. He leads his outlaws in an attempt to rob the castle of his former clan.

Title: The Glass Cell
Description: A man is wrongfully imprisoned for five years. Once out, he hears about his wife's supposed adventures outside of their marriage and becomes increasingly jealous.

Title: Attention, les enfants regardent
Description: In a seaside villa, where under the care of a nanny, a group of children spend most of their days watching violent television shows.

Title: Corleone
Description: Two friends grow up together in the Sicily of the '50s. Two different destiny, two different way of life. Could their friendship survive to the mafia shadow?

Title: Le témoin
Description: A sexually adventurous young woman approaches Antonio, an Italian art-restorer working at a cathedral in France. He resists getting involved with her but later he finds out she was raped and murdered in a derelict house.

Title: Mullum Malarum
Description: A boorish villager butts heads with a newly appointed engineer from the city.

Title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
Description: A young man learns about the secrets hidden in the Heavenly Sword and the Dragon Sabre to become the head of the Kung-Fu world, while unifying the Chinese Zoroastrianism Cult, and eventually overthrows the Mongolian Dynasty.

Title: Mysteries
Description: A wealthy visitor to a small town befriends a midget and gets involved with two women as his behaviour becoming ever stranger.

Title: Mig og Charly
Description: Steffen is picnicking with his girlfriend, daughter of a rich businessman, when he meets Charly - trying to steal Steffen's moped. Later they end up as BFFs despite the differences.

Title: The Shooting Party
Description: A romantic drama in which a beautiful but poor young woman has to choose between three suitors: an old widower, a decadent nobleman and a handsome but poor young man.

Title: Dossier 51
Description: An unnamed French intelligence service spies on and analyzes a French diplomat code name '51' to identify a method to control him.

Title: Un papillon sur l'épaule
Description: A man who finds there is another world to the one we know.

Title: Oi tembelides tis eforis koiladas
Description: A father moves with his three sons and their beautiful, hard working servant in a big, old house in the countryside, where a weird drowsiness seems to occupy the four men. Will it be possible for one of them to break free?

Title: Pastorale 1943
Description: In a Dutch village during the German occupation, a small group of badly organized resistance fighters attempt to assassinate a collaborator.

Title: Alice in Spanish Wonderland
Description: Based on the story Alice in Wonderland, Alicia has fallen asleep on a summer afternoon on the bank of a river. When she thinks she awakens, she meets an erotic black bunny in the shape of a woman who catches her attention.

Title: Io sono mia
Description: Vannina and Giacinto are a young married couple who live their relationship in an unequal way; while the girl is submissive to the will of her husband Giacinto, he sees in his bride only the personal object of his sexual satisfaction.

Title: Hababam Sinifi Dokuz Doguruyor
Description: A son of a tribe chef comes to the class, and he declares himself as a landowner. At the same time, a girl who has a boyfriend in the class gets pregnant. This is the funny and dramatic story of a class.

Title: Main Tulsi Tere Aangan Ki
Description: A woman raises the illegitimate son of her husband along with her own, treating them both equally. But her decision to hand over the property matters to the illegitimate son is met with hostility by her own revenge-minded son.

Title: Shag
Description: In this crime thriller produced by Toshiro Mifune (who has a supporting role), hard-boiled Shiro Akitsu goes on a relentless search for his abducted 7-year old daughter, with the aid of an Ainu dog summoned by a whistle she gave him.

Title: Jacob Two-Two Meets the Hooded Fang
Description: A six year old boy has a dream in which he is in jail.

Title: On the Yard
Description: In prison, one prisoner buys some smokes from another. Then he admits he can't pay for it and becomes indebted to him and the interest is rising daily.

Title: L'argent des autres
Description: A bank employee tries to clear his name after he is unfairly fired.

Title: Magyarok
Description: Many Hungarian migrant workers work in Germany in good conditions and for good wages during WW2. They face the war only once they return home to Hungary.

Title: Óscar, Kina y el láser
Description: Oscar builds a laser which oddly begins to speak to him when switched on. They set off on an adventure, along with Oscar's goose Kina, to rescue a kidnapped child.

Title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
Description: Only the union of the title weapons can save the six remaining martial arts sects who are vying for mastery.

Title: The Key Is in the Door
Description: The life of Marie, a French teacher, is completely upset by the arrival in her class of a hectic schoolboy.

Title: Yasei no shômei
Description: A Japanese Warrior leaves the secretive battalion he is apart of. As a skilled soldier, he confronts evil and serves his people.

Title: Asya
Description: Based on the eponymous novella by Turgenev, the film follows the narrator, a young Russian man traveling in Germany. He meets his compatriots, Gagin and his sister Asya. The narrator and Asya fall in love, but will he take the next step?

Title: Double Suicide of Sonezaki
Description: A poor merchant and a prostitue plan to suicide together after being pressured and betrayed by their surroundings.

Title: O Cortiço
Description: This adaptation of a classic Brazilian novel focuses on the relations of charismatic characters within a tenement.

Title: Va voir maman, papa travaille
Description: Family mother and model wife, Agnes hits a vehicle while driving in Paris. She immediately falls in love with the driver of the damaged car.

Title: Un balcon en forêt
Description: At the start of the Last World War, on the Maginot Line, a troop of French soldiers awaited the German invasion.

Title: Loggerheads
Description: In Weimar Germany, twin brothers Hermann and Gustav find themselves on opposite extremes: Hermann is a loyal sympathizer of the emerging Nazi party and Gustav is an anarchist who prints and spreads anti-Nazi propaganda.

Title: Charmurti
Description: Based on Narayan Gangopadhyay’s creation, Potoldangar Charmurti is the story of Tenida and his three followers, who go on a holiday and end up solving a mystery case.

Title: The Great Brain
Description: A young boy has great fun conning his family, friends, and neighbors.

Title: La mazzetta
Description: Sasá Iovine, a small-time Neopolitan operator, finds himself in the thick of a multi-murder mystery when Don Michele, a building contractor hires Iovine to find his daughter who has disappeared with incriminating documents.

Title: Divinas palabras
Description: Mari Gaila is an adulteress who lives between ragged, thieves, prostitutes, dwarfs and other misshapen beings, in a rare box at a country and a vague time.

Title: Weekend of Shadows
Description: In the 1930s, a farmer's wife in a small town is murdered. Suspicion falls on a Polish labourer and a posse is formed to catch him.

Title: Two Solitudes
Description: The story of the problems caused by what became known as the Conscripton Crisis in 1917 Canada, which threatened to divide the country.

Title: Chakravyuha
Description: A young man fights spies to defend his country.

Title: La ciudad maldita
Description: A wandering gunman/lawman comes to a town in the old west where lawlessness and crime roam. A murder-mystery set in the old wild-west.

Title: The Sailor's Return
Description: Set in the early days of the reign of Queen Victoria provides an unusual historical representation of a black person's experience of England.

Title: Steppe
Description: A boy in Russia, circa 1900, makes a daunting trip from his home village to a school in the city.

Title: Swordsman and Enchantress
Description: Master kung-fu choreographer Tang Chia leads the king and queen of Shaw Brothers' swordplay, Ti Lung and Lily Li, to the amazing "Deer Sword" and escape from the insidious maze-like "Toy Land"

Title: Mon premier amour
Description: Story of a young man who finally gets a chance to know and love his still beautiful mother who is dying of leukemia.

Title: L'enfant de nuit
Description: Claudia Lanza can not overcome the death of her son, Marco, killed in an accident for which she blames her husband, Andrea.

Title: Hør, var der ikke en som lo?
The Suspended Vocation
Description: Divergent factions within the Catholic Church are plagued by internal ideological quarrels.

Title: Lyftet
Description: Kennet, an incompetent thief and incorrigible petty criminal, longs to even 'the score,' which is not in his favor.

Title: Mutthi Bhar Chawal
Description: Trilok, a horse carriage driver dies during an altercation as he is accused of having criminal connections. The community pressurizes his younger brother Mangal to marry the widow. Mangal having another love interest faces a cliffhanger.

Title: August Without Emperor
Description: A group of ultra-right military prepares a coup d'etat, code-named August Without the Emperor, with the goal of establishing a military dictatorship.

Title: Inkognito iz Peterburga
Description: In the 19th century, a corrupt authorities of provincial town horrified by the news that inspector from a capital coming to them for inspection.

Title: BUÉK!
Description: Three young research chemists celebrate a few days before New Year's Eve. Their friendship completely falls apart by the end of the night.

Title: Arrive Before Daybreak
Description: The story of political prisoners, detained in a jail before the start of the WWII, and their torture and attempts to escape, and join a partisan unit.

Title: Los de abajo
Description: Mexican author Mariano Azuela's novel about a peasant who joins a group of rebels who fight in the Mexican Revolution.

Title: Hail Hazana
Description: Several inconformities begin to develop at a catholic boys school in the transitional Spain of the seventies. After three students are expelled, a new director arrives with new liberal ideas, but things remain the same way.

Title: Queen Bee
Description: Private detective Kindaichi investigates a series of murders in scenic rural Japan.

Title: El recurso del método
Description: It tells the story of a dictatorship. Its protagonist is the sum and essence of several of the rulers who have exercised absolute power in Latin American countries.

Title: Koncert në vitin 1936
Description: Tells the story of tow artistes, they visite in the city of Lushnja and the way that the citizens of Lushnja treatet them.

Title: The New Beaujolais Wine Has Arrived...
Description: Camadule is in charge of buying several barrels of the Beaujolais new wine. the Capitaine and Kamel will travel with him to get the divine beverage.

Title: From Orion's Testimony: Formula for Murder
Kvarkvare
Description: Kvarkvare is wrongly accused of activities against the Tsar and is imprisoned, but the Socialist Revolution makes him an imposter "hero". Blinded with the authority, he goes to far in his avenge against the whole village.

Title: A Walk in the Sun
Description: Tore Andersson is a depressed 43 year old sport journalist living in Stockholm. His girlfriend has left him so he decides to take a vacation in Cyprus.

Title: Misfire
Description: A major routine explosion is to be carried out at a power plant, but it does not work properly.

Title: Armed and Dangerous: Time and Heroes of Bret Harte
The Stud Farm
Description: A new supervisor arrives at a horse ranch, but as he is not at all well-liked, he meets quite an amount of resistance and cannot put across his will.

Title: Taugenichts
Description: A young man seeks freedom and eventually gets conformed. To escape society, he wanders south. After some adventures he returns to his lover, where he expects a civil career.

Title: Das Einhorn
Description: An advertising expert and writer is pushed by his publisher to deliver a script for a new book. This one is supposed to be on the topic sexuality.

Title: Oka Oori Katha
Description: The father of a son living on the fringes of a village believes that working is a fools game, for the lord takes what little the workers make. When a young woman enters their home tensions begin to rise and their idle life is threatened.

Title: Obyasneniye v lyubvi
Description: The life of Filipok, a young man with a romantic personality, which happens in the first half of the 20th century in Soviet Russia. Filipok finds love with a young women, Zinochka who is of aristocratic roots.

Title: Teatris
Description: Human attempts to understand why when acting they are all going through the heart, but in real life are playing a role.

Title: Front za liniey fronta
Description: Film is a sequel to "Front bez flangov" (1974). About the partisans fighting against the Nazi's occupation of Rissia during the WWII.

Title: Winterspelt 1944
Description: The film is set in September 1944, when a Wehrmacht officer tries to surrender his unit, stationed in the German Eifel village of Winterspelt, to nearby American forces.

Title: An Unknown Friend
Description: The cold and ruthless Bruno is married to Karen. Together they seek out poor and defenseless people offering them life insurance policies. Bruna and Karen make sure that it pays off.

Title: Slægten
Description: An adaptation of Gustav Wied's nineteenth century novel about a baron who takes a young bride, but reacts brutally when she is not faithful to him.

Title: Doramundo
Description: A series of murders begins to haunt Cordilheira, a small town near São Paulo, Brazil. The investigations show there is a love triangle involved.

Title: Det andre skiftet
Description: A middle aged man has his life overthrown within some summer weeks in 1977. His wife finds a younger man, and uncertainties at work.

Title: Operasjon Cobra
Description: The three 13 year old friends lives close to the airport, and discovers that something fishy is going on around the time the American foreign minister is about to land.

Title: Jiu wen long
Description: The strong willed son of a rich lord has a natural gift for martial arts and his brash temper ends up in hs family being murdered, he realises the error of his arrogant ways and becomes a humble hero fighting for justice.

Title: Tutto suo padre
Description: A young Roman receives from his mother, who is dying, a shocking news: he is the natural son of Adolf Hitler, conceived during a fling between the Führer and the lady during the visit that the German dictator made to Italy in 1938.

Title: Huso astgh
Description: Commanders David Bek and Mkhitar Sparapet lead a major struggle against Turkish invaders in the Syunik region of Armenia in the 18th century.

Title: Iron Gate
Description: The lives of two people in Athens in the 50's. One is a former Resistance fighter, now compromised, and the other is an adventurer who takes advantage of the first man he finds in front of him to become an industrialist.

Title: Ne pleure pas
Description: Marc Lafarge, 13, is idolized by his brother Thomas, 20, future veterinarian and amateur boxer. Thomas has a soul of justice. Thus, returning home with Marc after a fight, he hits a little thug who has just robbed an old lady.

Title: Como Matar Uma Sogra
Description: A dissatisfied man and his conflicts with his wealthy mother-in-law's demands.

Title: Azyl
Description: In 1946, a former resistance fighter starts working as a forester in a small town in Masuria. The local people don't trust him, robberies are common and his old flame is married to another man.

Title: Sluzhebno polozhenie-ordinaretz
Description: This is a film about human dignity in a society resting on violence and subordination.

Title: As Aventuras de Robinson Crusoé
Description: Robinson Crusoe spoof, with touches of Peter Pan. Shipwreck victim lands on a desert island, finds a friendly native and has to fight pirates whose leader is Captain Hook himself.

Title: Un idilio de estación
Description: A girl falls in love with the son of a rancher, who gives her certain illusions about their relationship.

Title: Formynderne
Description: The painter Else is used to do things and paintings her way, but after getting married she struggles in finding the balance, which leads to a nervous breakdown. She finds help in a psychic doctor. Or at least she thinks so.

Title: Ein Mädchen aus Schnee
Description: It centers on the ten-year-old Peter who is in love with his classmate Jana. Much to his despair, however, Una is attracted to another classmate. Peter escapes into a dream world.

Title: Suspiria
Description: An American newcomer to a prestigious German ballet academy comes to realize that the school is a front for something sinister amid a series of grisly murders.

Title: The Spy Who Loved Me
Description: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.

Title: A Bridge Too Far
Description: Operation Market Garden, September 1944: The Allies attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands in the hope of breaking the German lines.

Title: The Deep
Description: In Bermuda, two amateur treasure-hunting divers have a run-in with local criminals when they inadvertently discover the secret cargo of a World War II shipwreck.

Title: The Sentinel
Description: A young woman moves into an apartment in a building which houses a sinister evil.

Title: The Rescuers
Description: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

Title: Sorcerer
Description: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.

Title: Bilitis
Description: A coming of age story centering on the exploits of a young girl during summer vacation.

Title: Looking for Mr. Goodbar
Description: A dedicated schoolteacher spends her nights cruising bars, looking for abusive men with whom she can engage in progressively violent sexual encounters.

Title: Valentino
Description: The life of 1920s movie star and sex symbol Rudolph Valentino.

Title: Airport '77
Description: Art thieves hijack a 747, hit fog and crash into the ocean, trapping them and the passengers under one hundred feet of water.

Title: Black Sunday
Description: Black Sunday is the powerful story of a Black September terrorist group attempting to blow up a Goodyear blimp hovering over the Super Bowl stadium with 80,000 people and the president of the United States in attendance.

Title: The Island of Dr. Moreau
Description: A shipwrecked survivor discovers a remote island owned by a crazed scientist who is carrying out sinister experiments on the island's inhabitants.

Title: Demon Seed
Description: A scientist creates Proteus--an organic super computer with artificial intelligence which becomes obsessed with human beings, and in particular the creators wife.

Title: That Obscure Object of Desire
Description: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

Title: Cross of Iron
Description: German commander Hauptmann Stransky (Maximilian Schell) places a squad in extreme danger after Sergeant Rolf Steiner (James Coburn) refuses to lie for him.

Title: The White Buffalo
Description: At the closing of 1874 a haunted, dying Wild Bill Hickok teams up with a grieving Crazy Horse to hunt a murderous albino buffalo.

Title: Alucarda
Description: After the death of her parents, a young girl arrives at a convent and brings a sinister presence with her. Is it her enigmatic imaginary friend, Alucarda, who is to blame? Or is there a satanic force at work?

Title: The American Friend
Description: Tom Ripley, who deals in forged art, suggests a picture framer he knows would make a good hit man.

Title: Soldier of Orange
Description: During World War II, Dutch students join the resistance movement against the German occupation of The Netherlands.

Title: Audrey Rose
