Description: A stranger attempts to convince a happily married couple that their daughter is actually his daughter reincarnated.

Title: Candleshoe
Description: Welcome to Candleshoe, a stately English manor where a swashbuckling pirate hid a fortune in Spanish doubloons centuries ago. And that's what young orphan Casey and a sly con man are determined to find.

Title: Damnation Alley
Description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a group of survivors travel and find other settlements in huge custom designed all terrain vehicles.

Title: Love Letters of a Portuguese Nun
Telefon
Description: A Russian officer is sent to the U.S. to try and stop sleeper agents who will mindlessly attack government entities when they hear certain coded words.

Title: The Last Remake of Beau Geste
Description: An aging Sir Hector Geste (Trevor Howard) takes a young greedy wife who's after his famed Blue Water sapphire, but his sons hide the gem and join the French Foreign Legion in North Africa.

Title: The Ascent
Description: Two Soviet partisans on a mission to gather food contend with the winter cold, the occupying Germans, and their own psyches.

Title: Semi-Tough
Description: A three-way friendship between two free-spirited professional football players and the owner's daughter becomes compromised when two of them become romantically involved.

Title: Empire of the Ants
Description: Con artist Marilyn Fryser tries to sell bogus real estate deals in an area overrun by giant ants.

Title: Bobby Deerfield
Description: Bobby Deerfield, a famous American race car driver on the European circuit, falls in love with the enigmatic Lillian Morelli, who is terminally ill.

Title: Oh, God!
Description: When God appears to an assistant grocery manager as a good natured old man, the Almighty selects him as his messenger for the modern world.

Title: The Other Side of Midnight
Description: A Greek tycoon's mistress tries to track down and find her ex-World War II lover.

Title: The Debut
Description: The delicate story of the impossible love between an older married man and a fourteen-year old schoolgirl.

Title: Fun with Dick and Jane
Description: When an upwardly mobile couple find themselves unemployed and in debt, they turn to armed robbery in desperation.

Title: The Pack
Description: The residents of vacation spot Seal Island find themselves terrorized by a pack of dogs -- the remnants of discarded pets by visiting vacationers.

Title: The Haunting of Julia
Description: After her daughter's death, wealthy American homemaker Julia Lofting moves to London to restart her life. All seems well until she is haunted by the ghosts of other children while mourning for her own.

Title: The Choirboys
Description: A group of Los Angeles cops decide to take off some of the pressures of their jobs by engaging in various forms of after hours debauchery.

Title: Hitch-Hike
Description: A bickering couple driving cross-country pick up a murderous hitchhiker who threatens to kill them unless they take him to a sanctuary. In return he agrees to split some bank loot he has on him.

Title: Young Lady Chatterley
Description: Cynthia Chatterley is a young and beautiful, and a bit naïve. She is about to embark on an incredible odyssey of sexual discovery.

Title: Tintorera: Killer Shark
Description: Two shark hunters flirt with an attractive British lady while hunting down a large tiger shark terrorizing the Mexican East coast.

Title: I Never Promised You a Rose Garden
Description: A disturbed,institutionalized 16-year-old girl struggles between fantasy and reality.

Title: Twilight's Last Gleaming
Description: An imprisoned rogue USAF general with a secret personal agenda, escapes the brig and takes over an ICBM silo, threatening to start WW3.

Title: Emmanuelle 3
Description: Emmanuelle and her architect husband continue their amoral lifestyle in the Seychelles. But when a casual dalliance between her and a film director starts to turn serious her husband shows very traditional signs of jealousy

Title: The Brothers Lionheart
Description: Brothers Jonatan and Skorpan lead a revolution against the tyrant Tengil in the magical afterlife land of Nangijala.

Title: The Domino Principle
Description: A Vietnam War veteran, imprisoned for murder, is offered his freedom if he accepts to undertake a contract killing for a shady organization.

Title: La stanza del vescovo
Description: Mario, a rich and eccentric war hero befriends Marco, a loner with a sailboat and takes him home to meet his estranged wife Cleofe and sexually repressed sister in law Matilde.

Title: Sleeping Dogs
Description: A New Zealand man recently estranged from his family gets unwittingly caught up in a revolution.

Title: The People That Time Forgot
Description: In 1919, a British expedition in the Antarctica region is searching for a lost American explorer and finds a hidden prehistoric world instead.

Title: Golden Rendezvous
Description: On a cargo ship converted into a cruise-liner, First Officer John Carter foils the plan of international hijackers to use his vessel as bait for a passing U.S. Treasury ship carrying gold bullion.

Title: The Squeeze
Description: A dangerous, violent gang kidnaps a woman and her daughter to extort some money from her rich husband. He and her down-on-his-luck ex-cop ex-husband decide to deal with the kidnappers themselves.

Title: The Disappearance
Description: Thriller about a contract killer whose wife has disappeared. When he is hired by an international organization to carry out a "shy" or hit, he suspects they are connected with her disappearance.

Title: The Greatest
Description: Muhammad Ali plays himself in a reconstruction of the events that brought him to fame.

Title: The Forbidden Room
Description: Bizarre events keep occurring in an old mansion in Venezia, and it's soon obvious that something mysterious is up in the attic.

Title: Gulliver's Travels
Description: Lemuel Gulliver washes ashore on Lilliput and attempts to prevent war between that tiny kingdom and its equally minuscule rival Blefuscu.

Title: The Lacemaker
Description: A reserved young woman moves into an apartment with a young student she met while on vacation.

Title: Silver Bears
Description: Financial wizard "Doc" Fletcher acquires a Swiss bank and a silver mine - alleged to be worth a billion dollars. As rivals close in from all sides, Doc must fight a complex struggle to keep hold of both the bank and the mine.

Title: Stand Up, Virgin Soldiers
Description: Two soldiers stationed in Singapore set off in pursuit of the fairer sex instead of carrying out their orders. Soon after their arrival on the exotic island, the two visit a local brothel and there encounter a pair of lusty nurses.

Title: Crossed Swords
Description: Poor boy Tom Canty and Edward, Prince of Wales exchange identities, but events force the pair to experience each other's lives as well.

Title: L'homme pressé
Description: Pierre is an antique dealer living in our modern fast paced society. The rub is he tries to move even faster than the surrounding world. Alain Delon and Mireille Darc (Pierre's wife) starr

Title: A Dog Called... Vengeance
Description: A political prisoner in a South American dictatorship escapes and is pursued throughout the country by a bloodthirsty dog.

Title: Sheffey
Description: The life and works of 19th-century circuit rider Robert S. Sheffey.

Title: The Chaos Class Is Waking Up
Description: A kind and hardworking student joins to Hababam Sinifi (The Chaos Class) but they don't accept him as one of them and he becomes the target of all class' pranks.

Title: Nasty Habits
Description: In a Philadelphia convent, two nuns battle it out to be elected to the position of head abbess, and neither is about to let anything stand in the way of getting what she wants.

Title: The Purple Taxi
Description: With his mauve taxi, the old philosopher Dr. Seamus Scully (Fred Astaire) runs around the small green roads of the south of Ireland, becoming confident of his patients, while trying to help them find their way.

Title: Pedro Páramo
Description: Remake of the 1967 literary adaptation, in which a wayfarer travels to a mysterious arid village to meet the father who long ago abandoned his wife.

Title: Where Time Began
Description: Also known as 'The Fabulous Journey to the Centre of the Earth'. Partially dubbed to english, but good cinematography.

Title: Acto de posesión
Description: A sterile woman concocts a plan to have a baby by manipulating her handsome lover to seduce and impregnate a naive and lonely girl.

Title: Ballad of Orin
Description: A blind traveling musician is abused and oppressed while she tours the country, even though the modern world imposes changes on people's behavior.

Title: Bhumika
Description: A girl learns music from her courtesan grandmother and breaks into the burgeoning show business industry of 1930s Bombay, which eventually leads to decades of superstardom as well as romantic entanglements.

Title: Un borghese piccolo piccolo
Description: A meek middle-aged man finally takes justice into his own hands.

Title: The Left-Handed Woman
Description: After returning from a business trip in Finland, Bruno (Bruno Ganz) find that his wife Marianne (Edith Clever) wants her husband to leave her alone with their son. A struggle with loneliness and adapting to the new situation ensues.

Title: Group Portrait with a Lady
Description: The story follows the life of a regular German women Leni Gruyten during 1930s and 1940s. Through her interactions with friends, family and other people she knows, the regular folks' perception of the Nazi era is shown.

Title: The Mouse and His Child
Description: Adaptation of Russell Hoban's novel about two mechanical toy mice, and their quest to become "self-winding".

Title: Swami
Description: After she enters into an arranged marriage, a spirited and intellectual young woman tries to adjust to life with a man who was not her choice.

Title: Tell Her That I Love Her
Description: A man is desperately attaining beloved woman, despite her husband and child.

Title: Terror of Frankenstein
Description: Victor Frankenstein's search for the secret of life leads to the creation of a monster that consumes his life and family.

Title: Il prefetto di ferro
Description: The mafia has overrun a section of the country so ruinously that a very stern man has been sent by the government to be the governor in that region. He has been given wide-ranging power and authority and is not afraid to use it.

Title: A Hero Ain't Nothin' But a Sandwich
Description: A troubled boy (Larry B. Scott) becomes addicted to heroin, and his mother (Cicely Tyson) and foster father (Paul Winfield) help him fight it.

Title: Monsieur Papa
Description: A father is raising his ten-year-old son on his own. The two get along very well until the arrival of a new companion in the father's life.

Title: Jack
Description: Jack, a bohemian in Stockholm with writer and musician dreams and his wild life with friends in Stockholm and on Gotland in 1970's - early years

Title: Target of an Assassin
Description: An ailing African leader is admitted to a hospital. A male nurse at the hospital kidnaps him, but it turns out that things aren't exactly what they seem to be.

Title: Io Island
Description: An investor planning on developing a tourist resort begins an investigation into the legends of the mysterious Io Island in the hope of exploiting its unspoiled beauty.

Title: Proof of the Man
Description: When an American is murdered in a Japanese inn, Tokyo police Detective Munesue follows the trail of the killer to New York City. There he is joined by Detective Shuftan, and together they sort out the crime.

Title: René la canne
Description: Rene and Marchand are best friends. What makes their friendship special is that Rene is a professional thief, and Marchand is a policeman, albeit somewhat corrupt.

Title: Hakkodasan
Description: Two infantry regiments of the Imperial Japanese Army tackled Mount Hakkoda in the winter of 1902 to prepare for war with Russia.

Title: Matriarhat
Description: The film belongs to the 'migration cycle' in the Bulgarian cinema. It is about the drama of a group of women who have been left alone in their 'female kingdom' - a village deserted by its entire men folk.

Title: Une fille cousue de fil blanc
Description: A young girl dies in an accident just before her wedding. But when her sister starts to look into it, she discovers the truth about her.

Title: A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man
Village of Eight Gravestones
Description: The heir to a family fortune discovers that a curse has been placed on it, put there centuries before by a band of samurai warriors.

Title: Death Duel
Description: This martial arts spectacular showcases 20-year-old Derek Yee, David Chiang's younger brother, with ample swordfights, beautiful damsels in distress, and a great cast of kung-fu film stalwarts.

Title: Les passagers
Description: A man and his stepson driving across Europe are terrorized by a man following them in a pickup truck.

Title: Nuns That Bite
Description: A woman on the run is raped, rescued, then raped again. Escaping, she heads for the hills and finds safe haven at a convent. After becoming a postulant, she catches her fellow sisters engaging in unholy activities.

Title: The Assignment
Description: A Swedish diplomat travels to a civil war in a Latin American country. His mission is to mediate between the two extremist groups.

Title: The Devil's Island
Description: A scruffy detective investigates the murders of three sisters on a small Japanese island in 1946.

Title: Legenda o Tile
Description: A story of two orphans growing up in Flemish town at the time of witch-hunts, fear and ever present chance to get caught and been tortured and killed with or without a reason.

Title: Bang!
Description: Magnus is divorced and has an affair with an art teacher at the school where he works. When he thinks she's pregnant, he is worried because he is in love with another woman.

Title: The Battle Wizard
Description: A bookish young man and his sword-loving sister find themselves battling a trio of villains, one of them a beautiful but masked woman who has promised to either marry or murder the first man to see her unmasked.

Title: Pigs Have Wings
Description: Rocco and Antonia, two 15-year-old students in the same Roman high school, meet at an event and fall in love.

Title: L'imprécateur
Description: The management orders an investigation about the inflammatory leaflets that are spread, because they assume that an internal opposition is at work.

Title: Hærværk
Description: A talented newspaper critic suddenly realizes his own situation, and starts going to pieces while soaking himself in alcohol. Based on Tom Kristensen's acclaimed novel.

Title: Den allvarsamma leken
Description: Arvid share the love with a young woman named Lydia, but as is customary at the turn of the century, is not love enough for a fairy tale to come true.

Title: Death Is My Trade
Description: The disturbing biography of Auschwitz commander Rudolf Höss.

Title: Julie pot-de-colle
Description: Julie asks Jean-Luc Farlot,authorized signatory of a big European bank to help her disguise a murder as an accident.

Title: Impossible Love
Description: Rich Spanish landowner Alvaro is torn between his wife Elvira and two other women in his life. He's also worried about the fact that both his father and grandfather were murdered by Spanish revolutionaries in the house he's inherited.

Title: Deseos
Description: Snippets of a family drama involving a rebellious son coming to his depressing home village, his father, and a jaded ex-lover, mixed with various surrealist scenes and statements about sin.

Title: Pas på ryggen, professor!
Description: When a boring collage professor is mistaken for his cousin, he gets into all kinds of trouble, with hilarious results.

Title: Women in Hospital
Description: Schuman and Oberhoff are successful hospital doctors who treat pregnant women. However, their personal lives are a mess. Schuman has to deal with his drug-addicted wife Claudia, while Oberhoff deals with his teenage daughter's pregnancy.

Title: La Gioconda está triste
Description: The Mona Lisa loses her famous smile, and so does the rest of the world...

Title: Violanta
Description: A young man raises the dead in a high valley where the power is held by Violanta.

Title: Female Teacher
Description: High school on the outskirts of Tokyo. On Saturday, after school, music teacher Setsuko is raped by three students in the music class The third class teacher Mitsugu sees the whole story through the ajar door.

Title: Around the World with Bolek and Lolek
Description: Bolek and Lolek race around the world facing danger to win a wager with Lord Fogg.

Title: Life Triumphs
Description: This story of a strong-willed man, Nahapet, who lost his family during the Armenian Genocide in 1915, is an eternal story of resurrection.

Title: L'apprenti salaud
Description: After a car accident in which his mother dies, Antoine Chapelote decides to change his life and become a con-artist. He meets a young girl Caroline who helps him with his scam.

Title: Le portrait de Dorian Gray
Description: Basil Hallward is a mediocre painter. His exhibitions owe their success to his social position and nothing more. But one day Basil meets Dorian Gray, symbol of youth and a certain beauty.

Title: Maldoror
Description: Marco is working on a film called Maldoror, and focuses on his tormented relationship with a married woman.

Title: La oscura historia de la prima Montse
Gate of Flesh
Description: A tale of prostitutes in American-occupied Japan, following the end of World War 2.

Title: Parranda
Description: Three vagabond men go on a binge of drink, fights, prostitutes and crime in the Asturias of the early 20th century.

Title: Le maestro
Description: The eldest daughter of Germaine lives in concubinage with Hubert. She is determined to marry her youngest Corinne, upon her return from England. This one meets the beautiful Maestro, a friend of Hubert.

Title: Maten al león
Description: A handsome pilot is called back to his homeland, the Latin American republic of Arepa, by the rich islanders, to participate in a complot to kill the dictator known as El León (The Lion).

Title: Puika
Description: World for the boy is revealed gradually - in all its diversity, beauty and sustainability.

Title: Pretty Good for a Human
Description: Rhapsodic story from a small Finnish town in the 1920s. The wounds of the civil war in 1918 are not yet fully healed. The current ban legislation on alcohol triggers a diligently moon-shining.

Title: A csillagszemü
Description: The story of a young starry-eyed shepherd who becomes a hero of his time.

Title: Come ti rapisco il pupo
Description: A gang of clumsy thieves, with no experience in crime, kidnap the son of a billionaire, leading to complications they're unprepared for. Based on the 3rd Dortmunder novel by Donald E. Westlake.

Title: Belcanto oder Darf eine Nutte schluchzen?
Replay
Description: Cécile has just had a terrible car accident. Her husband François got to the hospital while she is still in a coma. When she wakes up, she does not recognize Francois and forgot all the circumstances of the accident.

Title: Ottokar der Weltverbesserer
Description: A boy always ready to help others and to fight injustice gets thus into trouble.

Title: La question
Description: 1957. For several months, Henri Charlègue, the ex-director of the newspaper "Alger democratic", banned, has been living in hiding. Suspected of belonging to the FLN, he is actively sought by paratroopers.

Title: Dao hun
Description: A rogue swordsman known as "Soul of the Sword" kills the father of a young Kung Fu expert, who teams up with a Drunken Monk to put an end to Soul of the Sword's reign of terror, and thwart the Mongol invasion.

Title: L'exercice du pouvoir
Description: At the turn of the century, an unusual woman refuses to become an object to be desired or played with.Instead she wants to succeed on the stage of politics in the Third Republic.

Title: Karikakramäng
Description: A woman puts an advertisement in the newspaper and receives an answer from someone called Hans-Erik. They begin to correspond and even set up a date for marriage. The woman waits for Hans-Erik to arrive.

Title: Måndagarna med Fanny
Description: Robert works at a warehouse and as a cinema usher and lives in a strained marriage. Every monday, he visits his ill father at the hospital. There he meets the orderly Fanny.

Title: The Last Lumbercamp
Description: The life and death of Vikke Nilo, a lumberjack from the good old times.

Title: Las cuatro novias de Augusto Pérez
Dorodarake no junjô
Description: Teenage cousins Masao and Tamiko fall in love when she comes to his riverside brewery house to take care of his sickly mother. Family objections ensue as Tamiko is older than Masao, and the two cannot marry in peace.

Title: Ashnan arev
Description: Aghun, early married by her despotic father against her will, wages a war against her husband, her family, the village, the world... She couldn't restrain even when the war is won.

Title: Terror
Description: About a group of young criminals, turning terrorists. When one of the gang members want out he is put under severe pressure.

Title: Blokada: Leningradskiy metronom, Operatsiya Iskra
Description: "Iskra" is the code name of the plan of the operation of the Soviet troops to break the blockade of Leningrad. In January 1943, the blockade of Leningrad was broken. Between Lake Ladoga and the front line formed a corridor 8-11 km wide.

Title: Le coeur froid
Description: A governess tries to save her pupil in jeopardy.

Title: High Street
Description: David, an American Jewish painter in Brussels for an exhibit, becomes obsessed with Mimi, a mentally ill Belgium woman. As he uncovers the World War II roots of her disturbance, however, he increasingly manifests her symptoms.

Title: Bosundhara
Description: a love story of a painter towards his wife.

Title: Karjolsteinen
Description: A radical writer struggles with his roles, and a meeting with a priest. A meeting which changes both their lives. After Sigbjørn Hølmebakks novel.

Title: Antônio Conselheiro e a Guerra dos Pelados
Crecer de golpe
Description: It tells the complex relationship of Milo, a teenager, and his old protector. Adaptation of "Around the cage", work of the writer Haroldo Conti, disappeared in 1976 by Argentine dictatorship.

Title: Rudin
Description: Rudin is Erudite and eloquent, received European education.He earns the love of an intelligent girl,Natasha.However, is not able to act decisively,Natasha marries another.After long wanderings, he dies in barricades of Paris.

Title: As Trapalhadas de Dom Quixote e Sancho Pança
Barra Pesada
Description: Young robber, son of a prostitute who had killed herself, gets involved with two police informers, who force him to share the loot he gets.

Title: Carrie
Description: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

Title: Logan's Run
Description: A police officer in the future uncovers the deadly secret behind a society that worships youth.

Title: Marathon Man
Description: After the shocking murder of his older brother, a New York history student finds himself inexplicably hounded by shadowy government agents on the trail of a Nazi war criminal who is trying to retrieve smuggled diamonds.

Title: The Man Who Fell to Earth
Description: An alien must pose as a human to save his dying planet, but a woman and greed of other men create complications.

Title: Burnt Offerings
Description: A family moves into a large old mansion in the countryside which seems to have a mysterious and sinister power over its new residents.

Title: Murder by Death
Description: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

Title: The Eagle Has Landed
Description: A German plot to kidnap Sir Winston Churchill unfolds at the height of World War II.

Title: The Shootist
Description: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

Title: To the Devil a Daughter
Description: An American occult novelist battles to save the soul of a young girl from a group of Satanists, led by an excommunicated priest, who plan on using her as the representative of the Devil on Earth.

Title: Salon Kitty
Description: Kitty runs a brothel in Nazi Germany where the soldiers come to "relax". Recording devices have been installed in each room by a power hungry army official, who plans to use the information to blackmail Hitler and gain power himself.

Title: A Real Young Girl
Description: Reluctantly, a sulky adolescent returns to her parents' house for yet another boring summer vacation, dabbling in desire and the art of desirability, eventually mixing reality with vision, caged fantasies with the fierce female sexuality.

Title: Family Plot
Description: A phony psychic/con artist and her taxi driver/actor boyfriend encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while trailing a missing heir in California.

Title: L'Innocente
Description: Tullio Hermil is a chauvinist aristocrat who flaunts his mistress to his wife, but when he believes she has been unfaithful, he becomes enamored of her again.

Title: Two-Minute Warning
Description: A crazed sniper is set to kill spectators at an L.A. Coliseum football championship game and the police race against time to eliminate him.

Title: Stay Hungry
Description: So-called 'special agent' infiltrates into the gym, which is targeted by a dirty business fraud.

Title: The Fifth Seal
Description: In Budapest in 1944, a watchmaker, a book seller and a carpenter are drinking in a bar with the owner, when they are joined by a stranger. The watchmaker asks a hypothetical question that will change their lives.

Title: Who Can Kill a Child?
Description: A couple of English tourists arrive on an island where all the children have gone crazy and are murdering the adults.

Title: Shout at the Devil
Description: During World War I, a British aristocrat, an American entrepreneur, and the latter's attractive young daughter, set out to destroy a German battlecruiser, which is awaiting repairs in an inlet just off Zanzibar.

Title: The Food of the Gods
Description: A group of friends travel to a remote Canadian island to hunt, only to be attacked by giant killer animals which have populated the place.

Title: Confessions of a Driving Instructor
Description: The sexual misadventures of Timothy Lea and his brother-in-law Sidney Noggett when they set up a driving school business.

Title: At the Earth's Core
Description: A Victorian era scientist and his assistant take a test run in their Iron Mole drilling machine and end up in a strange underground labyrinth ruled by a species of giant telepathic bird and full of prehistoric monsters and cavemen.

Title: From Noon Till Three
Description: After spending 3 unforgettable hours with an outlaw, a beautiful young widow turns her story into a worldwide famous book.

Title: Dona Flor and Her Two Husbands
Man on the Roof
Description: When a police inspector is murdered in hospital, the investigation led by detective Martin Beck uncovers reports of police misconduct and a possible revenge motive.

Title: The Sailor Who Fell from Grace with the Sea
Description: After his father dies, a disturbed young boy plots to take revenge on the new man in his mother's life.

Title: The Return of a Man Called Horse
Description: The English gentleman known as Horse, returns to the American west to save his adopted Indian tribe from extinction.

Title: The Seven-Per-Cent Solution
Description: To treat his friend's cocaine induced delusions, Watson lures Sherlock Holmes to Sigmund Freud.

Title: The Last Hard Men
Description: In 1909 Arizona, retired lawman Sam Burgade's life is thrown upside-down when his old enemy Zach Provo and six other convicts escape a chain-gang in the Yuma Territorial Prison and come gunning for Burgade.

Title: Drum
Description: A mid-19th-century mulatto slave is torn between his success as a pit-fighter and the injustices of white society.

Title: The Shaggy D.A.
Description: A lawyer makes an interesting discovery that could affect his chances of getting elected to office.

Title: St. Ives
Description: A crime novelist is hired by a shady character to negotiate the return of stolen confidential documents.

Title: The Bawdy Adventures of Tom Jones
Description: Tom Jones, a maid's son adopted by the nobleman she worked for, now all grown up must run away from home when he is set up by his jealous cousin. He has several adventures and women on his way to town where his possible salvation awaits.

Title: Treasure of Matecumbe
Description: In 1869 Kentucky, a young boy and his friends set out to find a treasure chest hidden by his late father in the Florida Everglades during the Civil War.

Title: The Bingo Long Traveling All-Stars & Motor Kings
Description: Tired of the slave-like treatment of his team's owner, charismatic star Negro League pitcher Bingo Long takes to the road with his band of barnstormers through the small towns of the Midwest in the 1930's.

Title: Nobody's Daughter
Description: An orphan girl suffers abuse from her adopting parents.

Title: The Desert of the Tartars
Description: Lieutenant Giovanni Drogo is assigned to the old Bastiani border fortress where he expects an imminent attack by nomadic fearsome Tartars.

Title: A Matter of Time
Description: A simple young woman helps eccentric old countess deal with her old age and she introduces the young woman to a world of upper class society.

Title: Todo modo
Description: Party leader and power broker Aldo Moro is holed up with his cronies and rivals at a monastic retreat where they plot their political fortunes while being led by a Jesuit cleric in spiritual cleansings.

Title: The Chaos Class Failed the Class
Description: A young and beautiful female teacher starts working in an all boys high school.

Title: Lullaby of the Earth
Description: The story of an orphan girl, brought up in naive, rustic innocence by an elderly relative, who is suddenly exposed to the brutality, greed and deceptiveness of the outside world, when her grandmother dies.

Title: Julefrokosten
Description: A small jewelry company has their annual christmas party

Title: The Arrival of Joachim Stiller
Description: Freek and Simone's lives are taken over by the bizarre character Joachim Stiller.

Title: The Twist
Description: Bored aristocratic Parisian couples begin affairs with each other which only brings trouble.

Title: Den sommeren jeg fylte 15
Description: Peter is telling his story about a special summer, when he was invited over to summer holiday from bickering parents, to his aunt and uncle in the country. He's been there before, but this summer was quite one to remember.

Title: The Night of the Askari
Description: A colonial police officer in Rhodesia hunts down the albino terrorist who raped and murdered his fiancée.

Title: The Killer Inside Me
Description: Haunted by visions from his abusive childhood, Montana deputy sheriff Lou Ford gradually exhibits the signs of a homicidal schizophrenic.

Title: Crime and Passion
Description: A Vienna financier embezzles money from his firm and clients, forces his girlfriend to marry an old cuckold voyeur industrialist and runs for his life when the industrialist sends killers after him.

Title: Coup de Grâce
Description: A countess' unrequited love for an army officer leads to disaster.

Title: The Inugami Family
Description: After the death of the Father , His family are gathered to share Inheritances , but suddenly a woman with a mysterious masked man arrive there , claiming to be the other wife of the man ...

Title: Max Havelaar
Description: An idealistic Dutch colonial officer posted to Indonesia in the nineteenth century is convinced that he can make the kinds of changes that will actually help the local people of whom he is in charge.

Title: The Clown
Description: Hans Schnier has earned his living as a clown, though he is in fact a very covert sort of social critic. After enduring a difficult childhood in Bonn during the Second World War, including his mother's fanatic Nazism.

Title: Der Gehülfe
Description: Joseph is hired by an inventor and moves in with his family. Although he doesn't get any salary for his work, he stays on because he believes that the highly dysfunctional family needs to be rescued.

Title: The Leper
Description: A simple governess and a wealthy aristocrat fall madly in love with each other. However, his family are prejudiced towards her and have other plans for him.

Title: The Last Supper
Description: A pious plantation owner attempts to teach Christianity to 12 of his slaves by inviting them to participate in a reenactment of the Last Supper.

Title: Storm Boy
Description: Mike is a lonely Australian boy living in a coastal wilderness with his reclusive father. In search of friendship he encounters an Aboriginal native loner and the two form a bond in the care of orphaned pelicans.

Title: Tanya
Description: A rich girl is kidnapped by a revolutionary group, but instead of wanting to be rescued, she decides to join her captors' organization.

Title: Baker's Hawk
Description: When a young boy nurses an injured hawk back to health, he gains newfound courage and confidence on his own.

Title: Alicia en el país de las maravillas
Cuore di cane
Description: Professor Preobrazhensky puts courageous experiences, trying to turn a dog in equal to in all of the person. As a result somebody turns out Doggies. Unfortunately, experience proves that it is better for dog to remain a dog.

Title: Une femme à sa fenêtre
Description: Margot Santorini is an aristocratic woman in 1936 in Greece, who amuses herself pursuing a shallow loveless affair with a nobleman, but unexpectedly falls in love with a political activist.

Title: The Killer Meteors
Description: Mei Xing He is a local hero, as known as "Killer Meteors", his secret weapon makes him invincible. However, when Hua Wu Bin, another powerful local character seeks his assistance, Mei Xing He will face the deadliest challenge of his life.

Title: It Shouldn't Happen to a Vet
Description: Comedy-drama based on the books by James Herriot about a Yorkshire vet and the adventures he and his colleague have in their everyday life.

Title: Manhunt
Description: A tough police detective is falsely accused of corruption, and goes on the run to clear his name. He is assisted by the beautiful daughter of a rich man.

Title: La ley del monte
Description: El hijo de un hombre rico y generoso crece lleno de odio por la muerte de su padre. Él se une a la revolución y después de tres años, vuelve para recuperar a su chica, pero las cosas han cambiado y se lleva una gran sorpresa.

Title: Pantaleon
Description: The Peruvian army captain Pantaleon Pantoja, a very serious and efficient officer, is chosen to set up a special service of 'visitors' to satisfy the sexual needs of the soldiers posted on remote jungle outposts.

Title: Shoot
Description: Two groups of armed men eye each other across a body of water. An deadly incident ensues and the first group returns to their town in fear of the consequences, which never come.They realize that far greater danger is offing.

Title: The Amorous Adventures of Don Quixote and Sancho Panza
Description: This adult movie is a costume period piece, filmed on location in Spain. Corey John Fisher stars as Don Quixote. The movie even included musical numbers, with suggestive lyrics too adult to be played on the radio.

Title: Birch Interval
Description: An eleven-year-old girl goes through extreme culture shock when she leaves the city and moves in with her Amish cousins.

Title: The Magic Blade
Description: Don't miss this one it is excellent. Chinese sword masters pair up to fight off yet another villain for the deadly PeacockDart. The ending is eye popping don't miss this one. Shaw Brothers come thru yet again

Title: Rikki-Tikki-Tavi
Description: Rikki is a young mongoose who is adopted by a human family after nearly drowning in the river. He returns the favour by protecting them from two murderous cobra.

Title: Já Não Se Faz Amor Como Antigamente
Diary of the Dead
Description: An unemployed man who lives with his wife and overbearing mother-in-law sees an opportunity to relieve himself of the old bat, which tangles him in a maze of deception.

Title: Everyone Dies Alone
Description: When they start losing family members and neighbors due to WWII and the Nazi government's policies, a quiet married couple becomes disillusioned and begins spreading leaflets against the government - a crime punishable by death.

Title: End Play
Description: When a hitchhiker is picked up and murdered by an unseen assailant, two brothers both become suspects, all the while increasing their tensions between them as they both pursue their half-cousin, Margaret.

Title: Seishun no satsujinsha
Description: Though his parents help him run the family business, Jun still feels persecuted by their love; when they bar him from meeting with his girlfriend, tensions increase.

Title: Idealist
Description: Screen Adaptation of a classic socio-critical novel.

Title: Metamorphosis
Description: A young man wakes up one morning and discovers that he has been transformed into a beetle. Soon he becomes hated by all.

Title: Shehu Umar
Description: Shehu Umar film is released in 1976 but long forgotten that to my opinion should the film be revisited and shown to this generation would have educate the more

Title: Die Elixiere des Teufels
Description: Monk Medardus (Dieter Laser), administrator of the relic chamber of a Capuchin monastery, drinks from the elixirs of the devil and is confronted with the dark sides of his soul.

Title: Madol Duwa
Description: The adventure of a rebellious child, running away from his house to an island called Madol Duwa.

Title: Caro Michele
Description: Michele is the younger son of a middle-class family, a strong-willed and free-thinking fellow who is off in some distant country fighting for a revolutionary cause.

Title: Sounder, Part 2
Description: Poor black sharecroppers band together to build a school for their children.

Title: Le grand escogriffe
Description: The aging villain Émile Morland talks his old friend Aristide into helping him with to kidnap the son of a millionaire.

Title: Ôzora no samurai
Description: Epic dramatization of the WWII memoirs of Saburô Sakai, the famous ace pilot of the Imperial Japanese Navy.

Title: Tanase Scatiu
Description: The rise and fall of the opportunistic Tanase Scatiu, a boyar in 19th century Wallachia.

Title: Older Brother, Younger Sister
Description: Members of a country family react differently to the return of daughter Mon from a town factory.While the men are angry she is pregnant with no husband, the women show kindness.

Title: Let the Balloon Go
Description: While his brother is fighting in WWI, a small independent Australian boy who lives in the countryside with his overbearing mother and pet dog and who must wear a leg brace decides to overcome his handicap no matter what.

Title: Agaton Sax och Byköpings gästabud
Description: Two villains escape from jail in London. They are planning an attack on Agaton Sax. Inspector Lispington and Sax are chasing the two bad guys, but the hunt is hampered by the villains have lookalikes.

Title: Kjære Maren
Description: Two young women arrives from the countryside to the capital around 1900, with the dreams of a new and better life.

Title: Fumô chitai
Description: After 11 years in Siberia as a war criminal, a man joins a corporation making fighter planes to sell to the government but other corporations are competing with his firm for the enormous profit of such a deal.

Title: Assault on Agathon
Description: CIA team in Greece tries to capture a major drug dealer.

Title: La polizia ordina: sparate a vista
Description: A reporter/cop/hypnotist is blackmailed into working for criminals who are out to steal a precious artifact.

Title: Bartleby
Description: A bailiff's study engages a young man, Bartleby, pale, stiff, not speaking and expressing no emotion. One fine day Bartleby refuses certain tasks, then all work.

Title: Fluchtversuch
Description: A homesick 10-year old Yugoslav immigrant escapes from Germany on foot in a bid to return to his homeland.

Title: Dimmi che fai tutto per me
Senhora
Description: A beautiful and poor woman buys herself a rich husband after inheriting a great deal of money.

Title: Bør Børson II
Description: In Olderdalen Bør Børson has affirmed his stand as the king of the valley and the richest man with the biggest house.

Title: Cuando Conchita se escapa, no hay tocata
Pamanento buru manatsu no koi
Description: A boy in a fishing port brings home a girl he found sick on the beach and his father puts her to work as a maid. Meanwhile the police are looking for a leftist girl student who has killed a man during a riot.

Title: Fulanita y sus menganos
Description: The Spanish official representative of the European Congress of prostitutes, held in Paris, is dedicated to remembering various stories that have occurred in the performance of their profession over the years.

Title: Passi furtivi in una notte boia
Tsuma to onna no aida
Description: Depicts various relationships between four beautiful sisters, their husbands, and their second daughter's husband's mistress.

Title: Fogo morto
Description: In 1910, in the State of Paraíba, Brazil, a man is expelled from his own land by the ruthless colonel who owns the sugar mill. He asks some outlaws to help him retrieve his land.

Title: Mann gegen Mann
Description: Robert and Michael meet on their return from captivity. They discover that they are both married to the same woman: After Robert was pronounced dead, Michael married Anna. The decision about the future is left to chance.

Title: Sinyata bezpredelnost
Description: The intelligence officer Emil Boev is back. All are residents, and the purpose of the missions is different.

Title: Oru Oodhappu Kan Simittugiradhu
Description: The film revolved around the relationship between a young man and his charming neighbour.

Title: Gunda
Description: A girl from slum happens to be the princess of a vast property.

Title: Nave zem buras
Description: A successful oncologist, Dr. Roger Mills, invited a company of his friends to spend time on his yacht. A few days later, Mills was found dead with a shot through the heart.

Title: Jeongmal ggumi itdagu
Description: Hie-suk is placed on parole from the juvenile detention center and put in the custody of Song Dae-kyun, a newspaper editor. Song's son was left an invalid from polio and Hie-suk becomes determined to make the boy well.

Title: Jaws
Description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on beach community off Long Island, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

Title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
Description: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

Title: Salò, or the 120 Days of Sodom
Description: In World War II Italy, four fascist libertines round up nine adolescent boys and girls and subject them to 120 days of physical, mental, and sexual torture.

Title: Barry Lyndon
Description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

Title: Picnic at Hanging Rock
Description: During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.

Title: The Story of O
Description: Photographer O's lover takes her to a Château, where she is, like other women there, naked, humiliated by whipping, sexual abuse by men etc. When O leaves, her lover gives her to his much older step-brother.

Title: The Eiger Sanction
Description: Classical art professor and collector Dr. Jonathan Hemlock, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.

Title: Three Days of the Condor
Description: A bookish CIA researcher in Manhattan finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

Title: Escape to Witch Mountain
Description: Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?

Title: The Stepford Wives
Description: Joanna Eberhart has come to the quaint little town of Stepford, Connecticut with her family, but soon discovers there lies a sinister truth in the all too perfect behavior of the female residents.

Title: Rooster Cogburn
Description: Marshal Rooster Cogburn unwillingly teams up with Eula Goodnight to track down her father's murderers.

Title: The Man Who Would Be King
Description: Two former British soldiers in 1880s India decide to set themselves up as Kings in Kafiristan, a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander the Great.

Title: Farewell, My Lovely
Description: Los Angeles private eye Philip Marlowe is hired by paroled convict Moose Malloy to find his girlfriend Velma, former seedy nightclub dancer.

Title: Mandingo
Description: An 1840s slaveowner trains one of his slaves to be a bare-knuckle fighter.

Title: The Day of the Locust
Description: An art director in the 1930s falls in love and attempts to make a young woman an actress despite Hollywood who wants nothing to do with her because of her problems with an estranged man and her alcoholic father.

Title: The Apple Dumpling Gang
Description: Three orphan children strike gold in 1878 California.

Title: Breakheart Pass
Description: John Deakin is being transported, as a prisoner, on a train with supplies and medicine to Fort Humboldt, Nevada.

Title: The Reincarnation of Peter Proud
Description: When college professor, Peter Proud begins experiencing flashbacks of an earlier life, he's mysteriously drawn to a place he's never been to, but which seems familiar and where he soon finds his previous incarnation's wife.

Title: The Chaos Class
Description: Lazy, uneducated students share a very close bond. They live together in the dormitory, where they plan their latest pranks. When a new headmaster arrives, the students naturally try to overthrow him. A comic war of nitwits follows.

Title: The Hindenburg
Description: A film that chronicles the events of the Hindenburg disaster in which a zeppelin burst into flames.

Title: The Killer Elite
Description: Mike Locken, who works for a private security firm affiliated with the C.I.A., is betrayed by his partner and left apparently crippled for life.

Title: The Drowning Pool
Description: Harper's a big-city PI, who travels to Louisiana to help an old girlfriend who's worried her husband will find out she's been cheating on him.

Title: Hustle
Description: At the instigation of a grieving father, a Los Angeles cop investigates the suspicious circumstances of a girl's apparent suicide.

Title: Wrong Move
Description: A writer goes on a road trip across West Germany with a group of eclectic people he meets along the way.

Title: The Wilby Conspiracy
Description: A black anti-Apartheid activist and a British engineer are forced to run from South African Secret Police.

Title: Fantozzi
Description: A good-natured but unlucky Italian is constantly getting into difficult situations, but never loses his positive mood.

Title: Rosebud
Description: Renowned producer-director Otto Preminger captures international terrorism in this film about five teenage girls who are kidnapped from a yacht by the P.L.O. Stars Peter O'Toole and Richard Attenborough.

Title: Katie Tippel
Description: The young girl Keetje moves to Amsterdam in 1881 with her impoverished family, and is led into prostitution in order to survive. In the process she sees the corrupting influence of money.

Title: Once Is Not Enough
Description: A young woman goes home to New York after a long stay in Europe. Her former schoolmate introduces her to the decadence of New York and she ultimately falls in love with an older man who's a stand-in for her father, before tragedy strikes.

Title: The Lost Honor of Katharina Blum
Description: A young woman's life is scrutinized by police and tabloid press after she spends the night with a suspected terrorist.

Title: The Romantic Englishwoman
Description: A marriage crisis between a writer and his wife leads her to flee to Germany and eventually return with another man, through whom the writer is going to overcome his writer's block.

Title: Peeper
Description: In 1947, a smart-mouthed Brit working in L.A. as a private eye (or peeper) is on a case to find the long lost daughter of a shady client pursued by two dangerous goons. The case leads him to a rich oddball Beverly Hills family.

Title: Royal Flash
Description: Ne'er-do-well Captain Harry Flashman (Malcolm McDowell) is coerced by Otto Von Bismarck (Oliver Reed) into impersonating a Prince.

Title: The Story of Sin
Description: A beautiful Polish girl traveling around Europe in search of her lover suffers a variety of tragic adventures as the men around her try to fit her into their own selfish schemes.

Title: One of Our Dinosaurs Is Missing
Description: A suspected Western spy steals a secret microfilm from China and hides it in the skeleton of a museum dinosaur, prompting a frantic search for it by various interested parties.

Title: Footprints on the Moon
Description: A woman is tormented by strange dreams of astronauts on the moon. She visits a deserted seaside town whose inhabitants know her although she does not know them.

Title: Cornbread, Earl and Me
Description: A 12-year-old is traumatised by the murder of his friend, a star basketball player.

Title: End of the Game
Description: When a Swiss cop is murdered, a veteran homicide inspector and a rookie are assigned to solve the case but they are obstructed by interfering Swiss politicians.

Title: Framed
Description: A gambler kills a sheriff in self defense. But as everyone in conspiring against him, he is condemned to a long sentence in prison.

Title: Emilienne
Description: A female artist is having an affair with a married man. He won't leave his wife, so she decides to meet her. However, she ends up liking and seducing the introvert wife, so they enter a ménage à trois. The wife explores her lesbian side.

Title: Report to the Commissioner
Description: Police officer Patty Butler, alias "Chicklet," is the live-in girlfriend of Thomas 'Stick' Henderson to gather evidence. Detective Bo Lockley is instructed to try to find her, not knowing she's also a cop.

Title: The Divine Nymph
Description: A beautiful woman (Laura Antonelli) engages in affairs with two men, playing them against each other. Set in the decadent Roaring Twenties, the triangle dissolves against suicide and fascism.

Title: Leonor
Description: A female vampire rises from her crypt every night in search of children as her victims.

Title: Sheila Levine Is Dead and Living in New York
Description: The traumas confronting a young Jewish girl in search of life, happiness and a husband in the big city.

Title: The Spiral Staircase
Description: In a remake of the 1940s film, Helen has been incapable of speech since seeing her husband die - will she become the target of a deranged serial killer targeting disabled people?

Title: Manila in the Claws of Light
Description: Júlio Madiaga, a 'provinciano', arrives in Manila to search for Ligaya, his loved one.

Title: The Daughter of Emanuelle
Description: Emanuelle's daughter Pussy introduces her to her new lover and she suffers a flash of recognition.

Title: Abduction
Description: Daughter of a wealthy family is kidnapped by left wing terrorists.

Title: Synomosia sti Mesogeio
Description: After a failed mission, a British ex-spy accepts one last assignment, against the backdrop of a rare meeting between an Israeli and an Arab diplomat. In this dirty ballet of spies, two alluring women pose as friends. Can they be trusted?

Title: Graveyard of Honor
Description: A self-destructive man becomes a powerful member of the Japanese mafia but quickly loses his self control. Based on the true story of Rikio Ishikawa.

Title: 92 in the Shade
Description: A young drifter returns to his home in Key West, Florida and attempts to open a fishing charter business, provoking a dangerous feud with a rival fishing sea captain.

Title: Journey Into Fear
Description: An American geologist accidentally discovers oil in Turkey. Several assassins are sent to eliminate him, but they all fail. He eventually boards a passenger boat to try to escape. However, one of the passengers is an undercover assassin.

Title: Winstanley
Description: Winstanley explores the attempt by Gerrard Winstanley who formed 'The Diggers' and with a group of followers attempted to form a small farming community in one of the first proto-Communist attempts at collective agriculture.

Title: Under the Blossoming Cherry Trees
Description: A mountain man captures a beautiful, but a manipulative city woman and goes to excessive lengths to please her every whim.

Title: Man Friday
Description: During the 17th century, shipwrecked English seaman Robinson Crusoe, after years of solitude, spots natives on his deserted Pacific island and befriends one who he names Friday.

Title: Russian Roulette
Description: An RCMP officer is ordered to discreetly take a Russian immigrant into custody in advance of a state visit by the Soviet premier. When his prisoner is kidnapped, the officer is drawn into a complicated assasination scheme.

Title: I Am a Cat
Description: The cat of the title roams around the house of a poor schoolteacher in the late 19th century, observing the goings-on of the teacher and his neighbors.

Title: The Kingfisher Caper
Description: Young lovers find themselves placed at odds with each other, after reigniting a fued between their families over a valuable diamond mine.

Title: Khel Khel Mein
Description: Three youngsters play a prank on a wealthy jeweller but later find themselves framed for murder by a mysterious criminal.

Title: Noce i dnie
Description: An epic saga of the Niechcic family, told from a woman's perspective. In 1914 in the war-torn Kaliniec, Barbara Niechcic remembers her youthful love, marriage hardships, family life in the countryside and finally her husband's death.

Title: Largo retorno
Description: David and Anna are a newly wed couple, whose lives together take a turn as Anna becomes diagnosed with a terminal illness.

Title: Xala
Description: A corrupt politician is cursed with impotence on the night of his third wedding after embezzling 100 tons of rice.

Title: Jana Aranya
Description: A bright and idealistic young man steels himself for the dog-eat-dog business world, only to flounder in a job market packed with thousands of other hopefuls.

Title: The Swiss Family Robinson
Description: A family shipwrecked on a deserted island tries to survive the best way they can. All is going well until a gang of pirates arrives on the island looking for a hidden treasure.

Title: Ride a Wild Pony
Description: A young teenage boy in Australia finds himself at odds with a crippled teenage girl over the ownership of a beloved pony.

Title: Mr. Quilp
Description: A kindly shop owner whose overwhelming gambling debts allow a greedy landlord to seize his shop of dusty treasures. Evicted and with no way to pay his debts, he and his granddaughter flee.

Title: Cagliostro
Description: The mysterious Conte di Cagliostro holds supernatural powers he uses to heal the poor, but his activity is considered dangerous by the 18th century's establishment...

Title: Velké trápení
Description: After the separation of her parents from her father, a 13-year-old girl is placed in an orphanage where she has difficulty settling in, but then begins to break away from her father because she sees through his selfishness.

Title: Un sac de billes
Description: Two young French Jewish boys and their family struggle to survive in WWII during the invasion of Germans.

Title: Cross of the Devil
Description: A British novelist travels to Spain to visit his sister. However, when he arrives he discovers that she has been murdered by a gang of devil-worshiping bandits called the Devil's Cross.

Title: Het jaar van de kreeft
Description: Well to do business man Pierre (Rutger Hauer) falls for the unpredictable and free-spirited Toni (Willeke van Ammelrooy). They begin a relationship, despite the fact that she's living with another man, who is the father of her child.

Title: Captain Nemo
Description: An expedition is dispatched to find the mysterious monster roaming the seas. Three crew members learn it to be an advanced submarine crewed by free men and headed by Captain Nemo. Their adventures continue aboard the amazing submarine.

Title: The Great MacArthy
Description: Macarthy is a country football player who is kidnapped by the South Melbourne Football Club and made a star player in the city.

Title: La faille
Description: A quiet man in his forties is arrested for a minor reason and sent to prison.

Title: Scobie Malone
Description: Sydney homicide detective Sergeant Scobie Malone and his offsider investigate the murder of Helga, whose corpse is found in the basement of the Sydney Opera House.

Title: Osadeni dushi
Description: The events of the film are related to the Civil War in Spain. This is a film about the beauty of love - exotic and tragic and the maze of human feelings.

Title: Folle à tuer
Description: A young woman, out of a psychiatric clinic, is engaged as a governess of the nephew of a rich industrialist.

Title: Love Lesson
Description: A German governess is hired to give German and piano lessons to the teenager son of a rich traditional family, in the 20s. But soon they get involved, and she teaches him love lessons instead.

Title: The Legend of Sea Wolf
Description: A tale of the brutal sea captain of the Ghost who is ruthless with his crew. It becomes more than they can tolerate.

Title: The Great Adventure
Description: Set during the American Gold Rush era, this is an unforgettable tale of an orphaned boy and his wild dog who must battle against the Yukon wilderness and human greed to help save a frontier town.

Title: Zaklete rewiry
Description: A teenage country boy starts working in a restaurant of the famous Pacific Hotel in the 1930s. He soon discovers that to get promoted one needs to conform and sacrifice his dignity.

Title: Viaje fantástico en globo
Description: A professor in Africa crosses the globe from East to West with his servant and a bold Scottish hunter.

Title: Front bez flangov
Description: Front bez flangov (1974) is the first episode in the trilogy about the partisan's fighting against the Nazi occupation of Russia during the WWII.

Title: Il faut vivre dangereusement
Description: A private detective and former police gets an investigation that turns out to be rather complicated.

Title: Zanna Bianca alla riscossa
Description: Set at the end of the 19th century in Canada's gold rush Klondike area, wolf-dog White Fang teams up with a prospector when his master is killed. Together they try to avenge his death.

Title: The Musician Killer
Description: After the conductor of the orchestra he has been playing in commits suicide, a young clarinettist is left with a quite valuable violin.

Title: Os Condenados
Description: In São Paulo, during the 1920s, a woman who is loved by a telegraphist and seduced by a slacker ends up in prostitution.

Title: Der Geheimnisträger
Description: The Cologne accountant Kuno is a lovable, nice mind person who does not want to hurt anyone. For the intelligence service, he is the ideal because completely unsuspected person to use it for a secret mission.

Title: The Man Who Wouldn't Die
Description: A boat captain in the Caribbean becomes part of a bond theft/murder cover up.

Title: Alkitrang dugo
Description: A group of Filipino teenaged boys and girls survives a plane crash and copes to live in an island amid politics, social class, sanity and death.

Title: Anna Karenina
Description: This is a Bolshoi Ballet version of Anna Karenina. Anna and a younger Vronsky are expressing their love through dance.

Title: Los pájaros de Baden-Baden
Description: During Summer a young woman falls in love with an older man who has a bad reputation amongst the upper crust of Madrid.

Title: Tôkyô-wan enjô
Description: Thriller about hijackers taking control of an oil tanker and threatening to blow it all up in Tokyo Bay.

Title: Awans
Description: After getting a university degree, Marek Grzyb comes back to his village and does his best to persuade its inhabitants to modernize their surroundings.

Title: Diamonds for the Dictatorship of the Proletariat
Dokter Pulder zaait papavers
Description: A small town doctor gets a visit from a former study-friend. He doesn't know this former surgeon has become a junkie that wants to steal his morphine.

Title: L'Ibis rouge
Description: Forty eight hours in an area around a Parisian canal where a former Tango champion meets a killer.

Title: Sønnen fra vingården
Description: A rich relative of the Martin family returns to Denmark from USA to buy Vingården and continue the cherry wine production instead of allowing 3 greedy, dishonest men turn it into building lots.

Title: Violer er blå
Description: TV reporter Mille wants to be liberated from matrimonial restraints and not just one man in her life. She spends time with her 2 friends Suzanne, a bi-sexual intellectual, and Lise, a prostitute. They mostly talk about men and women's lib.

Title: Povest o dobrih ljudeh
Description: The return of a refugee from the police to his grandparents' village disrupts the life of the villagers.

Title: Sila Nerangalil Sila Manithargal
Description: An umarried woman tries to make it living alone in 70s Madras.

Title: Dômyaku rettô
Description: A hospital intern threatens to blow up a bullet train because he believes that their noise and pollution is contributing to his patients deaths.

Title: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
Description: Travel with Dorothy and Toto across the land of Oz in L. Frank Baum's American classic. Help the Scarecrow get his brains, the Tin Woodman his heart, and the poor Cowardly Lion just a little bit of courage!

Title: Promise of the Flesh
Description: A suicidal woman recalls her memories of sexual abuse while on a train ride. On route, she meets a man who may be the key to finding a reason to live.

Title: Eugénie de Franval
Description: Reflection on the relationship between image and voice-over in the cinema, punctuated by the reading of a news of Sade telling the incestuous love of a father for his daughter.

Title: Maria
Description: Maria and Leif has a relationship. Leif is a former bank robber. He makes another hit and is sentenced to prison. He urges Maria to forget him.

Title: O Trapalhão na Ilha do Tesouro
Ludwig Ganghofer: Der Edelweißkönig
Description: A farmer shelters his brother, a carver, from the police who want him for the murder of a local official.In a subplot, a mountain girl finds her soulmate in a forester.

Title: Choritrohin
Description: Orthodox, unthinking, and not in control of the emotions of men towards women.

Title: Looping
Description: The thirty year old bee is a daredevil, everything seems to work for him. But suddenly a tragic event tears him out of his carelessness. In the explosion of a carbide furnace in operation, a colleague is killed.

Title: Rakastunut rampa
Description: Krokelby in the 1920s. Sakris Kukkelman is a crippled, Nietzsche reading village idiot who believes himself to be a romantic hero.

Title: Vous ne l'emporterez pas au paradis
Description: After the death of one of his clients, a Swiss industrialist decides to call his brother to transport the corpse to Switzerland. The journey will not be easy.

Title: O Monstro de Santa Teresa
Description: A civil servant fantasizes about being a 19th-century Baron, and he is joined by a co-worker and mistress who role plays as a Countess during their intimate moments. Everything goes well until his overbearing mother comes to live with him.

Title: Rufus
Description: Professional gambler Rufus convinces an ex-girlfriend to help him pull one over on a corrupt casino owner.

Title: Young Frankenstein
Description: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

Title: The Godfather: Part II
Description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Title: Murder on the Orient Express
Description: In December 1935, when his transcontinental luxury train is stranded by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before, with a multitude of suspects.

Title: The Man with the Golden Gun
Description: James Bond is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin, while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.

Title: Dirty Mary Crazy Larry
Description: Down-on-their-luck racers Larry and Deke steal from a supermarket manager to buy a car that will help them advance their racing chances. Their escape does not go as planned when Larry's one-night stand, Mary, tags along for the ride.

Title: Death Wish
Description: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks. In self-defense, the vengeful man kills muggers on the mean streets after dark.

Title: Emmanuelle
Description: The wife of a French diplomat in Bangkok, Emmanuelle embarks on a voyage of sexual discovery.

Title: The Great Gatsby
Description: A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.

Title: The Towering Inferno
Description: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

Title: Mame
Description: Following the death of his father, an orphan is sent to live with his free-spirited aunt.

Title: Going Places
Description: Two thugs harass assault, steal, murder, Marie-Ange, a jaded, passive hairdresser, joins them as lover, cook, and mother confessor, on her own search for seemingly unattainable sexual pleasure.

Title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
Description: Four armed men hijack a New York City subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. The city's police are faced with a conundrum: Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

Title: Arabian Nights
Description: In ancient Arabia, a beautiful slave girl chooses a youth to be her new master, then she is kidnapped and they must search for each other. Stories are told within stories: love, travel and the whims of destiny.

Title: Airport 1975
Description: A 747 in flight collides with a small plane, and is rendered pilotless. Somehow the control tower must get a pilot aboard so the jet can land.

Title: The Parallax View
Description: An ambitious reporter gets in way-over-his-head trouble while investigating a senator's assassination which leads to a vast conspiracy involving a multinational corporation behind every event in the world's headlines.

Title: The Odessa File
Description: Following the suicide of an elderly Jewish man, a journalist in possession of the man's diary investigates the alleged sighting of a former S.S. Captain, who commanded a concentration camp during World War II.

Title: The Land That Time Forgot
Description: During World War I, a German U-boat sinks a British ship and takes the survivors on board. After it takes a wrong turn, the submarine takes them to the unknown land of Caprona, where they find dinosaurs and neanderthals.

Title: Mr. Majestyk
Description: A melon farmer battles organized crime and a hit man who wants to kill him.

Title: Confessions of a Window Cleaner
Description: An optimistic and inept window cleaner fully 'satisfies' his customers, bed hopping from one unsatisfied housewife to another, until he meets a successful female police officer, who will have none of his sexual advances.

Title: Where the Red Fern Grows
Description: Where the Red Fern Grows is the heartwarming and adventurous tale for all ages about a young boy and his quest for his own red-bone hound hunting dogs.

Title: Madhouse
Description: A horror movie star returns to his famous role after years in a mental institution. But the character seems to be committing murders independent of his will.

Title: Gold
Description: A South African gold mine manager discovers a plot hatched by the mine owners and London bankers to flood the mine in order to curb gold production and consequently manipulate its price on the stock markets.

Title: The Little Prince
Description: A pilot, stranded in the desert, meets a little boy who is a prince on a planet.

Title: The Tamarind Seed
Description: During a Caribbean vacation, a British civil servant finds herself falling in love with a Russian Agent.

Title: The Four Musketeers: Milady's Revenge
Description: The Four Musketeers defend the queen and her dressmaker from Cardinal Richelieu and Milady de Winter.

Title: Fun for Three
Description: After her recent release from a deep psychiatric care institution, a Libertine-styled countess goes back to her very evil ways and fixes her eyes on a pretty girl with the intention to destroy her after fully corrupting her body and soul.

Title: Thieves Like Us
Description: When two men break out of prison, they join up with another and restart their criminal ways, robbing banks across the South.

Title: The Midnight Man
Description: An ex-con, once a cop, now working as security in a college, decides to investigate the murder of one of the students, a daughter of a senator.

Title: Ein Unbekannter rechnet ab
Description: Ten people are invited to a hotel in the Iranian desert, only to find that an unseen person is killing them one by one. Could one of them be the killer?

Title: The Klansman
Description: A local Sheriff tries to keep the peace as racial strife hits his small Alabama town as tensions boil over when a black man is accused of raping a white woman.

Title: The Terminal Man
Description: Hoping to cure his violent seizures, a man agrees to a series of experimental microcomputers inserted into his brain but inadvertently discovers that violence now triggers a pleasurable response his brain.

Title: The Black Windmill
Description: A British Agent's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

Title: The Deluge
Description: During the 1655 war between Protestant Sweden and Catholic Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth some Polish-Lithuanian nobles side with Swedish king Charles X Gustav while others side with the Polish king Jan Kazimierz.

Title: Open Season
Description: Three young men take a young woman and a middleaged man to an isolated cabin, where they are terrorized in different ways.

Title: The Internecine Project
Description: A retired intelligence agent devises a cunning plan to eliminate those who know too much about his past.

Title: Daisy Miller
Description: In this comedy of manners, Frederick Winterbourne tries to figure out the bright and bubbly Daisy Miller, only to be helped and hindered by false judgments from their fellow friends.

Title: The Apprenticeship of Duddy Kravitz
Description: In a bid to gain respect, the neglected younger son of a working class Jewish family in Montréal embarks on a series of get-rich-quick schemes to buy land surrounding a lake.

Title: Abby
Description: A marriage counselor becomes possessed by the demon of sexuality, when her father in law, an exorcist, freed it while in Africa.

Title: The Spikes Gang
Description: Three farm boys in the Old West help a wounded bank robber, who teaches them the trade.

Title: Someone Is Bleeding
Description: On a beach in Nice, François meets the mysterious Peggy and falls in love with her. Following her to a villa, he meets Marc, a lawyer who has a strange relationship with the girl. Marc tells François that Peggy is a drug addict: she kills men who approach her.

Title: The Driver's Seat
Description: A mentally-disturbed spinster experiences a series of bizarre encounters in Rome as she searches for someone to murder her.

Title: Seven Alone
Description: A frontier family crosses the U.S. by wagon train, hoping for a better life in the Oregon Territory.

Title: Lovin' Molly
Description: Acclaimed director Sidney Lumet brings this marvelous adaptation of a Larry McMurtry novel to life. Blythe Danner and Susasn Sarandon star in this complex yet disarmingly fresh look at love

Title: Cockfighter
Description: A trainer of fighting cocks takes a vow of silence and gambles his loves and possessions in a bid to win a championship.

Title: Huckleberry Finn
Description: In the 1840s Missouri, young boy Huckleberry Finn, wanting to escape his drunkard violent father, joins black runaway slave Jim on a quest for freedom down the Mississippi River on a raft.

Title: Who?
Description: After an American scientist is severely injured and scarred in a car crash along the border with East Germany, he is captured by East German military. The scientists use metal implants to save him. Once he's back in the States, no one can tell if it's really him, so an intelligence specialist must determine who is under the "mask".

Title: The White Dawn
Description: In 1896, three survivors of a whaling ship-wreck in the Canadian Arctic are saved and adopted by an Eskimo tribe but frictions arise when the three start misbehaving.

Title: The Castle of Sand
Description: Detectives investigate the murder of an old man found in a Tokyo rail yard.

Title: The Clockmaker of St. Paul
Description: A Watchmaker finds out one day that his son has become a murderer. He tries to understand for whom and why.

Title: Craze
Description: A nutty antiques dealer starts to sacrifice women to an African idol.

Title: Where the Lilies Bloom
Description: A family of Appalachian children live together in the backwoods so that they can stay together after the death of their widower father.

Title: Ghost in the Noonday Sun
Description: In the 17th century, a pirate captain is murdered by his cook after he buries his treasure and marks it on a map but the poor-memory cook must rely on the captain's ghost to re-track the loot, since the map was drawn in disappearing ink.

Title: Zandy's Bride
Description: An American settler marries an European mail-order bride and together they learn how to thrive in the harsh wilderness while working on their relationship too.

Title: Flower and Snake
Description: The elderly Senzô Tôyama (Nagatoshi Sakamoto) orders his employee, Makoto Katagiri (Yasunori Ishizu), to kidnap and train his wife Shizuko (Naomi Tani) in order to break her pride so that she will submit to his desires.

Title: 11 Harrowhouse
Description: Independent diamond broker and his girlfriend attempt a heist at a major Diamond Exchange house in London.

Title: The Infernal Trio
Description: A cunning French legal adviser teams up with an unemployed German girl and her sister to commit murders in Marseille.

Title: Vincent, François, Paul and the Others
Simona
Description: While at a bullfight Simona begins flashing back to a torrid sexual relationship she had with George (Maurizio Degli Esposti). Her relationship with George was one of open sexual discoveries which eventually led to revenge and murder.

Title: Blueblood
Description: An unusually nasty butler takes over the possessions of his degenerate master by means of witchcraft.

Title: Celestine, Maid at Your Service
Description: The police raid a brothel and a prostitute (Lina Romay) escapes into the countryside. The woman, Celestine, ends up at a rich folks house where she ends up sleeping with two of the servants who then get her a job as a maid.

Title: The Bears and I
Description: A man seeking peace and quiet finds himself father to three bears.

Title: One or the Other
Description: What started as a simple blackmail quickly devolves into a downward spiral of psychological and physical violence.

Title: The Bank Shot
Description: A motley crew of criminals plans to rob a Los Angeles bank that's temporarily located in a mobile home during renovations.

Title: The Voyage
Description: The charming Adriana gets sick after her husband's death. Her brother-in-law takes her on a journey to meet a doctor, while love overwhelms them.

Title: Black Eye
Description: Private detective investigated a series of murders connected with a drug ring in Venice, California.

Title: The Killer Wore Gloves
Description: A murder of a man in an airport restroom leads to a series of mysterious killings in London.

Title: Les Chinois à Paris
Description: Overnight, Paris is invaded - although peacefully - but the Chinese Army, and millions of Chinese people... It's the Nazi occupation all over again, with modern - funny - twists.

Title: The Truce
Description: A man has to come to terms with his wasted youth, estranged family and grim prospects for the future.

Title: Oliver Twist
Description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

Title: L'invenzione di Morel
Description: A castaway arrives on an island. He thinks it's uninhabited, but he sees a palace with also a hidden room. Soon he sees some people walking, dressed with old-fashioned clothes. He is afraid because people don't see him, like a ghost.

Title: The Treasure of Jamaica Reef
Description: A suspense filled adventure-drama about the search for a treasure-laden Spanish Galleon that sank over 200 years ago.

Title: The Take
Description: Crime fighter Terry Sneed arrives in New Mexico to help out a local police chief - but he's already taking money from the underworld.

Title: Les Charlots en folie: À nous quatre Cardinal!
Description: The Queen of France finds herself in a state of embarrassment, when the king asked her to wear the special necklace for the forthcoming appearance in public.

Title: Les quatre Charlots mousquetaires
Description: D'Artagnan and his musketeer comrades must thwart the plans of Cardinal Richelieu to usurp King Louis XIII's power.

Title: Izu no odoriko
Description: "The Izu dancer" describes Young solo to Izu peninsula, and close to an entertainer troupe, in particular with the dancer named Kaoru,but to that brief love is just a featuring lyrical and pale memories by their sad waves farewell.

Title: Esupai
Description: A bad ESP syndicate is planning to kill world leaders through mental telepathy. The good guys are a top secret group called ESPY and they're in charge of stopping the killer psychics.

Title: Hangup
Description: A rookie cop on the undercover narcotic squad falls for the junkie who can help him nab a ruthless pusher/killer.

Title: The Fossil
