Description: A detailed look at a Tokyo business tycoon (played by Shin Saburi) given a diagnosis of terminal cancer who must now re-assess his life and values.

Title: Rebellion in Patagonia
Description: In 1920, some workers of Patagonia, grouped in anarchist and socialist societies, decide to make a strike demanding better working conditions. The situation becomes unsustainable and the government sends the order is restored.

Title: Bons baisers... à lundi
Description: Three thieves, Henri-Pierre, Bob and Dimitri decide to take on Frankie Strong, a wealthy businessman.

Title: Eradu Kanasu
Description: Ramachandra Rao, a college professor, is newly married but is unable to come to terms with his previously failed relationship. This sours his relationship with his wife.

Title: La merveilleuse visite
Description: In a small French village, an angel appears disguised as a beautiful young blond.

Title: Tormento
Description: A man returns to Spain after getting rich in America. He falls in love with a woman who works as a servant in his cousin's home. Before marrying her, he finds out that she's had a torrid affair with a priest.

Title: Un linceul n'a pas de poches
Description: Michel Dolannes resigns from a major newspaper as a journalist to launch a new journal 'Le Cosmopolite' which reveals all kinds of shady deals.One day, he is killed but who is the killer ?

Title: Help, de dokter verzuipt!
Description: Small town doctor Angelino falls in love at first sight with schoolteacher Irene. Bram the Builder is in love with gypsy girl Katja. Neither of the two men know how to convey their feelings to the objects of their affection.

Title: Lost in the Stars
Description: Brock Peters (To Kill a Mockingbird) is Stephen Kumalo, a black South African minister searching the unfamiliar back alleys and shantytowns of Johannesburg for his son, Absalom.

Title: O.K. patron
Description: The widow of a French mafia boss decides to find a successor for him.

Title: Bør Børson Jr.
Description: This is the story about the great man of Olderdalen which starts as a simple shop-owner in the country and ends up as a tycoon in the capital (right after WW1.)

Title: Cat's Play
Description: The story of two elderly sisters who exchange letters, and through brief flashbacks we see glimpses of their younger years.

Title: Les trois mousquetaires
Description: D'Artagnan and his musketeer comrades must thwart the plans of Cardinal Richelieu to usurp King Louis XIII's power.

Title: The Catamount Killing
Description: A banker troubled by both business and personal problems is transferred to a small town. There he meets and seduces an older woman. Together, they decide to pull off a payroll holdup together.

Title: Il bacio di una morta
Description: The Countess Clara is in love with Andrea Valverde but agrees to marry the Count Guido when he learns that Andrew is his brother from his mother's side.

Title: Nitten røde roser
Description: A Danish man's girlfriend is killed by a drunk driver. After a stay at a mental hospital he decides to kill someone dear to each of the 4 men in the car. 3 police detectives try to solve the "random" murders.

Title: Il romanzo di un giovane povero
Description: The turbulent vicissitudes of the young protagonist perpetually torn between a Volterrian candor and a legitimate desire for revenge.

Title: The Fish with the Eyes of Gold
Description: A ruthless killer is spreading terror in a beach town.

Title: Kimen
Description: On a small green island out in the sea, they live in harmony - until a stranger comes. Like a hurricane this rocks the small society, and a killing lets all hidden forces loose.

Title: The Hair
Description: A middle-aged man becomes deeply involved with the affairs and criminal connections of a mysterious girl.

Title: Gangsterfilmen
Description: An American gangster (Gulager) arrives in a small town in the south of Sweden. He establishes himself as a kind of politician/preacher, promising great changes in the community. Only a few people suspect that his intentions are evil.

Title: Il était une fois dans l'est
Description: Criss-cross stories adapted by author Michel Tremblay's popular plays from the Plateau borough in Montreal.

Title: La Paloma
Description: A love story between a "demi-mondaine" kept by various lovers, suffering from tuberculosis, and a young provincial bourgeois. Adaptation from the novel by Alexandre Dumas, fils, "The Lady of the Camellias".

Title: Kanli deniz
Description: The film takes on the story of two men who are in love with the same woman.

Title: Shoot It Black, Shoot It Blue
Description: A young black student accidentally films a crooked cop committing a murder. He then follows the cop around, filming more of his illegal activities.

Title: Wer stirbt schon gerne unter Palmen?
Island of Lost Souls
Description: The film version of Jose Leon Sanchez's best-selling novel about the author's 20 years of imprisonment on an island ruled by brutality.

Title: Nøddebo præstegaard
Description: 3 brothers studying at Copenhagen University are invited to Nøddebo vicarage for Christmas. A steam engine and later a sleigh get them there. The vicar has 2 daughters of 18 and 21. They all sing, ice-skate, dance and have fun.

Title: Vreemde Wêreld
Description: A young woman inherits a massive industrial empire that starts a feud with her relatives.

Title: Den kyske levemand
Description: Mr. Basse wants his employee Mr. Bumbach married to his daughter. To make Bumbach more interesting, he invents an affair Bumbach must have had with movie star Rya Rya.

Title: Boquitas pintadas
Description: The life and the lovers of a few young women in a provincial town.

Title: Fratii Jderi
Description: A historical tale from the 15th century about a young man that falls in love with the same woman that the son of the ruler of Moldavia loves.

Title: When Mother Went on Strike
Description: When Clementine Kemper, the mother of three children, is once again prevented from playing the piano and singing by her husband Harry, she packs her things and leaves.

Title: Why Rock the Boat?
Description: A young naive reporter romances a female reporter who is quietly organizing a journalist union and joins her cause.

Title: Deixem-me ao Menos Subir às Palmeiras
Description: Rape by an African foreman leads to the the mounting revolt of the labour force in an African colony. While some are forced to accept their condition of slaves, others prepare themselves to fight back at the armed repression.

Title: A Pendragon legenda
Description: A Hungarian scholar enters a strange world of animal experimentation and murder, after he is invited to visit Pendragon Castle, belonging to an eccentric reclusive earl.

Title: El amor infiel
Description: A man and a woman begin an affair. The film explores different attitudes towards infidelity, and the reasons why couples stay together or separate.

Title: Gross Paris
Description: Bernard, a journalist, and his friend Jules, a butcher by trade, are both passionate about horse racing.

Title: Pigen og drømmeslottet
Description: While nursing her "auntie", Tine dreams of staying at the nearby castle. The criminal Bruno drops by. When Tine goes to the castle to phone the hospital, Karsten asks her to stay. Tine likes him but he still broods over a dead girlfriend.

Title: The Murderess
Description: Adaptation of Papadiamantis' novel Fonissa about a woman who murders little girls.

Title: Sagarana, o Duelo
Description: In Northeast Brazil, after carrying out some comissioned killing, hitman returns home to find his wife involved with a man who is a hitman hunter. A conflict ensues.

Title: Atheis
Description: Hassan, a man raised in a traditional environment, resorts to murder when his wife has an affair.

Title: Die Antwort kennt nur der Wind
The Camerons
Description: The Camerons

Title: Output
Description: A young filmmaker becomes involved with a gangster in Berlin.

Title: Bortreist på ubestemt tid
Description: A choking cry before a man carries his wife down in their basement freezer. Alex has killed off his wife on his remote farm. Then Helen turns up fleeing from her silver wedding celebrations. All alone.

Title: Pagye
Description: A boy raised in a temple by monks must resist the test of temptation before he can become an abbot of his order.

Title: Ivan Kondarev
Description: The film shows Bulgaria after the First World War - different destinies, different turns on both sides of the political barricade. A life full of contradictions and passion.

Title: Theater of Life: Youth, Lust and Spirit
O Forte
Description: An engineer returns to his hometown to demolish an old fort. In the return he is confronted with his past and his love of youth.

Title: The Exorcist
Description: When a 12-year-old girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.

Title: The Wicker Man
Description: A puritan Police Sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl whom the locals claim never existed.

Title: Live and Let Die
Description: James Bond is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organisation and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

Title: Soylent Green
Description: A nightmarish futuristic fantasy about the controlling power of big corporations and an innocent cop who stumbles on the truth.

Title: Magnum Force
Description: San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is on the trail of vigilante Police Officers who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

Title: Le train
Description: Two people, a Frenchman Julien Maroyeur and a Jewish German woman (Anna Kupfer) met on a train while escaping the German army entering France.

Title: The Three Musketeers
Description: A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

Title: Paper Moon
Description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

Title: The Long Goodbye
Description: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam, but in doing so gets implicated in his wife's murder.

Title: Fantastic Planet
Description: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

Title: The Day of the Jackal
Description: In the aftermath of France allowing Algeria's independence, a group of resentful military veterans hire a professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" to kill President Charles de Gaulle.

Title: The Legend of Hell House
Description: A physicist, his wife and two mediums are hired to investigate the Belasco House, where 27 guests had inexplicably died in 1927, along with most of a team of paranormal investigators that was sent in the early 1950s.

Title: Lost Horizon
Description: While escaping war-torn China, a group of Europeans crash in the Himalayas, where they are rescued and taken to the mysterious Valley of the Blue Moon, Shangri-La.

Title: The Friends of Eddie Coyle
Description: After his last crime has him looking at a long prison sentence for repeat offenses, a low level Boston gangster decides to snitch on his friends to avoid jail time.

Title: The Last Detail
Description: Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.

Title: Belladonna of Sadness
Description: After being raped by an evil feudal lord and subsequently getting banished from her village, a peasant girl makes a pact with the Devil to gain magical powers and take her revenge.

Title: Charlotte's Web
Description: Wilbur is a farm pig who's terrified that he'll end up on the dinner table. His friend Charlotte, a charming spider, comes to his rescue. She weaves words into her web, convincing the farmer that Wilbur is too special a pig to kill.

Title: Turkish Delight
Description: A young love faces with old problems.

Title: The Paper Chase
Description: A first-year law student at Harvard Law School struggles with balancing his coursework and his relationship with the daughter of his sternest professor.

Title: Flesh for Frankenstein
Description: Baron Frankenstein creates two "zombies" - one male, one female - planning to mate them in order to create a master race.

Title: Bang the Drum Slowly
Description: The story of the friendship between a worldly-wise star pitcher and a half-wit catcher as they cope with the catcher's terminal illness through a baseball season.

Title: Lolly-Madonna XXX
Description: In the early 1970s, a young woman passing through rural Tennessee unintentionally gets caught in a feud between two local neighboring clans, the Feathers and the Gutshalls.

Title: O Lucky Man!
Description: An ambitious coffee salesman has a series of improbable and ironic adventures that seem designed to challenge his naive idealism.

Title: Charley Varrick
Description: A man, his wife and their friend stage a bloody bank robbery without realizing they are stealing from the Mob.

Title: Chino
Description: A runaway teenager and a mixed-race horse breeder strike an unlikely friendship in the context of common hardships.

Title: And Now the Screaming Starts!
Description: England, 1795: the young Catherine has just married Charles Fengriffen and moves into his castle. She becomes the victim of an old curse that lays on the family. On her wedding night she is raped by a ghost and gets pregnant.

Title: The Stone Killer
Description: A top New York detective is sent to Los Angeles where he must solve a case involving an old Sicilian Mafia family feud.

Title: The Day of the Dolphin
Description: A marine biologist teaches his dolphins to communicate in English but shady characters plan to kidnap the trained mammals for a more sinister purpose.

Title: Cinderella Liberty
Description: A lonely Navy sailor falls in love with a hooker and becomes a surrogate father figure for her son during an extended liberty due to his service records being lost.

Title: The MacKintosh Man
Description: A member of British Intelligence assumes a fictitious criminal identity and allows himself to be caught, imprisoned, and freed in order to infiltrate a spy organization and expose a traitor.

Title: Nothing But the Night
Description: Three rich trustees are murdered - appearing as suicides. When a bus filled with orphans and three other rich trustees has an "accident," Colonel Bingham investigates.

Title: The Outfit
Description: Earl Macklin robs a bank owned by the mob, serves his prison time and is released, only to start a private war against the crime outfit that owned the bank.

Title: Seduction
Description: Giuseppe commits to love a woman he hasn't seen in 15 years, amid dangers of seduction from her daughter.

Title: The Laughing Policeman
Description: In San Francisco, California, one victim in a mass murder is a police detective. His partner and a new partner investigate in the city's seamy side.

Title: The Earth Is a Sinful Song
The Man Who Loved Cat Dancing
Description: Western story about a defiant wife who leaves her husband to take up riding with outlaws.

Title: Jonathan Livingston Seagull
Description: A skilled flyer but very rebellious young seagull is kicked out of his clan. However, instead of being sad or lonely, he decides to enjoy and explore his newfound freedom.

Title: The Spook Who Sat by the Door
Description: A black man plays Uncle Tom in order to gain access to CIA training, then uses that knowledge to plot a new American Revolution.

Title: The Adventures of Mowgli
Description: An adaptation of a classic tale about a boy raised in jungle by animals.

Title: The Don Is Dead
Description: After his mistress is savagely beaten up a Mafia leader goes after the killer with a bloody vengeance. Soon after the hunt begins, a gang war ensues.

Title: From the Mixed-Up Files of Mrs. Basil E. Frankweiler
Description: Precocious Claudia and her brother run away from home and hide in the Metropolitan Museum in New York.

Title: The Pyx
Description: A police detective uncovers a sinister occult explanation behind the mysterious death of a heroin-addicted prostitute.

Title: Seven Deaths in the Cat's Eyes
Description: In a small Scottish village, horribly murdered bodies keep turning up. Suspicion falls upon the residents of a nearby castle that is haunted by a curse involving a killer cat.

Title: Charley and the Angel
Description: Charley is a workaholic family man that finds out from an angel that his "number's up" and he will be dying soon so he tries to change his ways and be a better husband and father with the time he has left.

Title: White Fang
Description: The wolf dog, White Fang, aids a reporter, a fur trapper, a nun, a young Eskimo boy and his father of ridding a gold mining town of a sleazy crime lord in 1896 Yukon, Canada.

Title: The Man Called Noon
Description: An amnesiac gunfighter, aided by a sympathetic outlaw, tries to discover his own identity and past.

Title: The Thief Who Came to Dinner
Description: A computer programmer decides to become a thief. And when he starts making waves an insurance investigator hounds him. He also meets a woman who becomes his accomplice.

Title: The Punishment
Description: Britt, deluxe call-girl, is punished by the brothel owner because she was not accomodating enough to a customer. From now on, she must obey to all customers sadistic wishes, or else.

Title: The Boss
Description: A hitman finds himself embroiled in the middle of a Mafia war between the Sicilians and the Calabrians.

Title: Mistress Pamela
Description: Loosely bases on Samuel Richardson's novel Pamela or Virtue Rewarded, this is the story of Pamela who goes to work in the kitchen of Lord Devenish who is determined to rape her.

Title: Because of the Cats
Description: A gang of wealthy ne'er do wells rape and terrorize women for fun and force their husbands to watch. A police detective tries to catch them, but can he break their twisted loyalty to one another?

Title: The Blockhouse
Description: During D-day several people become trapped while hiding in a bunker, when heavy shelling collapses it. They have plenty of food and water so they decide to wait for rescuers. And so they wait year, after year, after year.

Title: The Hireling
Description: A young British woman suffering from depression over the loss of her husband develops an unusual relationship with her chauffeur.

Title: Cops and Robbers
Description: Two disillusioned New York City policemen plan a ten million dollar robbery to fuel their low pensions, only to run into one debacle after another in the process.

Title: Submersion of Japan
Description: The shorted re-edited American version of Submersion of Japan, in which Japan slowly sinks into the sea as the US and Japan work together to stop it.

Title: The Belstone Fox
Description: Based on the novel "The Ballad of the Belstone Fox", this heartwarming film chronicles the life of a fox much smarter than the dogs that hunt him. In fact, they never could catch him!

Title: Digby: The Biggest Dog in the World
Description: Digby consumes a bowl of Project X, a liquid growth formula. Soon, he becomes a sheepdog of gigantic size!

Title: Teresa the Thief
Description: Teresa Numa in Nardecchia, motherless daughter of a heartless Lazio peasant, becomes a war widow and single mother constantly looking for new jobs--and often forced to steal in order to live.

Title: The Optimists
Description: A retired entertainer makes his living as a street musician on the streets of London. Two young children befriend the old musician, brightening his otherwise colorless life.

Title: Fury
Description: Based on Lermontov's novel Vadim, this costume drama, set in Russia during the 1700s, chronicles the battle between a vengeful, anarchic peasant and the tyrannical landowner who killed his mother and father.

Title: Conflict
Description: Set in Ireland where the Catholic Church has been superseded by a repressive order with new ideas. When a group of Irish monks rebel, a Vatican official is sent to bring order once more.

Title: A River Called Titas
Description: A 1973 Bangladeshi film it describes the life of the fishermen on the bank of the Titas River in Brahmanbaria, Bangladesh.

Title: Dream City
Description: A married couple of artists move to a utopian town known for its absolute freedom, but behind the surface perversion and violence are spreading.

Title: Emil och griseknoen
Description: Emil visit a country auction, help Lina pull out a tooth and raise his pig to do tricks.

Title: Elle court, elle court la banlieue
Treasure Island
Description: Young Jim Hawkins, a pirate mouse named Hiccup, Dr. Livesey and Squire Trelawney hire a ship to find the legendary treasure of notorious late pirate Captain Flint. However, Flint's former crewmates plan to take over the ship.

Title: Zemlya Sannikova
Description: The exiled settler Alexander Ilyin persuades the goldmines owner Trifon Perfilyev to sponsor the expedition dedicated to the searches of "Sannikov Land", a legendary warm land behind the Polar circle.

Title: England Made Me
Description: A story about an English businessman in 1930s Germany who encounters a financier who has forged his career on greed, corruption, and opportunism, rather than the traditional British principles of decency and fair play.

Title: Juan Moreira
Description: In the late-19th century, mule-driver Juan Moreira is a good gaucho and worker who, like many others, is subjected to abuse and humiliation by those in power: landowners of the police.

Title: Manchali
Description: The story is about a rich spoiled girl who does not want to get married and hires a husband.

Title: Il tuo piacere è il mio
Description: In the 16th century a Tuscany nobleman gives a banquet in which immoral stories were told.

Title: The Heroes
Description: Four soldiers and a beautiful Greek nurse, thrown together in North Africa during World War II, team up to pull off a heist of two-million pounds in boxes marked "plasma."

Title: L'insolent
Description: Having escaped from prison, Ristack contacts his partner to organize an attack on a van full of gold.

Title: Book of Numbers
Description: Two waiters in Depression-era Arkansas get involved in the numbers racket.

Title: Robinson Crusoe
Description: Sailor is stranded on a desert island.

Title: Don Quixote
Description: A film adaptation of the Ludwig Minkus ballet, completely re-orchestrated and with additional music by John Lanchbery.

Title: Gott schützt die Liebenden
Description: The engineer Paul Holland proposes to his girlfriend Sybille shortly before a business trip, which she accepts. When Paul returns to Berlin, Sybille has disappeared without a trace.

Title: The Petrified Forest
Description: Medical student Himoto Haruo makes no compromises in resolving issues with his mother, his authoritarian department boss, and his girlfriend's abusive employer.

Title: Little White Dove
Description: Ruiz deconstructs, satirizes and politicizes a rich-boy/poor-girl romance bestseller which had been dubbed 'the Chilean "Love Story"'.

Title: Jealousy and Medicine
Description: In 1930s, a doctor has an affair with the wife of a wealthy industrialist in Poland.

Title: I Could Never Have Sex with Any Man Who Has So Little Regard for My Husband
Description: In this sex farce, two middle-aged pairs of aspiring swingers rent a summer cottage in Martha's Vineyard. There they sit around discussing the pros and cons of having affairs.

Title: Une saison dans la vie d'Emmanuel
Description: A Season in the Life of Emmanuel, a newborn who witnesses the drastic changes a French family experiences in a brief period of time.

Title: Vurun kahpeye
Description: In Romania, the idealistic Istanbul teacher, Aliye, communicate activities to a town in Anatolia supporting the idea of National Struggle in the region.

Title: Los cachorros
Description: A man who has been mutilated in boyhood encounters numerous difficulties because of it. His frustration at being unable to culminate his relationships with women eventually drives him to drastic actions.

Title: Amore e ginnastica
Description: Turin, late 19th century. The young Simone Celzani is hopelessly in love with the gym teacher Maria Pedani.

Title: Svadba
Description: Beginning in 1943. year. The tragic story of the prisoners... partisans and others who were found in a prison in Montenegro at the time when the Chetniks and the occupiers at all costs they want to crush the uprising in Yugoslavia.

Title: Das Mädchen von Hongkong
Description: Frank Boyd comes to Hong Kong to visit a friend, but unfortunately he was murdered a few days ago. The father of his fiancee puts $ 10,000 reward for the capture of the murderer and Frank wants to earn this money.

Title: Don Quijote cabalga de nuevo
Description: Don Quixote is obsessed with knighthood and its honor codes. Together with his singular squire Sancho Panza, Don Quixote remembers the adventures they have shared.

Title: Anderssonskans Kalle i busform
Description: The kid Anderssonskans Kalle is a menace to his surroundings and this time he uses nails, fireworks and sneezing powder.

Title: The First Circle
Description: Based on Nobel Prize-winner Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn's novel, this is the story of life as a political prisoner behind the walls of a Stalinist labor camp.

Title: Happy as the Grass Was Green
Description: A Mennonite boy is beaten to death at an unnamed NY university protesting the Vietnam War. His best friend and another college student, Eric Mills, attends his funeral in the Mennonite country in Pennsylvania.

Title: El amor tiene cara de mujer
Profession: Aventuriers
Description: Henry is a young Englishman who decides to abandon the chaotic city life, but his journey into the Pacific Ocean ends with a shipwreck as a result of which he finds himself on a lost island.

Title: Schloß Hubertus
Description: A baron is blinded by an eagle when he withdraws from his children to a mountain retreat.Now without sight, he becomes more accommodating to them.

Title: Los siete locos
Description: After committing a fraud in the company where he works, a man meets a strange character who will introduce you to a group a terrorist attack plot.

Title: Rolande met de bles
Description: Widower Rainier has returned to his estate after WWI. His family wants him to marry Emily, his sister-in-law. Meanwhile Rolande a woman he met in Paris during the war persuades him to invest a lot of money in the 'Académie de Beauté'.

Title: Kuzis stari moj
Description: Our hero is Glista - a young Zagreb punk whose (sub)urban adventures depict his world and philosophy.

Title: Dert bende
Description: The complicated love affair of 2 women and 2 men.

Title: Ukuaru
Description: Writer Veera Saar' s book Ukuaru based movie. Estonian womans drams in their life.

Title: Jentespranget
Description: Lina is strong willed and self confident due to her life without a man on her farm. Still she longs for the man in her life, but have never seen the opportunity to live out her longing. But then Gilbert is back after 20 years in America.

Title: Poil de carotte
Description: In rural France, an undernourished and unloved young boy attempts suicide. Based on the classic by Jules Renard.

Title: Cuando quiero llorar no lloro
Description: In 1948 Venezuela three children are born on the same day, all named Victorino were born.

Title: Dik Trom en zijn dorpsgenoten
Description: Rascal Dik Trom gathers money for a poor and sick acquaintance. When this money gets stolen, Dik and his friends chase the thief.

Title: La satánica
Description: A woman has got a sugar-daddy paying her bills, and while she's stringing him along, she meets somebody her own age that she truly falls in love. And it turns out he's the son of her rich dude.

Title: Yamaguchi-gumi San-daime
Description: A boy born in a poor village in Tokushima spends his days idly until a chance meeting sets him on the road to becoming boss of Japan's largest gang.

Title: Operación masacre
Description: In 1956 a military civic coup against self-appointed Liberating Revolution fails, and in Jose Leon Suarez, Argentina, are killed several suspected to be part of the civil uprising. However survive seven people manage to tell the story.

Title: Chipollino
Description: The eccentric musical film tale of the amazing country where there live vegetables and fruit, and about adventures of the brave cheerful and naughty boy Chipollino from onions family.

Title: Rekordi
Description: Bullied Jotia throws heavy stone to an incredibly long distance and attracts the interest of the world records committee. But, the only motivation for wannabe record-holder is to be told swear-word again.

Title: Brannen
Description: A young boy lives alone in a small room in a block of flats, with a phone ringing constantly, without anyone at the other end. He runs away, soon to follow everyone telling him to, until he gets involved in a search for a missing girl.

Title: Une larme dans l'océan
Description: Jewish fighters and their non violent religious neighbors, deal with the Nazis in Poland. The Jewish fighters finally connect with the Polish underground, hopeful about joining them and receiving arms, but the Poles refuse to arm them.

Title: Jeevana Tarangalu
Description: An innocent Roja gets into trouble when she decides to help an irresponsible Ananth. However, the latter's stepbrother Vijay comes to her rescue.

Title: Symposium
Description: A gay film director questions homosexuality in the contemporary world : is it the ultimate "solution" to love, and can it find its philosophical Greek roots back ?

Title: Little Shepherds
Description: Depicts the lives of children of the coastal hills and pastures who work as shepherds from an early age to earn a living.

Title: Mit der Liebe spielt man nicht...
Palec bozy
Description: Determined to become a professional stage actor, ambitious Tadeusz takes entrance exams to an acting school. Even failure does not deter him from keeping on trying.

Title: Café na Cama
Description: In order to become an actress, young woman tries many jobs, but in all those places she finds a man trying to have sex with her.

Title: Un amore così fragile, così violento
Jiang hu xing
Description: The self-discovery and awakening of a young man, who has been exposed and fallen for the lucrative powers of wealth.

Title: De blinde fotograaf
Description: A journalist has to interview a blind photographer.

Title: O Detetive Bolacha Contra o Gênio do Crime
Ljubezen na odoru
Description: A woman trapped in a marriage with aging husband she doesn't love, fatally falls in love with another man and gets pregnant.

Title: Luftburen
Description: Jan and Gertrud have a sexual relationship, even though they are half siblings. Jan is an air traffic controller, while Gertrude is writing a dissertation on ferns. Jan falls in love with another woman, Jenny.

Title: The Godfather
Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

Title: The Getaway
Description: A recently-released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.

Title: Deliverance
Description: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

Title: Solaris
Description: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

Title: The Poseidon Adventure
Description: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

Title: Jeremiah Johnson
Description: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

Title: The Cowboys
Description: Rancher Wil Andersen is forced to hire inexperienced boys as cowhands in order to get his herd to market on time but the rough drive is full of dangers and a gang of cattle rustlers is trailing them.

Title: Frenzy
Description: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

Title: The Canterbury Tales
Description: Pasolini's artistic, sometimes violent, always vividly cinematic retelling of some of Chaucer's most erotic tales.

Title: Ben
Description: A lonely boy befriends Ben, the leader of a violent pack of killer rats.

Title: Night of the Lepus
Description: Giant mutant rabbits terrorize the south-west.

Title: Slaughterhouse-Five
Description: Billy Pilgrim has mysteriously become unstuck in time. He goes on an uncontrollable trip back and forth from his birth in New York to life on a distant planet and back again to the horrors of the 1945 fire-bombing of Dresden.

Title: The Valachi Papers
Description: Gangster Joe Valachi is a marked man in the same joint where mob boss Don Vito Genovese is imprisoned and he's forced to co-operate with the DA in exchange for protection.

Title: The Other
Description: A series of gruesome accidents plague a small American farming community in the summer of 1935, encircling two identical twin brothers and their family.

Title: Endless Night
Description: A working-class young Englishman marries an affable American heiress, but their marital bliss is soon interrupted when they begin constructing a home on land alleged to be cursed.

Title: What the Peeper Saw
Description: A wealthy author's second wife begins to suspect that her 12 year old stepson may have murdered his mother, who mysteriously died in a bathtub accident.

Title: What Have You Done to Solange?
Description: A teacher who is having an affair with one of his students is reluctant to present an alibi when his lover witnesses the first in a series of murders connected to their school.

Title: Fat City
Description: Two men, working as professional boxers, come to blows when their careers each begin to take opposite momentum.

Title: Images
Description: A schizophrenic housewife kills off each of her terrorizing apparitions, unsure if these demons are merely figments of her imagination or part of reality.

Title: Virgin Witch
Description: A pair of miniskirted birds who travel to a remote castle in order to land a contract in the modeling agency of the mysterious lesbian Sybil Waite (In HD).
A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

Title: Across 110th Street
Description: Two New York City cops go after amateur crooks who are trying to rip off the Mafia and start a gang war.

Title: Man of La Mancha
Description: The funny story of mad but kind and chivalrous elderly nobleman Don Quixote who, aided by his squire Sancho Panza, fights windmills that are seen as dragons to save prostitute Dulcinea who is seen as a noblewoman.

Title: Tower of Evil
Description: A group of experienced archeologists are searching for an old and mystic Phoenician treasure when they are surprised by a series of mysterious murders...

Title: The Blood Spattered Bride
Description: Newlywed Susan is haunted by visions of Mircalla Karnstein, a centuries-old bride who murdered her husband on their wedding night.

Title: Fuzz
Description: Police in Boston search for a mad bomber trying to extort money from the city.

Title: The Hot Rock
Description: Dortmunder and his pals plan to steal a huge diamond from a museum. But this turns out to be only the first time they have to steal it...

Title: The New Centurions
Description: An idealistic rookie cop joins the L.A.P.D. to make ends meet while finishing law school, and is indoctrinated by a seasoned veteran. As time goes on, he loses his ambitions and family as police work becomes his entire life.

Title: The New Land
Description: A Swedish immigrant family struggle to establish a new life for themselves in the forest of Minnesota in the mid 19th Century.

Title: The Possession of Joel Delaney
Description: An upper-class Manhattan divorcee comes to believe that her brother is possessed by the spirit of a serial killer who beheaded young women in Spanish Harlem.

Title: Play It As It Lays
Description: A Hollywood actress undergoes a psychic breakdown and recalls the traumatic events which led to her stay at a sanitarium.

Title: A Reflection of Fear
Description: A disturbed young girl starts believing that there is something very sinister at work after her estranged father visits her at her mother and grandmother's house with the woman he plans to marry.

Title: The Wrath of God
Description: Set in the 1920s, several foreigners held by a South American military group are offered possible freedom if they accept to topple a local crazed military leader.

Title: A Separate Peace
Description: Two roomates at a prep school in New England during World War II come to grips with the war, jealousy and betrayal. Based on a novel by John Knowles.

Title: Morgiana
Description: Klara and Viktoria are sisters. Their father dies, leaving most of his property to Klara. When Klara becomes involved with a man that her sister loves, Viktoria begins to plot her murder.

Title: We Won't Grow Old Together
Description: A husband and wife in a loveless marriage struggle to remain ignorant to their failed relationship.

Title: Night of the Devils
Description: The patriarch of a wealthy family fears that he will show up one day in vampire form. Should this happen, he warns his family to not let him back into his house, no matter how much he begs them.

Title: Portnoy's Complaint
Description: The movie chronicles a young man's love and passion in his own kinky way.

Title: Skyjacked
Description: A crazed Vietnam vet bomber hijacks a Boeing 707 in this disaster film filled with the usual early '70s stereotypes, and demands to be taken to Russia.

Title: X, Y and Zee
Description: The venomous and amoral wife of a wealthy architect tries, any way she can, to break up the blossoming romance between her husband and his new mistress; a good-natured young widow who holds a dark past.

Title: Caliber 9
Description: A former gangster is forced to resume his old lifestyle when his violent, jealous ex-colleagues and the police believe that he knows the location of a stolen cache of $300,000.

Title: Pocket Money
Description: Broke and in debt, an otherwise honest cowboy gets mixed up in some shady dealings with a crooked rancher.

Title: Up the Sandbox
Description: A bored housewife takes refuge in a fantasy world.

Title: The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick
Description: A goalkeeper Josef Bloch is ejected during a game for foul play. He leaves the field and goes to spend the night with a cinema cashier.

Title: Treasure Island
Description: Young Jim Hawkins has an unforgettable encounter with pirate Captain Long John Silver and his murderous mates.

Title: Justine De Sade
Description: Justine is a poor serving girl who tries to maintain her virtue and her standards. Unfortunately, she is victimized by everyone she encounters.

Title: Fear Is the Key
Description: A man is in radio contact with his family when their airplane is shot down. He wants those responsible and becomes a criminal to get a job as deep sea diver with those salvaging the plane's cargo.

Title: Liza
Description: Liza slowly replaces Melampo, Giorgio's dog. While she accepts it, Giorgio forces her to wear collars and leashes.

Title: The Twilight People
Description: A kidnapped diver is taken to an island inhabited by a mad scientist and his half-animal, half-human creations.

Title: Sitting Target
Description: Imprisoned Harry Lomart is a vicious, brute of a man and yet he is prepared to do his long jail term as he is confident that on his release his beautiful wife Pat will be waiting for him, but a visit from Pat brings him his worst nightmare.

Title: And Hope to Die
Description: A crook on the run hooks up with a criminal gang to commit a kidnapping. However, things don't go quite as planned.

Title: Cool Breeze
Description: Thalmus is the leader for a group of criminals who gather in L.A. to rob a bank. Their goal is to find a new bank.

Title: Cancel My Reservation
Description: Bob Hope is a stressed out talk show host who is sent on a vacation to Arizona on doctor's orders and has to play Sherlock Holmes with his wife, the lovely Eva Marie Saint, to solve a series of murders that has Bob as the prime suspect.

Title: Hit Man
Description: A lawyer whose brother was murdered winds up getting involved with gangsters and the world of porno movies.

Title: King, Queen, Knave
Description: Adopted by his rich uncle from Germany, British teenager Frank falls in-love with his uncle's Italian wife Martha, and has conflicting feelings when she suggests he should kill his uncle in order to have her and the family fortune.

Title: I Want What I Want
Description: A 20-something son of a military officer feels like a woman trapped in a man's body. When he can't hide it anymore he has a fallout with his ladies man father and leaves home. Now what?

Title: The Salzburg Connection
Description: A list of agents and collaborators, hidden by the Nazis in an Austrian lake in 1945, is sought after by various interested parties during the Cold War.

Title: The Call of the Wild
Description: A house dog is abducted and brought to the north as a sled dog.

Title: The Carey Treatment
Description: At a Boston hospital, Dr. Carey becomes an amateur sleuth to help clear a colleague who's accused of botching an illegal abortion that kills a 15 year old girl.

Title: Dealing: Or the Berkeley-to-Boston Forty-Brick Lost-Bag Blues
Description: A cocky Harvard graduate transports a load of marijuana from Berkeley to Boston. His girlfriend gets busted with the second load. He and a friend go against a dirty cop and a Cuban gangster to get the load and the girl back.

Title: The Water Margin
Description: Tells the story of the 108 Heroes who stood up against a corrupt government. Each hero has his own unique fighting skill, but they are all willing to die to uphold justice.

Title: The Adult Version of Jekyll & Hide
Description: A crazed doctor, who has already murdered a man, finds Dr. Jekyll's diary and mixes up Jekyll's formula. He mixes up a batch of the potion, turns into the Jekyll monster and begins to stalk, rape and murder women.

Title: The Triple Echo
Description: Deserting soldier dresses as a woman to escape detection; liking the female role he goes to a dance with another soldier and is exposed.

Title: Something to Hide
Description: A man having marital problems with his shrewish wife picks up a young, pretty and pregnant hitchhiker. Before he knows it, he's in over his head and mixed up in violence and murder.

Title: The Man with Two Heads
Description: Horror remake of "Dr. Jekyll And Mr. Hyde".

Title: The Groundstar Conspiracy
Description: A government investigator tries to find out the truth behind the break-in at a top secret research facility.

Title: The Master and Margaret
Description: A writer and his assistant are working on a biblical story about Pontius Pilate who convicted Jesus of Nazereth, while the Satan (here called Woland) and his lieutenants are harassing the writer duo in various ways.

Title: When the Legends Die
Description: A young, rebellious Ute Indian joins the rodeo circuit and falls in with a drunken mentor who teaches him the ways of the ring and the world.

Title: Where Does It Hurt?
Description: A corrupt hospital administrator decides to get as much money as possible from the patients by any means necessary - lie, cheat or steal.

Title: Trick Baby
Description: Two Phildelphia con men try to evade gangsters they have conned and cops who are trying to put them in jail.

Title: The Man
Description: An African-American senator becomes the designated survivor of a tragic accident that kills the President of the United States. Now the first black President, he attempts to end the bigotry and divide standing in his way.

Title: Under the Flag of the Rising Sun
Description: One woman's search to find the truth about her husband's death in World War II.

Title: Le moine
Description: Ambrosio is a monk who is sexually tempted by an emissary of the Devil, a young girl in monk's robes.

Title: Siddhartha
Description: The story of a young Indian who embarks upon a journey to find the meaning of existence. Based on the novel by Hermann Hesse.

Title: Justin Morgan Had a Horse
Description: The circumstances that lead to the origination of the first American Bred Horse, the Morgan Horse.

Title: Una cavalla tutta nuda
Description: The story is set in the Middle Ages. The youngsters Folcacchio and Guffardo must bring an embassy to the Bishop of Volterra, and during the trip, the two boys meet the beautiful Gemmata.

Title: Cops Is Cops
Description: For a special mission to destroy drug dealers in Nice, hardcore bachelor inspector Campana has to don the role of a married man with a child. He adjusts himself well but will have to fight a lot before being able to achieve final victory.

Title: Embassy
Description: A Russian spy penetrates into the U.S. Embassy in Beirut, Lebanon to try to kill a Soviet defector under asylum there.

Title: What Became of Jack and Jill?
Description: In order to collect inheritance money, a slacker tries to induce a heart attack in his invalid grandmother by convincing her that she's become the target of youth supremacists who want to enact a genocide on the elderly.

Title: Running Scared
Description: When an undergraduate commits suicide, his best friend Tom Betancourt is sent down from university because he did nothing to prevent the death, which he felt was a choice his friend had a right to make.

Title: The Strange Vengeance of Rosalie
Description: A traveling salesman gives a pretty hitchhiker a ride home, who then injures him to keep him captured in her run-down shack.

Title: Der Todesrächer von Soho
Description: A London slasher pack the suitcases of his victims before stabbing them to death in this adaptation of Edgar Wallace's 'Secret of the Black Suitcases.'

Title: Thumb Tripping
Description: An adventurous couple of hitchhikers decides to accept every ride that is offered to them. no matter how odd the driver might be. They'll get more than they bargained for.

Title: Don Camillo e i giovani d'oggi
D'amore si muore
Description: A group of young people - Enzo and Leila (formerly a porn hero and unsuccessful singer) and Eddy and Tea (struggling with an unwanted pregnancy) - take refuge in the home of Renato, a suicidal musician.

Title: São Bernardo
Description: The story of Paulo Honório, a poor kid who becomes a rich farmer. Obsessed by his desire to get even richer, he doesn't pay much attention to his wife, Madalena, a teacher who reacts against his tyrannical ways.

Title: Chère Louise
Description: A young woman, Louise, is a lecturer in a provincial town where she meets an Italian immigrant. The film retraces their relationship.

Title: New Mischief by Emil
Description: Emil visit the market in Vimmerby, take part in the yearly religious examination and save Alfred from dying in a snow storm.

Title: María
Description: Based on the book of the same name, Maria by Colombian writer Jorge Isaac's, is a tragic love story. The movie reflects a lot of the beautiful prose found in the book.

Title: The Black Decameron
Description: The endless search for pleasure and love by African men and women.

Title: Then I Sentenced Them All to Death
Description: In order to avoid reprisals from the Wehrmacht for the murder of a soldier, intellectuals from a Romanian village try to convince Ipu, the village idiot, to take the blame for the murder and save everybody.

Title: Sest medvedu s Cibulkou
Description: The owner of a circus decides to swap his trained bears for trained pigs, and fires clown Cibulka. The clown gets a job at a local school, bears escape and seek him out and a school inspector comes into town.

Title: The Music
Description: A young woman undergoes psychiatric treatment after she no longer hears music and develops sexual hang-ups.

Title: The Long Darkness
Description: Shinobugawa depicts the emerging love of a student, identified only as "I", for a young waitress named Shino.

Title: The Souliotes
Description: As the Revolution against the tyrannical Ottoman Empire rages on, the Souliotes fight tooth and nail to stand their ground. But, disgraceful treason will bring Ali Pasha and his multitudes of soldiers at the gates. Do heroes fear death?

Title: Questa specie d'amore
Description: Federico is married to Giovanna, a rich and attractive woman who has guaranteed him an excellent social position. His father Giuseppe, on the other hand, was an anti-fascist and works as a craftsman.

Title: Felix si Otilia
Description: A large family and it's many generations vie for advantage, seeking to win the inheritance sure to be left behind by a wealthy older man of the clan. Along the way, stories of friendship, love and rivalry emerge.

Title: John, the Knife and the River
Description: An older man consumed by jealousy over his much younger wife decides to venture into the jungle in search of riches without her. When he returns 4 years later, he finds that his mistrust in her may have been well-founded.

Title: War Is Hell
Description: The amorous and warlike adventures of Franz, a young hussar officer, at the beginning of the First World War.

Title: The Ribald Decameron
Description: The story teller Cecco Angiolieri manages to conquer women with his tricks.

Title: Nagara Haavu
Description: This is the tale of an angry young man with flavours of Teacher-student relationship, the stubbornness of Ramachari(protagonist) and his attempts at having a romantic relationship.

Title: Uma Abelha na Chuva
Description: A married couple of rich and depressed noblemen destroy the lives of their servants out of spite.

Title: Ostrov sokrovishch
Description: Young Jim Hawkins is torn between his loyalty to his benefactors and his affection for lovable rogue Long John Silver in their struggle to recover a buried pirate treasure.

Title: The Little Ark
Description: Two children are trapped in the tower of a church during a flood. Local fishermen attempt to rescue them.

Title: Der Stoff aus dem die Träume sind
Hymn
Description: The story tells of the adoration of Sasuke for his mistress, the blind Shamisen teacher Shunkin, who treats him imperiously and subjects him to cruel beatings.

Title: Karaoglan geliyor: Cengiz Han'in hazineleri
Description: The story of Karaoglan, who first found out the treasure that Genghis Khan had left before his death, took revenge for his murdered mother.

Title: Paulina 1880
Description: In 1880's Italy, young Paulina must join a monastery to escape a doomed relationship with a married count. However, neither she, nor the count can just move on and all elements for a tragedy are there.

Title: Tabi no omosa
Description: A 16-year-old girl grows into maturity while hiking the 88-temple pilgrimage around Shikoku.

Title: Yarali kurt
Description: Ali gets out from prison more recently. He needs money to go to Germany. Therefore, he accepts the offer to kill a businessman. When he completes mission there is a huge trickery: money is fake.

Title: Come fu che Masuccio Salernitano, fuggendo con le brache in mano, riuscì a conservarlo sano
Description: The main characters are two ruffians in various disguises as false priests.

Title: Dauriya
Description: Epic about Cossacks in the Siberian province of Dauria. Cossacks are living in their village like one big family under the guidance of a strong leader - Ataman.

Title: Pas folle la guêpe
Description: An old lady is far from suspecting everything that is going on behind her back, in particular what her servants are up to.

Title: Danny Jones
Description: In the early 70s in the quiet calm of the Welsh foothills, Danny Jones reaches the age of 17 with a desire to break away from the strict influence of his father, encouraged by his girlfriend who shakes up his small world for the better.

Title: Les caïds
Description: Thia and Murelli, who live from car stunt shows, make ends meet by carrying out small burglaries.

Title: Ture Sventon - Privatdetektiv
Description: Ture is born Sture but due to a speech problem, he has changed his name, but is still, in his own eyes, Scandinavias' best private dick. Still he rarely has any cases to solve, but has some rather strange clients.

Title: IXE-13
Description: The (french-)canadian first-rate spy have to fight with a chinese woman spy working for the nazis and in love with him.

Title: Operation Rainbow
Description: A young student takes part in the resistance, is arrested by the Germans and with his confessions tries to deceive them and guide them to wrong decisions.

Title: Manden på Svanegården
Description: Henrik used to spend summers on Svanegården as kid. He's back on his own airplane after working in Australia, to meet cute Lisbeth and just in time to help save his vacation "dad's" farm from an evil criminal.

Title: Und der Regen verwischt jede Spur
Mendiants et Orgueilleux
Description: The story of Hadjis, a former professor of philosophy, who came to live in the midst of a poor community in the Tunisian suburbs, far from Western civilization.

Title: Heroína
Description: A woman who has been traumatized by her brother's accidental death from electrocution in the subways of Buenos Aires learns to readjust.

Title: Topoli
Description: It is loosely based on the novel Of Mice and Men by John Steinbeck and is the story of Topoli a young retarded guy who lives by his nephew Essi and their life.

Title: Malchiki
Description: A story of a young singer Zhenya Prokhorov, a soloist of the Moscow boys chorus, losing voice and becoming a composer.

Title: Fuss, hogy utolérjenek!
Description: Dangerous spies act as representatives of an international recording company to get important plans from the father of an aspiring composer.

Title: Nakovalnya ili chuk
Description: This is a film about two irreconcilable outlooks on the world, about the need for political struggle in the cause of humanism and social progress.

Title: Cemo
Description: A father says that whoever wants to marry his daughter must first beat his daughter in a fight.

Title: Der Mann, der nach der Oma kam
Description: After grandma remarries and moves out, the overworked Piesold family hires domestic helper Erwin to take care of children and household. But is a man up to the job?

Title: I Know You Are a Murderer...
Jag heter Stelios
Description: Stelios travels to Stockholm from Greece. He lives with a relative in an abandoned house with several other Greeks. At first he distributes newspapers, but Stelios quickly gets a job at a restaurant.

Title: Sisli hatiralar
Description: Dürrin Arbel is a famous actress and there are many men who fall in love with her.

Title: Vukuat var
Description: The happiness of a woman who marries her ex-husband's uncle will not last long.

Title: A Clockwork Orange
Description: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

Title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
Description: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

Title: Diamonds Are Forever
Description: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

Title: Let's Scare Jessica to Death
Description: A recently institutionalized woman has bizarre experiences after moving into a supposedly haunted country farmhouse and fears she may be losing her sanity once again.

Title: Death in Venice
Description: While recovering in Venice, sickly composer Gustav von Aschenbach becomes dangerously fixated with teenager Tadzio.

Title: The Last Picture Show
Description: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

Title: The French Connection
Description: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

Title: Get Carter
Description: When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.

Title: Walkabout
Description: Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.

Title: The Beguiled
Description: While imprisoned in a Confederate girls' boarding school, an injured Union soldier cons his way into each of the lonely women's hearts, causing them to turn on each other, and eventually, on him.

Title: Straw Dogs
Description: A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious local harassment.

Title: The Omega Man
Description: Biological war has decimated life on Earth. Los Angeles is a windswept ghost town where Robert Neville tools his convertible through sunlit streets foraging for supplies.

Title: The Andromeda Strain
Description: A team of top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what has killed the citizens of a small town and learn how this deadly contagion can be stopped.

Title: Wake in Fright
Description: After a bad gambling bet, a schoolteacher is marooned in a town full of crazy, drunk, violent men who threaten to make him just as crazy, drunk, and violent.

Title: Vampyros Lesbos
Description: An erotic horror tale about a vixen vampiress seducing and killing women to appease her insatiable thirst for female blood.

Title: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
Description: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

Title: Willard
Description: A social misfit uses his only friends, his pet rats, to exact revenge on his tormentors.

Title: The Decameron
Description: An adaptation of nine stories from Boccaccio's "Decameron".

Title: Shaft
Description: Cool black private eye John Shaft is hired by a crime lord to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.

Title: Cold Turkey
Description: Hoping for positive publicity, a tobacco company offers $25 million to any American town that quits smoking for 30 days. Amidst a media frenzy, Eagle Rock, Iowa accepts the challenge while the company's PR man tries to sabotage the effort.

Title: Johnny Got His Gun
Description: During World War I, a patriotic young American is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.

Title: Pretty Maids All in a Row
Description: California State Police Captain Sam Surcher investigates a string of teenage girl murders at Oceanfront High School.

Title: Blood from the Mummy's Tomb
Description: An archaeological expedition brings back to London the coffin of an Egyptian queen known for her magical powers. Her spirit returns in the form of a young girl and strange things start to happen.

Title: Dr Jekyll & Sister Hyde
Description: A Victorian scientist tests a serum that transforms him into a sensuous murderess.

Title: The Emigrants
Description: Småland, Sweden, mid-19th century. A farming family struggle with their rocky, unyielding land, and decide to embark on the arduous journey to new hope in America.

Title: 10 Rillington Place
Description: What happened to the women at 10 Rillington Place? The story of British serial killer John Christie, who committed most or all of his crimes in the titular terraced house, and the miscarriage of justice involving Timothy Evans.

Title: The Anderson Tapes
Description: After Duke Anderson is released from prison after ten years for taking the rap for a scion of a Mafia family, he cashes in a debt of honor with the mob to bankroll a caper.

Title: The Mephisto Waltz
Description: An old, dying satanist arranges to transfer his soul into the body of a young concert pianist.

Title: Sometimes a Great Notion
Description: A family of fiercely independent Oregon loggers struggle to keep the family business alive amidst changing times.

Title: Catlow
Description: An outlaw tries to avoid interference as he journeys to Mexico to pull off a $2,000,000 gold robbery.

Title: When Eight Bells Toll
Description: In a vein similar to the James Bond movies, British Agent Philip Calvert (Sir Anthony Hopkins) is on a mission to determine the whereabouts of a ship that disappeared near the coast of Scotland.

Title: Valdez Is Coming
Description: A Mexican-American sheriff must resort to violence against a powerful rancher in order to get just compensation for the pregnant Indian widow of a wrongly killed black man.

Title: Kidnapped
Description: In eighteenth century Scotland, during the Jacobite Rebellion, David Balfour claims his inheritance from his uncle who has him shanghaied on a ship where David meets fugitive Jacobite rebel Alan Breck.

Title: The Fifth Cord
Description: A journalist finds himself on the trail of a murderer who's been targeting people around him, while the police are considering him a suspect in their investigation.

Title: The Last Valley
Description: During the Thirty Years' War of 1600s, a band of Protestant mercenaries peacefully coexist with German Catholic villagers in a hidden idyllic mountain valley untouched by war.

Title: Shoot Out
Description: A former bank robber searches for his double-crossing partner who left him for dead, while having to look after an six-year-old girl.

Title: Murphy's War
Description: A lone survivor from a British naval ship is obsessed with getting revenge on a German U-boat crew that massacred his shipmates in the water.

Title: Fools' Parade
Description: In 1935, after forty years in a West Virginia prison, three released convicts wish to open a legitimate business using the $25,000 earned in prison, but a crooked prison guard in cahoots with the town banker plans to defraud them.

Title: The Burglars
Description: In 1970s Athens a group of professional burglars plan an emerald heist from the home of a gem collector but the corrupt Greek police inspector Abel Zacharia is on their trail.

Title: Drive, He Said
Description: The star player of a college basketball team starts to go off the rails with an illicit love affair and his roommate going crazy to avoid the war draft.

Title: Villain
Description: In 1970s London, Scotland Yard orchestrates the downfall of mob boss Vic Dakin after he crosses the line by blackmailing Members of Parliament.

Title: Pinocchio
Description: Dyanne Thorne stars as the fairy godmother in this innocently-sleazy take on the story of Pinocchio.

Title: The Love Machine
Description: An ambitious TV newscaster has an affair with the wife of a network executive to get a promotion.

Title: Blanche
Description: Blanche is the young, pure, beautiful wife of the Master of the castle, in a secluded land. Every man is in love with her, including the King and his servant Bartolomeo, visiting the Master.

Title: The Legend of Doom House
Description: A young sailor finds himself trapped in the labyrinthine mansion of his occultist uncle, along with a number of eccentric and mysterious relatives who all seem to be harboring a dark secret.

Title: Bless the Beasts & Children
Description: A group of social misfits at a summer camp for boys run away to save penned-in buffaloes from a rifle club's slaughter.

Title: Someone Behind the Door
Description: A neurosurgeon with a cheating wife takes an amnesiac into his home and conditions him to believe that the cheating wife is his own and to take the "appropriate" action.

Title: Cry Uncle
Description: Private detective takes on a case and gets mixed up in murder, sex and blackmail.

Title: The Music Lovers
Description: Piano teacher Peter Ilych Tchaikovsky struggles against his homosexuality by marrying, but unfortunately he chooses a nymphomaniac whom he cannot satisfy.

Title: The Light at the Edge of the World
Description: A ruthless pirate captures the keeper of a lighthouse, in the most southern city in Argentina. His goal is obvious and horrific. He plans to control the lighthouses signals in a way that the passing ships will be crushed on the rocks.

Title: The Gang That Couldn't Shoot Straight
Description: This is the funny story about two warring Mafia gangs in New York City. The weaker gang uses a lion to blackmail the opposite gang's "clients". The police succeed in stopping one of the gangs, while the other remains without the boss.

Title: Wat zien ik
Description: In Amsterdam, two prostitutes make a choice between love and work.

Title: Out 1
Description: Following the May 1968 civil unrest in France, a deaf-mute and a con artist simultaneously stumble upon the remnants of a secret society.

Title: Mira
Description: The story of a small and conservative West-Flemish village opposing the construction of a bridge over the Scheldt.

Title: Max and the Junkmen
Description: A detective decides to go undercover and set up a group of robbers, but he may be getting too caught up in the task at hand.

Title: The Devil Came from Akasava
Description: A mineral is discovered which can turn metal to gold or humans into zombies. When the mineral is stolen, secret agents are sent in to get the mineral back!

Title: The Horsemen
Description: Drama depicting rural life in contemporary Afghanistan and the Afghani people's love for an ancient traditional sport similar to horseback polo.

Title: Lake of Dracula
Description: A doctor investigates the murders of several women at a lakeside resort. His investigation leads him to believe that a vampire is responsible for the murders. He sets out to track the vampire down.

Title: Twelve Chairs
Description: Two gentlemen of fortune from the times of Imperial Russia are looking for an uncountable treasure at the dawn of the Soviet Union age.

Title: Zachariah
Description: Two gunfighters separate and experience surreal visions on their journey through the west.

Title: Making It
Description: Phil, a 17-year-old cocky high school student thinks nothing of using the people around him to satisfy his self-centered needs, until someone in his life gets pregnant.

Title: The Night Digger
Description: The dreary existence of middle-aged spinster Maura Prince takes an unexpected turn with the arrival of young handyman Billy Jarvis, but there is more to Billy than meets the eye.

Title: The Marriage of a Young Stockbroker
Description: A stock-broker is stuck in a dreary job and a marriage that's become a dull routine. To cope with the boredom and frustration, he resorts to voyeurism and extramarital love affairs.

Title: Captain Apache
Description: A Native American born US Army officer, Captain Apache, investigating a murder, uncovers a presidential assassination plot.

Title: Doctors' Wives
Description: Dysfunctional marriages of several unhappy rich doctors who work at a private clinic and their neglected wives who deal with their own unhappiness in various ways enter crisis mode when one of them murders his cheating wife.

Title: Emil of Lonneberga
Description: An 8 y.o. Swedish boy always gets into trouble despite good intentions and afterwards ends locked up in a shed. He lives on a farm (before electricity and cars) with his mom, dad, sister, maid, best friend the farmhand and an old woman.

Title: Love
Description: The wife of a political prisoner tends to her mother-in-law and keeps from the old woman the truth about her son, whom she believes is in New York making a film.

Title: Pinocchio
Description: A fairly faithful adaptation of Carlo Collodi's classic novel about an animated puppet that desires to become a real boy.

Title: Desperate Characters
Description: Marriage of a midlife, middle-class, childless couple is in a rut. Sophie has become depressed, frigid and slightly paranoid and Otto is stuck in optimistic denial. Things escalate at their summer cottage, but no one dares call it quits.

Title: Mrs. Pollifax-Spy
Description: A widowed New Jerseyan woman volunteers for spy duty at the CIA, being in her own opinion, expendable now that the children are grown, and is assigned to pick up a book in Mexico City, while finding out that it is easier said than done.

Title: Jennifer on My Mind
Description: Two wealthy, independent young people meet in Venice and fall in love; their affair takes a tragic turn as the young woman becomes hooked on heroin.

Title: One Way Ticket
Description: A small-time criminal wants to give up his life of crime. He performs a robbery with a friend, with similar feelings, and things go sour.

Title: Romance of a Horsethief
Description: In 1905, Polish horse thieves living near the Russian border find their livelihoods threatened by the new Russo-Japanese conflict because the Russian army requisitions all horses and forcibly conscripts all men for the war.

Title: Les petites filles modèles
Description: Two daughters of a sexually liberated countess, a mother and daughter who've befriended them after a car accident and live with them, and a S&M-prone daughter of their butch neighbor all fall for the same men - a doctor and a local boy.

Title: Niklas och Figuren
Description: Niklas, 9, lives with his parents and his grandfather in the country in a yellow house. He longs for a dog and this summer, father, mother and grandfather has decided to get him one.

Title: Chinmoku
Description: Two Jesuit priests encounter persecution when they travel to Japan in the 17th century to spread Christianity and to locate their mentor.

Title: The Widow Couderc
Description: John, an escaped convict, takes refuge on the farm of Widow Couderc. He becomes the older woman's lover and admits that he's on the run. The widow's in-laws, who despise her,

Title: Long Live ... Your Death!
Description: A self-proclaimed Russian prince, a Mexican bandit and a radical Irish female journalist team up during the Mexican Revolution to find fortune and notoriety.

Title: Things Fall Apart
Description: This is the story of Okonkwo, an Ibo man who lives in the village of Umoufia, in Nigeria. It shows the traditions and culture of the Ibo people, while also telling Okonkwo's story.

Title: Been Down So Long It Looks Like Up to Me
Description: Free-thinking student tries to put up with life at a straight-laced college in 1958.

Title: Honky
Description: Sheila, an affluent black teenager, begins dating working class white teen Wayne, and asks him for help to sell a kilo of marijuana.

Title: The Revolutionary
Description: Set in the 1880's, a rich young man from the middle class falls in love with the daughter of a local count and sets in motion a series of conflicts with the aristocrats of Zante.

Title: Catch Me a Spy
Description: Andrej (Kirk Douglas), a smuggler of microfilmed Russian manuscripts, uses the luggage of unsuspecting travellers to transport the contraband out of the country.

Title: Scandalous John
Description: A crotchety old ranch owner fights to be able to live his life the way he wants to, and not the way other people--and the law--tell him he has to.

Title: Winter Comes Early
Description: A young hockey player becomes an overnight star of the Toronto Maple Leafs and falls in love with a beautiful young singer. Their relationship is plagued by his "jock" nature and decadent lifestyle.

Title: The Sporting Club
Description: The new groundskeeper at the Centennial Sporting Club decides to do something about the very odd goings-on there.

Title: Seemabaddha
Description: Chatterji is an ambitious and self-made young man who becomes the director of the company he works for.

Title: The Jekyll and Hyde Portfolio
Description: A man commits a series of murders due to his dual personalities and his zodiac birth sign.

Title: The Double
Description: A man is shot in an underground car-park by a mysterious bearded man. As he dies he recollects the events that led him to this situation, including adulterous liaisons and jealous envy.

Title: A Few Hours of Sunlight
Description: Nathalie Silvener, a married woman, falls for Gilles, a depressed and brilliant Parisian journalist who is already in a relationship with a model.

Title: Cry of the Penguins
Description: A womanizing biologist studies life in a colony of penguins.

Title: Flight of the Doves
Description: While fleeing across the Irish countryside, two orphans are pursued by their villainous uncle, a master of disguises.

Title: Anneler ve Kizlari
Description: A tricotage worker Nese who becomes very popular singer and Anatolian woman, Fatma. The story of them and their daughters.

Title: Goya - oder Der arge Weg der Erkenntnis
Thartharah fawq al-Nil
Description: Set against the backdrop of the 1967 Six-Day War, the movie adaptation of Naguib Mahfouz's novel follows the escapist, drug-fuelled riverboat meetings of a group of frustrated Egyptians from various walks of life.

Title: Games
Description: A young girl meet a young guy that want to be a gangster. They fall in love and you follows his minds struggle what to do.

Title: Jumping Over Puddles
Description: A boy keeps his spiritedness and optimism in spite of polio.

Title: Fantasia chez les ploucs
Description: Sagamore lives in the countryside on a farm where he secretly distills whiskey. A young stranger and her companion who is a gangster come to disturb their peace.

Title: Kommissar X jagt die roten Tiger
The Steagle
Description: In the midst of the Cuban missile crisis, a mild-mannered professor decides to live out all of his daydreams, travelling across the country and adopting a different persona in each city.

Title: African Story
Description: When his top client, popular singer Rex Maynard, runs away to South Africa with his daughter, powerful producer, Arnold Tiller, stages Maynard's fake kidnapping out of revenge. Maynard escapes only to be pursued by actual kidnappers.

Title: Welcome to the Club
Description: In 1945 Hiroshima an American Quaker tries to introduce a black singing duo into the all-white quarters of an officer's club, with farcical results.

Title: Den forsvundne fuldmægtig
Description: Two men disappear at the same time, one of them commits suicide with dynamite. The police try to figure out who it was and what happened to the other.

Title: Le drapeau noir flotte sur la marmite
Le cri du cormoran, le soir au-dessus des jonques
Description: Alfred Mullanet, an unlucky player who lives on his wife's income, becomes in a few moments the object of interest of two thugs, Kruger and Mister K.

Title: Naves ena
Description: Group of men fishing in the icy Baltic sea find themselves trapped when the ice breaks away carrying them with it. As the ice breaks into smaller and smaller pieces the behavior of the men gets more desperate and class driven.

Title: Le lys de mer
Description: Young girl Vanina and her friend, Juliette go to Sardinia on vacation. Arriving there, she attracts the attention of a young village man.

Title: Little Ayse and the Magic Dwarfs in the Land of Dreams
Hayat sevince güzel
Description: Turkish Pollyanna's story.

Title: Four Candles for Garringo
Description: A gang holds up a tax shipment of gold. That night, when celebrating, Farley steals the gold, but is found dead the next morning.

Title: Le petit matin
Description: Nina lives with her family in a superb property in the French region of Landes. She loves her cousin Jean who is overprotected by his possessive mother, Eva. There is war and, after the French defeat, Jean wants to join London.

Title: Espérame en Siberia, vida mía
Description: Mario is a millionaire who is diagnosed with a deadly disease. His doctor advises him to commit suicide, what Mario doesn't know is that the doctor is planning to kill him.

Title: Les aveux les plus doux
Description: A policeman invents a Machiavellian plan to force a criminal to confess his misdeeds.

Title: Midsommardansen
Description: A group of young people gathered on the countryside to celebrate midsummer. On the journey home the car some of the youngsters are traveling in collides with a bus.

Title: Animal Treasure Island
Description: A group of kids compete with a team of bumbling pirates to find buried treasure.

Title: Anubhavangal Palichakal
Description: An amoral, hypocritical worker with Communist leanings learns the consequences of his callousness and redeems himself.

Title: Trotta
Description: After his imprisonment during the Great War, a young soldier returns to Vienna only to realize that everything has changed.

Title: Senede bir gün
Description: A young hapless couple's devotion for each other is tested through harsh times of war as they are forced to negate patriotism and dependability to their families and nations, for a length of a lifetime before during and after the war.

Title: Der Kapitän
Description: After Wilhelm Ebbs promotes to a cruise captain his longed for dream turns into a nightmare.

Title: Gold, Frankincense and Myrrh
Description: In an island town, a professor pensioned before his time, together with his wife, takes care of the hundred year old Maddona Makantuna, a dispossessed land owner.

Title: On est toujours trop bon avec les femmes
Nyama nishto po-hubavo ot loshoto vreme
Son hiçkirik
Description: Decades after the murder of his wife, a lonesome composer receives a letter from a boarding schoolmistress requesting a family home for an orphan girl who queerly turns an identical reminiscence of his late wife when she's grown up.

Title: Equinozio
Description: Psychiatrist takes young man to castle owned by strange woman, where the latter discovers he's the incarnation of a dead man.

Title: The Song of the Blood-Red Flower
Description: A glib log driver, Olavi, keeps sowing his wild oats. When the time comes for him to settle down he finds it difficult to trust anyone in view of his fickle past.

Title: Les coups pour rien
Description: Paul lives in Africa. He leads an honest and calm existence. Until the day when he found his friend Frankovich dead.

Title: La montaña rebelde
Description: Some events take place in a small hamlet of the mountains of Asturias, following the arrival of Abel, a young doctor, shortly before the outbreak of the Spanish Civil War.

Title: Na klancu
Description: Trials and tribulations of a woman in prewar Yugoslavia who after being seduced by a rich man, marries a poor one and struggles on. Based on a novel by Ivan Cankar.

Title: Üvey ana
Description: Lale is the young governess of Gül, daughter of the famous composer Emin. The girls get along very well, while the father Emin shows emotional interest in Lale. But Gül is suffering from a mysterious illness.

Title: Gagga
Description: A study of the political and religious fanaticism in Malta in the 60s.

Title: Mãos Vazias
Description: In a small town in the State of Minas Gerais, Brazil, a woman rebels against local morality after her child dies, with tragic results.

Title: Molodye
Description: Love test for two students in USSR's Moscow: 23-year old ambitious straightforward builder Alexei, and 20-year old Zhenya, the daughter of prosperous parents that already have a fiance for her.
