Title: Um Certo Capitão Rodrigo
Description: Fearless bohemian enters quiet city and wins the hearts of women and admiration of men while causing many conflicts.

Title: On the Run
Description: On moving to a new flat in London Ben meets neighborhood kids Lil and Thomas. But when they uncover a plot to kidnap Thomas the three decide to run away instead.

Title: Great Expectations
Description: A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.

Title: Gola savest
Description: An extremely honest forest ranger fights for the trust to the very end.

Title: As Confissões de Frei Abóbora
Description: Under an oppressive sun on the Xingu River, in the Brazilian Amazon, Frei Abóbora, feverish and delirious, recalls events from his life.

Title: Um Anjo Mau
Description: A poor and beautiful young woman living in the backwoods of the State of Minas Gerais, Brazil, is protected by a peasant.

Title: Der verlorene Engel
Description: August 24, 1937: a day in the life of expressionist sculptor/author Ernst Barlach.He lives in the small town of Güstrow, keeping to himself, not interested in politics. This day he learns that his sculptor in the Cathedral is gone.

Title: Akcja Brutus
Description: Undercover agent working for the State Security infiltrates the guerrilla fighters, who continue the struggle against communist authorities after the end of the war.

Title: Tjærehandleren
Description: In Sandemose's psychological drama, Audun Hamre is a respectable tar trader to the public eye. Behind the scenes he earns his living from deceiving women who wants to marry, stealing their fortune and committing crimes even more severe.

Title: Ieder van ons
Description: Depicts the ensuing discussion of world reform, revolution, pacifism and society on the spot. This engaging and well-argumented manifesto - a philosophical battle of words which deals mercilessly with modern consumer society.

Title: MASH
Description: The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and high jinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.

Title: Love Story
Description: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

Title: Catch-22
Description: A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.

Title: Airport
Description: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

Title: The Bird with the Crystal Plumage
Description: An American expatriate in Rome witnesses an attempted murder that is connected to an ongoing killing spree in the city, and despite himself and his girlfriend being targeted by the killer, he conducts his own investigation.

Title: Little Big Man
Description: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

Title: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
Description: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

Title: Myra Breckinridge
Description: After undergoing gender reassignment surgery, an aspiring actress travels to Hollywood, where she also wants to make a claim on her wealthy uncle's estate.

Title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
Description: The story of the 1941 Japanese air raid on Pearl Harbor, and the series of preceding American blunders that aggravated its effectiveness.

Title: The Conformist
Description: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

Title: Soldier Blue
Description: After a cavalry patrol is ambushed by the Cheyenne, the two survivors, a soldier and a woman, must reach the safety of the nearest fort.

Title: The Railway Children
Description: After the enforced absence of their father, three children move with their mother to Yorkshire, where during their adventures they attempt to discover the reason for his disappearance.

Title: Count Dracula
Description: Count Dracula, a gray-haired vampire who regains his youth by dining on the blood of maidens, is pursued in London and Transylvania by Professor Van Helsing, Jonathan Harker and Quincey Morris after he victimizes them and their loved ones.

Title: Diary of a Mad Housewife
Description: A housewife with an abusive husband has an affair with a writer.

Title: Scream and Scream Again
Description: A serial killer who drains his victims' blood is on the loose in London. The police follow him to a house owned by an eccentric scientist.

Title: Tristana
Description: Shortly after her mother's death, an innocent and youthful woman will find refuge into the household of her middle-aged aristocratic guardian, who will submit her to his sexual advances.

Title: The Horror of Frankenstein
Description: Scientist Victor Frankenstein builds a man from spare body parts; the monster comes alive and wreaks havoc.

Title: The Twelve Chairs
Description: In 1920s Soviet Russia, a fallen aristocrat, a priest and a con artist search for a treasure of jewels hidden inside one of twelve dining chairs, lost during the revolution.

Title: Girly
Description: A wealthy, fatherless British clan kidnaps bums and hippies and forces them to participate in an elaborate role-playing game in which they are the perfect family; those who refuse or attempt escape are ritualistically murdered.

Title: Norwood
Description: A Vietnam veteran returns to his Texas home but feels restless and decides to become a radio singer. Based on the novel by Charles Portis.

Title: Cold Sweat
Description: With his wife and daughter being held hostage, a seasoned ex-military man is involved in a shady smuggling operation to save his family.

Title: Colossus: The Forbin Project
Description: Thinking this will prevent war, the US government gives an impenetrable supercomputer total control over launching nuclear missiles. But what the computer does with the power is unimaginable to its creators.

Title: The Phantom Tollbooth
Description: Milo is a boy who is bored with life. One day he comes home to find a toll booth in his room. Having nothing better to do, he gets in his toy car and drives through - only to emerge in a world full of adventure.

Title: No Blade of Grass
Description: An environmental catastrophe destroys civilization. Led by father John and mother Ann, the Custance clan sets out on a quest for safety in a savage world that may just end up turning them into the very thing they are fleeing.

Title: The Landlord
Description: Hal Ashby makes his directing debut with this acclaimed social satire starring Beau Bridges as a wealthy young man who leaves his family's estate in Long Island to pursue love in a Brooklyn ghetto.

Title: I Walk the Line
Description: Henry Tawes, a middle-aged sheriff in a rural Tennessee town, is usually the first man to criticize others for their bad behavior. Miserable in his marriage, Henry falls in love with teenage Alma, who is the daughter of local criminal.

Title: The Things of Life
Description: A highway engineer is involved in a car crash, after which, near death, he remembers his life leading up to the accident.

Title: Dorian Gray
Description: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

Title: Where's Poppa?
Description: When an attorney meets the girl of his dreams, he fears that his batty mother will scare her off, so he schemes to eliminate the senile old woman.

Title: The Kremlin Letter
Description: During the Cold War a Naval Intelligence officer endowed with a powerful photographic memory is transferred to the CIA to participate in a covert operation in Moscow.

Title: Cotton Comes to Harlem
Description: Two Harlem cops investigate a robbery, believing that a reverend has staged it in order to steal the money he's collected for a local fundraiser.

Title: Dodes'ka-den
Description: Various tales in the lives of Tokyo slum dwellers, including a mentally deficient young man obsessed with driving his own commuter trolley.

Title: WUSA
Description: A radio station in the Deep South becomes the focal point of a right-wing conspiracy.

Title: Monte Walsh
Description: An aging cowboy realizes that the West he knew and loved will soon be no more--and that there will be no room for him, either.

Title: The Lady in the Car with Glasses and a Gun
Description: A secretary takes her boss's car for the holiday in the Mediterranean, oddly retracing a journey she has not taken, and is recognized by people she has not met before. Soon, things get serious.

Title: Getting Straight
Description: A Vietnam vet and former social radical is conflicted by his desire to become a teacher and his sympathy with anti-establishment student protests.

Title: The Garden of the Finzi-Continis
Description: The story of the Finzi-Continis, a noble family of Ferrara, during the Jewish persecution in Italy's 1930s.

Title: Witchhammer
Description: A very popular movie on the medieval persecution of witches (inquisition).

Title: Wuthering Heights
Description: Doomed lovers Catherine and Heathcliff are torn apart by their own selfishness and hate.

Title: The Looking Glass War
Description: From the John le Carré novel about a British spy, who sends a Polish defector to East Germany, to verify missile sites.

Title: The Cross and the Switchblade
Description: Long before faith-based films became a regular feature of mainstream movie theaters, there was The Cross and The Switchblade. The story of Pastor David Wilkerson and gang member, Nicki Cruz.

Title: Pippi in the South Seas
Description: With the help of her friends Tommy and Annika, Pippi Longstocking ventures to the South Pacific island Porto Piluse to rescue her father, who was captured by ruthless pirates.

Title: Skullduggery
Description: The missing-link is found on a safari in New Guinea. Is it human or animal?

Title: The Hawaiians
Description: Captain Whip returns to Hawaii. He's inherited "worthless" land. He starts a plantation, staffed with a Chinese couple from his ship. Drilling thru lava for water and stealing/smuggling pineapple from French Guyana, things look brighter.

Title: Tropic of Cancer
Description: The film depicts the adventures of expatriate American writer Henry Miller and his friends, as they pursue art, money, food, and sex in Paris.

Title: The Grasshopper
Description: A young woman's odyssey from innocence to decadence. Hopeful for a career in show business, Christine Adams leaves British Columbia with her boyfriend at age 19. But a detour to Las Vegas leads her into a life that no one would envy.

Title: The Strawberry Statement
Description: An apolitical college student joins a group of campus protesters to meet girls but gets swept up in their cause and involved in a violent confrontation with police.

Title: La califfa
Description: As strikes upset Italy, the Califfa's husband is killed and she becomes a passionate militant of the strikers. She opposes the factory manager Doverdo who used to be himself a worker.

Title: Darker Than Amber
Description: Professional beach bum and 'knight errant' Travis McGee goes up against psychotic body-builder Terry Bartell. McGee pulls out all the stops when he joins a Carribean cruise to bring the killer to justice.

Title: The Cop
Description: Barnero is a bitter cop working in a city he considers rotten.

Title: Pippi on the Run
Description: Fed up with their strict parents, Tommy and Annika run away from home, with their friend Pippi Longstocking to look after them in their long trek.

Title: Dirty Dingus Magee
Description: Dirty Dingus Magee and his old rival Hoke Birdsill take turns at being either lawman or outlaw and being rivals or partners in crime, depending of the circumstances.

Title: Tell Me That You Love Me, Junie Moon
Description: The story of three wildly neurotic characters: A facially disfigured girl, a homosexual paraplegic and an introvert epileptic who, after leaving the hospital, set up housekeeping together in a cottage where they support each other.

Title: Figures in a Landscape
Description: Two escapees are on the run in the wilderness of an unspecified country. Wherever they go, they are followed by a menacing black helicopter.

Title: Hoffman
Description: A businessman blackmails his attractive young secretary into spending a weekend with him. Though he's a creep throughout, he gradually emerges as a sympathetic character.

Title: The Deep
Description: A couple's honeymoon trip aboard a yacht leads to a claustrophobic drama when another vessel runs into their voyage, apparently drifting.

Title: The Magic Garden of Stanley Sweetheart
Move
Description: A young playwright who writes porno novels to overcome writer's block, lives the fantasies of one of his books while trying to move with his wife into a larger apartment.

Title: The Moonshine War
Description: A federal agent attempts to make some real money before the alcohol ban is lifted so he sets his sights on the whiskey cache of an old army buddy.

Title: The Games
Description: Four marathon runners (one from England, one from the U.S., a Czechoslovakian, and an Australian Aborigine) prepare to run in the Olympic games. The film follows each one and shows what their motivations are for running in the games.

Title: The McKenzie Break
Description: During WW2, German POWs in Britain plot to escape from their prison camp in Scotland.

Title: Rabbit, Run
Description: A crude man is stuck in a loveless marriage. One day he decides to run away from his life and family. First he finds a mistress, but just because a man runs away from one disappointment, doesn't mean he won't run into another one.

Title: Aranyer Din Ratri
Description: A group of Calcutta city slickers, including the well-off Asim (Soumitra Chatterjee), the meek Sanjoy (Subhendu Chatterjee) and the brutish Hari (Samit Bhanja), head out for a weekend in the wilderness.

Title: The Invincible Six
Description: In 1970s Iran, a motley group of international thieves saves an Iranian village from murderous local bandits.

Title: All the Right Noises
Description: A married theatre lighting technician with two small children has an affair with a teenage actress.

Title: One Day in the Life of Ivan Denisovich
Sensational Janine
Description: Josefine is a young streetwalker in Vienna at the turn of the 20th century. She manages to sleep her way to the top by marrying a British aristocrat, and she delights in telling ribald stories of her sordid past to moralistic prudes.

Title: A Walk in the Spring Rain
Description: The Merediths move to an isolated farm. Mrs. Meredith and the neighbour Will Cade become friends and anticipate becoming lovers.

Title: Many Wars Ago
Description: On the Italian/Austrian front during World War I, a disastrous Italian attack upon the Austrian positions leads to a mutiny among the Italian troops.

Title: Kyrkoherden
Description: A witch's daughter take revenge on a vicar and bewitches him so that he suffers constant erection.

Title: Fragment of Fear
Description: Reformed drug addict Tim Brett (David Hemmings) is vacationing in Italy with his aunt. When she is murdered, he tries to investigate, and soon his whole life is out of control.

Title: Loving
Description: In this romantic comedy/drama, George Segal stars as a freelance artist who's attempting to revitalize his career just as his marriage to Eva Marie Saint begins to fall apart. Co-starring David Doyle, Sterling Hayden and Kennan Wynn.

Title: Pratidwandi
Description: A young college graduate is struggling to find a job. He lives in a flat with his younger, employed sister, revolutionary brother and widowed mother. The strain of the situation ultimately causes him to hallucinate.

Title: The Virgin and the Gypsy
Description: The story, adapted from a novella by D.H. Lawrence, tells how the daughter of a staid Rector in the north of England, rebels against her family by having a relationship with a gypsy, and how "the voice of the water" triumphs in the end.

Title: The Mind of Mr. Soames
Description: A man who has been in a coma since infancy is awakened.

Title: Kati Patang
Description: A runaway bride promises her dying widowed friend that she will assume her identity and look after her infant child.

Title: Mr. Superinvisible
Description: A scientist becomes invisible after he swallows an Indian potion.

Title: The Sidelong Glances of a Pigeon Kicker
Brotherly Love
Description: Controversial tragicomedy about a brother's obsessive love for his sister. Having left her husband, Hilary moves in with her unbalanced brother, Pink, who uses wit and humor to hide his amorous yearnings.

Title: Hell Boats
Description: An American commander, serving under the British Royal Navy in 1942, is assigned to blockade the island of Malta and told to formulate a plan to destroy the Nazi arsenal in Sicily.

Title: Nana
Description: This adaptation of Emile Zola's novel "NANA," is about the sexual liaisons of a woman who through her relationships with different men, enjoys a life of pleasure and luxury. However, her lavish life-style does not always bring happiness.

Title: Goodbye Gemini
Description: Unnaturally close, jet-setting twins become enmeshed in the Swinging London scene, where their relationship is strained after they befriend a predatory hustler and his girlfriend.

Title: Mir hat es immer Spaß gemacht
Description: West German comedy film directed by Will Tremper and starring Barbi Benton.

Title: Promise at Dawn
Description: A Soviet silent-film actress (Melina Mercouri) raises her illegitimate son, who becomes the writer Romain Gary (Assaf Dayan).

Title: Metello
Description: Struggling with life in 18th-century Italy, young Metello Salani is determined to change his situation for the better - but love, marriage and politics complicate things considerably...

Title: Come Have Coffee with Us
Description: Emerenziano, a middle-aged tax inspector, is in search of a wealthy wife. He travels to Italy where he meets three sisters, who, though wealthy, are not by any stretch of the imagination young or beautiful. He decides to marry one of them.

Title: Jonathan
Description: In a apocalyptic 19th century landscape where wealthy vampires have taken over the world, a group of humans prepare an uprising, and select an adventurous young man to track down the leader of the undead and destroy him.

Title: Elle boit pas, elle fume pas, elle drague pas, mais... elle cause!
Description: Housemaid Georgette (Girardot) loves to gossip and this causes major trouble to people around her.

Title: Pero the Lump's Gang
Description: A group of village children decide to secretly renovate the old mill, in order to have fun and a place to spend the summer vacation.

Title: Flap
Description: Comedy based on the plight of modern aboriginal Americans living on reservations.

Title: The Revolutionary
Description: A radical student feels that he has been betrayed by the college association to which he belongs, and thinks more violent actions must be taken in order to alter the existing system.

Title: A Girl Called Jules
Description: Teen girl Jules must deal with her budding sexuality, and the fact that some men and women want her adds to her confusion.

Title: A Day at the Beach
Description: Bernie, a self-destructive alcoholic, is given watch over his niece Winnie. He tests the patience of the various people he knows and Winnie is often left on her own.

Title: Up in the Cellar
Description: A student poet seduces his college President's wife, daughter, and girlfriend over lost financial aid.

Title: Strogoff
Description: A captain in the Czar's army encounters danger and romance while carrying a secret message across 19th-century Russia.

Title: The Hero
Description: Eitan is yesterday's football star waiting for a tomorrow. He is a man who has nothing left but guts consulting the prospects of having to find a new profession and having to face a loving woman who doesn't understand his problems.

Title: Dead of Summer
Description: Joyce is alone in her luxurious apartment in Morocco, trying to cool down during a heat wave but also suffering from anxiety and sexual frustration. She holds a party, goes to the beach, and meets her physician. But where's her husband?

Title: Hoa Binh
Description: A small Vietnamese boy grows up during the horrors and hardships of The Vietnam War era.

Title: Robinson Crusoe
Description: A man struggles to survive after being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

Title: The French Cousins
Description: A disabled young woman is tormented by two female cousins who play sexual games while she's unable to escape from them.

Title: How Do I Love Thee?
Description: Stanley Waltz (Jackie Gleason) is seeking forgiveness in Lourdes, France, after a good deed had backfired at him, regarding a poem "How do I love thee?".

Title: The Delta Factor
Description: Kim Stacy and Morgan are two CIA Agents on a secret mission to rescue a scientist imprisoned by terrorists on a remote island.

Title: Meu Pé de Laranja Lima
Description: Poor boy treats a sweet lemon tree as his only friend, talking to it, and learning important values in the process. But one day the tree must be cut.

Title: Skal vi leke gjemsel?
Description: Five persons, all on their own are having a holiday at a summer pension get to know each other, without telling to much about themselves.

Title: The Night of the Assassin
Description: During the civil war in Cyprus, an island nation split between the Greeks and the Turks, a British peacekeeping officer is trying to prevent a Greek guerrilla fighter from escalating the violent situation even further.

Title: Trop petit mon ami
Description: Ticky Edriss, a dwarf, develops a scheme to avenge him on society and extort a bank.

Title: Hurra for de blå husarer
Description: How do you choose a new lieutenant for the cavalry in 1893? Send them riding all night, during which they must drink 3 litres of champagne and have 2 love affairs.

Title: Safety Catch
Description: A doctor struck off the order for euthanasia is called by a man to help his depressed son since the suicide of his companion.

Title: The Set
Description: Paul Lawrence is a working class man who dates Cara, sells shirts at a Sydney department store, and dreams of attending art school.

Title: Only the Cool
Description: A network of spies affects the lives of people in and out of the organization in this routine espionage drama.

Title: La vida inútil de Pito Pérez
Denki kurage
Description: An exploitation sex drama just this side of pinku-eiga with yakuza elements.

Title: L'asino d'oro: processo per fatti strani contro Lucius Apuleius cittadino romano
Description: In ancient Mauretania, the young Roman Lucius Apuleius and his friend Aristomene run into a series of misadventures.

Title: La maison des bories
Description: Two platonic lovers in the sunny landscapes of south France.

Title: L'alliance
Description: A vet meets a mysterious woman through a dating agency and moves into her large apartment. As the apartment fills with animals and insects, strange goings on and suspicions between the couple increase.

Title: Mont-Dragon
Description: The story involves a soldier, Georges Dormond, who seduces Germaine de Boismesnil and is subsequently driven out of the army by one of Germaine's friends who is a colonel.

Title: Ankara ekspresi
Description: During World War II, Germany aims to conquer Turkey with an operation which is Ankara Express. German spy Hilda and Turkish major Seyfi engage in a dangerous relationship while they work for Ankara Express operation.

Title: Kaidan Kasane-ga-fuchi
Description: A blind masseur sleeps with the wife of a samurai, who catches them in the act and kills them. The murdered couple return as vengeful ghosts. This film is a remake of a 1957 film. It was the final picture made by Daiei Studios.

Title: The Knight of the Sword
Description: The life story of Argentine independence hero Jose de San Martin.

Title: La banda de los tres crisantemos
Bjurra
Description: A couple of leaders and thirteen kids arrive on the island Bjurra, and when the woman breaks her leg the kids are told to go back home. In stead they take over the island.

Title: Akseli and Elina
Description: A former Red Rebellion leader returns home after being imprisoned for his participation in the Finnish Civil War, but soon finds out that wartime mindsets still linger in the heads of people.

Title: La mentira
Description: A man, torn inside by two passions, falls for the woman against whom he sought revenge, believing her to be responsible for the death of his brother.

Title: Un caso di coscienza
Description: Discovering that a woman from their small town in Sicily cheated on her husband, a group of upper class men investigate and try to identify her.

Title: OSS 117 prend des vacances
Description: OSS 177 goes on holiday to Brazil, but is called into action when he finds himself being stalked by a double.

Title: Ils
Description: A young painter becomes increasingly hostile and confrontational after the death of his father. He eventually finds a friend in an aging scientist who is working on a strange experiment.

Title: Memoirs of a Gigolo
Description: Man raised in a brothel tries to earn his living as a pimp, but gets in trouble when his girlfriend cheats him with an older man.

Title: L'araignée d'eau
Description: Bernard, an entomologist, moves to the country with his wife to write in peace and quiet. When he brings home a water spider their lives change irrevocably as the insect transforms into a beautiful young woman.

Title: The Falcons
Description: The daily routine of a falconry shows the newcomer how order through dictatorship can and cannot work.

Title: The Bridge in the Jungle
Description: In this sequel to THE TREASURE OF THE SIERRA MADRE, John Huston portrays a tequila-swigging crocodile hunter who heads into the jungles of Mexico. He has been warned that only native Indians can survive there...

Title: Lilika
Description: A story about young orphan girl who was rejected by her mother.

Title: Nippon no akuryo
Description: Murase is a bodyguard in a yakuza group. Ochiai is a police officer who once was a student activist. When they meet, they are surprised how identical they look. They decide to trade places with each other.

Title: Strange Holiday
Description: Ten young boys are shipwrecked somewhere in Oceania.

Title: L'amore coniugale
Description: In a noble villa of Bagheria, near Palermo, two spouses, Silvio and Leda Pataneo, spend their days devoting themselves mainly to the care of a citrus grove.

Title: Trip Around My Cranium
Description: Based on the autobiographical novel by Frigyes Karinthy in which the author shares his experiences on finding out having a brain tumor and undergoing brain surgery in the 1930s.

Title: Schmetterlinge weinen nicht
Description: In their wintry snowy resort, the financially notoriously clammy girlfriends Cecily and Laura see from their hotel window the established Munich businessman Karl Engelmann, a middle-aged man, with his BMW ancestor.

Title: La larga agonía de los peces fuera del agua
La modification
Description: While on a train to Rome, Léon muses about his love life after leaving his wife.

Title: Yakuza Masterpiece
Description: NOTHING SHORT OF BRILLIANT. MINDBLOWING.

Title: Birlesen yollar
Description: The paths of Feyza and Bilal, who are from different worlds, cross again after years.

Title: Der Bettenstudent oder Was mach' ich mit den Mädchen?
Divina Gracia
Description: Two identical sisters vying for the attention of one man they both love.

Title: Pour un sourire
Description: A deserter who has lost all hope meets with a little girl in a ruined city.

Title: El hombre que se quiso matar
Cleo e Daniel
Description: A young and sensitive couple's impossible love affair.

Title: Apart from Life
Description: Dr. Unan is asked to treat a young girl with A-bomb disease symptoms but her mother denies being in Nagasaki at the time of the bombing. Another young girl, Tokuko, asks Unan to write her a "Proof of Rape".

Title: Douglas
Description: Douglas is a slippery stuck-up policeman, working in the intelligence services, who thinks his status makes it ok to make other people's life miserable.

Title: Tintomara
Description: In March 1792 the Swedish King Gustav III is murdered at a masked ball. Five young people are involved in the murder story, including Tintomara, a 17 year old inter-sex who dominates over the others.

Title: Slap in the Face
Description: A communist woman bursts naked into a bank accusing bankers of being capitalist manipulators.

Title: Küçük hanimefendi
Description: A young woman abandoned by her husband starts a new life and re-creating herself.

Title: A Guerra dos Pelados
Description: In 1913, in the state of Santa Catarina, Brazil, the Government gives some lands to a foreign railway company, giving rise to revolt by the former owners of the land. The episode became known as Guerra dos Pelados.

Title: Con alma y vida
Description: A prostitute, a criminal and his passionate love - loyal to the end.

Title: Little Remi and Famous Dog Capi
Description: Japanese animation adaptation of a 19th century French novel: A boy is given up by his foster parents to a traveling performer.

Title: Uma Mulher Para Sábado
Description: Existential drama involving two men (Portho, Di Pietro) and two young women (Prieto, Knaut) who experiment in breaking social, sexual and psychological barriers in a weekend at a beach house.

Title: Baltutlämningen
Description: In 1945 about 3 000 German soldiers and a 167 Baltic legionaries came as refugees to Sweden. Those who came via the island Gotland were first detained there, in a camp next to Havdhem.

Title: Good-Bye Nana
Description: A film that questions the right of parents to force their children into the adult world's rational behavior. A 6-year-old revolt by going to a lawyer and ask for a divorce from their parents.

Title: O Enterro da Cafetina
Description: While Dona Betina, owner of a very famous bordello in Rio de Janeiro, was being buried, an old scoundrel remembers his own past.

Title: Favorite Children's Books: The Wizard of Oz
Vale do Canaã
Description: The film depicts the arrival of immigrants in the city of Espírito Santo following the history of Carlos, an Italian who struggles for his place against Hermann Gunter, a German colonist who rules the region.

Title: De många sängarna
Description: Jeanette is an inmate at a juvenile prison. She contemplates her life which has been miserable ever since birth.

Title: Bülbül Yuvasi
Description: Feridun begins to live in the same house with Hatice and her daughter, who are distant relatives, in order to fulfill his father's will.

Title: Güller ve dikenler
Description: Only a field of roses, lovers of which meet to leave behind a deceased family father's oath to take revenge from a loan shark whose traumatized wife falls in love with his innocent orphan, can ever end this forbidden love affair.

Title: Jänken
Description: Inger gets pregnant with an American man who abandons her. Maskot moves in with Inger. She wants them to start a relationship, but the Maskot has other plans. He performs several thefts and uses Ingers apartment as a hub.
